eng_prompt: To ensure a successful harvest, it's important to consider the ideal climate for planting. Many gardeners find that certain vegetables thrive when exposed to higher temperatures.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa amakungula amalungi, kikulu okulowooza ku mbeera y'obudde esinga obulungi ey'okusimba. Abalimi b'ensuku bangi bakizuula nti enva endiirwa ezimu zikula bulungi bwe zibeera mu bbugumu ery'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kac tye maber, pire tek tutwal me niang piny ma ber pi pito kodi. Lupur mapol ginongo ni pot dek mukene dongo kace ki keto gi kama lyeto tye iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aisak, ejokuna aomoom ejautene loajokan loka ikwamin kanu aira. Edumunenete akoriok luipu ebe epoloete icie idiasio ejok arai ejai toma amwanis naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ori okuzu kililiru, eri orodriru e'yo angu mile ni ori sazu kililiru ri ma dria. Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma karakara eyi esu kini tibi ini azi 'diyi ezo muke eyi ka eyi 'ba angu driza ru 'diyi ma alea ria.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu okusharuura kurungi, n'eky'omugasho kumanya obwire burungi bw'okubyara. Abahiingi baingi nibashanga ngu emboga ezimwe nizikura kurungi zaaba ziri aha bbugumu ry'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: Farmers often face various obstacles in their work, ranging from unpredictable weather patterns to fluctuating market prices. One significant aspect of their struggle lies in managing the complexities of farmland.
lug_prompt: Abalimi batera okusanga obuzibu bungi mu mirimu gyabwe, okuva ku mbeera y'obudde etategeerekeka okutuuka ku bbeeyi y'ebintu ekyukakyuka mu katale. Ensonga emu enkulu mu lutalo lwabwe eri mu kuddukanya ebizibu by'ettaka ly'okulimirako.
ach_prompt: Lupur ipol kare ginongo peko mapol tutwal I tic gi, cakke ki lok pa piny ma pe gitwero niang iye wang ma oo I lok pa wel jami I cuk. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I lweny meggi obedo tic matek I kom ngom me pur.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc akoriok adumun atiokisio nuegelegela kotoma aswamukec, anyoun kotoma ejautene loka ikwamin keda aijulanakineta nuka itiaisinei kosokoni. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luepedorete kesi aswam erai aitemonokin atiokisio nuka alupok nu akoru.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBa amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi sawa driasi eꞌyo ewaru karakara yi esu azi yini ꞌdiyi ma alia, eꞌdozu eꞌyo angu mile ni ꞌbani nile ku ꞌdiyi vu kpere aje cuu ma alia ꞌdiyi ma ojata vu. E'yo azi orodriru a'di 'diza yiniri ma alia ri e'yo ewaru nyaku ori ezozani 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi omu mirimo yaabo, okuruga aha mbeera y'obwire etarikwetegyerezibwa kuhisya aha kuhinduka kw'emihendo omu katare. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho omu kurwana kwabo, n'okurwanisa oburemeezi bw'eitaka ry'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: As global demand for coffee continues to rise, it is essential to explore sustainable agricultural practices. Increasing coffee production can provide economic benefits to farmers and contribute to local communities.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'emmwanyi mu nsi yonna bweyongera okulinnya, kya mugaso okunoonyereza ku nnima ez'obuwangaazi. Okwongera ku bulimi bw'emmwanyi kisobola okuwa abalimi emiganyulo mu byenfuna n'okuyamba abantu b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me mwanyi tye ka medde I wilobo lung, pire tek tutwal me yenyo yoo me pur matye anyim. Medo rwom me pur pa mwanyi twero weko lupur nongo cente madwong ki bene konyo lwak ma ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda loka emwanyi kotoma akwap kere, ejokuna noi aimo iwaitin lu akoru. Aiyatakin aitolomio naka emwanyi epedori ayangaun ameda naka ikapun mama ejaasi akoriok keda itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Kava ma cu wudrikurusi ndulu ri ni mu drile tu, eri orodriru e'yo ori ezoza ni 'diyi ma vuti ondazu. Kawa ma edeta ma omgbo otuzuri eco orodri e'yo robiani 'diyi eji 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri azini eco orodri fe ongulumu angu ma alia 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetaago by'omwani omu nsi yoona nibigumizamu nibyeyongyera, niky'omugasho okuronda emiringo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikugumizamu. Okwongyera aha buhingi bw'omwani, nikibaasa kuhwera abahingi n'abariisa n'abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: In response to rising food insecurity and economic challenges, the government has prioritized agricultural development. This shift aims to enhance self-sufficiency and boost the livelihoods of rural communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebbula ly'emmere eryeyongera n'okusoomoozebwa mu by'enfuna, gavumenti ekulembezza enkulaakulana y'ebyobulimi. Enkyukakyuka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula okweyimirizaawo n'okutumbula embeera z'abantu mu byalo.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me can cam matye kamede ki peko me can lim, gamente oketo pi dongo lobo me pur obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Aloka-loka man tye ki miti me medo rwom me kwo pa dano ki bene ilo malo rwom me kwo pa dano ma icaro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin amamus na inyamat keda atiokisio nuka ikapun, abu apugan isingarenit aitopol akoru. Alosikinet naka aijulanakineta ngun erai aitojokar aijar naka itunga luka ocaloi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nyaka ako ni tuzu tualu e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi pie, gamete 'ba e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi okporu. Asisile ojataa 'di niri lezu e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si ri ma omgbo otuzu azini geri eyini aa'zu angu caloru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eibura ry'eby'okurya eryeyongyeire hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya, gavumenti etandikire kutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Empindahinduka egi negyenderera okwongyera okwetunguura n'okutunguura emituurire y'abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: Many factors contribute to the health of plants, including water, soil quality, and light exposure. Among these, sunlight is crucial for photosynthesis, and without it, plants struggle to survive.
lug_prompt: Ensonga nnyingi ziviirako obulamu bw'ebimera, omuli amazzi, omutindo gw'ettaka n'ekitangaala. Mu bino, ekitangaala ky'omusana kya mugaso nnyo mu kukola ebimera, era awatali ekyo, ebimera birwana okuwangaala.
ach_prompt: Tye jami mapol ma kelo yotkom pa jami apita, ma I kingi obedo pii, rwom me ngom ki mac. I kin magi, ceng obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi yubu mac, dok labongo ne, jami apita tute matek me kwo.
teo_prompt: Ipu iboro lu eyangaunete angaleu naka iraan, aimoriarit akipi, adoketait na alupok keda aica. Kotoma iboro lu, ejokuna noi akolong kanu aitolomun akim, ido komamei ngesi, etiono iraan aijar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi fe ori eyini aa'zu rua ala be, eyi ma eselea yi, nyaku ma wura kililiru ri tualu angu eyini aa'zu angu 'da ma alea ri pie. Afa 'diyi ma eselea, etuka ma etuka eri orodriru e'yo aci ni 'diyi 'yezu, dika eri kokoru, ori yi dri ci idri ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Hariho enshonga nyingi ezirikureetaho amagara marungi g'ebimera, otwariiremu amaizi, omutindo gw'eitaka hamwe n'ekyererezi. Omuri ebi, omushana n'ogw'omugasho munonga omu kukoresa ebimera, kandi hatariho omushana, ebimera nibirwana kubaho.

eng_prompt: As we explore options for improving our crop yields, it's crucial to identify varieties that can withstand environmental challenges. Additionally, we need to ensure that these varieties appeal to consumers in the marketplace.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tunoonyereza ku ngeri y'okutumbula amakungula gaffe, kikulu nnyo okuzuula ebika ebisobola okugumira okusoomoozebwa kw'obutonde bw'ensi. Okwongerako, twetaaga okukakasa nti ebika bino bisikiriza abaguzi mu katale.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka yenyo yoo me medo rwom me kac, pire tek tutwal me niang kwai cam mapat-pat matwero lweny i kom peko me cwec ma orumuwa. Medo i kom meno, omyero wanen ni kodi magi oyomo cwiny luwil.
teo_prompt: Kwape iuta sio airereor iwaitin lu itojokarere akoru na iraan, ejokuna noi ajenun iponesio lu epedorete aitikitik atiokisio nu ekwam. Kilema, ekot oni awanyun ebe eminasi itunga lu agwelak ikorion lu.
lgg_prompt: Amani geri amani ecozu ori amavile 'diyi ma ori ezozuri ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ondazu, eri orodriru wura ecopi e'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma ta mbapi ra 'diyi esuzu. Azi dika, le ama ma ne ra kini wura ndundu 'diyi leki 'ba afa je'baa cu'a 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitusherura oburyo bw'okutunguura amasharuura, n'eky'omugasho kumanya ebika ebirikubaasa kugumira oburemeezi bw'obuhangwa. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, twine kureeba ngu ebika ebi nibishemeza abaguzi omu butare.

eng_prompt: In regions where cassava is a staple crop, farmers rely heavily on the availability of quality planting materials. Ensuring a steady supply of cassava stems is crucial for successful cultivation and harvest.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu ebirimu muwogo ng'ekirime ekikulu, abalimi beesigama nnyo ku kubeerawo kw'ebikozesebwa mu kusimba eby'omutindo. Okufuna ebikoola bya muwogo buli kaseera kya mugaso nnyo mu kulima n'okukungula obulungi.
ach_prompt: I but lobo ma gwana obedo cam ma dano mapol pito, lupur jenge tutwalle I kom jami apita ma rwom gi malo. Neno ni gwana tye mapol kare ki kare pire tek tutwal pi poto ki kac maber.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuejaasi emuogo keda iraan lu itwasamao noi, emunokina akoriok noi adumun iboro lu iraan lu ejokuka. Ajenun ebe ejai emwogo duc ejok kanu akoru ka aisak.

eng_prompt: Despite the gardener's best efforts to nurture the plants, a sudden outbreak of blight has taken hold. As a result, the once-thriving garden is now struggling to recover.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'omulimi akoze kyonna ekisoboka okukuza ebimera, obulwadde bw'omusujja gw'ensiri bubaluseewo mangu. N'ekivuddemu, ennimiro eyali ekulaakulana kati erwana okudda engulu.

eng_prompt: As a farmer looking to optimize my crop yield, I'm interested in understanding the current trends and pricing for sweet potatoes. I want to ensure I'm making informed decisions about planting and selling my produce.
lug_prompt: Ng'omulimi anoonya okutumbula amakungula gange, njagala okumanya emitendera egiriwo n'ebbeeyi y'amatooke. Njagala okukakasa nti nsalawo bulungi ku by'okusimba n'okutunda ebirime byange.

nyn_prompt: Nk'omuhingi orikugyezaho kwongyera ahamikorero y'ebihingirwe bye, nyine ekihika ky'okumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho n'emihendo y'ebitookye. Ninyenda kuhamya ngu ninkora encwamu nungi ahaby'okubyara n'okuguza ebihingirwe byangye.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, we finally found a way to reach a larger audience. With the support of the community, we approached the local radio station for help in promoting our farm.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga tukola n'obunyiikivu, twasobola okutuuka ku bantu bangi. Olw'obuyambi bw'ekitundu, twatuukirira leediyo y'omu kitundu okufuna obuyambi mu kutumbula ffaamu yaffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, dong wa nongo yoo me oo bot lwak mapol. Ki kony pa lwak, wapenyo kony ki redio me cato fam wa.

eng_prompt: With the increasing demand for sustainable farming practices, I needed a reliable source for agricultural advice. Fortunately, mobile technology has made accessing vital information much easier.

teo_prompt: Keda eipud loepol noi loka akoru, akoto eong aiboisit na emunoi eong aicoreta nuka akoru. Arereng najokan, einakinit etatai loakwana adumunun akiro nuepolok noi.

eng_prompt: While planning a tropical-themed dinner party, I realized I wanted to incorporate some exotic flavors. As a result, I found myself searching for passion fruit information.

ach_prompt: Ikare ma atye kayubu yub me kwero cam me otyeno ma kilwongo ni tropical-themed-dinner party, aniang ni amito medo jami matye ki moc cam mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat Macalo adwogi ne, anongo ni atye ka yenyo ngec i kom nyig yat ma kilwongo ni passion fruit.

eng_prompt: To ensure that farmers can make informed decisions about their crops, it is essential to provide them with relevant market data. Access to this information will help them understand pricing trends and demand for bananas.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti abalimi basobola okusalawo obulungi ku birime byabwe, kikulu nnyo okubawa obubaka obukwata ku katale. Okufuna obubaka buno kijja kubayamba okutegeera emiwendo gy'ebijanjaalo n'obwetaavu bwabyo.

teo_prompt: Kanu aanyun ebe epedorete akoriok aiswamaun aseununeta nuikamunitos iraanakec, ejokuna aijaikin kes akiro nuikamunitos esokoni. Adumunun akiro nu ingarakini kesi amisiikin itiaisinei lu etaget keda eipuda lo etaget.
lgg_prompt: Lezu 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ma ni ra kini eyi eco peta kililiru 'du ori eyivile 'diyi ma dria ra, eri orodriru eyidri e'yo cuu ni 'diyi fezu. O'duko 'di esuzu ri ni nga eyi ma aza ko aje a'bua eyini 'diyi ma dria azini afa eyini lele a'bua eyini 'diyi ma dria 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu abahingi nibabaasa kucwamu kurungi aha bikwatiraine n'ebihingirwe byabo, n'eky'omugasho kubaheereza amakuru agarikukwata aha katare. Okubona amakuru aga nikiija kubahwera kwetegyereza emihendo y'ebitookye hamwe n'obwetaavu bwabyo.

eng_prompt: To ensure a successful harvest, farmers must select high-quality seedlings that can thrive in their local conditions. Access to reliable sources of information about reputable seedling suppliers is crucial for making informed decisions.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa amakungula amalungi, abalimi balina okulonda endokwa ez'omutindo ogwa waggulu ezisobola okukula obulungi mu mbeera zaabwe. Okufuna ensibuko z'amawulire ezesigika ku batunda ensigo ez'ettutumu kikulu nnyo mu kukola okusalawo okulungi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kac tye maber, lupur omyero guyer kodi ma rwom gi malo dok twero dongo maber I kabedo gi. Bedo ki yoo me nongo ngec ma genne I kom lucat kodi matye ki nying maber pire tek tutwal I moko tam matye ki ngec matut.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ekoriete akoriok ejok, ekot akoriok aseun ikito luejokuka luepedorete apolo kotoma ojautene kec. Adumunun aiboisio nu itigogongoritai nuikamunitos agwelanarak ikinyom lu ejokuka erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBani ani ꞌba amvu ꞌyazu kililiru, le ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma pe ori wura onyiru ꞌbani ecozu zozu kililiru angu yini ma alia ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi. Geri 'bani ecozu o'duko esuzu 'ba ori ozipi kililiru 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo 'duzu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu basharuura kurungi, abahingi bashemereire kuronda embibo z'omutindo gw'ahaiguru, ezirikubaasa kukurira omu mbeera zaabo. Okutunga oburugo bw'amahurire oburikwesigwa oburikukwata ahari abo abarikuguza embibo n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kucwamu kurungi.

eng_prompt: Farmers in the region often seek reliable sources for their agricultural needs. They rely on local vendors to provide essential supplies for successful crop production.
lug_prompt: Abalimi mu kitundu batera okunoonya ensibuko eyeesigika ey'ebyetaago byabwe eby'obulimi. Beesigama ku batembeeyi b'omu kitundu okubawa ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kulima obulungi.
ach_prompt: Lupur ma ikabedo eni ipol kare giyenyo kama gi twero nongo iye jami ma mite pi pur gi. Gi jenge I kom lucat me tedero me miyo jami ma mite pi pito cam maber.
teo_prompt: Etapit akoriok lu atutubet aimo iponesio luabeit luka aitodolikin iboro lu akoru kec. Emunokina kesi agwelanarak luka atutubet kanu ainakin kesi iboro lu itwasamao kanu akoru iraan lu ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tutuni geri 'bani ecozu eyi ma agirikica ma tambazu 'diyi nda. Yi yi ati 'ba afa ozipi angu 'da ma alea ogogo 'diyi ma dria afa orodriru 'diyi fezu ori eyi ma ezota drile suzaru.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa b'omu kyanga, nibakira kuronda oburugo oburikwesigwa bw'ebintu ebibarikwetenga omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Nibeesiga abashubuzi b'omwihanga, okubaheereza ebintu by'omugasho omu kuhinga kwabo.

eng_prompt: Many rural communities rely on radio broadcasts for essential agricultural knowledge. These programs play a crucial role in educating farmers about best practices and resources available to them.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu byalo bangi beesigama ku leediyo okufuna amagezi agakwata ku bulimi n'obulunzi. Pulogulaamu zino zikola omulimu munene mu kusomesa abalimi ku nkola ennungi n'ebikozesebwa ebiriwo gye bali.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma icaro gijenge I kom redio pi nongo ngec mapigi tego I kom pur. Yub magi konyo totwal me pwonyo lupur i kom yoo me tic maber ki jami ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lukocaloi itwasamaete iredion kanu adumun acoa na akoru. Iswamaete ainapeta nu aswam naepol noi kanu aisisianakin akoriok nuikamunitos iponesio luajokak ka iboro lu ejaas kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi yi ati e'yo radio ni 'diyi ma dria onita orodriru agirikica ma dria 'diyi esuzu. Otita 'diyi azi okporu nga imbata fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri geri onyiru 'diyi ma dria azini afa yini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omubyaro nibegamira aha reediyo kutunga obwengye bw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Puroguraamu ezi nizikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kwegyesa abahingi n'abariisa emiringo nungi y'okukoresa hamwe n'ebintu ebirikuba biriho.

eng_prompt: Farmers in the region are looking for resilient crops that can thrive in local conditions. One promising option is cassava, known for its adaptability and nutritional value.
lug_prompt: Abalimi mu kitundu banoonya ebirime ebigumira embeera ebiyinza okukula obulungi mu mbeera y'ekitundu. Ekimu ku biyinza okukozesebwa ye muwogo, ogumanyiddwa olw'obwangu bwagwo n'omugaso gwagwo mu by'endya.
ach_prompt: Lupur me twok piny eni gitye ka yenyo kodi ma tek ma twero dongo maber i kabedo gi. Yo acel maber tutwal obedo gwana, ma oywek tutwal pi ber pa cam ma en tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Eutasi akoriok luka atutubet aimo ikorion luepedorete aitojokaar ejautene lo akwap. Idiopebore yenepedori aswam ngun ngesi emuogo, ejenara noi kanu aijulanakineta ke keda ajokis naka inyamat.

eng_prompt: Timely access to agricultural data is crucial for effective farm management. Early warnings about potential disease threats can significantly impact crop yields and overall farm productivity.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amawulire agakwata ku byobulimi mu budde kikulu nnyo mu kuddukanya obulungi ffaamu. Okulabulwa nga bukyali ku ndwadde ezisobola okutiisa biyinza okukosa ennyo amakungula g'ebirime n'ebirime okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Nongo ngec ikit me pur ikare ki kome pire tek tutwal pi doro tic me pur maber. Ciko dano con i kom peko me two twero kelo adwoki marac i kom kac ki jami apita.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akiro nuka akoru kotoma apak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu eyaitene loajokan loka akor. Ikwenyaritai sek nuikamunitos adekasinei nuepedorete aitukurian iraan keda aswam na akoru.
lgg_prompt: O'duko agirikica ma dria 'diyi esuzu sa'wa dria ri eri orodriru amvu 'yaza kililiru ri ni. O'duko bile ndu liza e'yo azo ecopi ori fepi ra 'diyi ma dria ri eco orodri ori ezoza ni azini afa ofule amvu 'diyi ma dria ri oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amakuru agarikukwata ahaby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu bwire, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okureeberera e faamu kurungi. Okuhaburwa bukiri kare aha ndwara ezirikubaasa kutiinisa, nikibaasa kurabanisamu munonga amasharuura g'ebihingirwe hamwe n'ebirikuruga omu faamu.

eng_prompt: Effective management of crops is crucial for maximizing yield and ensuring sustainability. One key aspect of this management is understanding and mitigating the impact of plant diseases.
lug_prompt: Okukwasaganya obulungi ebirime kya mugaso nnyo mu kwongera ku makungula n'okukakasa obuwangaazi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nzirukanya eno kwe kutegeera n'okukendeeza ku buzibu bw'endwadde z'ebirime.
ach_prompt: Gwoko cam maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me medo kac ki dongo pa cam. Gin acel ma pire tek ma omyero kitim en aye niang ki gengo peko ma two jami apita kelo.
teo_prompt: Aidar iraan ejok ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aiyatakin esakan keda aitojokar ejautene lo akoru. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis lu eyaitene lo ngesi amisiikin ka aitikitik atiokisio nuka adekasinei nu iraan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ori eyi ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru afa ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea. E'yo azi okporu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu ri eri vata azini e'yo azo ori eyini 'diyi ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeberera kurungi ebihingirwe n'eky'omugasho munonga, okureeba ngu eby'ebihingirwe bigumireho. Ekikuru omu kukora eki n'okwetegyereza n'okukyendeeza aha kabi k'endwara z'ebihingirwe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve crop yields and quality, a local agricultural extension program has been established. As part of this initiative, experts gather to share their knowledge with the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula amakungula n'omutindo gw'ebirime, enteekateeka y'okugaziya ebyobulimi mu kitundu etandikiddwawo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakugu bakungaana okugabana amagezi gaabwe n'abantu.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me kac ki rwom me cam, yub me medo rwom me pur I tedero kiketo. Macalo but yub man, ludiro gure me nywako ngec gi ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae loka iraan keda adoketait, etolomun ainapeta nuka akoru. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, iriamununete ipirioitin aimor acoa kec keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba ori efiza ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do otita agirikica ma omgbo otuzu angu 'da ma alea. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi tra yi ma ondua awazu o'bi yi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura amasharuura n'omutindo gw'ebihingirwe, enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omwihanga eteirweho. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekigyendererwa eki, abakugu nibeeteerana okugabana okumanya kwabo n'abantu.

eng_prompt: In today's unpredictable climate, agricultural success heavily relies on accurate forecasting. As a result, many farmers are seeking expert guidance on weather patterns to optimize their planting and harvesting schedules.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'obudde ey'ennaku zino etategeerekeka, obuwanguzi mu byobulimi businziira nnyo ku kuteebereza okutuufu. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi bangi banoonya okulambikibwa abakugu ku mbeera y'obudde okusobola okulongoosa enteekateeka zaabwe ez'okusimba n'okukungula.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma dano pe ngeyo ngo matye ka time, loc me pur jenge tutwalle I kom byek ma tye kakare. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur mapol tye ka yenyo kony ki bot ludiro I kom kit ma piny bedo kwede me yubu yub me pur ki kac gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene lo mam ejena, akerianut naka akoru esipokinitai kotoma aomisio nuajokak. Kanuka ngun, eutasi akoriok luipu aimo aicoreta nuka ipirioitin kanuikamunitos ekuse ka etepe.
lgg_prompt: Angu ewu andruri ma alea e'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma alea, agirikica ma drile suza ni asi'ba e'yo 'bani ega kililiru 'diyi ma dria. nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera y'obwire egi etarikwetegyerezibwa, obusinguzi omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibwegamira munonga aha kuteebereza okuhikire. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi baingi nibasherura obuhabuzi kuruga omu bakugu aha mbeera y'obwire, kugira ngu babaase kuhinga n'okusharuura kurungi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for sustainable crops, the government has prioritized agricultural support initiatives. Recently, the ministry has focused on enhancing food security by promoting the cultivation of cassava among local farmers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'ebirime ebiwangaala, gavumenti ekulembezza enteekateeka z'okuwagira ebyobulimi. Gye buvuddeko, minisitule etadde essira ku kutumbula eby'okulya ng'etumbula okulima muwogo mu balimi b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me cam ma dongo kare ki kare, gamente oketo cwak ikit me pur obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Cocoki, gangkal oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom medo rwom me cam kun tyelo kor pur pa gwana ikin lupur me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakin lo ikorion lu ejarete, abu apugan isingarenit agangat na akoru. Apakio nu, epodokinit erionget aitojokar inyamat kowai lo aitopolor akoru emwogo kanejaas akoriok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu nyaka eyi ma ezoanzi eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ra risi, gamete 'ba okpo e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi atizu 'diyi ma dria. O'du 'diyi ma alia, okalamvu 'di 'ba asi e'yo nyaka ma tambaza ma omgbo otuzu geri gbanda ezoza ma omgbo otuzu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi ma eselea risi.

eng_prompt: Given the numerous benefits of home gardening, including improved mental health and access to fresh produce, community leaders are encouraging residents to cultivate their own green spaces. This initiative aims to promote sustainability and self-sufficiency within the district.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku migaso mingi egiri mu kulima ennimiro awaka, omuli okulongoosa obulamu bw'obwongo n'okufuna ebirime ebibisi, abakulembeze b'ekitundu bakubiriza abatuuze okulima ebifo byabwe ebya kiragala. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula obuwangaazi n'okweyimirizaawo mu disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki ber pa poto me gang, ma I kingi obedo ber pa adam ki nongo cam manyen, lutela me kabedo gi tye ka cuku cwiny lwak me puru poto gi. Yub man tye ki miti me tyelo kor dongo lobo ki dongo lobo I district.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo ajokis naka amisiri naka ore, aimoriarit aitojokar angaleu naka adam keda adumun iboro luitetiak, isinyikokitos engarenok luka atutubet itunga akoru amisirin kec. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai kanu aitopoloritor aijar naka itunga ko disitrikt.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emigasho mingi y'obuhingi n'oburiisa omumaka, otwariiremu okutunguura amagara g'omutwe n'okutunga eby'okurya ebisya, abebembezi b'ebyanga nibahiga abatuuragye okuhinga emyanya yaabo ey'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureetaho entunguuka n'okwetunguura omu disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: Effective agricultural management is crucial for maximizing crop yield and ensuring sustainable farming. To achieve this, farmers must implement a variety of essential practices.
lug_prompt: Enzirukanya y'ebyobulimi ennungi ya mugaso nnyo mu kwongera ku makungula n'okulaba ng'okulima kugenda mu maaso. Okutuukiriza kino, abalimi balina okussa mu nkola enkola ez'enjawulo ez'omugaso.

lgg_prompt: Geri agirikica ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru afa ofule ori eyi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika e'yo agirikica niri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ma 'ba geri orodriru ndundu 'diyi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local agriculture and enhance knowledge sharing, a new initiative has been launched. This program aims to connect farmers with experts in the field.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira ebyobulimi n'obulunzi mu ggwanga n'okutumbula okugabana amagezi, enteekateeka empya etongozeddwa. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukwataganya abalimi n'abakugu mu byobulimi.

nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushagika eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omwihanga n'okushongyera okugabana obwengye, enteekateeka nsya etandikirweho. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okukwatanisa abahingi n'abakugu omu by'obuhingi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent market trends and consumer preferences, agricultural experts are emphasizing the importance of strategic crop selection. To maximize profitability and ensure sustainability, farmers should consider the economic viability of their chosen crops.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku mbeera eriwo mu katale n'ebyo abaguzi bye baagala, abakugu mu byobulimi n'obulunzi bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okulonda obulungi ebirime. Okutumbula amagoba n'okukakasa obuwangaazi, abalimi balina okulowooza ku busobozi bw'ebirime bye balonze mu byenfuna.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami matye katime kombedi I cuk ki miti pa luwil, ludiro me pur tye ka cuko cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa yero cam maber. Pi nongo magoba madwong ki neno ni lupur tye ka tic maber, omyero gutam tutwal I kom kit ma jami apita ma giyero twero kelo kwede magoba.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo apol naka esokoni keda iboro lu ekotosi agwelak, eutasi ipiriotin luka akor aitigogong ajokis naka aseun iraan lu ejokuka. Kanu adumun ameda naepol ka awanyun ebe ejarete akoriok, ekot akoriok aomoom nuikamunitos ikapun luka iraan lu eseunitos kesi.

Okwongyera amagoba n'okureeba ngu eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa bigumireho, abahingi n'abariisa bashemereire kureeba ngu eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ebibarikuzoora nibibahwera omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: When cultivating beans, it's essential to manage pests effectively to ensure a healthy crop. Farmers often seek guidance on the best pest control options available.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba olimira ebinyeebwa, kikulu nnyo okuziyiza ebiwuka okusobola okukakasa nti ebirime byo biba biramu bulungi. Abalimi batera okunoonya okulambikibwa ku ngeri z'okuziyizaamu ebiwuka eziriwo.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka puru muranga, pire tek tutwal me lweny i kom jami ma balo cam wek cam obed ma yot. Lupur ipol kare gipenyo pi ngec i kom yoo me lweny i kom jami ma balo cam.

lgg_prompt: Ka kaiko ori ezo, eri orodriru afa ori eza'ba 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru nyaka 'da ni aa'zu rua ala be beni. Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi tutuni imbata nda geri onyiru afa ori eza'ba 'diyi atrizu 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: Smallholder farmers play a crucial role in local economies and food production. By engaging in sustainable agricultural practices, they can enhance their livelihoods and contribute to community resilience.
lug_prompt: Abalimi b'ebirime ebitonotono bakola omulimu gwa maanyi mu by'enfuna by'ekitundu n'okufulumya emmere. Nga beenyigira mu byobulimi n'obulunzi ebiwangaala, basobola okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'obulamu n'okutumbula ebitundu.

teo_prompt: Akoriok ludidik iswamaete aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolom ikapun keda aitolom inyamat. Kowai lo alomar akoru na ejok, epedorete kesi aitojokar aijar kec ka aitopolor aijar naka itunga.

teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae keda amamus na inyamat, epolok noi aitolomun iponesio luitetiak luka akor. Kowai lo aijulakin iponesio luka iraan lu ekorio, epedorete akoriok aitojokar eswamae loajokan keda eswamae loajokan.

eng_prompt: In our quest to improve food preservation techniques, we explore various sources of knowledge. One valuable resource we've discovered is the informative content shared through radio broadcasts.

ach_prompt: I miti wa me yubu diro me gwoko cam, watye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me nongo ngec. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal ma wanongo en aye lok angeya ma kibedo ka nywako i redio.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam wok naka aitojokar iponesio luka aidar inyamat, iuta sio aingic aiboisio nuegelegela nuka acoa. Adiopebore naejok noi nawanyunit sio ngesi akiro nuinerasi itunga kotoma oredio.
lgg_prompt: Asisile amani geri amani ecozu nyaka ta mbazu 'diyi otuzu ri ma alea, ama geri onita esuzu ndundu 'diyi onda. Afa azi orodriru amani esu ri afa o'dukoti edripi 'diyi awale geri rediyo ni 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuronda kwaitu okw'okutunguura emiringo y'okurinda eby'okurya, nitusherura oburugo bw'obwengye butari bumwe na bumwe. Ekintu kimwe ky'omugasho eki twajumbwire n'amakuru agarikugambwa kurabira aha reediyo.

eng_prompt: Farmers are always looking for ways to improve their crop yields and diversify their produce. Understanding the best practices for cultivating citrus fruits and vegetables can significantly enhance their farming techniques.
lug_prompt: Abalimi bulijjo banoonya engeri y'okutumbula amakungula gaabwe n'okukyusakyusa mu bibala byabwe. Okutegeera enkola ennungi ey'okulima ebibala ebiyitibwa citrus n'enva endiirwa kisobola okutumbula ennyo enkola zaabwe ez'okulima.
ach_prompt: Lupur I kare weng gitye ka yenyo yoo me medo rwom me kac gi ki medo rwom me cam gi. Niang diro mabeco me puru nyig yat citrus ki pot dek twero yubu diro me pur gi tutwal.
teo_prompt: Emoete duc akoriok iponesio lu itojokarere esakec ka aiyatakin esakec. Amisiikin iwaitin luajokak luka akoru araito keda idiasio epedori aitojokar iponesio luka akor.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi sa'wa driasi geri nda ori yini 'diyi ma ori ma omgbo otuzu azini afa yini ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Geri onyiru 'bani ecozu pati efi eyi ezozu azini tibi ini eyi ezozu 'diyi ma vata ma omgbo otu geri eyini ori ezozu 'diyi ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa buriijo nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura amasharuura gaabo n'okukoresa ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe. Okwetegyereza emiringo mirungi y'okuhinga ebijuma hamwe n'emboga, nikibaasa kwongyera amaani omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: As spring approaches, many gardeners are eager to start planning their planting schedules. Understanding the upcoming weather conditions is crucial for ensuring a successful garden.
lug_prompt: Ng'obutiti busembera, abalimi bangi beesunga okutandika okuteekateeka enteekateeka zaabwe ez'okusimba. Okutegeera embeera y'obudde ejja kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma ennimiro ennungi.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me poto dong cok, lupur mapol tye ki miti matek me cako yubu yubgi me pito kodi. Niang kit ma piny bibedo kwede pire tek tutwal pi poto maber.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apakio nu ekitoi, ekotosi akoriok luipu ageun aitemonokin ainap kec. Ajenun ejautene loka ikwamin lo ebunit erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna amisiri.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti ni ecaria, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba karakara 'diyi avasi e'dozu otita yini ori sazu 'diyi otuzu. E'yo angu mile ni emupi 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru amvu 'bazu drile suzaru.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'obutiti ku burikuhika, abahingi baingi baine ekihika ky'okutandika kutebeekanisa enteekateeka yaabo y'okubyara. Okwetegyereza embeera y'obwire erikwija, n'eky'omugasho munonga, okureeba ngu omusiri guraabe murungi.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, agricultural experts have been analyzing the trends in various markets. As a result, some radio discussions highlight the good markets for farmers' produce.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise, abakugu mu byobulimi babadde beekenneenya emitendera mu butale obw'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, okukubaganya ebirowoozo okumu ku laadiyo kulaga akatale akalungi ak'ebirime by'abalimi.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato angec, ludiro me pur gubedo ka ngiyo jami matye katime I cuk mapatpat. Macalo adwogi ne, nywako lok mukene I redio nyutu cuk mabeco pi jami apita pa lupur.
teo_prompt: Kosabitin lu atuboros, eutasi ipirioitin luka akor airereor iboro lu iswamaete kosokonin luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, ineresinei ice luka oredio itodunitos isokonin luajokak luka iraan luka akoriok.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba onita be e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ebi e'yo yi 'yepi cuu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo 'disi, e'yo nzeza radio ma dria 'diyi ma azi yi e'da cuu onyiru 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma ori ezozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu sande ezihweireho, abakugu omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa babaire nibegyendesereza eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu butare butari bumwe na bumwe. N'ekyarugiremu, ebiteiso ebimwe aha reediyo nibyoreka obutare burungi bw'ebihingirwe by'abahingi.

eng_prompt: Many rural communities rely on various media sources for agricultural advice. One effective method has been the use of radio broadcasts tailored specifically for farmers.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu byalo bangi beesigama ku mikutu gy'amawulire egy'enjawulo okufuna amagezi ku byobulimi. Engeri emu ekola obulungi kwe kukozesa emikutu gya laadiyo egitegekeddwa abalimi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol me caro gijenge I kom odi poko ngec mapat-pat pi nongo tam I kom lok me pur. Yoo acel maber tutwal obedo tic ki redio ma kiyubu pi lupur.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lukocaloi itwasamaete ewai lo iyemuto kanu adumun aicoreta nuka akoru. Adiopet ewai lo iswamat ejok ngesi aitwasam airedio kanu akoriok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi yi ati geri ndu ndu e'yo oyuzani 'diyi ma dria imbata agirikica ma dria 'diyi esuzu. Geri azi orodriruni ebi ovu geri 'bani e'yo oyuza radio ni 'diyi ayuzu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omubyaro nibegamira aha mikutu y'empurizagana okutunga obuhabuzi ahaby'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Omuringo gumwe ogukozirwe kurungi, n'okukoresa reediyo z'abahingi n'abariisa.

eng_prompt: Through various agricultural workshops and community programs, local farmers are equipped with essential skills and information. This education empowers them to make informed decisions about their farming practices.
lug_prompt: Okuyita mu misomo egy'enjawulo egy'ebyobulimi ne pulogulaamu z'ekitundu, abalimi b'omu kitundu baweebwa obukugu n'obubaka obwetaagisa. Okusoma kuno kubawa amaanyi okukola okusalawo okulungi ku nnima zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kacoke me pwonye ki yub mapat-pat me pur, lupur ki lupur me tedero ginongo ngec ki diro ma mite pi tic gi. Kwan eni minigi kero me moko tam mabeco i kom kit me pur gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunun nuka akoru keda ainapeta nuka atutubet, isisianakino akoriok luka atutubet acoa keda akiro nuepolok. Ijaikini aisisia ngin kesi apedor aiswamaun aseununeta nuikamunitos akoru kec.
lgg_prompt: Otita agirikica ni ndundu 'diyi ma alea, 'ba 'ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ondua azini o'dukoti orodriru 'diyi fe 'ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyini. Onita 'diri yi dri okpo fe e'yo 'duzu kililiru geri yini ori ezozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Barikurabira omu mishomo y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe na puroguraamu z'ebyaro, abahingi b'omubyaro nibatunga emyoga n'amakuru g'omugasho. Obwegyese obu, nibubaha amaani g'okucwamu kurungi ebikwatiraine n'obuhingi n'oburiisa bwabo.

eng_prompt: In many rural areas, access to agricultural resources and knowledge can be limited. To address this gap, innovative communication methods are being employed to reach farmers effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo bingi, okufuna eby'obugagga by'obulimi n'amagezi biyinza okuba ebitono. Okumalawo ekituli kino, engeri z'empuliziganya ez'obuyiiya zikozesebwa okutuuka obulungi ku balimi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, nongo ngec ki jami me pur twero bedo tek. Me tyeko peko man, kitye katic ki yoo manyen me kube ki lupur.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, etiono adumunun iboro lu akoru ka acoa. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, itwasamao iponesio luitetiak luka einer kanu adolokin akoriok ejok.
lgg_prompt: Angu caluru karakara 'diyi ma alia, geri 'bani ecozu afa agirikica ni 'diyi esuzu azini ondua 'diyi esuzu ri ma ongmbo ni ovu ewaru. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba geri o'diru e'yo nzezu 'diyi ayu cazu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi vu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'ebyaro, okutunga ebintu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe n'obwengye, nikibaasa kuba kitari kyorobi. Okwihaho omwanya ogu, emiringo y'empurizagana ey'omutaano eriyo neekoresibwa kuhika aha bahingi n'abariisa kurungi.

eng_prompt: Despite her efforts to protect her crops, the woman noticed a growing flock of birds gathering near her garden. Each morning, she would find more and more of her precious maize cobs missing.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yakola kyonna ekisoboka okukuuma ebirime bye, omukyala yalaba ebinyonyi bingi nga bikuŋŋaanira okumpi n'olusuku lwe. Buli ku makya, yasanganga ebikunguddwa by'emmwaanyi bye eby'omuwendo ennyo nga tebiriiwo.

teo_prompt: Karaida abu ngesi iswama agogongu kanu ayuwar iraanake, abu aberu koany ikweny luipu luetukokinos amisiri ke. Kanginitupuruc, abu ngesi kodum ekirididi loemamei.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro okpo 'bazu ori erini 'diyi ma ta mbazu ra ti, oku nderi ndre kini aria karakara eyi tra eyi amvu erivileri ma agei. O'biti vusi, eri nga kaka eri vile onyiru tu 'diyi esu avi ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwe kurinda ebihingirwe bye, omukazi akareeba ebinyonyi ebirikweyongyera omu musiri gwe. Buri kasheeshe, akaba ashanga ebicoori bye eby'omuhendo biriyo nibibura.

eng_prompt: As I walked through the garden, I noticed several plants showing signs of distress. One particular leaf caught my eye, its vibrant colors contrasting sharply with the surrounding greenery.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali ntambula mu nnimiro, nnalaba ebimera ebiwerako nga biraga obubonero obulaga nti biri mu buzibu. Ekikoola ekimu kyankuba amaaso, langi zaakyo ezaakaayakana ennyo n'obutonde obweetoolodde.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I poto, aneno kodi mapol ma tye ka nyutu lanyut me peko. Oboke acel aye omako wanga, rangi ne maleng dok pat tutwal ki lum ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong alosit komisiri, abu eong aany iraan luipu luitodunitos ijenuneta luka atiokisio. Abu ediope akwi kijaik eong akonye, araasi iriaginike luitegelikina keda luiriokok.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria amvu ma alia, ma ndre ori karakara yi eceta e'dapi e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi. Ori ma bi aluri bi ma mile ra, eri ma wura ndrizaru 'diyi esele co esele onyi ma ageia 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: As autumn approached, the once vibrant foliage began to show signs of change. Among the trees, one particular leaf caught my eye with its striking colors.
lug_prompt: Ekyeya bwe kyasembera, ebikoola ebyali bimyufu byatandika okulaga obubonero bw'enkyukakyuka. Mu miti, waaliwo ekikoola ekimu ekyankuba amaaso olw'okuba langi zaakyo zaali za langi ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kare me poto ocako oo, potone ma onongo yam ber tutwal-li ocako nyuto lanyut me aloka-loka. I kin yadi ne, oboke acel omako wanga ki rangi ne maleng tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka elap, apotu akwii nudidika kogeutu aitodun ijenuneta luka aijulanakineta. Kotoma okitoi, abu ediope akwii kodum akeka keda iriagin luibusiak noi.

nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'obutiti ku bwahikire, amababi agabaire garimu amaani gakatandika kworeka obubonero bw'empinduka. Omu miti, harimu eibabi rimwe eryakwatsire amaisho gangye n'erangi zaaryo ezirikutangaaza.

eng_prompt: One of the most common diseases affecting maize crops is leaf rust, which can significantly impact yield. Farmers need to be vigilant for early signs of infection to mitigate damage.
lug_prompt: Obumu ku bulwadde obusinga okukosa ebirime by'emmwaanyi kwe kwata kw'ebikoola, ekiyinza okukosa ennyo amakungula. Abalimi beetaaga okubeera obulindaala olw'obubonero obusooka obw'obulwadde okukendeeza ku kwonooneka.
ach_prompt: Two acel matye ka yelo anyogi mapol tutwal obedo nyal matye I pot anyogi, ma twero balo kac pa anyogi. Lupur omyero gubed ma wanggi twolo pi lanyut me two macon me gengo bale pa two.
teo_prompt: Adiopet kotoma adekasinei nuetapit aimusung ekirididi erai ekurut loka akwi, loepedori aitolitol esake. Ekot akoriok acoikina kanu ijenuneta luka adekasinei kanu aitidisiar atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Azo alu kaka ori eyi 'yepi tu 'diyi ma azi eri ori bi eyi ma bi eyi ma ombuzu, dika eri eco nyaka ofuza ma omgbo otu ra. Le ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma ovu mile be eꞌyo ꞌbani azo esuzu drioru ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌbani ani eꞌyo onzi ꞌyezu ku beni.

eng_prompt: The garden has been struggling with an unexpected outbreak of pests. As a result, many plants are showing signs of distress.

eng_prompt: As I examined the plant closely, I noticed several unusual characteristics that caught my attention. Among them, the yellow leaves displayed a peculiar folding pattern that intrigued me.
lug_prompt: Bwe nneetegereza ekimera ekyo n'obwegendereza, nnalaba ebintu ebitali bimu ebyankwata. Mu byo, ebikoola ebya kyenvu byalaga enkola ey'enjawulo ey'okusiba ekyanneewuunyisizza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka ngiyo tyen cam eni maber tutwal, aneno jami mapol mapat-pat ma oywek tutwal ma oyomo cwinya. I kingi, pot dek ma rangi ne yellow onyuto kit ma opoto kwede ma oyomo cwinya tutwal.

eng_prompt: Farmers often struggle to identify the early signs of crop diseases that can significantly impact their yields. Understanding the symptoms of common maize diseases is crucial for effective management and prevention.
lug_prompt: Abalimi batera okulwana okumanya obubonero obusooka obw'endwadde z'ebirime eziyinza okukosa ennyo amakungula gaabwe. Okutegeera obubonero bw'endwadde z'emmwaanyi eza bulijjo kya mugaso nnyo mu kuziyiza n'okuziyiza obulungi.

teo_prompt: Etionikinit akoriok noi ajenun ijenuneta lukatupuruc luka adekasinei nu iraan nu emunarete iraanakec. Ajenun ijenuneta luka adekasinei nu ekirididi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik ka aitikitik.

lug_prompt: Bwe nnalambula ennimiro, nnakiraba nti ebikoola byonna byali bikyuse langi. Abalimi babadde beeraliikirivu olw'embeera y'obudde gye buvuddeko, era kati kirabika okutya kwabwe kwali kutuukirira.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose over the fields, a group of goats wandered in search of food. Their insatiable appetite led them to the nearby maize crop, where they began to graze.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yali ebuuka mu nnimiro, ekibinja ky'embuzi kyataayaaya okunoonya emmere. Okwagala emmere kwabatwala mu nnimiro y'emmwaanyi eyali okumpi, gye baatandikira okulundira.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka ryeny I poto, dyangi mapol gubedo ka wirre I kabedo mapatpat me yenyo cam. Miti me camo dekgi ma pe gikayo oweko gucito I poto anyogi matye cok, kama gucako cam iye.

nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwahikire omu misiri, guruupu y'embuzi ekataayaaya kuronda eby'okurya. Ekyetengo kyabo ky'eby'okurya kikareeta omu musiri gw'ebicoori oguri haihi, ahu batandikire kurya.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a healthy garden requires regular attention and care. One essential aspect of this maintenance is understanding the importance of weeding.

eng_prompt: After months of careful cultivation and monitoring, we've finally seen the fruits of our labor. Our latest analysis shows that the sorghum crop is thriving, indicating a promising harvest ahead.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okulima n'okulondoola n'obwegendereza, tusembyeyo okulaba ebibala by'okufuba kwaffe. Okwekenenya kwaffe okusembyeyo kulaga nti ekirime kya sorghum kikula bulungi, ekiraga amakungula amalungi mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pur ki ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede, dong watyeko neno adwogi me tic matek ma watimo. Kwedwa manyen nyutu ni cam me sorghum tye ka dongo maber tutwal, ma nyutu ni kac bibedo ber tutwal I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu akoru ka aanyanar, apotu sio awanyutu araito nuka aswam wok. Aingic kosi naitetet itodunit ebe epoloi ekirididi, itodunit ebe ejai aituk naejok noi koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani ori ezozu kililiru azini angu onezu 'bori ma vutia, ama nga asizu pati efi ama vile azi ngazuri ndre ra. Ama vile e'yo eti ondaza o'diru ri ece kini ori sorghumniri zoria, ece kini ori okuza drile ri muke.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuhinga n'obwegyendesereza, twaheza kureeba ebijuma by'emirimo yaitu. Okucondooza kwaitu okusya nikworeka ngu ebihingirwe bya sorghum biriyo nibyeyongyera, ekirikworeka ngu nibiija kusharuura.

eng_prompt: I've been monitoring the health of my garden, and I've noticed some troubling signs. One particular plant stands out among the others, showing symptoms that concern me.
lug_prompt: Mbadde nneetegereza embeera y'olusuku lwange era ndabye obubonero obunkangavvula. Ekimera ekimu kyeyoleka mu birala, nga kiraga obubonero obunkwatako.
ach_prompt: Abedo ka ngiyo kit ma poto na tye kwede, dok aneno lanyut mogo ma kelo lworo. Tyen cam acel pat ki mukene, nyutu lanyut ma kelo lworo madit tutwal I koma.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aanyanar ejautene loka amisiri ka, ido awanyunit eong ijenuneta ice luiticanitos. Ejai ekitoi ediope lo itegelikina kanejaas luce, itodunit aanyuneta nu epodokinit eong.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera y'ettaka n'enkula y'ekimera, kyazuuka nti embeera y'obutonde teyali nnungi kulima bulungi. Olw'ebbula ly'ebiriisa n'embeera y'obudde embi, tetusobola kufuna makungula gonna okuva mu kimera kino.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma ngom tye kwede ki kit ma cam eni dongo kwede, onen atyer kamaleng ni kabedo ne pe ber pi pur maber. Pi peko me nok pa moc cam ki piny marac tutwal, pe watwero nongo kac ki I tyen cam man.

Afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ako ma e'yosi azini angu mile ni ovuzu onyiru ku ri si, ama econi nyaka engazu ori 'di vu ku.

teo_prompt: Neinyikokini eiriago aijar, eutasi itunga luitolosete ikapun aimo iponesio lu icie luka aipikakin ikapun kec. Eyangau aijulanakineta ngun eipud loka aiboisio nuegelegela kotoma osokonin luapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni 'diyi ni mu drile e'doria, 'ba lonyi vuti ale'ba 'diyi curu'do geri nda eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Ojata 'di fe ava tuzu esele ndundu cu a'di ni 'diyi ma kalasi amve 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entaasya ku birikugumizamu nibitereera, abarikukoresa esente omu by'obushubuzi nibaronda oburyo bw'okutunguura eby'obushubuzi byabo. Empindahinduka egi ereesireho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu omu by'obushuubuzi bitari eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In today's financial landscape, many individuals and businesses seek funding to support their projects and investments. As a result, financial institutions have expanded their services to accommodate this growing demand.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyensimbi eya leero, abantu ssekinnoomu ne bizinensi bangi banoonya ensimbi okuwagira pulojekiti zaabwe n'okusiga ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'ebyensimbi bigaziye obuweereza bwaabyo okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu buno obweyongera.
ach_prompt: I kare me lim me kare-ni, dano ki biacara mapol giyenyo cente me culu pi yub gi ki biacara gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok kom lim omedo rwom me ticgi me cobo miti eni matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loka lolo, itunga keda ibiasaran luipu emoete apiyai kanu aigang ipurojektin kec keda ibiasaran kec. Kanuka ngun, apotu iriongeta luka ikapun iyatakinos aijanakin kec kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi tualu tujari eyi pie robia nda eyi ma otita eyi atizu tualu lonyi vuti aleza eyini 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, amuti e'yo robia ni 'diyi ondrepi 'diyi edri azakoma fele eyidri 'diyi e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'esente eby'erizooba, abantu baingi hamwe na bizinesi nibaronda esente z'okushashurira za purogyekiti zaabo hamwe n'ebyobushubuzi. N'ekyarugiremu, ebitongore by'esente byongyeire aha buheereza bwabyo, okubaasa kukora aha byetaago ebirikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In response to the evolving job market, educational institutions are rethinking their curricula. Many are now incorporating practical skills that prepare students for entrepreneurship and business management.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'emirimu obweyongera, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza gazzeemu okulowooza ku nsoma yaago. Bangi kati bayingizaamu obukugu obw'omugaso obuteekateeka abayizi mu by'obusuubuzi n'okuddukanya bizinensi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo pa tic, gangi kwan tye ka tam I kom yub me kwan gi. Pol pa lutino kwan kombedi tye ka nongo diro me tic cing ma yubu lutino kwan me cako biacara ki doro biacara.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka aswamisinei, eutasi isomeroi airereor aisisiaeta kec. Isisianakinete kwana itunga luipu acoa na itutuonorere esisiak kanu agwelanar keda aitolot ibiasaran.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru cuu azi ni oja'ba ri ma e'yosi, angu onita ni 'diyi e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma ale andri o'diru. Ongmbo karakara eyi curu'do ondua afa edele drisi 'diyini sukulu anzi eyi otuzu tujari 'yezu azini tujari eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'emirimo, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese gariyo nigagaruka gashwijuma engyenderwaho zaago. Obwahati bingi nibishomesa abeegi emyoga erikubatebeekanisa kutandika bizinesi n'okureeberera eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the economy faces significant challenges, including high unemployment rates and limited opportunities for growth. By fostering a conducive environment for business development, the nation can stimulate economic activity and improve livelihoods.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda eby'enfuna byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi omuli ebbula ly'emirimu eringi n'emikisa emitono egy'okukulaakulana. Mu kutumbula embeera ennungi eri enkulaakulana y'ebyobusuubuzi, eggwanga lisobola okutumbula eby'enfuna n'okutumbula embeera z'abantu.
ach_prompt: I Uganda, biacara tye ka nongo peko madongo, ma I kingi obedo bedo peke pa tic ki gum me dongo lobo matidi. I yoo me kelo kabedo maber pi dongo biacara, lobo twero medo rwom me timo biacara ki ilo malo rwom me kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, etereikina edumune loka ikapun keda atiokisio nuepolok, aimoriarit amamus na aswamisinei keda arerengesio nu ikidioko nuka apol. Kowai lo aitopolor ejautene lo iswamaere ibiasaran, epedori akwap aitopolor aswamisinei nuka ikapun ka aitojokar aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo ewaru e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi esu, azi ako ma omgbo angiri tualu drileba zota ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni were. Angu tujari eyini zozu kililiru risi, kari eco e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otu azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, eby'entatsya biine oburemeezi bw'amaani, otwariiremu eibura ry'emirimo n'emigisha mikye y'okutunguuka. Okureetaho embeera nungi y'okutunguura eby'obushubuzi, eihanga niribaasa kutunguura eby'entaasya n'entunguuka y'abantu.

eng_prompt: After several years of political instability and a series of natural disasters, the nation is now facing significant economic challenges. Experts predict a long recovery process before the country can regain its previous economic standing.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi egy'obutali butebenkevu mu byobufuzi n'obutyabaga obw'omuddiring'anwa, eggwanga kati lyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu byenfuna. Abakugu bateebereza nti kijja kutwala ebbanga ddene eggwanga okudda ku mutindo gwalyo ogw'ebyenfuna.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki peko ma poto atura, lobo man dong tye ka nongo peko me lim mapol. Ludiro gitye ki byek ni lobo man obikato kare malac ma peya odok I rwom me lim macon.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka amamus ainapakina kotoma politikis keda atiokisio nuka isuban, etereikina kwana akwap keda atiokisio nuka ikapun. Ebakasi ipirioitin ebe ebuni apak naepol noi kanu akwap na ainyakun adoketaitikec naka edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara ngiringiri politiki ni azini e'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ni 'diyi ma vutia, kari 'di curu'do e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi isu. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi ega kini e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi nga sawa 'du saaru de nga po'di kari econi angu e'yo robiani oku 'diyi esu ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'obutabanguko omu by'obutegyeki hamwe n'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa, eihanga obwahati riine oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'entaasya. Abakugu nibagira ngu eihanga niriija kutwara obwire bureingwa kugaruka omu by'entaasya nk'oku ryabiire riri.

eng_prompt: In light of recent financial irregularities and growing public concern, officials have decided to take a closer look at corporate practices. As a result, the government now wants to examine all the transaction books of various companies.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku butali bwenkanya bw'ensimbi obubaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira kw'abantu okweyongera, abakungu basazeewo okwekenneenya enkola z'ebitongole. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti kati eyagala okwekenneenya ebitabo byonna eby'okutunda ne kkampuni ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tim maraco me lim ma otime cokcok-ki ki lworo madit ma lwak tye kwede, lutic gumoko tamgi me ngiyo kit ma dul mapat-pat timo kwede ticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente kombedi tye ki miti me ngiyo bukke weng ma dul mapat-pat timo kwede biacara.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun keda aiyalongong naka itunga, aseutu eswamak airereor iponesio luka ikampunin. Kanuka ngun, ekoto kwana apugan airereor itabon kere luka ikampunin luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia esuzu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini asi otiza o'bi eyini tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi asi 'du e'yo amuti eyini 'ye 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru. E'yo 'disi, gamete le di buku dria amuti ndundu eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma ale andri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obushomankuzi bw'esente obwahwireho hamwe n'okwerarikirira kw'abantu, abakuru bashaziremu kushwijuma gye emirimo y'ebitongore. N'ekyarugiremu, gavumenti hati neeyenda kushwijuma ebitabo by'obushubuzi bya kampuni nyingi.

eng_prompt: Businesses often face the challenging decision of adjusting their pricing strategies in response to market conditions. Understanding the potential impact of these changes is crucial for maintaining financial stability.
lug_prompt: Bizineesi zitera okusanga okusalawo okusoomooza okukyusa emiwendo gyazo okusinziira ku mbeera y'akatale. Okutegeera ebiyinza okuva mu nkyukakyuka zino kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma obutebenkevu mu by'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Biacara ipol kare ginongo peko me loko welgi malubbe ki ngo matye katime I cuk. Niang adwoki pa aloka-loka magi pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kuc I tenge me lim.
teo_prompt: Etereikina duc ibiasaran keda ationis naka aijulakin itiaisinei kec kotupitete ejautene loka esokoni. Ajenun atiokisio nuepedorete aijulakineta ngun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ainapakina naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Tujura eyi tutuni e'yo ewaru 'bani ecozu eyi ma aje ojazu e'yo cuu ni 'diyi vusi 'diyi esu. E'yo ojata 'diyi ni eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Bizinesi nizitunga oburemeezi bw'okuhindura emihendo yaazo kurugirira aha mbeera y'akatare. Okwetegyereza ebirikubaasa kubaho ahabw'empindahinduka ezi, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obutebeekana omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: As the demand for fresh pineapples fluctuates, farmers are seeking ways to maximize their profits. They believe that diversifying their operations could provide more stability and opportunities for growth.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'ennaanansi empya bukyuka, abalimi banoonya engeri z'okwongera ku magoba gaabwe. Balowooza nti okukyusakyusa emirimu gyabwe kiyinza okuleetawo obutebenkevu n'emikisa gy'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti pa nacinaci tye ka loke, lupur tye ka yenyo yoo me medo magoba gi. Gitye ki niyee ni loko ticgi twero weko kuc bedo tye ki gum me dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejulakinor eipuda loka enanasi loitetet, eutasi akoriok aimo iponesio luajokak luka aiyatakin ameda kec. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aijulakin aswamisio kec epedori ayangaun ainapakina keda apol.
lgg_prompt: Afa 'bani le nanasi o'diru 'diyiniri ni i ojazurisi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi geri nda orodri yini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Eyi ai ra kini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eco asianzu eji dika drileba fe zota ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetaago by'enaanaasi ebitsya nibihindahinduka, abahingi nibaronda oburyo bw'okwongyera amagoba gaabo. Nibateekateeka ngu okuhindura emirimo yaabo nikibaasa kureetaho obusingye n'emigisha y'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, understanding industry trends and consumer behavior is crucial for entrepreneurs. As a result, many professionals emphasize the importance of continuous learning and skill development for business owners.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akavuganya, okutegeera enkola y'amakolero n'enneeyisa y'abaguzi kya mugaso nnyo eri abasuubuzi. N'ekivuddemu, abakugu bangi bassa essira ku bukulu bw'okusoma n'okukulaakulanya obukugu eri bannannyini bizinensi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk, niang jami matye katime ki kit ma luwil timo kwede obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi lutim biacara. Macalo adwogi ne, ludiro mapol giwaco ni pire tek tutwal me mede ki pwonyo ki dongo diro pa lutim biacara.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni loka lolo, amisiikin nuiswamasi keda iponesio luka agwelak erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka agwelanarak. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitos ipirioitin luipu ajokis naka aisisia keda aitopoloun acoa naka agwelanarak.
lgg_prompt: Cuu andruri ma alia baka seza ma alia, vata e'yo okalamvu ni 'diyi ma dria azini 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma adriza ma dria ri eri orodriru tujari 'yepi 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi okpo fe orodri onita muzu drile azini ondua ezozu tujari ipika eyini ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kataare k'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana, okwetegyereza enkora y'eby'obushubuzi hamwe n'emitwarize y'abaguzi n'eky'omugasho munonga aha bashuubuzi. N'ekyarugiremu, abakugu abaingi nibaha amaani omugasho gw'okwega n'okutunguura emyoga y'abashuubuzi.

eng_prompt: In times of financial distress, many individuals find themselves unable to meet their loan obligations. As a result, they face the harsh reality of losing their assets to financial institutions.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu bw'ensimbi, abantu bangi beesanga nga tebasobola kusasula ssente ze beewola. N'ekivuddemu, boolekaganye n'embeera embi ey'okufiirwa eby'obugagga byabwe mu bitongole by'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me lim, dano mapol nongo ni pe gitwero culu cente ma gudeno. Macalo adwogi ne, ginongo peko madit tutwal me rwenyo lonyo gi icing gangi tic me lim.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka ationis na ikapun, mam itunga luipu epedoritos aitac ilonin kec. Kanuka ngun, etereikina kesi keda atiokisio nuka atwaniar iborokec mama ejaasi iriongeta luka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru robia ma alia 'diyisi, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi eyi econi eyi ma mari eyi ofe ku. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'yo ewaru 'bani lonyi eyivile 'diyi avizu amuti robia trapi 'diyi vu ri esu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bw'esente, abantu baingi tibarikubaasa kushashura za rooni zaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okufeerwa ebintu byabo omu bitongore by'esente.

eng_prompt: The adoption of digital payment methods has surged as more people seek convenient and contactless transactions. As a result, many consumers are turning to mobile money platforms for their everyday purchases.
lug_prompt: Okukozesa enkola z'okusasula ez'oku mutimbagano kweyongedde ng'abantu bangi banoonya enkola ennyangu ey'okusasula ssente. N'ekivuddemu, abaguzi bangi badda ku mikutu gya mobile money okugula ebintu byabwe ebya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye katic ki yoo me culu cente kun gitiyo ki nyonyo me intanet pien dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me culu cente labongo kube ki dano. Macalo adwogi ne, luwil mapol tye ka tic ki mobile money me wilo jami me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Apolor aitwasam iponesio luka aitac kolago naarai ekotosi itunga aswam iboro koipone kalo epatana. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu aijulakin agwelanar kec mama ejaasi acuman nu isimun.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani robia ofezu geri oli aliasi 'diyi ma ayuta ma omgbo tu ra 'ba karakara eyini robia ofezu ewakokoru azini e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi kokoru ri ndazu. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara eyi curu'do mu geri 'bani robia trazu 'diyi ayu afa eyi jezu o'du driasi.
nyn_prompt: Okukoresa oburyo bw'okushashurira aha mikutu kweyongyeire ahabw'abantu baingi kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okushashurira ebintu. N'ekyarugiremu, abaguzi baingi nibaza aha mikutu ya mobayiro mane kugura ebintu.

eng_prompt: As the world begins to recover from the pandemic, many businesses are facing new challenges and opportunities. Adapting to the changing landscape is crucial for long-term success.
lug_prompt: Ng'ensi etandika okuwona ekirwadde bbunansi, bizinensi nnyingi zisanga okusoomoozebwa n'emikisa emipya. Okutuukagana n'embeera ezikyuka kikulu nnyo mu buwanguzi obw'ekiseera ekiwanvu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka cang ki I peko me two korona, biacara mapol tye ka nongo peko ki gum manyen. Ngeyo kit ma jami tye ka loke kwede pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti ne pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akwap aiyengun kotoma adeka naka ekorona, etereikina ibiasaran luipu keda atiokisio keda arerengesio nuitetiak. Aijulanakin keda aijulakineta nuka akwap erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni e'doria engazu e'yo azo 'dezaniri ma aliarisi, tujari karakara eyi e'yo ewaru azini drileba o'diru 'diyi esu. E'yo oja'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ojazu ri eri orodriru drile suza sa'wa ezu ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Ensi ku erikutandika kugaruka omu mbeera omu bwire bw'oburwaire, bizinesi nyingi nizitunga oburemeezi n'emigisha misya. Okwetegyereza empindahinduka n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi bw'obwire bureingwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the current economic challenges, the Ugandan government is encouraging its citizens to take proactive steps towards financial independence. Officials believe that entrepreneurship can play a crucial role in boosting the local economy.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okuliwo kati, gavumenti ya Uganda ekubiriza bannansi baayo okubaako kye bakolawo okusobola okweyimirizaawo mu by'ensimbi. Abakungu balowooza nti eby'obusuubuzi bisobola okukola omulimu omukulu mu kutumbula ebyenfuna by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim matye kombedi, gamente me Uganda tye ka cuku cwiny anywali ne me tic matek me nongo lonyo. Lutela tye ki niyee ni timo biacara twero konyo totwal i tyelo kor biacara me tedero.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun, isinyikokit apugan naka Uganda itungakec aswam kagogong kanu adumun aipugaikin bon kotoma ikapun. Iyuunitos eswamak ebe agwelanar epedori aitopolor edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani sawa 'disi 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete Uganda niri ni 'ba kari anzi erini 'diyi eka e'yo 'duzu okporu eyini ani ecozu eyi ma ngulupi esuzu e'yo robia nirisi. Azi'ba eyi ai ra kini tujari 'yezu ri eco azi okporu 'ye e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya oburiho obwahati,gavumenti ya Uganda neehiga abantu baayo kukora emiringo y'okwetegyeka omu by'entaasya. Abakuru nibaikiriza ngu eby'obushubuzi nibibaasa kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura eby'entaasya y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the company has faced significant financial challenges and declining sales. As a result, management has made the difficult decision to shut down operations entirely.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, kampuni efunye okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi n'okukendeera kw'ebyamaguzi. N'ekivuddemu, abaddukanya emirimu basazeewo okukomya emirimu gyonna.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, dul ne obedo ka nongo peko me lim ki wel cente matye kadok piny. Macalo adwogi ne, ludito tic gumoko tam matek tutwal me juku tic weng.
teo_prompt: Kolapio lu atuboros, etereikina ekampuni keda atiokisio nuka ikapun keda aikidiokor naka agwelanar. Kanuka ngun, eswamau eyaitene aseunet na etiono noi naka agolokin aswamukec cut.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, amuti 'da esu e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi azini afa oziza ma omgbo esizu. E'yo 'disi, driceza 'da 'du e'yo ewaru azi 'da ma ti opizu ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehwaire, kampuni etungire oburemeezi bwingi omu by'empiiha hamwe n'okuguza okukyendeera. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikukurira ekitongore bakozire encwamu egumire ey'okukingaho emirimo yoona.

eng_prompt: After extensive repairs and safety inspections, the authorities have finally deemed the facility safe for operations. Travelers can now resume their journeys as flights are scheduled to take off once more.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuddaabiriza ennyo n'okukebera eby'okwerinda, ab'obuyinza baamala ne balaba ekkolero nga teririna bulabe eri emirimu. Abatambuze kati basobola okuddamu olugendo lwabwe ng'ennyonyi zitegekeddwa okusimbula omulundi omulala.
ach_prompt: Ingee yubu jami ki ngiyo kit ma tic tye kwede, luloc dong gunongo ni tic tye maber. Luwot dong twero cako wotgi pien dege tye ki kare me cako ticgi odoco.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemonokino keda aanyanar ayuwara, apotu apedorosio koanyutu ebe eyuwara aiboisit ngin kanu aswam. Epedorete kwana alotok ainyikokin alosit naarai ebeit idegei aibwo bobo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani angu 'da edezu dika angu 'da andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, 'ba okpo e'ipi 'diyi esu asizu kini angu 'da azi ngazu kililiru. Ba aci'ba 'diyi eco curu'do aci eyivile 'diyi e'do ra a'dusikuni ndege eyi nga mu angu 'da ma alea pale alu dika.
