teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka aitolitol aswamisio nuka nginiparan, etereikina ikampunin luipu keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Aitodolikin ejautene lo akwap loakwana erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar keda apol.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni mu drile azi ngaza o'du driasi ri ezazu risi, amuti karakara eyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu. E'yo aa'zu ewu curu'dorisi ri be ri eca orodriru aa'zu edriru tualu zota be.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kutabangura emirimo yaabo eya buriizooba, kampuni nyingi nizitunga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo. Okwetegyereza embeera y'obwire eriho hati n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okutuuraho n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: With the growing demand for quality meat products in neighboring countries, there is a significant opportunity for local entrepreneurs. Expanding into new markets could provide substantial economic benefits for Uganda's beef industry.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu obweyongera obw'ennyama ennungi mu nsi eziriraanyeewo, waliwo omukisa omunene eri abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu. Okugaziya obutale obupya kiyinza okuvaamu emiganyulo mingi mu by'enfuna eri amakolero g'ennyama y'ente mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: Ki dongo pa miti me cato ringo I lobo ma orumuwa, tye gum madit tutwal pi lutim biacara me lobo man. Yubu cuk manyen twero kelo magoba madit tutwal I biacara me yubu ringo dyang I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Keda eipud loepol noi loka akiring kotoma akwapin nu idunyare, ejai arereng naepol noi nejaas agwelanarak luka akwapuwok. Aisiarakin toma osokonin luitetiak epedori ayangaun ameda naepol noi mama ejaasi itunga luitolomete akiring koUganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu afa edele za wura muke si 'diyi ma dria kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ri si, drileba angiri 'ba tujari 'yepi kari 'di ma alea 'diyini ci. Angu ezoma cu o'diru 'diyi ma alea ri eco orodri angiri eji okalamvu za edepi kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'eby'enyama omu mahanga agatuherereire, hariho omugisha gw'amaani aha bashuubuzi b'omwihanga. Okwegaita omu butare obusya, nikibaasa kureetaho emigasho y'amaani omu by'entaasya y'abantu abarikuguza enyama y'ente omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose over the lush fields, the Ankole community gathered to prepare for a momentous occasion. Excitement filled the air as families shared stories of their hard work and dedication throughout the growing season.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yali ebuuka mu nnimiro ezaali zijjudde omuddo, abantu b'e Ankole baakuŋŋaana okwetegekera omukolo ogw'enjawulo. Essanyu lyajjula empewo ng'amaka gabuulira ku mirimu gyago egy'amaanyi n'obumalirivu mu sizoni yonna ey'okulima.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka aa malo i kom poto ma opong ki jami mabeco, lwak me Ankole gugure me yube pi yub ma pire tek tutwal. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma lugangi gubedo ka lok I kom tic matek ma gutiyo ki cwinygi I kare me puru cam.
teo_prompt: Nealosior akolong kotoma amisirin, apotu itunga luka Ankole kotukokinos aitemonokin kanuka epucit loepol noi. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kotoma aiboisio nuinerasi ikalia nuikamunitos aswamukec kagogong kotoma apak naka akoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni ecaria amvu nyakuni 'diyi ma dria, ongulumu Ankole ni 'diyi tra eyi otuzu omu azi okporu ni ni. Ayiko ga angu ma alea familia eyini e'yo nzezu azi okporu eyini nga 'diyi ma dria sa'wa ori ezozanirisi dria.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kurabira omu misiri, abantu b'omuri Ankole baketebeekanisa omukoro gw'omutaano. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga obu amaka gaabo gaagambire ebirikukwata aha kukora n'okwehayo kwabo omu bwire bw'okuhinga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, several academic rankings have highlighted the achievements of universities across Africa. Among these institutions, Makerere University has consistently stood out for its quality of education and research contributions.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ensengeka z'ebyenjigiriza ez'enjawulo ziraga obuwanguzi bwa zi ssettendekero okwetoloola Afirika. Mu matendekero gano, yunivasite y'e Makerere bulijjo ebadde yeeyolekera olw'omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza n'obuyambi bwayo mu kunoonyereza.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, rwom me kwan mapat-pat onyuto jami ma gangi kwan me rwom ma malo me lobo Afrika gutimo. I kin gangi kwan magi weng, gang kwan me Makerere University obedo pat ki gangi kwan mukene pi rwom me kwan ki kwed ma obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, aitodianareta nuipu nuka asioman itodunit aitodolikineta nuka iunibasitin luka Africa. Kotoma osomeroi lu, etiono noi eunibasite loko Makerere kanu adoketait na asioman keda aingic.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, otita onita ni karakara 'diyi ece e'yo university eyini 'ye kari Africa niri ma alea ndulu 'diyi ma dria. Pari onita ni 'diyi ma eselea, Univasiti Makerere niri e'bi e'da sa'wa driasi e'yo onita ni onyiru azini e'yo vuti ondaza ni 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, enkora y'eby'obwegyese erikukira obwingi, eretsireho obuhanguzi bwa za yunivasite okwetoroora Africa. Omu matendekyero aga, yunivaasite ya Makerere etwire neejwekyera ahabw'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese n'okucondooza.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote gender equality in STEM fields, the Ugandan government has launched several initiatives aimed at empowering women in science and technology. These programs provide funding, mentorship, and resources to encourage female students to pursue careers in scientific research.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omwenkanonkano mu STEM, gavumenti ya Uganda etongozza enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula abakyala mu bya ssaayansi ne tekinologiya. Pulogulaamu zino ziwa ensimbi, okubuulirira n'ebikozesebwa okukubiriza abayizi abawala okwenyigira mu kunoonyereza kwa ssaayansi.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor rwom me mon ki coo I tenge me STEM, gamente me Uganda ocako yub mapol ma ki keto pi tyelo kor mon I tenge me cayanc ki tet manyen. Yub magi miyo cente, pwony ki jami ma mite me cuku cwiny lutino anyira me timo kwed me cayanc.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolorite nuka angor kotoma aiboisio nuka STEM, etolomu apugan naka Uganda ainapeta nuipu kanu aitigogong angor kotoma esayanis keda etatai loakwana. Ijainikinete ainapeta ngun ikapun, aicoreta keda iboro lu isinyikokinete esisiak nungor aswam nuka aingic akiro nuka sayanis.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie trotro e'yo STEM ni 'diyi ma alea, gamete Uganda niri e'do e'yo karakara eyi 'bani lezu oku eyini okpo fezu e'yo sayanisi ni azini tekenologia ni 'diyi ma alea. Otita 'diyi robia fe, imbata fe azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fe sukulu anzi ezoanzi eyini ava fezu fizu e'yo eti ondaza sayansini 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburinganiza omu by'obuhangwa,gavumenti ya Uganda etandikireho enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okutunguura abakazi omu bya sayansi na tekinorogye. Puroguraamu ezi niziheereza esente, okuhaburwa, n'eby'okukoresa, okuhiga abeegi abakazi kukora emirimo y'okucondooza aha bya sayansi.

eng_prompt: Investing in extracurricular programs is essential for fostering student engagement and development. Adequate funding can enhance the quality of these activities, benefiting the entire school community.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu pulogulaamu ez'ebweru w'essomero kya mugaso mu kutumbula okwenyigira kw'abayizi n'enkulaakulana. Obuvujjirizi obumala busobola okutumbula omutindo gw'emirimu gino, okuganyula ekitundu ky'essomero kyonna.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I yub mapat-pat me kwan obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa lutino kwan. Nongo lim ma oromo twero medo rwom me tic magi, ma weko gang kwan weng nongo magoba.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma ainapeta nuka asioman erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopol idwe. Ainanakin ikapun lu edolitos epedori aikeun adoketait na aswamisinei nu, kanu aimedaun itunga kere luka esomero.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu otita sukulu ni 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyi ma ava engazu sukulu'a ri ma omgbo otuzu. Robia feza capira ri eco 'yeta 'diyi ma omgbo otu, orodri fezu ongulumu dria sukulu ni 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu puroguraamu z'okushoma ezindi, n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura n'okureetaho entunguuka omu beegi. Esente ezirikumara nizibaasa kutunguura omutindo gw'emirimo egi, ekirikugasira abantu boona omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: As the government announced new guidelines for in-person classes, many students were left uncertain about their schedules. With varying policies from different institutions, the transition back to campus life has been anything but smooth.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti bwe yalangirira ebiragiro ebipya ku bibiina by'abantu kinnoomu, abayizi bangi baalekebwa nga tebalina bukakafu ku nteekateeka yaabwe. Olw'enkola ez'enjawulo okuva mu matendekero ag'enjawulo, okukyuka okudda mu bulamu bwa ssettendekero kibadde si kyangu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gamente okatti ki lok angeya manyen me doro kwan pa lutino kwan, lutino kwan mapol gubedo ki akala-kala I kom yub meggi. Ki cik mapat-pat ma aa ki bot gangi kwan mapat-pat, aloka loka me dok I gang kwan pe obedo yot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Nealimor apugan aicoreta nuitetiak nuka aisisia itunga, aponi kojalakinai idwe luipu mam ejenete nuikamunitos ainapeta kec. Keda ainapeta nuegelegela kama ejaasi isomeroi luegelegela, abongokinet naka aijar naka esomero mam epatana.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni o'duko ecezu azita o'diru kilasi 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyini 'diyi ma dria, sukulu anzi karakara eyi ku eyi ma otita eyi ma dria e'yo kokoru. Azita ndundu engazu pari onita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alia 'diyisi, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ojazu sukulu'a ri ebi ovu ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ku yarangiriire ebiragiro ebisya ebirikukwata aha mishomo y'abantu buntu, abeegi baingi bakasigara batiine buhame aha ntebeekanisa yaabo. Ahabw'ebiragiro ebitarikushushana kuruga omu matendekyero agatari gamwe, okugaruka omu magara g'ahaishomero, tikurabire kurungi.

eng_prompt: As the job market continues to evolve, many professionals are recognizing the need to enhance their skills. To stay competitive, candidates are expected to go back to school soon.
lug_prompt: Nga akatale k'emirimu bwe kasigala kakulaakulana, abakugu bangi bakitegedde obwetaavu bw'okutumbula obukugu bwabwe. Okusigala nga bavuganya, abayizi abali mu bibiina by'akamalirizo basuubirwa okuddayo ku ssomero mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma rwom me tic tye ka medde ameda, ludiro mapol gitye ka niang ni omyero gumed diro gi. Pi bedo ki kero me pyem, lutino kwan ma gitye ikangkwan me agiki omyero gudok igangkwan oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini esokoni loka aswamisinei aijulanakin, ejenete ipirioitin luipu eipud loka aitojokar acoasineikec. Kanu asalakite abolobol, ibusakinit esisiak abongun osomero atipet.
lgg_prompt: Cu azi niri ni mu drile ecaria, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi e'yo ega e'yo lezu eyi ma ondua ma omgbo otuzu ra. E'yo baka seza niri ma ta mbazu, 'ba le sukulu anzi sukulu depi dede 'diyi ma go sukulua mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Obutare bw'emirimo ku burikugumizamu nibuhinduka, abakugu baingi nibareeba ekyetengo ky'okutunguura emyoga yaabo. Abeegi abarikugyenda omu bibiina by'akamaririzo, bashemereire kugaruka omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: As the academic year comes to a close, students and educators are anxiously awaiting updates on the examination schedule. Many are concerned about the potential delays and their impact on future academic plans.
lug_prompt: Ng'omwaka gw'ebyensoma gunaatera okuggwaako, abayizi n'abasomesa balindirira n'obweraliikirivu ebipya ku nteekateeka y'ebigezo. Bangi beeraliikirivu olw'okulwawo okuyinza okubaawo n'engeri gye kikwata ku nteekateeka z'ebyenjigiriza ez'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mwaka me kwan tye ka tum, lutino kwan ki lupwonye gitye ka kuro ngec manyen I kom kare me timo peny. Dano mapol tye ki lworo I kom galle ma twero bedo tye ki adwoki ne I kom yub me kwan me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi ekaru loka aisisia angetakin, eutasi esisiak keda esisianakinak aidar akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aingito. Ekadakitos itunga luipu nuikamunitos aiyap keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitolitol ainapeta nuka asioman koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Eli onitaniri ni i deria, sukulu anzi eyi tualu imba'ba eyi pie te e'yo o'diru eyi ma dria sa'wa obeta eyini ri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi asi otiza be e'yo ecopi sa'wa ezazuri ma dria tualu e'yo eyini eco 'ye otita onita ni ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ku gurikuza kuhwa, abeegi hamwe n'abeegyesa bategyereize kumanya ebirikukwata aha ntebeekanisa y'ebigyezo. Baingi niberarikirira okukyerererwa n'oburemeezi bwabyo aha nteekateeka y'eby'obwegyese omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In light of recent budget cuts, many citizens have expressed their concerns about access to education. Officials have been addressing these issues in a series of public statements.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusala mu mbalirira gyebuvuddeko, bannansi bangi balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku kufuna ebyenjigiriza. Abakungu babadde boogera ku nsonga zino mu kwogera kwabwe eri abantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki ngolo byek me lim ma otime cokcok-ki, anywali mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom nongo kwan. Lutela gubedo ka lok I kom lok magi I lok mapat-pat ma guwaco bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitidisiar ebajet, apotu itunga luipu itodutu aiyalongongikec kanu adumunun asioman. Apotu eswamak itetemoto akiro nu kotoma akiro nuipu nuinerasi kesi mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu o'diru risi, kari anzi karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyidri geri eyini ecozu onita esuzu ri ma dria. Azi'ba eyi e'bi e'yo 'diyi ma aza ko e'yo nzeza karakara o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeeza aha mbaririra y'eihanga, abatuuragye baingi boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo aha bikwatiraine n'okutunga eby'obwegyese. Abakuru batwire nibagamba aha nshonga ezi omu bigambo ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In light of the current economic challenges faced by families, it is essential to prioritize accessibility to education. Raising school fees would disproportionately burden students and their parents, making it harder for them to afford quality schooling.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna amaka kwe gasanga mu kiseera kino, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza okufuna obuyigirize. Okwongeza ebisale by'essomero kwandizitooweredde abayizi n'abazadde baabwe, ne kibakaluubiriza okufuna obuyigirize obw'omutindo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim ma gangi tye ka kato ki iye kombedi, pire tek tutwal me keto rwom me nongo kwan obed gin ma pire tek. Medo wel cul kwan twero bedo peko madit tutwal ki lutino kwan ki lunyodogi, weko bedo tek tutwal botgi me nongo kwan me rwom mamalo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun nuetereikina keda ikalia, ejokuna noi aisingarenit adumunun asioman. Aiyatakin isirigin lu esomero epedori aitolitol esisiak keda auriakakec, ido ijaikini kesi etiono adumun ikapun lu isomeroi lu ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru familia eyini esu curu'do e'yo robia nirisi 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo onita ma esuta niri 'duzu okporu. Sukulu fizi ma omgbo otuza ni nga sukulu anzi eyi ma dria tualu eyi ma tipika eyi pie e'yo ewaru eji eyidri eyini ani ecozu onita muke ri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obu amaka garikurabamu, ni kikuru kwebembeza okutunga obwegyese. Okwongyera ebishare by'eishomero, nikiija kuremesa abeegi n'abazaire baabo, kibareetere oburemeezi bw'okushashurira amashomero ag'omutindo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for education, the government has prioritized the expansion of its school system. As a result, several new institutions have been launched to accommodate more students.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ebyenjigiriza obweyongera, gavumenti ekulembezza okugaziya enkola y'amasomero gaayo. N'ekivuddemu, amatendekero amapya agawerako gatongozeddwa okusobola okusuza abayizi bangi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me kwan, gamente oketo cwinygi tutwalle I dongo gangi kwan gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ki yabo gangi kwan manyen mapol me gamo lutino kwan mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakin lo asioman, abu apugan isingarenit aitanyanyar esomero. Kanuka ngun, aponi kitegearai isomeroi luitetiak kanu aisipej esisiak luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu onita ma omgbo tuzu ri ma aza kozu, gamete 'ba okpo e'yo sukulu eyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do sukulu o'diru karakara eyi sukulu anzi eyi 'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'eby'obwegyese, gavumenti eteire omutima aha kushanjuura eby'obwegyese bwayo. N'ekyarugiremu, amatendekyero masya gatandikirweho kwakiira abeegi baingi.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, allegations of misconduct surfaced against the school headteacher. Authorities launched an investigation after multiple reports emerged from concerned parents and students.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri ey'entiisa, ebigambibwa nti omukulu w'essomero yeeyisa bubi byafuluma. Ab'obuyinza baatandika okunoonyereza oluvannyuma lw'obuloopa bungi okuva mu bazadde n'abayizi abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, adot me tim marac obino I kom ladit me gang kwan. Lutela gucako kwed inge winyo lok mapol ma aa ki bot lunyodo ki lutino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka iboro, aponi kitodiarai nuikamunitos iponesio luarokok mama ejai apolon esomero. Apotu apedorosio kogeutu aingic akaulo na iripotan luipu luapotu kopotu kama ejaasi auriak keda esisiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini 'ye adriza onzi 'diyi efu dricere sukulu niri ma rua. Okpo e'ipi e'do e'yo vuti ondaza ni e'yo karakara eyi efuzu engazu tipika eyi vu sukulu anzi eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, ebyabaire nibigambwa ngu mukuru w'eishomero aine emicwe mibi bikabaho. Ab'obushoborozi batandikireho okucondooza ahanyima y'amahurire maingi kuruga omu bazaire n'abeegi.

eng_prompt: In response to recent feedback from educators and parents, the ministry of education conducted a thorough review of the current exam schedule. As a result, they decided to implement changes to better accommodate students' needs.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyayogerwa abasomesa n'abazadde gyebuvuddeko, minisitule y'ebyenjigiriza yakola okwekenneenya mu bujjuvu enteekateeka y'ebigezo eriwo. N'ekyavaamu, baasalawo okussa mu nkola enkyukakyuka okusobola okutuukagana obulungi n'ebyetaago by'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwoki me lok ma aa ki bot lupwonye ki lunyodo, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom kwan ongiyo maber yub me timo peny matye kombedi. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko tam gi me kelo aloka-loka ma lubbe ki miti pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu abongokin akiro nuka esisianakinak keda auriak, abu erionget loka asioman irereonor ainapeta nuka aingito. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi itolomutu aijulanakineta kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru engazu imba'ba eyi vu azini tipika eyi vu risi, okalamvu onita niri 'ye e'yo otita obeta eyini 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru. E'yo 'disi, eyi ai ojata eyi 'ye eyini ani ecozu sukulu anzi eyi ma e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru beni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu ebyarugiremu kuruga omu beegyesa n'abazaire, minisiture y'eby'obwegyese ekakora okushwijuma kurungi enteekateeka y'ebigyezo eriho obwahati. N'ekyarugiremu, bakasharamu kutaho empindahinduka kwenda kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abeegi.

eng_prompt: With the ongoing challenges and disruptions we've faced, many students are feeling overwhelmed. It's hard to focus on our studies when everything seems so uncertain.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusoomoozebwa n'okutaataaganyizibwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo, abayizi bangi bawulira nga bazitoowereddwa. Kizibu okussa essira ku misomo gyaffe nga buli kimu kirabika nga tekimanyiddwa.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol gitye ka winyo peko ki peko matye kamedde anyim. Tek tutwal me keto cwiny I kom kwan ka jami weng nen calo pe tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Keda atiokisio nu elosi akonye keda atiokisio nu itereikina keda oni, epupete esisiak luipu epol noi. Etiono noi apodokinit asioman naarai esubit bala mam ibore ejenuna.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru amani esu 'diyi pie, sukulu anzi karakara yi yi ma asi ombe. Eri ewaru asi 'bazu ama vile onitaniri ma dria e'yo dria ni e'dazu ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi n'oburemeezi obu tutungire, abeegi baingi nibahurira baremereirwe. Kigumire kuta amaani aha mishomo yaitu, ebintu byona biri nk'ebitarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: As concerns about the ongoing crisis continue to grow, parents and students are left in the dark about the future of their education. Many are anxiously awaiting updates from officials regarding the reopening of schools and universities.
lug_prompt: Nga okweraliikirira ku buzibu obugenda mu maaso kweyongera, abazadde n'abayizi basigala mu kizikiza ku biseera by'ebyenjigiriza byabwe eby'omu maaso. Bangi balindirira n'obweraliikirivu amawulire okuva mu bakungu ku bikwata ku kuggulawo kw'amasomero ne zi ssettendekero.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lworo I kom peko matye kamedde anyim, lunyodo ki lutino kwan pud gitye I col piny I kom anyim me kwan gi. Dano mapol tye kakuru lok manyen ki bot lutic I kom yabo gangi kwan ki univaciti.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyatakina aiyalongong kanuka ationis na elosi akonye, mam auriak keda esisiak ejenete nuikamunitos oingaren naka asioman kec. Eutasi itunga luipu aidar akiro nuitetiak kama ejaasi eswamak nuikamunitos apukor isomeroi keda iunibasitin.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'yo ewaru mupi drile 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu drile, tipika eyi tualu sukulu anzi eyi pie aa angu ini ma alea ewu drialeri ma onita ma dria. Ba karakara eyi te asi driasi o'dukoti engazu azi'ba eyi vu e'yo sukulu eyi ma ti zizu azini university eyi ma ti zizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira aha buremeezi oburiho nikuguma nikweyongyera, abazaire n'abeegi nibasigara omu mwirima aha bikwatiraine n'ebiro bya nyensya by'obwegyese bwabo. Baingi bategyereize amakuru kuruga omu bakuru aha bikwatiraine n'okwiguraho amashomero na Yunivasite.

eng_prompt: Effective governance in education requires a centralized authority to ensure consistency and quality across all institutions. This oversight helps address challenges and implement policies that benefit students and educators alike.
lug_prompt: Enfuga ennungi mu by'enjigiriza yeetaaga obuyinza obw'awamu okukakasa obutuufu n'omutindo mu matendekero gonna. Okulondoola kuno kuyamba okukola ku bizibu n'okussa mu nkola enkola eziganyula abayizi n'abasomesa.
ach_prompt: Tela maber I lok kom pwony mito dul ma doro lok me kwan I rwom ma lamal me neno ni rwom me kwan tye I rwom ma lamal I gangi kwan weng. Yub man konyo me tyeko peko ki keto cik ma konyo lutino kwan ki lupwonye.
teo_prompt: Epugae loajokan kotoma asioman ekoto apedorosio nuapolok kanu awanyun ebe ejai ainapakina keda adoketait na abeit kotoma osomeroi kere. Ingarakinit aimaniman na aitemokin atiokisio ka aitegear ainapeta nu imedaunete esisiak keda esisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru onita ma alia ri le drice'ba alu ni nezu ra kini sukulu dria ma eselea e'yo yi 'ye kililiru azini onyiru. Azi pamvu oneza 'di ni azakoma fe e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu azini azita orodriru sukulu anzi eyini tualu imba'ba eyi pie 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi omu by'obwegyese, nibwetenga ekitongore ky'obwegyese eky'omutaano, okureeba ngu eby'obwegyese nibigyenda omu maisho n'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese omu matendekyero goona. Okucondooza nikuhwera omu kurwanisa oburemeezi n'okuta omu nkora ebiragiro ebirikugasira abeegi hamwe n'abeegyesa.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing demand for in-person learning, officials have been evaluating the safety measures in place at schools and universities. After careful consideration, they have decided to implement a phased reopening plan.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obugenda mu maaso obw'okusomera mu buntu, abakungu babadde beekenneenya enkola z'obukuumi eziteekeddwawo mu masomero ne ssettendekero. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, basazeewo okussa mu nkola enteekateeka y'okuggulawo mu mitendera.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki miti me kwan ma tye kawot anyim, lutic gubedo ka neno yoo me gwoko kuc matye I gangi kwan ki gangi kwan me rwom ma malo. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi me yabo ticgi motmot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka aisisia itunga, eutasi eswamak airereor nuka ayuwara kosomeroi keda ounibasitin. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, aseutu kesi aitegear ainapeta nuka apukor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu muzu onita 'yezu eyi ma ngulupi si ri ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba eyi e'bi e'yo ageyitema ni sukulu eyi ma alea azini university eyi ma alea 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo otita eyi ma ti zizu ri 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'okwegyezamu, abakuru batwire nibarondoora enkora y'okwerinda omu mashomero na Yunivasite. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza, bacwiremu kuta omu nkora enteekateeka y'okwiguraho omurundi gumwe.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing mental health crisis among students, there is a growing consensus on the need for a paradigm shift in how we approach education. This shift involves reimagining schools and universities as supportive environments that prioritize student well-being.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'obwongo obweyongera mu bayizi, waliwo okukkaanya okweyongera ku bwetaavu bw'enkyukakyuka mu ngeri gye tukwatamu ebyenjigiriza. Enkyukakyuka eno ezingiramu okuddamu okulowooza ku masomero ne zi ssettendekero ng'ebifo ebiwagira ebikulembeza obulungi bw'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two wic matye kamede I kin lutino kwan, winye tye I kom lok me aloka-loka I yoo me kwan. Alokaloka man kwako neno gangi kwan ki universities macalo kabedo ma konyo lutino kwan ma keto ber bedo pa lutino kwan bedo gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin adeka naka adam naka esisiak, ejai acamanara naepol noi kanu aijulakin epone loiswamai oni kotoma asioman. Imoriaritos aijulanakineta ngun airereonor isomeroi keda iunibasitin kwape aiboisio nuigangitos idwe.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo omi ni tupi sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma e'yosi, 'ba eyi ai ra kini le ama ma oja geri amani onita 'yezu ri ra. Ojata 'di ma alia le 'ba ma ega sukulu azini univasiti eyi angu atita fepi sukulu anzi eyini aa'zu muke 'diyi 'bapi okporu 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'omutwe obweyongyeire omu beegi, hariho okukirizana okw'amaani aha nshonga y'empindahinduka omu muringo ogu turikukoramu eby'obwegyese. Empindahinduka egi neetwariramu okureeba amashomero na Yunivasite nk'emyanya y'okushagika abeegi erikwebembeza eby'amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: As the summer break stretched on, uncertainty loomed over the academic calendar. Parents and teachers alike were discussing the potential plans for the upcoming school year.
lug_prompt: Ng'oluwummula lw'omusana lugenda mu maaso, obutali bukakafu bwajja ku kalenda y'ebyenjigiriza. Abazadde n'abasomesa bombi baali bateesa ku nteekateeka ez'omwaka gw'essomero ogujja.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yweyo pa lutino obedo ka mede anyim, pe obedo yot tutwal I kare me kwan. Lunyodo ki lupwonye gubedo ka lok i kom yub ma omyero gubed kwede pi mwaka me kwan matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Neautar aiyengun na akwap angetakin, abu aomisio nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka asioman kolom. Autasi auriak keda isisianakinak aitemitem nuka aitemonokineta nuka ekaru loka esomero lo ebunit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ava liza eli driasiri ni muzu drile, e'yo onzi ni e'do kalenda onitani 'diyi ma dria. Tipika eyi tualu imba'ba eyi pie ri agbatara gba otita ecopi ra 'diyi ma dria eli sukulu ni emupi ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Obwiire bw'ekihuumuro bw'omushana ku bwabaire nibugyenda omu maisho, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire aha kalenda y'eby'obwegyese. Abazaire hamwe n'abeegyesa bakaba nibagamba aha nteekateeka y'omwaka gw'eishomero ogurikwija.

eng_prompt: As societal pressures and personal circumstances weigh heavily on young women, many are faced with difficult choices regarding their futures. The increasing complexity of teenage life often leads to challenging decisions about unplanned pregnancies.
lug_prompt: Ng'okunyigirizibwa kw'ekitundu n'embeera z'obuntu bigumira nnyo abakyala abato, bangi boolekaganye n'okusalawo okukaluba ku bikwata ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso. Obuzibu obweyongera mu bulamu bw'abavubuka butera okuleeta okusalawo okukaluba ku mbuto ezitasuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lyeto ma aa ki bot lwak kacel ki peko mapat-pat tye ka keto peko i kom mon matino, polgi tye ka nongo peko me moko tam i kom kwo gi me anyim. Tek pa kwo pa bulu ipol kare kelo peko me moko tam i kom yacu ma pe kiyubu.
teo_prompt: Kwape ainingosit naka itunga keda ejautene lo itunga itolitolete angor nudidika, ejaas kesi keda aseununeta nuetioko nuikamunitos ingaren kec. Aijar na apesur nudidika naepol noi eyangauni ainingosia nuikamunitos apotu na mam itemokinitai.
lgg_prompt: Ekile okpo ongulumu eyini 'diyi tualu e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi pie ri ni okpo fe oku oderu 'diyi dri, eyi ma karakara eyi e'yo 'du e'yo ewaru eyi ma ewu drialeri ma dria. E'yo ewaru idri 'ba oderu 'diyi niri ni tupi tutu ri ni fe e'yo 'duzu okporovu 'bani lelerile ku 'diyi ma dria ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu okugyemeserezibwa kw'abantu hamwe n'embeera y'abantu nibiremera munonga abakazi bato, baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okucwamu aha bikwatiraine n'ebiro byabo by'omumaisho. Okweyongyera kw'oburemeezi omu magara g'eminyeeto, nikireetera okwetantara okutwara enda ezitatebekanisiibwe.

eng_prompt: Many people find joy in expressing themselves through storytelling and performance. Engaging in dramatic activities allows for creativity and emotional exploration.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bafuna essanyu mu kwogera nga bayita mu kunyumya n'okuyimba. Okwenyigira mu bya katemba kisobozesa okuyiiya n'okunoonyereza ku nneewulira.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol nongo yomcwiny I tito tamgi I yoo me goyo ododo ki tuko goga. Timo jami ma kelo lworo weko ngat moni bedo ki ngec manyen ki ngec matut I kom ngo matye I cwinye.
teo_prompt: Edumunenete itunga luipu aiyalama kowai lo einer akiro keda abolia. Ajainikin toma aswamisinei nuegelegela ijaikini itunga acoasinei nuitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ayiko esu e'yo eyini ega 'diyi ecezu geri e'yo o'duko oluza ni azini e'yo avita ni 'diyisi. E'yo avita ni 'diyi 'yezu ri ni fe 'ba eyini e'yo eyi edezu o'diru azini e'yo eyini ega 'diyi ma eti ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibatunga okushemererwa omu kworeka enshonga zaabo barikurabira omu kugamba n'okukora ebyeshongoro. Okwejumba omu by'emizaano nikureetaho okujumbura n'okushwijuma ebiteekateeko.

eng_prompt: Many people believe that weddings are extravagant events reserved for those with deep pockets. However, the essence of a wedding lies in the love shared between two individuals, regardless of their financial status.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi balowooza nti embaga bikolwa eby'ebbeeyi ebiterekebwa abo abalina ensimbi ennyingi. Newankubadde, amakulu g'embaga gali mu kwagala okwagabanyizibwamu wakati w'abantu babiri, awatali kufaayo ku mbeera yabwe ey'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni nyom obedo yub ma welle lamal tutwal ma ki gwoko pi jo ma cente gi dwong. Kadi bed kumeno, ber pa nyom tye I mar matye ikin dano aryo, labongo paro pi lim ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe eraas ipetai lu epol noi lu eyuaritai kanuka ngul luejaasi keda ikapun luipu. Konye, ajokis naka epeta erai amina naejai kiding itunga iarei, araida ejaasi kesi keda ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ai'ki kini oku biza eyi 'yeta okporu 'bani 'ba robia be angiri 'diyini 'diyi. Kani si, oku biza ma orodri eri leta 'ba iri yi ma eselea ri ma alia, yini tro ovuzu lonyi be 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibateekateeka ngu embaga n'emikoro y'omutaano erikuba eri ey'abo abaine esente nyingi. Kwonka,omugasho gw'embaga n'okukundana okuri ahagati y'abantu babiri, oihireho eby'empiiha byabo.

eng_prompt: Music nominations play a crucial role in recognizing and celebrating artistic talent within the industry. They not only highlight exceptional work but also provide artists with increased visibility and opportunities for growth.
lug_prompt: Okusunsulwamu kw'abayimbi kukola omulimu munene mu kusiima n'okujaguza ebitone by'abayimbi mu mulimu. Tebikoma ku kulaga mirimu egy'enjawulo naye era biwa abayimbi emikisa gy'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Yer pa lugoo wee konyo totwal me miyo pwoc ki woro bot lugoo wee ma gitye ki diro me goyo wer. Pe nyutu tic mabeco keken ento bene miyo ki lugoo wee gum me dongo.
teo_prompt: Aiwadikao na ikososinei erai ibore yen epol ajokis na ajenun ka ainumunum atalanta naka ayoere kotoma okampuni. Mam kesi itodunitos aswam na itegelikina bon konye einakinitos enomak aputosia aijen keda arerengesio nu apolo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu 'diyi azi okporu ni nga e'yo 'ba ongo ngopi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma e'yo egazu azini ayiko fezu okalamvu 'di ma alea. Eyi lu e'da azi onyiru 'diyi ma dria ku te eyi vini 'ba ongo ngopi 'diyi dri e'daza fe tualu drileba eyini zozu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okutooranwa kw'abeeshongozi nikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanya n'okujaguza etaraanta y'abeeshongozi omu by'okweshongora. Tibarikumanyisa emirimo y'omutaano yonka, beitu nibahereza n'abeeshongozi omugisha gw'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: Producers often seek to maintain viewer interest by introducing unexpected twists and turns. As a result, many series conclude in ways that leave audiences surprised and eager for more.
lug_prompt: Abafulumya ebintu batera okugezaako okukuuma obwagazi bw'abalabi nga baleeta enkyukakyuka ezitasuubirwa. N'ekivuddemu, emizanyo mingi gikomekkerezebwa mu ngeri ereka abalabi nga beewuunya era nga beegomba okumanya ebisingawo.
ach_prompt: Luyub tuku ipol kare giyenyo yo me weko lutim tuku gubed ki miti I komgi kun gi kelo aloka-loka ma pe gitye ka byekone. Macalo adwogi ne, pyem tuku mapol gik I yoo ma weko lunen bedo ki ngeng ki miti me nongo ngec mukene.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi duc luitolomete akiro aitodolikin eipud loka itunga kowai lo aitolomun aijulanakineta numam kesi eomitos. Kanuka ngun, angetakinete iponesio luipu luka ainapeta ngun itunga noi ido ekotosi kesi aipu akiro nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo oyu'ba 'diyi tutuni le 'ba e'yo ndre'baa 'diyi ma ava ma ta mba geri eyini e'yo eyi ojazu geri 'bani ega kokoru 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi asi geri fepi 'ba emu'ba 'diyi dri osuta azini ava be e'yo azini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi b'ebishushani nibaronda okugumyaho ebyetengo by'abareebi barikukoresa ebintu ebitarikuteekateekwaho. N'ekyarugiremu, emizaano mingi neehendera omu muringo ogurikureetera abantu okutangaara n'okwenda kumanya ebirikukiraho.

eng_prompt: The art world has faced numerous challenges, leading to a significant impact on creative expression. As a result, we have lost many talented artists over the years.
lug_prompt: Ensi y'ebyemikono eyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi, ekiviiriddeko okukosa okw'amaanyi ku ngeri y'okwolesebwamu. N'ekivuddemu, tufiiriddwa abayimbi bangi abalina ebitone okumala emyaka.
ach_prompt: Luyub cal gunongo peko mapol tutwal ma okelo adwogi marac i kom yub me nyuto cal. Macalo adwogi ne, warwenyo lugoo wee ma ludiro mapol I mwaki ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Etereikina akwap naka aputosia keda atiokisio nuipu, nu eyangaunitos ationis naepol noi kotoma aitodiaret aputosia. Kanuka ngun, atwakiasi oni awook luipu luejaasi keda atalanta kokaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru e'da gbazaniri fu dri e'yo ewaru karakara yi be, e'yo fepi e'yo 'bani e'da edezu 'diyi ma e'yo ecezuri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, ama avi 'ba ongo ngopi talanta be 'diyi karakara eli agapi 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ensi y'eby'emikono etungire oburemeezi bwingi, ekirikureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kukora eby'emikono. N'ekyarugiremu,tufereirwe abeeshongozi baingi abaine etaraanta omu myaka egi yoona.

eng_prompt: From a young age, I have dreamed of captivating audiences with my performances. With unwavering determination and a passion for the craft, I am committed to honing my skills and making my mark in the film industry.
lug_prompt: Okuva mu myaka gyange emito, mbadde ndowooza ku ky'okusikiriza abantu okuyimba ennyimba zange. Olw'obumalirivu n'okwagala ennyo omulimu guno, nneewaddeyo okulongoosa mu bukugu bwange n'okukola akabonero kange mu kisaawe kya ffirimu.
ach_prompt: Nicake ma onongo pud atidi, abedo ki lek me mako cwiny dano ki tuko goga. Ki tek cwiny madit tutwal ki mar madit tutwal pi tic man, atye ki miti me medo diro mega ki keto alama mega I tic me yubu filim.
teo_prompt: Ageun editeu, amina eong airujasia nuka aitelekaar itunga keda aboliasio ka. Keda apodokinit ka amin naka aswam ngun, akoto eong aitojokar acoa ka aiswamaun ekiror kotoma okampuni loka ifilimun.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu ma eli werea risi, ma ovu orobi be o'bi eyi ma asi 'bazu avita mavile 'diyisi. Asi 'baza okporu azini leta avasi e'yo 'di ma dria ri si, ma asi fe ma vile ondua 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini ma ma wura 'bazu okalamvu senema niri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga omu myaka y'obuto, nyine ekirooto ky'okushemeza abantu n'ebyeshongoro byangye. Ahabw'amaani maingi n'okukunda munonga omurimo ogu, ninyihaireyo kutunguura emyoga yangye n'okukora akamanyiso kangye omu by'emizaano.

eng_prompt: Excitement is building as dancers from around the world prepare to showcase their talents. Fans can look forward to an unforgettable experience as the performances will be accessible to everyone.
lug_prompt: Okucamuka kugenda kweyongera ng'abazinyi okuva mu nsi yonna beetegekera okulaga ebitone byabwe. Abawagizi basobola okwesunga ekintu kye batajja kwerabira kubanga ebivvulu bijja kuba bisoboka eri buli omu.
ach_prompt: Cwiny dano tye ka yomo cwiny I kare ma lumyel ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat tye ka yubbe me nyuto mot gi. Lucwak tuku twero bedo ki miti me neno jami ma wigi pe biwil I komgi pien dano weng twero winyo tuko gi.
teo_prompt: Ejai aiyalama naarai ekapakina akosiok luka akwap kere aitodiar atalanta kec. Epedorete egangitok asesen ibore yen mam imurokini naarai epedorete itunga kere adolokin aitodianareta ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko efu 'ba ongo tu'ba enga'ba wudrikuru ma kalasi kuru 'diyi oturia yi ma feta Munguni fe yini 'diyi e'dazu. Ba atita fepi 'diyi eco asi 'baza be e'yo azi eyini nga avi ku 'diyi ma dria ra a'dusikuni avita 'da ni mu adri 'ba dria eyini ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa kuriyo nikweyongyera ahabwokuba abazini kuruga omunsi yoona nibeteekateekyera kworeka emyoga yaabo. Abahagizi nibabaasa kutegyereza ekihika eki batarikwija kwebwa ahabw'okuba buri omwe naija kuba naabaasa kureeba omuzaano.

eng_prompt: Despite their efforts to secure a venue, local authorities have imposed strict regulations on public performances. As a result, many artists are facing challenges in organizing events in the city.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bafubye okufuna ekifo, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bataddewo amateeka amakakali ku bivvulu by'olukale. N'ekivuddemu, abayimbi bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa mu kutegeka emikolo mu kibuga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ka yele me nongo kabedo, lutela me tedero guketo cik matek tutwal I kom tuko pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, lugoo wee mapol tye kanongo peko ikare me yubu yub i boma madit.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogongu kanu adumun aiboisit, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet ibwaikisi ikisila luitikitikete aitodianareta nuka itunga. Kanuka ngun, eutasi awook luipu adumunun atiokisio nuka aitemonokin epucit koibuga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo yini 'bazu pari kililiru isuzu ra ti, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba azita okporu 'diyi avita o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ongo ngopi karakara 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru eyi be omu eyi otuzu aku ambo 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani gaabo g'okutunga omwanya, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bateireho ebiragiro by'amaani ahaby'okweshongora. N'ekyarugiremu, abeeshongozi baingi nibatunga oburemeezi omu kutebekanisa emikoro omu rurembo.

eng_prompt: The rising number of cases involving defilement has become a serious concern in our society. It is crucial that we take decisive action to protect our vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo ogweyongera ogw'emisango egyekuusa ku kusobya ku baana abatanneetuuka gufuuse kizibu kya maanyi mu kitundu kyaffe. Kikulu nnyo okubaako kye tukolawo okukuuma abantu baffe abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Rwom me medde pa lok me butu ki lutino anyira tek tek obedo peko madit tutwal I kabedo wa. Pire tek tutwal ni omyero wamok tamwa me gwoko dano ma goro.
teo_prompt: Eyatakin na imusagon lu aibu aisiol idwe erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma atutubetekosi. Erai ibore yenepol noi oni aswam kagogongu kanu ayuarite itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe tupi tupi e'yo anzi nyiri eyi obizu okpo alea 'diyi ma dria ri eca asi otiza angiri 'ba amavile 'diyi ma eselea. Eri orodriru amani e'yo 'yezu okporu ama vile 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'emishango y'okutoroboza ogweyongyeire, nigwerarikiriza munonga abantu omu kicweka kyaitu. N'eky'omugasho ngu tukore eky'amaani okurinda abantu baitu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: The ongoing conflict in the region has led to a devastating rise in violence against women and children. Reports from humanitarian organizations reveal the harrowing extent of the atrocities committed during this period.
lug_prompt: Obukuubagano obugenda mu maaso mu kitundu buviiriddeko okweyongera okw'amaanyi mu butabanguko ku bakyala n'abaana. Alipoota okuva mu bitongole ebiyamba abantu ziraga obunene bw'ebikolwa eby'obukambwe ebyakolebwa mu kiseera kino.
ach_prompt: Lweny matye kawot anyim I but lobo eni okelo medde pa tim gero I kom mon ki lutino. Ripot ma aa ki bot dule ma miyo kony bot dano nyutu rwom me tim aranyi ma otime I kare eni.
teo_prompt: Ingungeta lu elosi akonye kotoma aiboisit kangin eyangaunit apol naka amumu naka angor keda idwe. Iripootan luka iriongeta lu ingarakitos itunga itodunitos adoketait naepol noi naka amumu kotoma apakio kanu.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri angu 'da ma alea ri fe ngiringiri oku eyini azini anzi nyiri eyini ri ma omgbo tu ra. O'duko engazu amuti azakoma fepi o'bi eyidri 'diyi vu 'diyi ece e'yo onzi 'bani 'ye sa'wa 'di ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Entaro ezirikugyenda omu maisho omu kyanga zireesireho okweyongyera kw'okunyangaraza abakazi n'abaana. Ripoota kuruga omu bitongore ebirikuhwera abantu nibyoreka oburemeezi bw'amaani obwakozirwe omu bwire obu.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to affect communities worldwide, many individuals are relying on testing to determine their health status. However, concerns have arisen regarding the reliability and timeliness of these tests.
lug_prompt: Nga ssenyiga omukambwe akyagenda mu maaso n'okukosa abantu mu nsi yonna, abantu bangi beesigama ku kukeberebwa okumanya embeera y'obulamu bwabwe. Newankubadde, okweraliikirira kuzzeewo ku bwesige n'obutuufu bw'okukebera kuno.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka mede ki balo kwo pa dano I wilobo lung, dano mapol tye ka jenge I kom pim me niang kit ma yot komgi tye kwede. Kadi bed kumeno, lworo tye I kom bedo ki gen ki kare me pim magi.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokit adeka aimusung itunga kotoma akwap kere, itunga luipu ejai ainwakio kanu ajenun ejautene lo angaleukec. Konye, epuakata nuikamunitos amunokina keda apak na ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile ongulumu eyi 'yezu wudrikurusi ndulu, 'ba karakara eyi asi 'ba eyi ma rua o'biza ma dria eyini ani eyi ma rua ala esuzu. Kani si, asi otiza efu e'yo 'bani ecozu asi 'bazu azo 'di ma dria ra azini e'yo 'bani eyi o'bizu sa'wa dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kuteganisa abantu omu nsi yoona, abantu baingi nibegyendera aha kukyeberwa kumanya amagara gaabo. Kwonka, hariho okwerarikirira aha bikwatireine n'okwesigwa n'okukyebera omu bwire.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to evolve, many people are expressing concerns about the accuracy and reliability of the available testing options. This has led to a growing debate over the effectiveness of coronavirus test kits.
lug_prompt: Nga ssenyiga omukambwe agenda mu maaso n'okukyuka, abantu bangi balaga obweraliikirivu ku butuufu n'obwesige bw'enkola z'okukebera eziriwo. Kino kireeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukugu bw'ebikozesebwa mu kukebera akawuka ka kolona.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye ka medde anyim, dano mapol tye ka nyuto lworo I kom ada ki gen pa yoo me pim matye. Man okelo laro lok mapol I kom kit ma jami me pimo two corona tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka naka ekorona aijulanakin, itunga luipu itodunitos aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos abeit keda amunokina naka iwaitin lu inwakere. Eyangau na epeget loepol noi loikamunit eswamae lo iboro lu inwakere ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni mu drile, 'ba karakara eyi asi otiza e'da geri 'bani azo eyi o'bizu 'diyi ma e'yo ada ma dria. E'yo 'di fe agbatara ma omgbo tuzu e'yo afa azo coronavirusniri o'bizu 'diyi ma orodri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugyenda omu maisho, abantu baingi nibereka okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza n'obwesigwa bw'emiringo y'okukyebera eriho. Eki kireesireho okuhanuura aha kukora kurungi kw'ebikwato by'okukyebera akakooko ka korona.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments, the committee convened to assess the progress of various initiatives. As part of their comprehensive evaluation, the task force has also been tasked to review the status of the remaining sector.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko, akakiiko kaatuula okwekenneenya enkulaakulana y'enteekateeka ez'enjawulo. Ng'ekitundu ku kwekenneenya kwabwe okw'awamu, akakiiko akadduukirize era kaweereddwa omulimu okwekenneenya embeera y'ekitundu ekisigaddewo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, dul ne gubedo tye me neno kit ma yub mapat-pat tye ka wot kwede. Macalo but yub me ngiyo kor tic gi, kimiyo tic ki dul ma doro lok kom yoto kom me ngiyo kit ma tenge mukene tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, abu ekomiti iriamunos airereor apol naka ainapeta nuegelegela. Kwape ediope kotoma airereonor kec, aponi koinakinai atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce airereonor ejautene loka iriongeta luideuna.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, komiti 'da eyi tra eyi muzu e'yo ndundu eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo onezu. E'yo 'bani e'yo eyi ma ale andrizu dria 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba fe drice'ba 'da eyini azi e'yo esele acepi 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho,akakiiko kakashutama kushwijuma entunguuka y'emirimo etari emwe. Nk'ekicweka ky'okushwijuma,akakiiko kakahebwa omurimo gw'okushwijuma omutindo gw'eby'obushubuzi ebisigaire.

eng_prompt: Understanding how diseases transmit is crucial for public health. Effective prevention strategies are essential to mitigate their impact on communities.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera engeri endwadde gye zisaasaanamu kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu bw'abantu. Enkola ennungi ez'okuziyiza za mugaso okukendeeza ku buzibu bwazo mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma two kobo kwede pire tek tutwal pi yot kom pa lwak. Yoo maber me gengo two eni pire tek tutwal me dwoko piny adwogi ne I kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Amisikin epone loekorere adekasinei erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu naka itunga. Iwaitin lu itikitikere ekorona ejokuka kanu aitidisiar atiokisio kec mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nizu azo eyi ma ereta ma dria ri eri orodriru alata o'bi eyini ri ni. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi atrizu kililiru 'diyi orodriru e'yo eyi 'yepi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oku endwara zirikurabanisibwa n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abantu. Enkora nungi y'okuzibira endwara n'ey'omugasho, okubaasa kukyendeeza aha kabi kazo omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Regular monitoring of one's health can prevent serious medical issues. It's essential to prioritize routine evaluations to ensure overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Okukebera obulamu bw'omuntu buli kaseera kisobola okutangira obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu byobulamu. Kya mugaso okukulembeza okwekebejjebwa okwa bulijjo okusobola okukakasa obulungi okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Bedo ka ngiyo yotkom pa ngat moni kare ki kare twero gengo peko madongo me yot kom. Pire tek tutwal me bedo ki yub me ngiyo kit ma tic tye kawot kwede wek dano weng gubed maber.
teo_prompt: Aanyanar duc angaleu naka itunganan epedori aitikitik adekasinei nuarokok. Erai ibore yenepol noi aisingarenit ainwakio kanu awanyun ebe ejai aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azi ma rua ma ale andrizu sawa driasi ri eco e'yo onzi eyi atri ra. Eri orodriru e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua andrizu sa'wa driasi ri 'bazu e'yo okporu eyini ani aa'zu muke ri nezu.
nyn_prompt: Okukyebera amagara g'omuntu buri kaire nikibaasa kuzibira oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'eky'omugasho kwebembeza okukyebera buri kaire, okureeba ngu abantu boona bari gye.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the world has witnessed the rapid emergence of various infectious diseases. These outbreaks highlight the urgent need for effective public health measures to control their transmission.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ensi ebaddemu endwadde ez'enjawulo ezisiigibwa amangu. Okubalukawo kuno kulaga obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'enkola z'ebyobulamu mu bantu okuziyiza okusaasaana kwazo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, two ma kobo oyot-oyot tutwal I wilobo. Poto pa two eni nyutu ni mite tutwal ni myero ki tii ki yoo me yot kom maber me gengo nya pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunit akwap na abwangun na adekasinei nu ikopas noi. Itodunit abwangun na ebe ibusakinit atipet aitolomun iwaitin lu angaleu kanu aitikitik awea na adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, wudrikuru ndre e'dota mbele mbele azo ndundu eyi erepi ra 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo efupi 'diyi ece kini le 'ba ma 'du e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi mbeleru e'yo erini i erezu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ensi ereebire okubarukaho kw'endwara ez'omutaano. Okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obu nikworeka ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okukora ahaby'amagara g'abantu kwenda kuzibira okujanjaara kwabwo.

eng_prompt: Cholesterol is a substance that plays a crucial role in the body, but many people have questions about its significance and impact on health. Understanding its function and the different types can help clarify its importance in our diet and overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Cholesterol kye kintu ekikola omulimu omukulu mu mubiri, naye abantu bangi balina ebibuuzo ku bukulu bwakyo n'engeri gye kikosaamu obulamu. Okutegeera emirimu gyakyo n'ebika ebyenjawulo kisobola okuyamba okunyonyola obukulu bwakyo mu mmere yaffe n'obulamu obulungi okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Cholesterol obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I komwa, ento dano mapol tye ki lapeny I kom ber ne ki adwoki ne I kom yotkom. Niang ticgi ki kwai gi mapat-pat twero konyo me niang ber pa cam megwa ki ber bedo wa.
teo_prompt: Erai adeka naka cholesterol ibore yenepol noi kotoma akwan, konye ipu itunga luejaasi keda aingiseta nuikamunitos ajokis ke keda epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol angaleu. Amisiikin aswam ke keda iponesio luegelegela ingarakini ajenun ajokis naka ainyam wok keda aijar wok.
lgg_prompt: Cholesterol eri afa azi orodriru 'yepi rua ma alia ni'I, te 'ba karakara eyi ma zita orodri erini ri ma dria azini e'yo erini 'ye rua ala ma dria 'diyi ma dria ci. E'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma vata azini wura ndundu 'diyi ma dria 'diyi eco ama aza ko orodri erini nyaka nyazuri ma alia azini aa'ta muke ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Cholesterol n'ekintu ekirikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu mubiri, kwonka abantu baingi baine ebibuuzo ebirikukwata aha mugasho gwakyo n'ebirikukwata aha magara. Okwetegyereza emirimo yaayo hamwe n'emiringo etari emwe, nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya omugasho gwayo omu by'okurya byaitu hamwe n'amagara gaitu.

eng_prompt: Many women may feel uncertain about their fertility, often wondering if they can achieve pregnancy without medical intervention. However, understanding the natural processes of conception can provide hope and clarity.
lug_prompt: Abakyala bangi bayinza okuwulira nga tebakakasa ku buzaale bwabwe, nga beebuuza oba basobola okufuna embuto nga tebalina bujjanjabi. Newankubadde, okutegeera enkola y'obutonde ey'okufuna olubuto kisobola okuwa essuubi n'obutangaavu.
ach_prompt: Mon mapol gitwero bedo ki akala-kala I kom nywalgi, pol kare gipenye kekengi kace gitwero yac labongo kony pa daktari. Kadi bed kumeno, niang kit ma yacu time kwede twero kelo gen ki niang matut.
teo_prompt: Mam angor nuipu ejenete ebe epedorete kesi apotu, mam ejenete arai epedorete kesi apotun komam amukian. Konye, amisiikin epone loka aidar apotu ijaikini itunga amuno ka amisiikin.
lgg_prompt: Oku karakara eyi ma asi e'yo eyi ma ezota ma dria ku, eyi sa'wa driasi eyi osu kani eyi eco okporovu esu arojo eyi ma aza ko kokoru ya ri ma dria. Kani si, geri okporovu eyini mva esuzu 'diyi ma vata eco asi'baza azini e'yo eyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Abakazi baingi nibabaasa kwehurira bataine buhame aha nshonga y'okuzaara kwabo, buriijo nibeebuuza yaaba nibabaasa kutwara enda bateine bujanjabi. Kwonka, okwetegyereza emiringo y'obuhangwa y'okutwara enda nikibaasa kureetaho amatsiko n'okwetegyereza.

eng_prompt: Regular physical activity plays a crucial role in overall well-being. Engaging in various forms of exercise can significantly enhance both physical and mental health.
lug_prompt: Okukola dduyiro obutayosa kya mugaso nnyo mu mbeera y'omubiri okutwalira awamu. Okwenyigira mu ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukola dduyiro kiyinza okutumbula ennyo obulamu bw'omubiri n'obw'obwongo.
ach_prompt: Yub me rweyo lee kare ki kare konyo totwal I gwoko yot kom pa dano. Timo jami mapatpat me rweyo lee twero yubu yotkom me kom ki wic.
teo_prompt: Aswam na etapit erai na epol ajokis noi kanu aijar najokan. Aswam iponesio luegelegela lu arionor epedori aitojokar angaleu na akwan keda aomisio.
lgg_prompt: Yeta rua ni 'diyi ma 'yeta sa'wa driasi ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke ri ma alea. E'yo rua ayuza wura ndundu 'diyi 'yezu ri eco rua ala ma omgbo otu tualu omi be.
nyn_prompt: Okukora emirimo y'omubiri obutoosha n'eky'omugasho aha magara marungi. Okwejumba omumiringo mingi y'eby'emizaano nikibaasa kutunguura amagara g'omubiri n'omutwe.

eng_prompt: Incorporating dairy into your diet can provide essential nutrients. Many people overlook the advantages of consuming milk regularly.
lug_prompt: Okuteekamu amata mu mmere yo kisobola okukuwa ebiriisa ebikulu. Abantu bangi babuusa amaaso emigaso gy'okunywa amata buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Medo cak I cam megi twero weko inongo moc cam ma mite. Dano mapol cayo ber pa mato cak kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikin akile toma ainyam kon epedori aijaikin ijo inyamat luibusakinit jo aidar. Mam itunga luipu epalunit ajokis naka aimat akile duc.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lesuni 'diyi 'bazu nyaka mini nya 'diyi ma alia ri eco mi dri afa nyaza orodriru 'diyi fe ra. Ba karakara eyi e'yo orodri lesu mvuza sa'wa driasi ri ma dria 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Okwongyera amate omu byokurya byawe, nikibaasa kukuheereza ebiriisa ebirikwetengwa. Abantu baingi tibarikufayo aha birungi by'okunywa amate buri kaire.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing patient demand and the strain on existing facilities, it is crucial to assess our current healthcare infrastructure. To ensure timely and effective care, we must identify areas that require additional resources.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abalwadde obweyongera n'okunyigirizibwa kw'ebyobulamu ebiriwo, kikulu nnyo okwekenneenya ebyobulamu ebiriwo. Okusobola okufuna obujjanjabi mu budde era obulungi, tulina okuzuula ebitundu ebyetaaga ebyetaago ebirala.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutwo ki peko matye I kom odi yadi matye, pire tek tutwal me ngiyo kit ma odi yadi tye kwede kombedi. Me neno ni kony tye ikare ki maber, omyero waniang kabedo ma mito kony mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanu eipud loepol noi loka adekak keda eipud loka aiboisio nu ejaas, erai ibore yenepol noi airereonor eswamae wok loka amukian. Kanu awanyun amukian najokan kotoma apak, ekot oni ajenun aiboisio nu ekotos iboro luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani lezu arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea ri be, eri orodriru ama ma one arojo eyi ma alea sa'wa 'disi. Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi azini kililiru ri esuzu, le ama ma esu angu 'bani le afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma azi eyi dika.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire hamwe n'oburemeezi ahabitongore ebiriho, niky'omugasho kushwijuma obuheereza bw'eby'amagara oburiho hati. Okureeba ngu habaho obujanjabi burungi omu bwire, twine kumanya emyanya erikwetenga eby'okukozesa ebindi.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the dedication and hard work of healthcare workers become even more evident. Their tireless efforts often go unnoticed, highlighting the importance of recognizing their contributions.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu, okwewaayo n'okukola ennyo kw'abasawo kweyongera okweyoleka. Emirimu gyabwe egy'obutaweera gitera obutategeerekeka, ekiraga obukulu bw'okusiima emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, keto cwiny ki tic matek pa lutic yoto kom nen tutwal. Tute gi ma pe ywee ipol kare pe nen, ma nyutu ber pa pwoyo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiokisio, esubit noi ainakina keda aswam na eswamak lu adekis. Aswamukec naepol noi etapit mam ajenun, itodunit ajokis na ajenun aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, asi feza azini azi okporu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini ri eca e'da saaru. E'yo eyini azi ngazu okpo kokoru 'diyi ma e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma dria ku ri ece e'yo orodri eyini azi eyini 'ye 'diyi ma e'yo egazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, okwehayo n'okukora n'amaani kw'abashaho nikweyongyera kureebeka. Amaani gaabo agatarikuhwa, tigarikukira kumanywa, ekirikworeka obukuru bw'okusiima obuhwezi bwabo.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a concerning rise in COVID-19 cases across the country. As a result, the government is implementing stricter measures to curb the spread of the virus.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe okweraliikiriza okwetooloola eggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti eri mu kuteeka mu nkola emitendera emikakali okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde tutwal I lobo man. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente tye katic ki yoo matek me gengo nya pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kakwap. Kanuka ngun, euta apugan aitegear iwaitin lu itigogongoritai kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu kari 'di ma alea ndulu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, gamete ni geri okporu 'diyi 'ba e'yo azo 'da ma ereta atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 okwetoroora eihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, gavumenti eriyo neetaho emiringo y'amaani y'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko ka muzibwe.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic spread and health officials emphasized the importance of wearing masks, many individuals sought creative solutions to protect themselves and others. With a shortage of medical-grade masks, resourceful citizens turned to their sewing skills and repurposed fabric from old clothing.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyeyongera okusaasaana era abakungu b'ebyobulamu ne bassa essira ku bukulu bw'okwambala obukkookolo, abantu bangi baanoonya engeri z'okwekuumamu n'okukuumamu abalala. Olw'ebbula lya masiki ez'ekika ky'obusawo, bannansi abagezi baddukira mu bukugu bwabwe obw'okutunga n'okukozesa embugo okuva mu ngoye enkadde.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two opoto dok lutic me yot kom gucuko cwiny dano me ruko labo dog ki um, dano mapol guyenyo yoo me gwokke kekengi ki jo mukene. Pi peko me nok pa labo dog ki um, anywali matye ki cente gucako tic ki diro gi me kwoc ki yubu bongi macon.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekorora adeka ka apotu eswamak luka angaleu kitogogongoto ajokis naka ainap aitabalan nuka ekume keda aituk, apotu itunga luipu kongicata iwaitin lu ayuara kes keda luce. Keda ekadakada loka aitabalan nurapis aituk keda ekume, apotu itunga luka akwapuwok kiswamautu aituk keda igoen luemojongito.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni i erezu dika azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba asi orodri afa andreti a'buzu 'diyi ma osuza ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi nda geri ndundu eyi ecozu eyi ma ta mbazu eyi ma ngulupi si azini 'ba azi 'diyi pie. E'yo afa andreti a'buzu arojo'a 'diyi ma ako si, kari anzi okporu 'diyi oja eyi ma ondua afa soza ni 'diyi ma dria dika eyi ayu bongo oku 'diyi ma bongo eyi o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire ku bwabaire nibujanjaara kandi abakuru omu by'amagara bakahamya omugasho gw'okujwara obukookoro, abantu baingi bakasherura oburyo bw'okwerinda n'okwerinda abandi.
