ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ka nongo kony me yat, dano mapol pwod gitye ki lanyut me two. Man okelo lworo ikin lutic yoto kom pi adwogi marac ma two eni twero kelo ikare malac.
teo_prompt: Karaida edumununete kesi amukian, eringa itunga luipu ejaas keda aanyuneta nuka adekasinei. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak lu adekis kanuikamunitos atiokisio nu apak naepol nuka adeka.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi aro esuzu ra ti, eyi nga po'di e'da eyi esu. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza 'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea e'yo ewaru azo 'di ni 'diyi ma dria sa'wa ezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okutunga obujanjabi, abantu baingi nibatunga obubonero oburikugumaho. Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira omu bashaho aha bikwatiraine n'oburemeezi bw'oburwaire obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: As Uganda continues to grapple with the impact of the pandemic, health officials are closely monitoring the influx of travelers at border points. Recent data has revealed a concerning trend in the spread of COVID-19 linked to cross-border trade activities.
lug_prompt: Nga Uganda ekyagenda mu maaso n'okulwanagana n'ebikosa ekirwadde bbunansi, abakungu b'ebyobulamu balondoola nnyo okuyingira kw'abatambuze ku nsalo. Ebiwandiiko ebifulumiziddwa gye buvuddeko biraga enkola eyeeraliikiriza mu kusaasaana kw'ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe ekikwatagana n'ebyobusuubuzi okusala ensalo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma Uganda tye ka lweny ki peko ma two korona okelo, lutic me yot kom tye ka ngiyo kit ma luwot tye ka donyo kwede I wang lobo. Lok ma otimme cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma two korona tye ka nya kwede malubbe ki cato wil ma aa ki I lobo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit Uganda ainingosit keda atiokisio nuka adeka naka ekorona, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aanyanar noi alomar naka alotok koikoru. Akiro nuitodunitos kwana itodunit ebe epol noi awea naka adeka naka COVID-19 kotoma aswamisinei nuka agwelanar kotoma akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ni mu drile a'di 'dizu e'yo azo 'dezaniri be, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo 'ba aci'ba emupi angu boda ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma pamvu one. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otizani COVID-19 ma ereta ma dria e'yo tujarani boda mile ma aliasi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obu Uganda erikugumizamu n'okurwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'endwara ruranda nsi, abakuru omu by'amagara bariyo nibareebuuza okutahirira kw'abantu aha nsharo. Ebikwatireine n'okujanjaara kw'endwara ya COVID-19 kuruga omu by'obushubuzi kuruga omu mahanga agandi.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to affect communities worldwide, many people are seeking information about the virus. Understanding how to identify potential infections is crucial for early detection and prevention.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okukosa abantu mu nsi yonna, abantu bangi banoonya obubaka obukwata ku kawuka. Okutegeera engeri y'okuzuula obulwadde obuyinza okukwatibwa kya mugaso nnyo mu kuzuula amangu n'okubuziyiza.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka mede ki balo kwo pa dano I wilobo lung, dano mapol tye ka yenyo ngec I kom two eni. Niang kit me niang two ma twero mako dano pire tek tutwal pi niang con ki gengo ne.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokit adeka aimusung itunga kotoma akwap kere, eutasi itunga luipu aimo akiro nuikamunitos adeka. Amisikin epone loka ajenun adekasinei nuepedorete adumun ejok kanu ajenun sek ka aitikitik.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile ongulumu yi bizu wudrikurusi ndulu, 'ba karakara yi o'duko nda e'yo azo nde ma dria. Vata geri 'bani ecozu azo eyi esuzu 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi esuzu drioru azini eyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kuteganisa abantu omu nsi yoona, abantu baingi nibaronda amakuru agarikukwata aha kakooko. Okwetegyereza oku orikubaasa kumanya oburwaire oburikubaasa kukwatwa, nikikuru munonga omu kumanya bukiri kare n'okuzibira.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continued to spread rapidly, reports emerged of increasing infection rates among various groups. In particular, the strain on healthcare systems has put frontline health workers at heightened risk.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyeyongera okusaasaana amangu, alipoota zaavaayo ku kweyongera kw'obubonero mu bibiina eby'enjawulo. Okusingira ddala, okunyigirizibwa kw'ebyobulamu kuteeka abasawo abali ku mwanjo mu katyabaga.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona omedde ki nyaa oyot, adwoki me kwed okati I kom wel dano matye ka nongo two I kin dul mapat-pat. I yo acel-acel, peko matye I tenge me yot-kom oweko lutic yot-kom matye I nyim dul pa gamente gitye I peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neinyikokinit adeka aisiarakin katipet, apotu iripootan kiswamata nuikamunitos aiyatakin na adekasinei kanejaas igurupun luegelegela. Kacut, aiyalongong naka erionget loka angaleu einakinit eswamak luka angaleu luejaasi toma ationis naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile i erezu okposi, o'duko efu e'yo ongmbo azo esuzuri ni tuzu ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Tutunisi, e'yo ewaru geri alata ni 'diyi ma dria ri 'ba azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwagumiizemu kujanjaara juba, ripoota z'oburwaire kweyongyera omu guruupu ezitari zimwe. Okukira munonga, oburemeezi oburi omu marwariro, butwire abashaho abari aha rurengo rw'okubanza omu kabi.

eng_prompt: Before proceeding with the analysis, the team carefully collected various samples from the contacts involved in the study. This step was crucial to ensure accurate testing results.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannagenda mu maaso n'okukebera, ttiimu yakungaanya n'obwegendereza sampolo ez'enjawulo okuva mu bantu be yakwatagana nabo mu kunoonyereza. Omutendera guno gwali gwa mugaso nnyo okulaba nti ebyava mu kukebera biba bituufu.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe gumede ki kwed, dul pa ludiro gujogo jami mapat-pat ki bot dano ma gubedo tye I kwed ne. Yub man obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni adwoki me pim tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Erongo egeuna aingic akiro ngun, apotu etimu kitukokinos iboro luegelegela kanejaas itunga luejaasi toma aingic kangin. Arai na ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe abeit akiro nu ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di e'doni e'yo eti ondazu ku, amuti 'da tra e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi geri kililiru si engazu 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi pie e'yo eti ondaza 'da ma alea 'diyi vu. Eꞌyo ꞌdi eri orodriru ꞌbani ani eꞌyo ꞌbani azo oꞌbizu ꞌdiyi ma dria kililiru ꞌdiyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Batakagumizemu n'okushwijuma, tiimu ekakora n'obwegyendesereza okurundaana eby'okureeberaho kuruga omu bantu abaabaire bejumbire omu kucondooza. Omuringo ogu gukaba guri ogw'omugasho munonga okureeba ngu ebirugire omu kukyebera biba bihikire.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges faced by the healthcare system, it is important to recognize the dedication and hard work of those on the front lines. Their tireless efforts have made a significant impact on the well-being of the community.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu gye buvuddeko, kikulu okusiima obumalirivu n'okukola ennyo kw'abo abali ku mwanjo. Okufuba kwabwe okw'obutaweera kukoze kinene ku mbeera y'abantu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma odi yadi tye ka kato ki iye cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me pwoyo keto cwiny ki tic matek pa joo matye I nyimgi. Tute gi matek tutwal okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda erionget loka angaleu, ejokuna aijen ainakina keda aswam naepol naka ngul luingarenikinitos. Aswam kec naepol noi nes iswamat noi kotoma aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ni isule o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru 'ba e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma asi feza azini azi okporu eyini nga 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Okpo eyini 'ba ande kokoru ri 'ye ojata angiri ongulumu eyi ma edri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu ab'eby'amagara barikurabamu ebiro ebi, n'eky'omugasho kumanya okwehayo n'okukora n'amaani kw'abo abarikwebembera eby'amagara. Amaani gaabo agatarikuhwa, gahindwire munonga entuura nungi y'abantu.

eng_prompt: As we prepare to implement the new testing protocols, it's important for everyone to understand the associated costs. We want to ensure transparency regarding any financial obligations related to the testing process.
lug_prompt: Nga twetegekera okussa mu nkola emitendera emipya egy'okukebera, kya mugaso buli omu okutegeera ebisale ebikwatagana nabyo. Twagala okukakasa obwerufu ku buvunaanyizibwa bwonna obw'ensimbi obukwatagana n'enkola y'okukebera.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka yubbe me keto cik manyen me pim itic, pire tek pi dano weng me niang wel cente ma mite. Wamito neno ni jami weng tye atir malube ki lok me lim ma kubbe ki yub me pim eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape iuta sio aitemonokin aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nuka ainwakio, ejok itunga kere amisikin ikapun lu itwasamao. Ikoto iso awanyun ebe ejai aica kanuikamunitos iboro lu ikapun lu ikamanara keda ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: Amani ama otuta 'yeria azita o'diru 'bani azo o'bizu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba dria ni e'yo aje yini 'diyi vazu. Ale ne kililiru e'yo dria e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria e'yo o'bita ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikweteekateekyera okuta omu nkora enkora ensya y'okukyebera, n'eky'omugasho buri omwe kwetegyereza enshohoza erikukwataho. Nitwenda ngu habeho amazima omu by'empiiha ebirikukwata aha kukyebera.

eng_prompt: The laboratory encountered unexpected technical issues during the analysis process. As a result, the team is working diligently to resolve the situation.
lug_prompt: Ekkeberero lyafuna ebizibu eby'ekikugu ebitasuubirwa mu nkola y'okukebera. N'ekyavaamu, ttiimu ekola n'obunyiikivu okugonjoola embeera.
ach_prompt: Ot pim onongo peko ma pe byek tye I komgi ikare me timo kwed. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ne tye ka tic matek me tyeko peko eni.
teo_prompt: Abu aiboisit nainwakere kodum atiokisio nu mam eomitai kapak kana aanyanar. Kanuka ngun, euta etimu aswam kagogong aitemokin ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Angu afa eyi o'bizu omvele laboratory ri esu e'yo ewaru 'bani egale ku 'diyi sa'wa 'bani afa eyi o'bizu ri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, amuti 'da ni azi nga okporu e'yo 'da ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Rabaratore ekatunga oburemeezi obutarikuteekateekwaho omu kukyebera. N'ekyarugiremu, tiimu eriyo neekora n'amaani kumaraho embeera.

eng_prompt: Health officials conducted a thorough screening of all individuals arriving from abroad. Among the travelers, eleven foreigners were selected for testing due to potential exposure risks.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu baakebera nnyo abantu bonna abajja okuva ebweru w'eggwanga. Mu batambuze, abagwira kkumi n'omu baalondeddwa okukeberebwa olw'obulabe obuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gupimo dano weng ma obino ki I lobo ma woko. I kin luwot, kiyero anywali me lobo ma woko apar wiye acel me pime pi peko ma twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis inwakautu ainwakio na itunga kere lu elomunenete akwapin nukokinga. Kotoma alotok, aponi koseunai itunga lu okinga itomonadiop kanu ainwakio naarai epedorete kesi adumun adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ye 'ba dria emupi engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrita kililiru. Ba pe 'ba aci'ba 'da eyi ma eselea 'ba juru ru 'diyi mudri drini alu eyi ma rua 'bani eyi ma rua o'bizu e'yo onzi eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara bakakora okukyebera kurungi abantu boona abarikuruga aheeru y'eihanga. Omu bagyenyi, abanyamahanga ikumi n'omwe, bakatooranwa kukyeberwa ahabw'oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases among transport workers, authorities implemented strict health protocols. As a result, truck drivers who tested positive for coronavirus were taken back to their home countries.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera mu bakozi b'ebyentambula, ab'obuyinza bassa mu nkola amateeka amakakali agakwata ku byobulamu. N'ekyavaamu, abavuzi ba biroole abaasangibwa n'akawuka ka kolona baddayo mu nsi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona ikin lutic me wot, lutela guketo cik matek tutwal I tic. Macalo adwogi ne, ludwo motoka madongo ma kinongo ni gitye ki two corona kidwokogi cen I lobogi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kanejaas eswamak luka elose, apotu apedorosio itolomutu ainapeta nuka angaleu. Kanuka ngun, aponi inyakunai iderepan luka ilorei lu inwakunitai ekorona akwapin kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe COVID-19 niri ni tuzu azi'ba acipa ni 'diyi ma eselea risi, drice'ba eyi 'ba azita okporu e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ji dereva lorri onzupi 'bani esu azo coronavirusniri be 'diyi vile kari yi vile akua 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire omu bakozi b'eby'engyenda, ab'obushoborozi bakataho engyenderwaho y'amaani y'eby'amagara. Ekyarugiremu, abavugi b'ebimotoka ebihango abashangirwe baine akakooko ka korona bakagarurwa omu mahanga gaabo.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases began to decline, health officials ramped up testing efforts across the region. This led to a significant increase in the number of patients being discharged from hospitals.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe bwe gwatandika okukendeera, ab'ebyobulamu beeyongedde okukebera mu kitundu kyonna. Kino kyaviirako okweyongera okw'amaanyi mu muwendo gw'abalwadde abasiibulwa okuva mu malwaliro.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona ocako dwogo piny, lutic me yot kom omedo rwom me pim I but lobo man weng. Man oweko wel lutwo ma ki kwanyo gi ki iot yat omede tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neageuna enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 aitidisiar, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kiyatakisi ainwakio kotoma aiboisit kere. Abu ngin koyangau aiyatakino na enaaba loka adekak lu aponi otwarai adekisia.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni e'doria esizu 'boria, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi otu okpo e'yo o'biza ni 'diyi ma omgbo angu 'di ma alea ndulu. E'yo 'di fe kalafe 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ofuzu arojoa ri tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ku gwatandikire kukyendeera, abakuru omu by'amagara bakongyera amaani omu kukyebera abantu omu kicweka ekyo. Eki kikareetaho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire kuruga omu marwariro.

eng_prompt: In response to the outbreak, health officials initiated a thorough investigation to trace potential sources of infection. To ensure comprehensive monitoring, samples were taken from their immediate contacts and also from the health workers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baatandika okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu okuzuula ensibuko z'obulwadde. Okusobola okukakasa okulondoola okujjuvu, sampolo zaggyibwa mu bantu be baakwatagana nabo era ne mu basawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two eni, lutic me yot kom gucako kwed matut tutwal me niang kama two eni aa ki iye. Me neno ni dano weng tye ka lubu kor tic gi, kikwanyo samples ki bot joo ma gubedo cok kwedgi ki bene ki bot lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kogeutu aingic noi kanu aanyun aiboisio nuepedorete ayangaun adeka. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aanyanar naejok, aponi oyangarai aokot kama ejaasi itunga luetapit kesi keda eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'da ni e'dozu risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'do e'yo vuti ondaza kililiru 'diyi e'yo azo 'da ni e'dozu 'diyi ma eti ondazu. E'yo eti ondazu kililiru, 'ba 'du afa eyi engazu 'ba eyi ecipi eyi pie tualu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire, abakuru omu by'amagara bakatandikaho okucondooza kurungi, okureeba oburugo bw'oburwaire oburikubaasa kubaho. Okureeba ngu habaho okurondooza okurikumara, abantu abaabaire nibakorengana nabo hamwe n'abashaho bakye bakye bakyeberwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in respiratory illnesses, health officials issued new guidelines. To help mitigate the spread of the virus, precautions were recommended for the general public.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'endwadde z'okussa gye buvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bafulumizza ebiragiro ebipya. Okusobola okukendeeza ku kusaasaana kw'akawuka, abantu bonna baakubirizibwa okuba abeegendereza.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa two ma mako yweyo, lutic me yot kom gumiyo cik manyen. Me gengo nya pa two eni, kimiyo tam bot lwak me gwoke.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei nu eyengane, apotu eswamak luka angaleu itolomutu aicoreta nuitetiak. Kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona, aponi icorakinai itunga kere aitikitik.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo oli seza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe azita o'diru ni eyi. E'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma omgbo esizu, 'ba fe imbata e'yo eyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma dria o'bi eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'endwara z'okwisya, abakuru omu by'amagara bakataho ebiragiro ebisya. Okuhwera okukyendeeza okujanjaara kw'akakooko, abantu boona bakahaburwa okwerinda.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to impact daily life, many people are seeking ways to ensure their health and safety. However, the costs associated with medical testing can be a significant barrier for many individuals.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okukosa obulamu obwa bulijjo, abantu bangi banoonya engeri z'okukakasa obulamu bwabwe n'obukuumi. Newankubadde, ebisale ebikwatagana n'okukeberebwa mu byobulamu bisobola okuba ekizibu eri abantu bangi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka mede ki balo kwo pa dano, dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me gwoko yot komgi. Kadi bed kumeno, wel cente ma mite pi pime I ot yat twero bedo ariya madit tutwal bot dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokit adeka aitolitol aijar naka nginiparan, eutasi itunga luipu aimo iwaitin lu eyuwarete kesi. Konye, etiai loka ainwakio erai ainingosit naepol noi kanejaas itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni mu drile e'yo eyi 'yezu o'du driasi, 'ba karakara eyi geri nda eyini ani eyi ma rua ala azini ageitema esuzu. Kani si, aje e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizu arojoa ri ma dria ri eco ovu e'yo azi okporu ni i 'yepi 'ba karakara eyini.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kuteganisa amagara g'abantu, abantu baingi nibaronda oburyo bw'okureebeka ngu baine amagara marungi n'oburinzi. Kwonka, ebishare ebirikukwatanisa n'okukyeberwa omu irwariro, nikibaasa kuremesa abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, health officials urged the public to take preventive measures. To support these efforts, the government announced a plan to ensure that everyone has access to essential protective gear.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baakubiriza abantu okukola ebintu ebiziyiza. Okuyambako mu kaweefube ono, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka okulaba nga buli omu afuna eby'okwekuumisa ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic yoto kom gulego lwak me timo jami mapat-pat me gengo two corona. Me tyelo kor tic man, gamente okatti ki yub me neno ni dano weng tye ki jami ma mite pi gwokke.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luka angaleu isinyikokisi itunga aitikitik adeka. Kanu aigang aswamisio nu, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuka awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumun iboro lu ayuara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ai o'bi eyi e'yo 'duzu e'yo eyi atrizu 'diyi 'yezu. Atita fezu e'yo 'diyi ma dria, gamete azi otita azi nezu ra kini 'ba dria isu afa ta mbazu 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, abakuru omu by'amagara bakashaba abantu okukoresa emiringo y'okuzibira. Okushagika enteekateeka egi,gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka y'okureeba ngu buri omwe yaatunga eby'okwerinda ebikuru.

eng_prompt: As the vaccination campaign gains momentum, health officials are cautiously optimistic about the situation. Reports indicate that some patients are beginning to show signs of improvement.
lug_prompt: Nga kaweefube w'okugema agenda mu maaso, abakungu b'ebyobulamu balina essuubi ku mbeera. Lipoota ziraga nti abalwadde abamu batandise okulaga obubonero bw'okutereera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub me gwero dano tye ka mede, lutic me yot kom tye ki gen I kom ngo matye katimme. Adwogi tic nyutu ni lutwo mukene tye ka cako nyutu lanyut me yube.
teo_prompt: Kwape euta ekato aiyatakin, ejaasi eswamak luka angaleu keda amuno naepol noi kanuikamunitos ejautene. Itodunitos iripotan ebe egeunos adekak ice aitodun ijenuneta luka ajokunar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi osozu aro azo atrizu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi'baza be e'yo 'da ma dria. O'duko ece kini 'ba azoru 'diyi ma azi e'doki eceta e'dazu e'yo yi otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ehururu y'okusirika eriyo neeyongyera amaani, abakuru omu by'amagara baine amatsiko aha nshonga egyo. Ripoota nizooreka ngu abarwaire abamwe batandikire kworeka obubonero bw'okutereera.

eng_prompt: After undergoing thorough testing and monitoring, the health authorities in Gulu have confirmed that several patients no longer show signs of infection. As a result, these individuals are now free to return home.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukeberebwa ennyo n'okulondoolwa, ab'ebyobulamu mu Gulu bakakasizza nti abalwadde bangi tebakyalina bubonero bwa bulwadde. N'ekyavaamu, abantu bano kati ba ddembe okudda ewaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee pimo ki ngiyo kit ma lutwo tye ka wot kwede, lutic yoto kom me Gulu gumoko ni lutwo mapol dong pe gitye ki lanyut me two. Macalo adwogi ne, dano magi dong tye agonya me dok gang.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainwakio ka aingic ejok, apotu apedorosio nuka angaleu ko Gulu itigogongoto ebe mam bobo adekak luipu itodunitos ijenuneta luka adeka. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kwana itunga lu abongor ore.
lgg_prompt: Bani eyi ma rua o'bizu azini eyi ma pamvu onezu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba arojo ni 'diyi esu ra kini 'ba karakara eyi esuni curu'do eceta azo 'da niri ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'diyi curu'do driwalaru egozu akua.

eng_prompt: As healthcare costs continue to rise, many patients are seeking services from private hospitals for quicker access to care. This shift in the healthcare landscape has led to changes in how these facilities operate financially.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebisale by'obujjanjabi byeyongera okulinnya, abalwadde bangi banoonya obuweereza okuva mu malwaliro ag'obwannannyini okusobola okufuna amangu obujjanjabi. Enkyukakyuka eno mu byobulamu ereeseewo enkyukakyuka mu ngeri amalwaliro gano gye gakola mu byensimbi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel cul me ot yat tye ka medde ameda, lutwo mapol tye ka yenyo kony ki I odi yadi pa wegine pi nongo kony oyot. Aloka-loka man ma otimme I tenge me yot-kom okelo aloka-loka I kit ma odi yadi magi tiyo kwede ki lim.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata etiai loka amukian, eutasi adekak luipu aimo amukian kadekisia nuka itunga kanu adumun atipet amukian. Aijulanakineta nuka amukian ayangau aijulanakineta kotoma epone loiswamata adekisia ngun keda ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Aje aro esuzu ri ni tutu, 'ba karakara eyi azakoma nda arojo gamete ma pala ku 'diyi vu eyini ani ecozu aro esuzu mbeleru. Ojata angu alata ni 'diyi ma alia 'diri fe ojata geri arojo 'diyi ni azi ngazu geri robia siri ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ebishare by'eby'amagara birikugumizamu nibyeyongyera, abarwaire baingi nibaronda obuheereza kuruga omu marwariro g'abantu buntu, kugira ngu babaase kuhikwaho obuheereza ahonaaho. Empindahinduka omu by'amagara ereesireho empindahinduka omu mirimo y'amarwariro.

eng_prompt: Recent testing efforts have shown promising results in the fight against the pandemic. Health officials are reporting a significant increase in the number of patients who have recovered from the virus.
lug_prompt: Okugezesa okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga ebirungi mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde bbunansi. Ab'ebyobulamu bagamba nti omuwendo gw'abalwadde abawonye akawuka gweyongedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: Yub me pimo ma otime cokcok-ki okelo adwogi maber tutwal I lweny i kom two korona. Lutic me yot kom tye ka waco ni wel lutwo ma gucang ki I two eni omede tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aswamisio nuka ainwakio pac itodunit ebe ejokuna noi kotoma aitiji adeka naka ekorona. Eutasi eswamak lu adekis alimor ebe iyata noi enaaba loka adekak lu angaleutu kotoma adeka.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani o'bi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo onyiru a'di 'dizu azo 'dezaniri be. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece kini kalafe 'ba atita esupi azo korona nirisi 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Amaani g'okukyebera obwahati gareesire ebirungi omu kurwanisa oburwaire. Abakuru omu by'amagara nibagira ngu omuhendo gw'abarwaire abakiire akakooko ka korona gweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a concerning rise in COVID-19 cases among travelers at border crossings. In particular, the situation at Mutukula has drawn attention due to the increasing number of truck drivers testing positive for the virus.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe mu batambuze ku nsalo. Okusingira ddala, embeera e Mutukula efunye okufaayo olw'omuwendo ogweyongera ogw'abavuzi ba biroole abakeberebwa ne bazuulibwamu akawuka.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde tutwal I kin luwot matye I wang lobo. Tutwalle, ngo matye katimme I Mutukula okelo tam mapol tutwal pi wel ludwo motoka madongo matye ka nongo two.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu olimosi ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kotoma akwapin nuegelegela. Kacut ejautene loko Mutukula nes ejenuna noi naarai iyata enaaba loka iderepan luka ilorei lu inwakunono ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tu 'ba aci'ba boda milia 'diyi ma eselea. Tutunisi, e'yo Mutukulaa ri fe 'ba eyini asi 'bazu e'yo 'ba mutukari ambo eyi onzu'ba 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu 'bani eyi esuzu azo be 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 omu batambura aha nsharo. Okukira munonga, embeera omuri Mutukula ereesireho amaani ahabw'omuhendo gw'abavugi ba roore ogweyongyeire kukyeberwa bashangwa baine akakooko.

eng_prompt: As the situation with the pandemic continues to evolve, the government is committed to keeping the public informed. In light of recent developments, officials have scheduled a briefing to address the latest statistics and measures.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ekirwadde bbunansi yeeyongera okukyuka, gavumenti yeewaddeyo okutegeeza abantu. Okusinziira ku bigenda mu maaso gye buvuddeko, abakungu bategese olukungaana okwogera ku bibalo n'ebipimo ebipya.
ach_prompt: Kit ma peko me two korona tye ka mede kwede, gamente tye ki miti me niango lwak. Ma lubbe ki jami matye katime cokcok-ki, lutic guyubu kacoke me lok I kom wel ki jami mapat-pat matye katime kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejai ejautene loka adeka naka ekorona, ekapakina apugan aitijenikin itunga. Katupitos nuiswamasi pac, etemokisi eswamak airiamun kanu aitemitem akiro nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile yi ojazu, gamete owi i o'bi yi dri o'duko fezu. E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba 'diyi otu otita e'yo nzezu kalafe o'diru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'endwara ruranda nsi ku erikugumizamu neehinduka, gavumenti eyehaireyo kumanyisa abantu. Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho, abakuru batebekaniise orukiiko rw'okugamba aha bibaro n'ebikyebezo.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing pandemic, health officials have decided to enhance communication with the community. Starting next week, the public will receive daily updates about coronavirus.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, abakungu b'ebyobulamu basazeewo okwongera ku mpuliziganya n'abantu. Okutandika ne wiiki ejja, abantu bajja kufuna amawulire agakwata ku kawuka ka kolona buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona matye kawot anyim, lutic me yot kom gumoko tamgi me medo rwom me lok ki lwak. Cako I cabit mabino, lwak gubi nongo ngec manyen I kom two corona nino ki nino.
teo_prompt: Kanuka adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye, aseutu eswamak luka angaleu aitogogong einer keda itunga. Ageun osabiti ngol, epote itunga adumun akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi e'yo nzeza o'bi yi be ri ma omgbo otu. E'dozu sabiti drusi ri si, o'bi eyi nga o'dukoti eyi esu o'du driasi azo korona niri ma dria.

eng_prompt: After weeks of dedicated care and treatment, the hospital saw a significant decline in COVID-19 cases. The medical team celebrated the successful recovery of their patients, marking a hopeful turning point in the pandemic.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bajjanjabiddwa, eddwaliro lyalabye okukendeera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe. Ttiimu y'abasawo yajaguzza okuwona kw'abalwadde baabwe mu buwanguzi, ekyalaga enkyukakyuka ey'essuubi mu ssenyiga omukambwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me miyo kony ki kony me yot kom, ot yat oneno wel dano matye ki two korona ojwik tutwal. Dul pa lutic yoto kom gukwero cango pa lutwoo gi, man obedo alokaloka maber tutwal I kare me poto pa gemo eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu amukian keda amukian, abu adekis koany aibiror naka adekak luka COVID-19. Apotu imurok inumunumata angaleu naka adekak kec, itodunit ebe ejai aijulakineta kotoma adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani asi fezu azini aro esuzu 'bori ma vutia, arojo nderi ndre e'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ra. Amuti dakitari eyini 'diyi ayiko zo e'yo 'ba eyivile azoru 'diyi ni atita esuzuri ma dria eyini ani asi'baza fezu e'yo azo 'depiriniri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okureeberera n'okuragurirwa, eirwariro rikareeba okukyendera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19. Tiimu y'abashaho ekashemererwa ahabw'okukira kurungi kw'abarwaire baabo, ekyabaire nikyoreka empindahinduka y'amatsiko omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi.

eng_prompt: Despite the overwhelming challenges faced during the pandemic, the dedication of health frontline workers has been nothing short of heroic. Their tireless efforts have saved countless lives, but the toll on their well-being has been significant.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi mu kiseera ky'ekirwadde, obumalirivu bw'abasawo ababadde ku mwanjo bubadde bwa maanyi nnyo. Kaweefube waabwe ataliiko bukoowu awonye obulamu bw'abantu abangi, naye omuwendo gw'abantu abafiiriddwa guli waggulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni peko mapol tutwal obedo tye ikare me poto pa gemo ni, tic pa lutic me yot kom obedo tek tutwal. Tute matek ma gutimo olaro kwo pa dano mapol tutwal, ento wel dano mapol ma gunongo peko obedo mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma apakio nuka ekorona, ainakina naka eswamak luka angaleu erai naepol noi. Aswam kec naepol noi eyuwari aijar naka itunga luipu, konye epol noi amunar aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'bani esu sawa azo 'dezanirisi 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma asi feza e'bi ovu asi driasi. Okpo eyini 'ba ande kokoru ri epa 'ba karakara eyi ma edri ra, te eyi ma edri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi bwingi omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi, abakozi b'ebyamagara abarikukoresa amaani gaabo kukora emirimo y'amaani. Amaani gaabo agatarikuhwa, gataasize amagara g'abantu baingi munonga, kwonka omuhendo gwabo gukaba guri ahaiguru munonga.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported alarming trends in recent weeks. As the pandemic evolves, more individuals are testing positive for the virus.

teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu olimosi akiro nueroko noi kotoma isabitin luatuboros. Kwape ejai adeka naka ekorona, ipu itunga lu inwakunono ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo onzi eyi sabiti agapi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile, 'ba karakara eyi azo nde esu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire ebirikwerarikiriza omu wiiki ezihweire. Endwara ruranda nsi ku erikugyenda omu maisho, abantu baingi nibashangwa baine akakooko.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a significant decline in severe cases of COVID-19. As a result, healthcare officials are optimistic about the increasing number of recoveries.

lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be okporu 'diyi ma kalafe esi ra. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi'baza be kalafe 'ba atita esupi 'diyi niri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In many regions, malaria remains a significant health threat, particularly in areas with high mosquito populations. To combat this issue, public health organizations are launching initiatives to promote protective measures.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, omusujja gw'ensiri gukyali gwa bulabe eri obulamu naddala mu bitundu ebirimu ensiri ennyingi. Okulwanyisa ensonga eno, ebitongole by'ebyobulamu bitongoza enteekateeka okutumbula enkola z'okwekuuma.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, malaria pud tye peko madit tutwalle I kabedo matye ki ober mapol. Me lweny i kom peko man, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom tye ka cako yub me tyelo kor yoo me gwokke.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, eringa eimidi erai ationis naepol noi naka angaleu kacut aiboisio nuipu isiru. Kanu aitikokin ationis na, eutasi iriongeta luka angaleu aitegear iwaitin lu ayuara.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, malaria ni nga po'di e'yo azi onzi ni i, tutuni angu yiyia eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, amuti e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi e'do otuta e'yo tambaza ni 'diyi otuzu.

eng_prompt: Health officials have been closely monitoring the latest trends in the pandemic. Despite a rise in new cases, the recovery rate among those infected has shown significant improvement.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu babadde balondoola nnyo ebigenda mu maaso mu kirwadde bbunansi. Newankubadde abalwadde abapya beeyongedde, omuwendo gw'abo abalwadde abawona gulaze okulongooka okw'amaanyi.

lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi e'yo i 'yepi o'diru e'yo azo 'dezaniri ma dria 'diyi ma pamvu one. Kalafe 'ba azo be o'diru 'diyi ni tuzu ra ti, ongmbo 'ba azo be 'diyi ni atita esuzu ri e'da ra.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara batwire nibareebuuza ebirikugyenda omu maisho omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi. Oihireho okweyongyera kw'abarwaire abasya, omuhendo gw'abo abakwatsirwe oburwaire nigubaasa kweyongyera.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continued to evolve, health officials ramped up their testing efforts. This increase in testing was particularly evident in June, when the number of coronavirus samples analyzed surged.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyagenda kyeyongera, abasawo beeyongedde okukebera. Okweyongera kuno mu kukebera kwalabikira nnyo mu gwomukaaga, omuwendo gw'abantu abaakeberebwa akawuka ka kolona bwe gwalinnya.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona omedde anyim, lutic me yot kom omedo kero gi me pimo dano. Medde pa pim man onen tutwalle I dwe me abicel, I kare ma wel dano ma kipimo gi me pimo two corona omede.
teo_prompt: Neautar adeka naka ekorona aiyatakin, apotu eswamak luka angaleu iyatakisi ainwakio. Aponi kitodunai noi aiyatakino na ainwakio kolap Loikanyetape, ne eyatakinor enaaba loka itunga lu inwakunitai ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni mu drile, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi otu e'yo eyi ma rua o'bizu 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizu ri ma omgbo ni tu imba azia si, kalafe 'bani eyi ma rua o'bizu azo coronavirusniri ma dria 'diyi ni tuzu 'bori ma vutia.

eng_prompt: After a thorough evaluation of their health status, the medical team determined that several patients had recovered sufficiently. As a result, they began the process of discharging those who tested negative for the virus.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera y'obulamu bwabwe, abasawo baakizuula nti abalwadde bangi baali bawonye ekimala. N'ekyavaamu, baatandika enkola y'okusiibula abo abaasangibwa nga tebalina kawuka.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma yot komgi tye kwede, lutic yoto kom gumoko ni lutwo mapol dong gucang maber tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gucako yub me kwanyo lutwo ma kipimo kinongo ni gipe ki two.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok ejautene loka angaleukec, apotu imurok kodumutu ebe angaleutu adekak luipu noi. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi kogeutu alacakin ngul lu mam aponi kodumunai ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eyi ma rua ala ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti dakitari eyini 'diyi esu kini 'ba karakara eyi ati eyi sa'wa ezu 'bo. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'do otuta 'ba 'bani esu azo koko 'diyi ofuzu arojoa risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma gye amagara gaabo, tiimu y'abashaho ekashanga ngu abarwaire baingi bakizire kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu, bakatandika enkora y'okusiibura abo abaabaire bataine akakooko.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing pandemic, local businesses and organizations rallied together to support healthcare facilities. One of the key contributions included essential supplies to aid in the treatment and prevention of the virus.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu n'ebitongole byakungaana wamu okuwagira amalwaliro. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyaweebwayo bye bintu ebikulu eby'okuyambako mu kujjanjaba n'okutangira akawuka.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona matye kawot anyim, lutim biacara ki dule me tedero guribbe kacel me konyo odi yadi. Acel me kin jami mapigi tego ma kimiyo obedo jami ma mite pi konyo I tic me cango ki gengo kwidi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye, apotu ibiasaran keda iriongeta luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aigang aiboisio nu amukian. Adiopet koboro luapolok lu ijaikitai imoriaritos iboro lu itwasamao kanu aimuke ka aitikitik ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, tujara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tualu amuti eyi pie eyi tra tualu atita fezu pari arojo ni 'diyi dri. Afa feza okporu 'diyi ma azi afa orodriru azakoma fezu aro esuzu azini azo 'da atrizu 'diyi.

teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik eimidi lo iyata noi, abu apugan nako Uganda kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak nuka angaleu naka itunga. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisioit kana, eponio aikor aitiban nuka isiru kotoma akwap kere.
