nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa omushwija gw'ensiri ogweyongyeire, gavumenti ya Uganda erangirire enteekateeka nsya y'eby'amagara g'abantu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, obutimba bw'ensiri obwa busha nibweija kujanjazibwa omwihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent surge in health concerns, officials have been evaluating the risks associated with large public events. To ensure public safety, the Ministry of Health has put in place guidelines for safe mass gatherings.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okubaddewo gyebuvuddeko, abakungu babadde beekenneenya akabi akali mu mikolo eminene egy'olukale. Okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu, minisitule y'ebyobulamu etaddewo ebiragiro ku nkungaana z'abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa peko me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki, lutic gubedo ka neno peko matye ikare me yub madongo. Me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom oketo cik ma doro gure pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo naka angaleu, eutasi eswamak airereor atiokisio nu ikamanara keda ipucito luapolok. Kanu awanyun ayuara na itunga, etolomu erionget loka angaleu aicoreta nu ikamunitos atukonokin na itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi e'bi e'yo onzi eyi 'yepi e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma ale andri. O'bi eyi ma tambazu, okalamvu alataniri 'ba azita eyi okuta o'bi eyini 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire, abakungu batwire nibarondoora akabi akarikuruga omu mikoro y'abantu baingi. Okuhamya oburinzi bw'abantu, minisiture y'eby'amagara eteireho ebiragiro by'enteerane z'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, health officials convened to discuss necessary precautions. After careful consideration, the Ministry of Health decided to implement new measures to protect public health.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okwewalamu ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, minisitule y'ebyobulamu yasalawo okuteekawo enkola empya okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic me yot kom gubedo ka lok i kom jami ma mite me gwokke. Ingee tam matut, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom omoko tamme me keto yoo manyen me gwoko yotkom pa lwak itic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luka angaleu iriamunos kanu aitemitem nuibusakinit aswam. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, abu erionget loka angaleu koseu aitolomun iwaitin luitetiak kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, okalamvu alataniri asi e'yo 'du geri o'diru 'diyi 'bazu o'bi yi ma rua ala ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, abakuru omu by'amagara bakashutama kuhanuura aha by'okwerinda ebirikwetengwa. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza, minisiture y'eby'amagara ekasharamu kutaho oburyo busya bw'okurinda amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to raise awareness about sickle cell disease, health officials have been working diligently to prepare for a new initiative. As part of this effort, various outreach programs and educational materials have been developed to engage the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu ku bulwadde bwa nnalubiri, abasawo babadde bakola nnyo okwetegekera enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo ez'okubunyisa amawulire n'ebikozesebwa mu kusomesa bikoleddwa okusikiriza abantu.
ach_prompt: I tute me rweyo lwak i kom two sickle cell, lutic yoto kom gubedo katic matek me yube pi yub manyen. Macalo but tic man, yub mapat-pat me konyo dano ki jami me pwony bene kiyubu me konyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos adeka naka sickle cell, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aswam kagogong aitemonokin kanu ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisio nu, aponi kitolomunai ainapeta nuka asioman keda iboro lu isisianakinete itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba eyini imbata fezu azo sickle cell niri ma dria, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi azi nga okporu otita azi o'diruni otuzu. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba e'do otita azini afa onita ni 'diyi ongulumu eyini.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha ndwara ya sickle cell, abakuru omu by'amagara batwire nibakora n'amaani okwetebekanisa enteekateeka ensya. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, enteekateeka z'okuhutuura abantu hamwe n'eby'okukozesa omu kwegyesa, bikozirwe kugira ngu abantu bagire eki barikukora.

eng_prompt: In light of recent health concerns and the ongoing pandemic, it is crucial for educational institutions to prioritize the safety of their students and staff. Implementing strict protocols can help mitigate the risks associated with large events.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okwakaggwa n'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, kya mugaso nnyo amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza okukulembeza obukuumi bw'abayizi n'abakozi baago. Okussa mu nkola amateeka amakakali kisobola okuyamba okukendeeza ku bulabe obuva mu mikolo eminene.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom ma otimme cokcok-ki ki two korona matye kawot anyim, pire tek tutwal ki gangi kwan me keto rwom me gwoko lutino kwan gi ki lutic gi obed gin ma pire tek. Keto cik matego itic twero konyo dwoko piny peko ma bino ikare me yub madongo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos nuka angaleu keda adeka naka ekorona, ejokuna noi isomeroi aisingarenit ayuwara naka esisiak keda eswamak kec. Aitodolikin ainapeta nuegogong epedori aitidisiar atiokisio nuelomunete kotoma opucito luapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo azo 'dezaniri be, eri orodriru angu onita ni 'diyi ni asi 'bazu e'yo sukulu anzi yini azini azi'ba yini 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria. ꞋBani azita okporu ꞌdiyi ma vuti obizu ꞌdiyi eco ꞌba ma aza ko eꞌyo ewaru yi ecipi ꞌba yi ma eselea ꞌdiyi be ꞌdiyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara n'endwara ruranda nsi erikugyenda omu maisho, ni kikuru amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese kwebembeza eby'okwerinda kw'abeegi n'abakozi. Okuta ebiragiro by'amaani omu nkora nikibaasa kuhwera okukyendeeza akabi akarikuruga omu mikoro mikuru.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent discussions about public health and safety, officials gathered to assess the situation regarding educational institutions. After careful consideration, a minister advised that schools remain open.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku by'obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu, abakungu baakuŋŋaana okwekenneenya embeera ekwata ku matendekero g'ebyenjigiriza. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, minisita yawa amagezi nti amasomero gasigale nga maggule.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom yot kom pa lwak, lutic gucokke me neno ngo matye katime I gangi kwan. Ingee tam matut, minista owaco ni gangi kwan omyero gubed ayaba.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aineranara pac kanuikamunitos angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga, apotu eswamak kimorikikinos airereor ejautene loka isomeroi. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, abu eminista icorak ebe ibusakinit isomeroi asalakin engara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma dria, azi'ba eyi tra eyi e'yo angu onita ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma ale andrizu. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, minisita azi fe imbata kini sukulu eyi ma awi ngmbo.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuhanuura okwabaireho ebiro ebi ahaby'amagara n'okwerinda, abakuru baketeeranira hamwe kushwijuma embeera erikukwata aha matendekyero g'eby'obwegyese. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza, minisita akahabura ngu amashomero gagume gagwire.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continues to rise, health officials are increasingly concerned about the country's ability to respond effectively. In light of this situation, it has become clear that the Ministry of Health needs more equipment to enhance Uganda's preparedness on coronavirus.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongera okweraliikirira ku busobozi bw'eggwanga okukola obulungi. Okusinziira ku mbeera eno, kyeyoleka bulungi nti minisitule y'ebyobulamu yeetaaga ebyuma ebirala okutumbula obwetegefu bwa Uganda ku kawuka ka kolona.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, lutic me yot kom tye ka paro pi kero pa lobo man me lweny i kom two korona. Ma lubbe ki lok man, nen atyer kamaleng ni jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom mito jami tic mapol me medo yubbe me lweny i kom two corona.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19, epodokitos eswamak luka angaleu nuikamunitos apedor naka akwapuwok aitemokin ngun ejok. Katupitos ejautene kalo, ecai cut ebe ekoto erionget loka angaleu iboro luipu kanu aitogogong akapakina naka ekorona koUganda.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni tuzu drile, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi otiza be kari ni ecozu e'yo nde ma aza kozu kililiru ri ma dria. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, eri e'da kililiru kini okalamvu alataniri le afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma azi kari Uganda niri ma otuta azo korona nirisi ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, abakuru omu by'amagara beeyongyeire kufayo aha kubaasa kw'eihanga kukora kurungi. Ahabw'embeera egi, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu minisiture y'eby'amagara neeyetenga ebyoma ebindi, kugira ngu Uganda eyeteekateekye kurwanisa akakooko ka korona.

eng_prompt: Health officials in Uganda reported a rise in COVID-19 cases, prompting increased surveillance and testing in the capital. As a precautionary measure, authorities identified individuals who may have been exposed to the virus.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu Uganda baategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe, ekyaleetedde okwongera okulondoola n'okukebera mu kibuga ekikulu. Ng'ekyokwegendereza, ab'obuyinza baazuula abantu abayinza okuba nga baakwatibwa akawuka.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom I lobo Uganda guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, ma oweko ki mede ki bedo ki wang mabit I kom two korona ki pime I boma madit me Uganda. Macalo yoo me gwoke, lutela gunongo dano mogo ma onongo twero nongo two eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu ko Uganda olimosi ebe iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19, ido abu koyangau aingic keda ainwakio kotoma aiboisio nuapolok. Kwape epone loka ayuwar, apotu apedorosio kojenutu itunga lu aticepak edumutu ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra, e'yo 'di fe 'bani 'ba eyi ma mile ozizu azini eyi ma rua o'bizu angu ambo kari 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ekile e'yo tambaza ni ru, drice'ba eyi esu 'ba azo 'da esupi ra 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara omuri Yuganda bakagira ngu abarwaire ba COVID-19 beeyongyeire, ekyaretsireho okukyebera n'okukyebera omu kibuga ekikuru. Nk'omuringo gw'okwerinda, ab'obushoborozi bakareeba abantu abarikubaasa kuba bakwasirwe akakooko.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns about the pandemic, the government took immediate action to ensure public access to vital health information. To facilitate this, the Ministry of Health established dedicated support channels for citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kirwadde bbunansi, gavumenti yakola mangu okulaba nga abantu bafuna obubaka obukwata ku byobulamu. Okusobozesa kino, minisitule y'ebyobulamu yataddewo emikutu gy'obuyambi eri bannansi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom two korona, gamente otimo gin mo oyotoyot me neno ni lwak onongo ngec mapigi tego I kom yotkom. Me konyo eni, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom oyabo yoo me miyo kony bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka adeka naka ekorona, abu apugan kiswama katipet kanu awanyun ebe epedorete itunga adumunun akiro nuikamunitos angaleu. Kanu aingarakin ngun, abu erionget loka angaleu kitolomu iponesio luigangitos itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, gamete 'du e'yo mbeleru nezu ra kini o'bi eyi eco o'dukoti orodriru e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi esu ra. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, okalamvu alataniri e'do geri azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi kari anzi eyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahabw'endwara ruranda nsi,gavumenti ekakora ahonaaho okureeba ngu abantu batunga amakuru ag'omugasho agarikukwata ahaby'amagara. Okuhwera eki, minisiture y'eby'amagara ekataho oburyo bw'okuhwera abantu.

eng_prompt: To ensure transparency and build public trust, it's essential that we showcase our health protocols. A clear understanding of our procedures will help alleviate any concerns the community may have.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obwerufu n'okuzimba obwesige mu bantu, kya mugaso okulaga emitendera gyaffe egy'ebyobulamu. Okutegeera obulungi emitendera gyaffe kijja kuyamba okukendeeza ku kweraliikirira kwonna abantu kwe bayinza okuba nakwo.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni jami weng tye atir dok dano tye ki gen, pire tek tutwal ni omyero wa nyut kit ma tic me yot kom tye kwede. Niang maber I kom yoo me tic wa obi konyo dwoko piny lworo mo keken ma lwak twero bedo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun abeit ka aitogogong amuno naka itunga, ejokuna aitodiar ikisila luka angaleu wok. Amisikin nuikamunitos ainapeta wok ingarakini aitidisiar aiyalongong naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ada esuzu azini asi'baza sizu o'bi eyi ma eselea, eri orodriru amani azita amavile e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi e'dazu. Vata kililiru geri amani azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria ri ni nga azakoma fe e'yo dria ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'okwikiririzamu abantu, niky'omugasho kworeka engyenderwaho yaitu y'eby'amagara. Okwetegyereza gye engyenderwaho yaitu, nikiija kuhwera omu kukyendeeza okwerarikirira kwona oku abantu barikubaasa kuba baine.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continues to rise, health officials are urging everyone to take precautions. It is crucial to prioritize safety and minimize the risk of transmission.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza buli omu okwegendereza. Kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obukuumi n'okukendeeza ku bulabe bw'okusaasaana.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, lutic me yot kom tye ka lego dano weng me gwoke. Pire tek tutwal me keto rwom me gwoko kuc obed gin ma pire tek tutwal me gengo nya pa two corona.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga kere aidar ejok. Erai ibore yenepol noi aisingarenit ayuwara ka aitidisiar atiokisio nuka awea.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni tutu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ai 'ba dria eyi e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru. Eri orodriru asi 'bazu e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria okori ma dria dika eri orodriru e'yo azo ma ereta niri ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba buri omwe kwegyendesereza. N'eky'omugasho kwebembeza eby'okwerinda n'okukyendeeza akabi k'okujanjaara kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: In light of recent health concerns and the spread of contagious illnesses, health officials have issued new guidelines for social interactions. To minimize the risk of transmission, the public has been urged to avoid handshaking and hugging at all times.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu gyebuvuddeko n'okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bafulumizza ebiragiro ebipya ku kukolagana n'abantu. Okukendeeza akabi akali mu kusiiga, abantu basabiddwa okwewala okukwatagana mu ngalo n'okwekwatira mu kifuba obudde bwonna.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki nya pa two ma kobo oyot-oyot, lutic me yot-kom gumiyo cik manyen i kom kit me kubbe ikin dano. Me dwoko piny peko me nyaa pa two, ki lego lwak pe me moto cing ki gwakke ikare weng.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aiyalongongo naka angaleu keda awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu aicoreta nuitetiak nuikamunitos aineranara keda itunga. Kanu aitidisiar atiokisio nuka awea, esinyikokitai itunga ainac aikwenyar akanin ka aikwenyar apakio kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta ma dria, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe azita o'diru eyi o'bi eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. E'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma omgbo esizu, 'ba fe o'bi eyini imbata eyi ma esele cozu driasi azini eyini eyi o'bizu ku sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburiho obwahati hamwe n'okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira, abakuru omu by'amagara bashohwize ebiragiro bisya ebirikukwata aha kukorengana kw'abantu. Okutuubya aha kabi k'okujanjaara kw'endwara, abantu bashabirwe kwetantara okwekwata omu ngaro n'okugwa omu kifuba obwire bwona.

eng_prompt: After undergoing extensive testing, the health officials reviewed the results of the individuals who had been exhibiting potential COVID-19 symptoms. They were relieved to find that the outcomes indicated no presence of the virus.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukeberebwa ennyo, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beetegereza ebyava mu bantu abayinza okuba nga baali balaga obubonero bwa ssenyiga omukambwe. Baafuna obuweerero okukizuula nti ebyava mu kukebera byalaga nti tewali kawuka.
ach_prompt: Ingee pimo dano mapol, lutic me yot kom gungiyo adwogi tic pa dano ma onongo gitye ki lanyut me two korona. Cwinygi obedo yom me nongo ni adwoki me pim pe onyuto two eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainwakio noi, apotu eswamak luka angaleu owanyutu akiro nuka itunga lu ajaas keda ijenuneta luka adeka naka COVID-19. Apotu kesi opotu noi nawanyunia kesi ebe mam ainwakio itodunit ebe emamei ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Bani eyi ma rua o'bizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi andri e'yo efupi 'ba azo COVID-19 niri ni e'dapi ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu ava ra eyini esuzu kini e'yo 'bani eyi ma rua o'bizu 'diyi e'da kini eyi vu azo 'da yo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukyeberwa munonga, abakuru omu by'amagara bakashwijuma ebyarugire omu kukyeberwa kw'abantu ababaire baine obubonero bwa COVID-19. Bakatunga obuhuumuro okureeba ngu ebyarugire omu kukyebera bikashoboorora ngu tihaine akakooko.

eng_prompt: After a brief period of disruption, the health department has worked diligently to address the technical difficulties affecting the hotline. As a result, the coronavirus toll-free line has been restored and issues have been rectified.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera ekitono eky'okutaataaganyizibwa, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu kikoze n'obunyiikivu okugonjoola ebizibu eby'ekikugu ebikosa essimu. N'ekyavaamu, essimu ey'obwereere ku kawuka ka kolona ezzeewo era ensonga zitereezeddwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare manok me peko, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom otiyo matek tutwal me tyeko peko me diro ma tye ka yelo nama me cim. Macalo adwogi ne, kiloko cim me nono I kom two corona dok bene kityeko cobo peko ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naedit na aitolitol, iswamat ewai lo angaleu kagogong aitemokin atiokisio nuka etatai. Kanuka ngun, aponi inyakunai ainom esimu loatitai lo ekorona ido itemokitai akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa were 'bani e'yo eyi ezazu 'bori ma vutia, arakala alata niri nga azi okporu e'yo ewaru simu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ogo simu omvele coronavirus toll free line ruri dika 'ba otu e'yo yi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akaire kakye k'okuteganisibwa, ekitongore ky'eby'amagara kikozire n'amaani kumaraho oburemeezi bw'omutaano oburikuteganisa esimu. N'ekyarugiremu, esimu etari ya busha y'okukoresa ahabw'endwara ya Korona yagarurwaho kandi eshonga zikakorwaho.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases worldwide, the government has implemented new health measures. As a precautionary step, officials have announced that all travellers are being screened for coronavirus at the border points.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera mu nsi yonna, gavumenti etaddewo enkola empya mu byobulamu. Ng'ekyokwegendereza, abakungu balangiridde nti abatambuze bonna bakeberebwa akawuka ka kolona ku nsalo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona I wilobo lung, gamente okatti ki yoo manyen me gwoko yot kom. Macalo yoo me gwokke, lutic guwaco ni luwot weng tye ka pime pi two corona I wang lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kotoma akwap kere, etolomu apugan iwaitin luitetiak luka angaleu. Kwape epone loka ayuwar, alimor eswamak ebe inwakio itunga kere lu alotok kanu ekorona koikoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe COVID-19 niri ni tuzu wudrikurusi ndulu risi, gamete 'ba geri alata ni o'diru 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Ekile e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu, azi'ba eyi azi kini 'ba aci'ba dria eyi ma rua o'bi azo korona nirisi boda eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire omu nsi yoona, gavumenti eteireho enkora nsya y'eby'amagara. Nk'eky'okwerinda, ab'eby'obutegyeki batumire ngu abantu boona abarikugyenda omu mahanga bakyeberwa akakooko ka korona aha nsharo.

eng_prompt: In a highly anticipated announcement, government officials have confirmed that the public will have the opportunity to hear directly from the permanent secretary. Viewers are encouraged to tune in for this important broadcast.
lug_prompt: Mu kulangirira okusuubirwa ennyo, abakungu ba gavumenti bakakasizza nti abantu bajja kufuna omukisa okuwulira butereevu okuva eri omuwandiisi ow'enkalakkalira. Abatunuulizi bakubirizibwa okuwuliriza pulogulaamu eno enkulu.
ach_prompt: I lok angeya ma byek tye I komgi tutwal, lutic pa gamente gumoko ni lwak binongo gum me winyo lok atir ki bot karan madit. Kicuku cwiny lunen me winyo lok angeya man ma pire tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Kotoma alimoret naewomitai ebe ebuni, apotu eswamak luka apugan itigogongoto ebe epote itunga adumun arerengu na apupun kanejai ekalani loka apugan. Isinyikokitai asesenak aipup aitodiaret na na epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba gameteni 'diyi 'yo kini o'bi yi nga drileba isu e'yo erizu engazu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi vu. Ba ai 'ba afa ndre'baa 'diyi e'yo orodriru 'di 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kurangirira okurikuteekateekwaho munonga, abakuru omu gavumenti bahamize ngu abantu nibaija kutunga omugisha gw'okuhurira butunu kuruga aha muhandiiki mukuru. Abareebi nibahigwa kuhurikiza empurizagana egi ey'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Health officials in the Masaka region conducted tests on an individual exhibiting symptoms consistent with the coronavirus. After thorough examination, the results have been confirmed.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu kitundu ky'e Masaka baakola okukebera ku muntu eyabadde n'obubonero bw'akawuka ka kolona. Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera ennyo, ebyavuddemu bikakasiddwa.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom me Masaka gupimo ngat ma tye ki lanyut me two corona. Ingee timo kwed matut, adwogi ne kimoko.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu luko Masaka inwakautu ainwakio mama ejaasi itunga luejaasi keda awanyununeta nuka ekorona. Akaulo naka aingic ejok, aponi itigogongorai akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni angu Masaka niri ma alea 'diyi 'ye o'bita 'ba azi ecetaru azo korona niri pie 'diyi ma rua. E'yo eti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, 'ba esu e'yo efupi 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara omu kyanga kya Masaka bakakyebera omuntu owaabaire aine obubonero bw'akakooko ka korona. Bwanyima y'okukyebera kurungi, ebyarugire omu kukyebera byahamibwa.

eng_prompt: As concerns about the spread of the virus grow globally, many countries are on high alert. In Uganda, health officials are closely monitoring the situation and conducting tests for potential cases.
lug_prompt: Nga okweraliikirira ku kusaasaana kw'akawuka kweyongera mu nsi yonna, amawanga mangi gali ku bunkenke. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu Uganda balondoola embeera era bakebera abantu abayinza okuba abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lworo tye kamedde I kom nya pa two eni I wilobo lung, lobo mapol tye ma wanggi twolo tutwal. I Uganda, lutic me yot kom gitye ka ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede dok gitye ka pimo dano matye ki two.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyatakina nuka awea naka ekorona kotoma akwap kere, akwap nuipu ekapakina noi. Ko Uganda, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aanyanar ejautene keda ainwakio naka adekak.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu wudrikurusi ndulu risi, kari karakara eyi mile be saaru. Kari Uganda niri ma alea, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo 'da ma pamvu andri azini eyi azo 'da eyi ma rua o'bi.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira okurikukwata aha kujanjaara kw'akakooko nikweyongyera omunsi yoona, amahanga maingi gari aha butegyeki. Ab'ebyamagara omu Uganda bariyo nibareebuuza embeera n'okukyebera abarwaire abarikubaasa kuba baine oburwaire.

eng_prompt: To maintain good hygiene and protect yourself and others, it's essential to follow proper handwashing practices. Regularly cleaning your hands is one of the most effective ways to reduce the risk of infection.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo n'okwekuuma n'okwekuuma abalala, kyetaagisa okugoberera enkola ennungi ey'okunaaba mu ngalo. Okunaaba engalo buli lunaku y'emu ku ngeri ezisinga okukendeeza ku bulabe bw'okukwatibwa obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko lengo ki gwoko kwo ni ki pa jo mukene, pire tek tutwal me lubu yoo me lwoko cing maber. Lwoko cingi kare ki kare obedo yoo acel maber loyo me dwoko piny rwom me nongo two.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar aila ka ayuarite akonikuan keda luce, ejok aitup iponesio luajokak luka ailot akanin. Aila akanin kon duc nes ediopet ewai lo itidisiaret ationis naka adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambazu azini mi ma ta mbazu tualu 'ba azi 'diyi pie, eri orodriru mini mi dri ojizu kililiru ri ma vuti obizu. Mi dri ojiza sawa driasi ri eri geri azi orodriru mini ecozu azo eyi esuzu ri ma omgbo esizu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obuyonjo n'okwekuuma hamwe n'abandi, n'eky'omugasho okukuratira engyenderwaho nungi y'okunaaba engaro. Okweyonja engaro zaawe obutoosha n'emwe aha mihanda mirungi y'okukyendeeza akabi k'okukwatwa oburwaire.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continues to rise, many citizens are looking for clarity and direction from their leaders. In light of the ongoing pandemic, the government has scheduled an important announcement.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya, bannansi bangi banoonya okulambikibwa okuva mu bakulembeze baabwe. Olw'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, gavumenti etegese okulangirira okw'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, anywali mapol tye ka yenyo niang matut ki tira ki bot lutela gi. Pi peko me two korona matye kawot anyim, gamente okatti ki yub me miyo kwena ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19, eutasi itunga luipu aimo aicoreta kanejaas engarenok kec. Kanuka adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye, itemokinit apugan alimoret naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni tutu, kari anzi karakara eyi e'yo nda azini driceza engazu drice'ba eyivile 'diyi vu. E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba o'duko azi orodriru ni.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, abatuuragye baingi nibaronda okutangazibwa n'obuhabuzi kuruga omu beebembezi baabo. Ahabw'oburwaire oburiho obwahati, gavumenti etebekaniise okurangirira okw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: To ensure the accuracy of the diagnosis, multiple tests are conducted on each patient. This rigorous process helps eliminate any possibility of false negatives.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obutuufu bw'okuzuula obulwadde, okukebera kungi kukolebwa ku buli mulwadde. Enkola eno ey'obwegendereza eyamba okumalawo obuzibu bwonna obuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Me niang ni nongo two eni tye kakare, kipimo latwo acel-acel tyen mapol. Yoo me tic matek man konyo me gengo jami ma pe tye ada.
teo_prompt: Kanu aanyun ebe ejokuna aingic, inwakio adekak luipu. Aitemonokineta nu ingarakinete alemar aomisio nuka aisab.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondazu kililiru, 'ba 'ba azoru 'diyi ma rua o'bi karakara. Geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu kililiru 'diri ni azakoma fe e'yo 'bani ecozu e'yo onzi 'yezu 'diyi atrizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu okukyebera kurungi, buri murwaire akakyeberwa emirundi mingi. Enkora egi erikukuratirwa munonga, neehwera okurwanisa oburemeezi bwona oburikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: Health officials in Uganda have been closely monitoring travelers returning from high-risk areas. Today, they announced the identification of a new case linked to international travel.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu mu Uganda babadde balondoola nnyo abatambuze abava mu bitundu eby'obulabe. Leero balangiridde okuzuula omulwadde omupya eyeekuusa ku ntambula z'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom I lobo Uganda gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma luwot tye ka dwogo kwede ki I kabedo ma peko tye iye. Tin, gunyuto ni ki nongo ngat manyen matye ki two ma kubbe ki wot I lobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu ko Uganda ongicata itunga lu abongunete kotoma aiboisio nu ejai ationis naepol noi. Lolo, aponi kolimorai adumunet naka itunganan yen ejatatar keda ationis naka alosit akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba alatani kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'bi 'ba aci'ba emupi engazu angu e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma pamvu one. Andru, eyi azi e'yo 'bani esu 'ba azo be o'diru ni e'yo acizu kari amve 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara omu Uganda batwire nibarondoora abagyenzi abarikuruga omu myanya y'akabi munonga. Eriizooba, batumire ngu batungire omurwaire omusya arikukwata aha by'engyenda z'aheeru y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: Health officials have issued a warning regarding a potential increase in coronavirus cases in the area. In light of this, everyone is advised to stay alert and calm in case they showcase coronavirus symptoms.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baalabudde ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde b'akawuka ka kolona mu kitundu. Okusinziira ku kino, buli omu aweebwa amagezi okubeera obulindaala n'obukkakkamu singa alaga obubonero bw'akawuka ka kolona.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gumiyo lok me ciko dano pi medo wel dano matye ki two corona i kabedo eni. Ma lubbe ki lok man, ki lego dano weng me bedo ma wanggi twolo kace ginongo lanyut me two corona.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu ikwenyasi nuikamunitos eyatakinet naka adekasinei nuka ekorona katutubet. Kanuka ngun, icorakitai nginitunganan asalakin ekapakina ido inapakina arai itodunit ngesi ijenuneta luka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe bile ndu liza e'yo 'ba azo korona niri be 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, 'ba fe 'ba dria eyini imbata aa'zu mile be azini aa'zu e'yere eyi ka e'da eceta azo korona niri ma alea ra ria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara barabwire aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba korona omu kyanga. Ahabw'enshonga egi,buri omwe naahaburwa kuguma ayeteekateekire kandi aine obucureera yaaba ayoreka obubonero bwa korona.

eng_prompt: Health officials in Uganda have been monitoring the situation closely as reports of a new virus emerged globally. After extensive testing, the results for one individual have come back positive.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu Uganda babadde balondoola embeera okuva ku lusegere nga alipoota z'akawuka akapya zifuluma mu nsi yonna. Oluvannyuma lw'okukeberebwa ennyo, ebyava mu kukeberebwa kw'omuntu omu byazuuliddwa.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom I lobo Uganda gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede I kare ma adwoki me kwidi manyen okatti I wilobo lung. Ingee pimo dano mapol, adwoki me pim pa ngat acel kinongo ni tye ki two corona.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu ko Uganda ongicata ejautene ngol noi naarai apotu iripotan luka adeka naitetet kolomutu kotoma akwap kere. Akaulo naka ainwakio noi, aponi kodumunai adeka naka idiopetunganan.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'bi e'yo nderi ma pamvu one e'yo o'duko efupi azo korona niri ma dria wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi ma dria. O'bita angiri ma vutia, o'duko efupi 'ba alu ma rua ri efu azo be.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara omu Uganda batwire nibareebuuza embeera ahabw'okugira ngu akakooko kashangirwe omunsi yoona. Bwanyima y'okukyeberwa munonga, ebyarugire omu kukyeberwa kw'omuntu omwe bigizire ngu aine oburwaire.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating pandemic, the government implemented strict travel restrictions. As part of these measures, major airports across the country began shutting down operations.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda kyeyongera, gavumenti yassaawo obukwakkulizo obw'amaanyi ku ntambula. Ng'ekimu ku bikolwa bino, ebisaawe by'ennyonyi ebinene okwetooloola eggwanga byatandika okuggalawo emirimu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two korona, gamente oketo kigeng matek tutwal I kom wot. Macalo yoo acel me timo man, bar dege madongo I but lobo man mapat-pat gucako loro ticgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin adeka naka ekorona, abu apugan ibwaik aitikitik alosit. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, apotu isawen luka idegei luapolok kotoma akwap kogeutu agolokin aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ma omgbo otuzu risi, gamete 'ba azita okporu e'yo acita ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma azi ru, ndege pari ambo kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi e'do azi nga yi ma ti opi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire bwa korona obweyongyeire, gavumenti ekataho ebiragiro by'amaani aha by'engyenda. Nk'emwe aha nkora egi, ebishaayi by'endegye ebikuru okwetoroora eihanga bikatandika kukinga emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: The Ministry of Health has been closely monitoring the situation as the number of infections has been rising in recent weeks. In their latest update, officials reported a concerning increase in cases.
lug_prompt: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu ebadde elondoola embeera nga omuwendo gw'abakwatibwa obulwadde bweyongedde mu wiiki eziyise. Mu biwandiiko byabwe ebisembyeyo, abakungu baategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'emisango.
ach_prompt: Jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom obedo ka neno kit ma peko tye kwede pien wel dano matye ka nongo two tye ka medde I cabit ma okato ni. I lok meggi manyen, lutic guwaco ni wel dano matye ki peko tye ka mede.
teo_prompt: Ewanyunit erionget loka angaleu ejautene ngol naarai iyata enaaba loka itunga luedekasi adekasinei kosabitin lu atuboros. Kotoma akiro kec nuitetiak, apotu eswamak olimosi ebe iyata noi imusagon.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu alataniri ebi e'yo nderi ma pamvu andri ci a'disiku kalafe 'ba azo esupi 'diyiniri ebi tu sabiti agapi 'diyi ma alia. E'yo o'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ma alea, azi'ba eyi ece kini e'yo eyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara kitwire nikyegyendesereza embeera ahabwokuba omuhendo gw'abarwaire gweyongyeire omu sande ezihweire. Omu makuru gaabo agahererukireyo, abakungu bakagamba aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire.

eng_prompt: The COVID-19 pandemic has brought unprecedented challenges to communities worldwide. In particular, those living in densely populated cities have faced unique struggles during this crisis.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe kireese okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo mu bitundu okwetooloola ensi yonna. Okusingira ddala abo ababeera mu bibuga ebirimu abantu abangi basanga ebizibu eby'enjawulo mu kaseera kano ak'obuzibu.
ach_prompt: Poto pa two korona okelo peko mapol tutwal I kabedo mapatpat I wilobo lung. Tutwalle jo matye kabedo I boma madongo ma dano dwong iye gunongo peko mapol tutwal I kare me peko man.
teo_prompt: Eyangaunit adeka naka COVID-19 ainingosia nuipu noi mama ejaasi itunga kotoma akwap kere. Kacut, ngul luiboiete koibuga lu ipu itunga apotu odumutu atiokisio nuegelegela kotoma apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Azo COVID-19 niri eji e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi ongulumu eyi ma eselea wudrikuru ma alea ndulu. Tutunisi, 'ba aa'pi aku ambo 'ba eyi pie 'diyi ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ekirwaire kya COVID-19 kireesire oburemeezi bwingi omu bantu omunsi yoona. Okukira munonga, abo abarikutuura omu ndembo ezirimu abantu baingi, batungire oburemeezi bw'omutaano omu bwire bw'oburemeezi obu.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to affect communities worldwide, health officials emphasize the importance of taking proactive measures. One effective strategy to reduce transmission rates is to maintain physical distance from others.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okukosa ebitundu mu nsi yonna, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bassa essira ku bukulu bw'okukola ebintu mu bwangu. Engeri emu ey'okukendeeza ku nsaasaana y'okwewa amabanga okuva ku balala.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two ma opoto ni tye ka mede ki balo kwo pa dano I wilobo lung, lutic me yot kom tye ka cuko cwiny dano me timo jami ma mitte. Yoo acel maber me dwoko piny rwom me nyaa pa two en aye me bedo mabor ki dano mukene.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokit adeka aimusung itunga kotoma akwap kere, esinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu ajokis naka aitolomun iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok. Adiopet naka aitikitik awea naka ekorona ngesi alaikina kanejaas luce.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile ongulumu yi bi wudrikurusi dria, azi'ba alatani 'diyi asi 'ba orodri 'bani e'yo 'yezu okporu 'diyi ma dria. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu azo 'da ma omgbo esizu ri eri esele coza 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kuteganisa abantu omu nsi yoona, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashagika omugasho gw'okukora ekirikwetengyesa. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kukyendeeza okujanjaara kw'oburwaire n'okureeba ngu abantu bari hare n'abandi.

eng_prompt: To maintain good hygiene and prevent the spread of germs, it's essential to follow proper handwashing practices. Make it a habit to clean your hands regularly, especially after certain activities.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo n'okutangira okusaasaana kw'obuwuka, kyetaagisa okugoberera enkola ennungi ey'okunaaba mu ngalo. Beera n'omuze gw'okunaaba engalo zo buli kiseera naddala oluvannyuma lw'okukola ebintu ebimu.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko lengo ki gengo nya pa kwidi, pire tek tutwal me lubu yoo me lwoko cing maber. Bed ki tim me lwoko cingi kare ki kare, tutwalle ingee timo jami mogo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar aila ka aitikitik awea na adekasinei, ejok aitup iponesio luajokak luka ailot akanin. Ibusakinit jo ailot akanin kon duc kacut akaulo naka aswam iboro ice.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambazu azini azo eyi ma ereta atrizu, eri orodriru 'bani dri ojizu kililiru ri ma vuti obizu. Le mi ma esu adriza mi dri ojizu sa'wa driasi, tutuni 'yeta azi 'diyi ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obuyonjo n'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'obukooko, n'eky'omugasho okukuratira engyenderwaho nungi y'okunaaba engaro. Gira omuze gw'okunaaba engaro zaawe buri kaire na munonga bwanyima y'okukora emirimo emwe.

eng_prompt: The pandemic has affected every aspect of life in the country, sparking conversations in homes, workplaces, and communities. As the virus spread, people began sharing their experiences and opinions more than ever before.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bbunansi kikosezza buli kitundu ky'obulamu mu ggwanga, ne kireetawo emboozi mu maka, mu bifo we bakolera, ne mu bitundu. Akawuka bwe kaasaasaana, abantu baatandika okugabana bye bayitamu n'ebirowoozo byabwe okusinga bwe kyali kibadde.
ach_prompt: Poto pa gemo eni obalo jami weng ma kwako kwo pa dano I lobo man, okelo lok I gangi, I gang tic ki I kabedo mapatpat. Ikare ma two korona omede ki nya, dano ocako nywako lok kom jami ma otimme I kwogi ki tam gi.
teo_prompt: Amuna adeka ngin aijar naka itunga kere kotoma akwapuwok, ido abu koyangau ineresinei oreria, aiboisio nu iswamaere keda aiboisio nu atutubet. Neakorar ekorona, apotu itunga kogeutu aimor akirokec keda aomisiokec adepar sek.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri eza e'yo dria aa'pi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi, e'yo nzeza eji aku eyi ma alea, pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea, azini ongulumu eyi ma alea. Azo korona niri ni i erezurisi, 'ba eyi e'do e'yo eyini esu eyi ma dria azini egata eyini 'diyi awa aga oku driorisi.
nyn_prompt: Endwara ruranda nsi eteganiise buri kimwe ekirikukwata aha magara g'abantu omu ihanga, ekireesireho okuganiira omu maka, aha mirimo hamwe n'omu byaro. Obu akakooko kakajanjaara, abantu bakatandika kugamba ebyabaireho n'ebiteekateeko byabo okukira kare.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising health concerns in the community, officials have recognized the need for improved communication strategies. Collaborative efforts are underway to enhance public awareness and education regarding health issues.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera mu kitundu, abakungu bakitegedde obwetaavu bw'enkola z'empuliziganya ennongooseemu. Kaweefube w'okukwatagana agenda mu maaso okutumbula okumanyisa abantu n'okusomesa ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede i kin lwak, lutic guniang ni omyero ki yub yoo me kube maber. Gitye ka tic kacelo me rweyo lwak ki pwonyo gi i kom lok me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo naka angaleu naka itunga, ejenete eswamak eipud loka aitojokar iponesio luka einer. Ejai aswam na aiswamanara kanu aisisianakin itunga nuka akiro nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi tupi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba eyi esu e'yo nzeza kililiru 'diyi ma orodri ra. E'yo ti icita ni 'diyi mu drile o'bi eyini imbata fezu azini imbata fezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire omu bantu, abakungu bareebire ekyetengo ky'okutunguura omuringo gw'empurizagana. Okukwatanisa kuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho, okumanyisa abantu n'okubashomesa ebikwatiraine n'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: After weeks of preparation and discussions, he finally secured an appointment. Eager to address the pressing health issues in the community, he met with the Health Services Director-General.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga yeetegekera era ng'akubaganya ebirowoozo, yasembyeyo okufuna olukusa. Ng'ayagala nnyo okukola ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu ez'amangu mu kitundu, yasisinkana Dayirekita w'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: I nge cabit mapol me yubbe ki nywako lok, lacen en onongo tic. Ki miti matek tutwal me tyeko peko me yot kom matye ikin lwak, en orwate ki lador dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin ka aitemitem, abu ngesi kodum apak. Keda eipud loka aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu kotoma atutubet, abu ngesi kiriamunos keda engarenon loka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia otuta 'yezu azini agbatara gbazu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asizu zita azi ni ra. Aa'zu ava be e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu ongulumu eyi ma alea, eri fu dri 'ba e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma drileru ri be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okweteekateekyera hamwe n'okuhanuura, ahamuheru akatunga orukiiko. Ahabw'okugira ekihika ky'okukora aha nshonga z'eby'amagara omu bantu, akabugana orikukurira eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In response to the global pandemic, several research facilities have been established to study various pathogens. Among these, the Virus Research Institute has taken a leading role in analyzing and managing Coronavirus samples.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi, ebifo eby'okunoonyereza eby'enjawulo biteekeddwawo okunoonyereza ku ndwadde ez'enjawulo. Mu bino, ekitongole ekinoonyereza ku kawuka kikutte ekifo ky'obukulembeze mu kwekenneenya n'okuddukanya sampolo z'akawuka ka kolona.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa gemo ma opoto ni, kiyubu ka kwed mapat-pat me kwedo two mapat-pat. I kin magi, dul makilwongo Virus Research Institute aye odoro tic me ngiyo ki gwoko lutwo corona.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin adeka naka ekorona, adukun aiboisio nuipu nuka aingic kanu aingic adekasinei nuegelegela. Kotoma ngun, erionget loka aingic ekorona nes engarenikit aingic ka aidar aokot nuka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do angu vuti ondaza ni karakara 'diyi azo ndundu eyi ma eti ondazu. Diyi ma eselea, amuti Virus Research Institute niri 'du azi okporu e'yo azo korona niri ma eti ondazu azini e'yo azo korona niri ma dria 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire bw'ensi yoona, emyanya y'okucondooza etandikirweho okushwijuma oburwaire butari bumwe na bumwe. Omuri ebi, ekitongore ekirikukora ahaby'okucondooza aha ndwara z'akakooko ka muzibwe kitweire omurimo gw'okushwijuma n'okureeberera eby'okukyebera akakooko ka korona.

eng_prompt: I noticed you've been coughing a lot and looking a bit pale today. It might be better for you to take it easy and rest.
lug_prompt: Nkirabye nti leero obadde okusesema nnyo era ng'olabika bulungi. Kiyinza okuba ekirungi okukkakkana n'owummulamu.
ach_prompt: Aneno ni ibedo ka cwee matek adada dok tin itye ka nen makwar adada. Twero bedo ber tutwal piri me bedo mot ki yweyo.
teo_prompt: Abu eong awanyun ebe iuta jo aikokoro noi ido iwanyunitai jo kwap ilolo. Aticepak ejokuna jo aiyengun kosodi aiyengun.
lgg_prompt: Ma ndre andru mi ebi oso saaru azini mi ena andru wereru. Eri nga ovu cika mini e'yo 'duzu ewakokoru azini mi ava lizu.
nyn_prompt: Nketegyereize ngu otwiire noshaasha munonga kandi orikureebeka nk'orikwera erizooba. Nobaasa kuba oshemereire kwehuzya okahuumura.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a concerning rise in respiratory illnesses across the country. As a result, many are urging the public to remain vigilant and adhere to safety protocols.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'obulwadde bw'okussa okweraliikiriza okwetooloola eggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, bangi bakubiriza abantu okubeera obulindaala n'okugoberera amateeka g'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ka nongo peko me yweyo tye ka medde tutwal I lobo man. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka lego lwak me bedo ma wanggi twolo dok me lubu cik me gwoko kuc.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe iyata noi adekasinei nu eyengane kotoma akwap. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitos luipu itunga asalakin acoikina ka aitup ainapeta nuka ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece kini azo oli seza ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu kari 'di ma alea ndulu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi o'bi eyi ai aa'zu mile be azini eyi ma obi azita agei tema ni 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'endwara z'okwisya okwetoroora eihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi nibashaba abantu kuguma beteekateekire n'okukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: During their hospital stay, expectant mothers face unique health challenges that require careful monitoring. Ensuring their well-being is crucial for both the mother and the developing baby.
lug_prompt: Nga bali mu ddwaliro, bamaama abali embuto basanga okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okw'enjawulo okwetaaga okulondoolwa n'obwegendereza. Okukakasa nti babeera bulungi kya mugaso nnyo eri maama n'omwana akula.
ach_prompt: Ikare magitye I ot yat, mon ma oyac nongo peko me yot kom ma mite ni myero ki nen gi maber. Neno ni kwo gi tye maber pire tek tutwal pi mego ki latin matye kadongo.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka aiboi kec adekis, ejaas angor nu epotiete keda atiokisio nuka angaleu nu ekotosi awanyanar ejok. Aanyun ebe ejarete kesi ejok ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka toto keda ikoku.
lgg_prompt: Sawa eyini aa'zu arojoa risi, ayia okporovu ru 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyi ma rua ala ma dria eyini ani eyi ma pamvu andrizu kililiru. Afa ayia eyini aa'zu muke ri ma tambazu ri eri orodriru ayia eyini tualu odekua eyini zoria ri be.
nyn_prompt: Obu abakazi abaine enda barikuba bari omwirwariro, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'omutaano oburikwetenga okureebuuzibwa kurungi. Okureeba ngu baba gye n'eky'omugasho ahari nyina hamwe n'omwana arikukura.

eng_prompt: The health department has been closely monitoring the situation in our area. Unfortunately, the number of confirmed infections has risen again.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu kibadde kilondoola embeera mu kitundu kyaffe. Eky'ennaku, omuwendo gw'abalwadde abakakasiddwa guzzeemu okulinnya.
ach_prompt: Dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom obedo ka ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede ikabedo wa. Ki gum marac, wel jo ma gunongo two omede odoco.
teo_prompt: Auta erionget loka angaleu aanyanar ejok ejautene lo aiboisit wok. Nukaiturur, apolor bobo enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu alataniri ebi e'yo angu amavileri ma alea 'diyi ma pamvu one. Drile onziru, kalafe 'ba 'bani esu azo be 'diyi tu 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara kitwire nikyegyendesereza embeera omu kyanga kyaitu. Eky'obusaasi, omuhendo gw'abarwaire oguhamiibwe gugarukire kweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, there has been a noticeable increase in illness among employees. As a result, health officials were called in to assess the situation.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu bulwadde mu bakozi. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baayitibwa okwekenneenya embeera.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato ni, wel lutic ma komgi lit omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kilwongo lutic yoto kom me neno ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Kosabitin lu atuboros, apolor noi adekasinei kanejaas eswamak. Kanuka ngun, aponi iwororai eswamak lu adekis airereor ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, azo eyi ma omgbo azi'ba eyi ma eselea ri tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba omve azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo nde ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu sande ezihweire, abakozi beyongyeire kukwatwa oburwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru omu by'amagara bakeetwa kushwijuma embeera.

eng_prompt: After months of strict lockdown measures and vaccination efforts, the community began to see a positive shift in the health crisis. Health officials reported a significant decline in new infections over the past few weeks.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'omuggalo omukakali n'okufuba okugema, abantu baatandika okulaba enkyukakyuka ennungi mu buzibu bw'ebyobulamu. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baategeezezza ku kukendeera kw'abalwadde abapya mu wiiki eziyise.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me loro piny ki yub me gwero dano, lwak ocako neno alokaloka maber I peko me yot kom. Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ka nongo two odok piny tutwal I cabit ma okato ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka agolokinio naka akwap keda aikis ekato, apotu itunga kogeutu asesen aijulanakineta kotoma ationis naka angaleu. Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe ekidiokoto noi adekasinei nuitetiak kotoma isabitin lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani angu ti opizu okporu azini okpo 'bani 'ba osozu aro azo atrizurisi 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi e'do ojata kililiru ni ndre e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma alea. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba azo esupi o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukumiirirwa hamwe n'okugyema, abantu bakatandika kureeba empindahinduka omu by'amagara. Abakuru omu by'amagara bagambire ngu omuhendo gw'abantu abarikukwatwa akakooko ka korona gukakyendeera munonga omu sande nkye ezihweire.

eng_prompt: After multiple attempts to collect payment for the urgent surgery, the clinic found themselves in a difficult position. Despite the life-saving procedure being completed, the baby's parents had not settled their outstanding bill.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugezaako enfunda eziwera okusolooza ssente z'okulongoosebwa okw'amangu, akalwaliro keesanga mu mbeera enzibu. Newankubadde enkola y'okutaasa obulamu yamalirizibwa, abazadde b'omwana baali tebannasasula ssente zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I nge temo tyen mapol me gamo cul pi yango ma opoto atura, ot yat onongo peko. Kadi bed ni yub me laro kwo otum, lunyodo pa latin pwod pe guculu cente gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitam aimo ikapun luipu kanu ajengio na engeso, apotu adekisia odumutu kesi toma ojautene loetiono noi. Karaida angetakin ainapeta nuka ayuwar aijar, mam auriak ikoku apotu kotacata ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: O'bita karakara eyi ma vutia robia trazu asita mbeleru 'da ni 'bori ma vutia, arojo 'da esu eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea. Ba ka tro geri 'bani ecozu edri pazu 'diyi de ra ti, odekua 'da ma tipika eyi ofeni nga aje eyini ofele ku 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okugyezaho munonga kushorooza esente z'okushemeza, eirwariro rikashangwa omu mbeera egumire. Oihireho enkora y'okukiza amagara, abazaire b'omwana bakaba batakashashwire esente zaabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent healthcare challenges, officials are reevaluating the current state of medical facilities across the country. During a press conference, the health minister highlighted the importance of strengthening local healthcare infrastructure.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abakungu baddamu okwekenneenya embeera y'ebyobujjanjabi okwetooloola eggwanga. Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire, minisita w'ebyobulamu yalambika obukulu bw'okunyweza obujjanjabi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye cokcok-ki, lutic tye ka ngiyo kit ma odi yadi tye kwede I lobo man. I kare me lok ki luco lok angeya, minista ma loyo lok kom yoto kom oloko I kom ber pa tyelo kor yub me yot kom I tedero.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka angaleu, eutasi eswamak airereor ejautene loka aiboisio nuka amukian kotoma akwap. Kotoma apak naka einer keda lu iyemuto, abu eminisita loka angaleu kitetem ajokis naka aitogogong nuka amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi curu'do angu arojo eyini 'diyi ma wura ma ale andri kari 'di ma alea ndulu. Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie risi, minisita alataniri ece orodri e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma okpo engazu angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikukwata ahaby'amagara obwahati, abakungu bariyo nibashwijuma omutindo gw'amarwariro okwetoroora eihanga. Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, minisita w'eby'amagara akashoboorora omugasho gw'okutunguura eby'amagara omu byaro.

eng_prompt: As the demand for reliable medical diagnostics continues to rise, it is crucial for healthcare providers to enhance their testing methods. Traditional blood testing techniques often yield inconsistent results, leading to potential misdiagnoses and ineffective treatments.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'okuzuula obulwadde obwesigika bweyongera okulinnya, kya mugaso eri abasawo okutumbula enkola zaabwe ez'okukebera. Enkola z'ekinnansi ez'okukebera omusaayi zitera okuvaamu ebyawukana, ekiviirako okuzuula obubi n'obujjanjabi obutakola.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me nongo yat ma gene tye kamede kwede, pire tek tutwal ki lutic yoto kom me ilo malo rwom me pimo gi. Yoo me pimo remo macon ipol kare kelo adwogi ma pe rwatte, ma weko nongo two i yo marac ki nongo yat ma pe tiyo maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo ainwakio najokan, ejokuna noi adekak aitojokar iponesiokec luka ainwakio. Iwaitin lu ainwakio aokot lumojong itolomunenete akiro nuegelegela, eyangaunete adekasinei nuarokok keda amukian namam iswamai ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ekile e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizu kililiru ri ma omgbo ni tutu risi, eri orodriru 'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma otu geri eyini eyi ma rua o'bizu 'diyi ma omgbo ra. Geri 'bani ari o'bizu oku 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo efupi yi ma eselea ku 'diyi eji, e'yo ecopi fepi 'bani ari esuzu geri onzi 'diyi pie azini aro eyi ma aza kozu geri kililiru ku 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ekyetengo ky'okukyebera kurungi nikyeyongyera, ab'eby'amagara bashemereire kwongyera aha mihanda yaabo y'okukyebera. Emiringo y'okukyebera eshagama ey'obuhangwa neekira kurugwamu ebitarikushushana, ekirikubaasa kurugwamu okukyebera kubi n'okuragurira kubi.

eng_prompt: Heart disease affects millions of people worldwide, causing immense pain and hardship for patients and their families. It is crucial that we unite in support of those facing these challenges.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde bw'omutima bukosa obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu mu nsi yonna, ekireetera abalwadde n'ab'omu maka gaabwe obulumi n'ebizibu eby'amaanyi. Kikulu nnyo okwegatta okuyamba abo aboolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kuno.
ach_prompt: Two aduno mako dano milion mapol I wilobo lung, kelo arem ki peko madit tutwal I kom lutwo ki lugangigi. Pire tek tutwal ni waribe me konyo jo matye ka nongo peko magi.
teo_prompt: Adekasinei nu etau esuronokini imilionin luka itunga kotoma akwap kere, eyangaununei apipil keda atiokisio mama ejaasi adekak keda ikalia kec. Erai ibore yenepol noi aimorikikin oni aigang ngul lu ejaas keda atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Azo culuniri ni 'ba milioni yi bi wudrikurusi ndulu, erini candi fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri tualu familia yini 'diyi pie. Eri orodriru amani ti ecizu 'ba e'yo ewaru 'diyi be 'diyi atizu.
nyn_prompt: Endwara z'omutima niziteganisa obukaikuru bw'abantu omunsi yoona, zikareetaho obusaasi n'oburemeezi bw'amaani ahabarwaire hamwe n'amaka gaabo. N'eky'omugasho ngu tukwatanise okuhwera abo abarikuhikwaho oburemeezi obu.

eng_prompt: Health officials have been monitoring the situation closely as new variants emerge. Recent reports indicate a concerning uptick in infections across several regions.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu babadde balondoola embeera okuva ku lusegere ng'ebika ebipya bivaayo. Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti obulwadde bweyongedde mu bitundu bingi.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma jami tye ka time kwede ikare ma kwai two mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat obino. Adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu ni wel dano matye ka nongo two omede tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Ewanyunitos eswamak lu adekis ejautene kama ejaasi iponesio luitetiak lu etakanunete. Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe eyatakinos adekasinei kotoma aiboisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi e'yo 'da ma pamvu one e'yo esele o'diru 'diyi ni efuzu 'bori ma vutia. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo esupi 'diyi ma kalafe tu angu kala karakara eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara batwire nibareebuuza embeera kurungi, ahabw'okugira ngu emiringo misya etandikire kubaho. Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okweyongyera kw'oburwaire omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: As tensions rise among various political factions, concerns about public safety have escalated. Health officials are warning that large gatherings could exacerbate both civil unrest and the ongoing health crisis.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu bibiina by'ebyobufuzi eby'enjawulo, okweraliikirira ku by'okwerinda kw'abantu kweyongedde. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu balabudde nti enkungaana ennene zisobola okwongera ku butabanguko mu bantu n'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Kit ma telle tye kamedde I kin dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat, lworo I kom ber bedo pa lwak omede. Lutic me yot kom tye ka ciko ni gure pa dano mapol twero kelo lweny ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata ingungeta kiding ipatei luegelegela, iyata aiyalongongo kanu ayuwara naka itunga. Apotu eswamak lu adekis ikwenyasi ebe epedorete atukonokin na itunga luipu aiyatakin amumu keda ationis na angaleu na elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu amuti politiki ni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea, asi otiza e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Azi'ba alata ni 'diyi bile ndu liza fe kini okuta ongmbo angiri si 'diyi eco e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu tualu e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi pie.
