eng_prompt: A well-maintained environment can significantly impact employee morale and productivity. Therefore, it is essential for leaders to prioritize hygiene and organization in the workplace.
lug_prompt: Embeera ennungi esobola okukyusa ennyo empisa z'abakozi n'okukola kwabwe. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abakulembeze okukulembeza obuyonjo n'entegeka mu bifo we bakolera.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ma ki gwoko maber twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa lutic ki ticgi. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero guwek lengo ki yub obed gin ma pire tek tutwal I gang tic.
teo_prompt: Aiboisit na idaritai ejok epedori aitojokar eswamae lo eswamak. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi engarenok aisingarenit nuka aila keda ainapara kotoma aiboisio nuka aswam.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'bani ta mba kililiru ri eco fe azi'ba eyini aa'zu edriru azini azi ngazu kililiru ra. Ka'dini, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini alata azini otita eyi 'bazu okporu angu eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa ebirikureebererwa kurungi, nibibaasa kukora kihango aha mitwarize n'emirimo y'abakozi. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho abebembezi kwebembeza obuyonjo n'obutebekana omu myanya y'emirimo.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a clean and inviting atmosphere is essential for attracting and retaining clientele. When businesses neglect their surroundings, they risk losing potential customers who prioritize hygiene and comfort.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma embeera nga nnyonjo era ng'esikiriza kya mugaso okusikiriza n'okusigaza bakasitoma. Bizinensi bwe ziragajjalira ebibeetoolodde, zifiirwa bakasitoma abakulembeza obuyonjo n'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: Gwoko kabedo maleng dok ma oyomo cwiny dano pire tek tutwal me ywayo ki gwoko luwil. Kace biacara pe giparo pi kabedo ma orumugi, gitwero rwenyo luwil ma gi maro gwoko lengo ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda ejautene lo elai ido lo isinyikokit itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aisukunyun ka aidar agwelak. Arai mam ibiasaran epalunit aiboisio nu idunyasi kesi, epedorete kesi atwaniar agwelak lu ekotosi nuka aila ka aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Angu ma tambazu alaru azini 'ba omvezuri eri orodriru aje'ba eyi ma e'yo ejizu azini eyi ma ta mbazu. Tujura ka angu yi ma ageia 'diyi adi, eyi e'yo aje'ba ecopi aa'pi eyi pie alata azini e'yo eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi avizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obusinguzi n'obwegyendesereza n'eky'omugasho omu kureeta abaguzi n'okubasigaza. Bizinesi ku zirikurekyerera ebizirikwetorwaire, nizibaasa kufeerwa abaguzi abarikwebembeza eby'obuyonjo n'obwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: As the days passed without collection, the pile of trash began to emit a foul odor. The warm weather only exacerbated the situation, making the smell even more unbearable.
lug_prompt: Ennaku bwe zagenda ziyitawo nga tetukung'aanyizza kasasiro, entuumu y'ebisasiro yatandika okuvaamu akawoowo akabi. Embeera y'obudde ey'ebbugumu yayongera bwongezi kwonoona mbeera, ekifuula akawoowo okuzibu ennyo okugumira.
ach_prompt: Ka nino woto ki kato labongo jogo yugi, yugi ocako ngwec. Piny ne ma lyet tutwal ni omedo peko ne, ma oweko ngwec ne odoko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana atuboros aparasia komam atukio agasia, abu agasia kogeu aibiror. Abu ekwam loemwanar akwap itolitoli ejautene, ido abu akinyet ijaik itunganan ationikinit.
lgg_prompt: O'du eyini agazu 'bani okurunya tra kokoru 'diyisi, okurunya 'da e'do odu onzi ofu. Angu driza ma e'yo eza lu e'yo 'da ma omgbo ra erini fezu aroru 'da ma ti ta mbazu drile.
nyn_prompt: Ebiro ku byagiire nibihingura hatariho kurundaana kasasiro, entuumu y'ebisasiro ekatandika kwihaho akahoho. Obwire bw'obutagasi bukongyera ahaburemeezi, ekyareteire akawooho katari kugumisiriza.

eng_prompt: As urban populations continue to grow, the issue of waste management has become increasingly pressing. Effective solutions are needed to address the rising levels of garbage in towns.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu bibuga gweyongera okukula, ensonga y'okuddukanya kasasiro yeeyongedde okuba ey'amangu. Eby'okugonjoola ebizibu eby'omugaso byetaagibwa okusobola okulwanyisa ebbeeyi ya kasasiro eyeeyongera mu bibuga.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano tye ka medde i boma, lok me tic ki yugi tye ka doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Miti tye me nongo yoo maber me cobo peko me balo yugi matye kamede i town.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kotoma oibuga, epol noi ationis naka aidar agasia. Ekotoi iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aitemokin ationis na agasia na iyata noi koibuga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tutu risi, e'yo okurunya eyi ma tambazu ri eca curu'do e'yo okporu ni ru. Le 'ba ma esu geri kililiru eyini ecozu e'yo okurunya ni tupi tawuni eyi ma alea ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu ndembo ogurikuguma nigweyongyera, enshonga y'okureeberera kasasiro eyeyongyeire. Hashemereire kubaho oburyo burungi bw'okutereeza omutindo gwa kasasiro ogweyongyeire omu ndembo.

eng_prompt: To maintain a clean and healthy environment, the community has established a regular waste management schedule. This ensures that all residents are aware of the importance of proper disposal practices.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obutonde nga buyonjo era nga bulungi, ekitundu kitaddewo enteekateeka ya bulijjo ey'okuddukanya kasasiro. Kino kikakasa nti abatuuze bonna bamanyi obukulu bw'enkola ennungi ez'okusuula kasasiro.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko kabedo ma orumowa maleng dok ma yot, lwak gukati ki yub me tic ki yugi kare ki kare. Man weko lutedero weng ngeyo ber pa tic ki yoo me bolo yugi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar aiboisio nu elaete, etolomutu itunga ainapeta nuka aidar agasia. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe ejenete itunga kere ajokis naka aicak agasia.
lgg_prompt: Angu ama agei ri ma tambazu alaru azini rua ala be, ongulumu 'da e'do otita eyi sa'wa driasi okurunya eyi ma tambazu. Diri ne ra kini 'ba dria aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni orodri 'yeta muke 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obwegyendesereza n'amagara marungi, abantu batandikireho enteekateeka y'okukoresa kasasiro buri kaire. Eki nikihamya ngu abatuuragye boona nibamanya omugasho gw'okukoresa emiringo mirungi y'okwihaho kasasiro.

eng_prompt: In a society where integrity is often compromised, we believe it is essential to stand up for transparency and accountability. Our mission is to inspire change and promote ethical practices in every aspect of life.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu nga obwesimbu butera okutyoboolwa, tukkiriza nti kya mugaso okulwanirira obwerufu n'embalirira. Ekigendererwa kyaffe kwe kuleetawo enkyukakyuka n'okutumbula empisa mu buli mbeera y'obulamu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma dano pe tye ki ada, watye ki niyee ni pire tek tutwal me cung pi ada ki kor tic. Miti wa tye me kelo aloka-loka ki tyelo kor tic mabeco I kabedo weng me kwo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet na mam itunga ejenete abeit, iyuunit sio ebe ibusakinit oni aitogogong nuka aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Alosikinetekosi erai aisinyikokit aijulakin ka aitopolor iponesio luajokak kotoma aijar.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'bani e'yo ada 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alea, ama a'i ra kini eri orodriru pa sozu e'yo ada ma dria azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Asisile amavileri ojata ejizu azini 'yeta kililiru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu e'yo dria edri ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu ahu emicwe mirungi erikukira kushishwa, nitwikiriza ngu n'eky'omugasho kurwanirira amazima n'embaririra. Ekigyendererwa kyaitu n'okureetaho empindahinduka n'okutunguura emicwe mirungi omuri buri kicweka ky'amagara.

eng_prompt: In the heart of East Africa, Uganda is known for its rich cultural heritage and vibrant communities. The warmth and hospitality of its citizens create an environment where harmony thrives.
lug_prompt: Mu mutima gwa East Africa, Uganda emanyiddwa olw'ebyobuwangwa byayo eby'obugagga n'ebitundu ebinyuma. Ekbugumu n'okusembeza bannansi baayo bireetawo embeera ey'obumu.
ach_prompt: I cwiny lobo Afrika kunyango, Uganda oywek pi tekwaro gi ki kabedo gi. Cwiny me yomcwiny ki jolo welo pa anywali ne kelo kabedo ma winye tye iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka East Africa, ejenara Uganda kanu inonosio ke luibusiak keda aiboisio nuegelegela. Amina keda aijaun itunga luka akwapuwok einakini aiboisit na ejai aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Kari Africa ma kala etuni efurialeru ri ma alea, 'ba ni Uganda ma e'yo a'bini 'diyi ma ongmbo angiri azini ongulumu eyini aa'zu edriru 'diyisi. Angu 'ba kari 'di ma alea 'diyini aa'zu ayikosi azini aa'zu ayikosi ri ni angu 'ba eyi ma eselea aa'zu tualu ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mutima gw'amahanga g'oburugwa izooba bwa Afirika, Uganda nemanywa ahabw'obuhangwa bwayo n'abantu baayo. Obusingye n'okwakirana kw'abatuuragye b'eihanga eryo, nibireetaho embeera erikureetaho okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Navigating the complexities of global markets can be daunting for businesses. Various factors, such as cultural differences and regulatory hurdles, can complicate international transactions.
lug_prompt: Okulambula obuzibu bw'obutale bw'ensi yonna kiyinza okuba ekizibu eri bizinensi. Ensonga ez'enjawulo, nga enjawulo mu byobuwangwa n'ebizibu mu mateeka, bisobola okukaluubiriza entambula y'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: Tic ki cuk mapat-pat matye I wilobo weng twero bedo tek tutwal pi biacara. Jami mapol calo apoka-poka me tekwaro ki peko me cik mapat-pat twero weko timo biacara I kin lobo mapat-pat bedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokin nuka esokoni lo akwap kere etiono noi kanuka ibiasaran. Akiro nuegelegela kwape nat atiakatiaka naka inonosio keda ainingosia nuka ikisila, epedorete aitolitol agwelanar naka akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru cuu wudrikurusiri ma alia 'diyi ma ti ojizu ri eco ovu ewaru tujari yi dri ra. E'yo ndundu ekile e'yo suruni 'diyi ma esele cozu azini e'yo ewaru azita ma dria 'diyi eco e'yo tujari kari eselia 'diyi ni 'diyi 'yezu kongoloru ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugyenda omu katare k'ensi yoona nikibaasa kugumira bizinesi. Enshonga nyingi, nk'obuhangwa obutarikushushana hamwe n'oburemeezi omu biragiro, nibibaasa kuremesa okukoragana kw'amahanga goona.

eng_prompt: In light of recent tensions and the need for regional stability, it is crucial for nations to come together. A unified approach will foster cooperation and ensure mutual security.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bunkenke obwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obwetaavu bw'obutebenkevu mu kitundu, kikulu nnyo amawanga okwegatta. Enkola ey'awamu ejja kutumbula enkolagana n'okukuuma emirembe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye cokcok-ki ki miti me kelo kuc I but lobo mapat-pat, pire tek tutwal ni lobo mapat-pat omyero guribe. Yoo me tic ma ribe obi weko winye bedo tye dok bene obi weko dano weng bedo agwoka.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta lu atuboros keda eipud loka ainapakina aiboisio, ejokuna noi akwapin aimorikikin. Aitemonokineta nuimorikikina epedorete aitopolor aiswamanara ka ayuarite ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ebipi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini e'yo lezu asianzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma dria, eri orodriru kari eyini emuzu tualu. Geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu tualu ri ni nga ti ecita ma omgbo otu dika eri nga fe 'ba dria ni aa'zu ageitema be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko oburiho obwahati hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'obutebekana omu byanga, n'eky'omugasho amahanga kukorera hamwe. Enkora erikukwatanisa neija kureetaho okukwatanisa n'okureeba ngu buri omwe aine eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: As the number of displaced families continues to rise, the challenges faced by pregnant women in refugee camps have become increasingly urgent. Many organizations are mobilizing resources to address the specific needs of these vulnerable individuals.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'amaka agasengulwa gweyongera okulinnya, okusoomoozebwa abakyala ab'embuto kwe basanga mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu kweyongedde. Ebitongole bingi bikungaanya ensimbi okukola ku byetaago by'abantu bano abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel lugangi ma orwenyo gangi gi tye ka medde ameda, peko pa mon ma oyac ma gitye i camp bene tye ka medde ameda. Dule mapol tye ka jogo cente pi tyeko peko pa dano ma goro.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka ikalia lu ikerai, apolor noi atiokisio nu ejaas angor nu epotiete kotoma okabin lu ikerai. Iriongeta luipu eutasi aituk iboro kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Familia angu kokoru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tutu, e'yo ewaru oku okporovu ru kembe emunyale eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi eca curu'do okporu. Amuti karakara eyi afa eyi tra e'yo 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'amaka agarikuruga omu maka gaago nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, oburemeezi bw'abakazi abaine enda omu kampu z'empungi bweyongyeire. Ebitongore bingi biriyo nibikora ahabyetaago by'abantu abo abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: Having a stable job can significantly enhance a family's financial situation. As individuals secure employment, they often experience a boost in their overall economic well-being.
lug_prompt: Okubeera n'omulimu ogutebenkedde kisobola okutumbula ennyo embeera y'amaka mu by'ensimbi. Abantu bwe bafuna emirimu, batera okufuna enkulaakulana mu byenfuna byabwe okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki tic maber twero medo rwom me lim pa jo me odi. Ka dano acel-acel onongo tic, rwom me lim gi omede.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda aswam na ejok epedori aitojokar ejautene loka ikapun loka ekale. Arai edumununete itunga aswamisinei, eyatakinete kesi ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu azi kililiru be ri be ri eco familia ma lonyi ma omgbo otu ra. Ba eyi ka azi esu, eyi ma lonyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugira omurimo oguhami, nikibaasa kwongyera ahaby'entaasya y'eka. Abantu ku barikutunga emirimo, entatsya yaabo neyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: In a world increasingly divided by conflict and inequality, the power of collaboration among diverse communities is becoming more evident. By fostering a sense of togetherness, we can unlock new opportunities for growth and innovation.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongera okwawukana olw'obukuubagano n'obutafaanagana, amaanyi g'okukwatagana mu bitundu eby'enjawulo geeyongera okweyoleka. Nga tukuza enneewulira y'obumu, tusobola okuggulawo emikisa emipya egy'okukulaakulana n'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opoke-opoke tutwal pi lweny ki apoka-poka, teko pa ribbe ikin kabedo mapat-pat tye ka nen atyer kamaleng. Ka wadongo cwiny me ribe, watwero yabo yoo manyen me dongo ki diro manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naetiakatiaka noi kanu ingungeta keda amamus na eirianu, apolor noi apedor naka aimorikikina kanejaas itunga luegelegela. Kowai lo aitopolor aimorikikina, ipedori oni aitolomun arerengesio nuitetiak nuka apol keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma esele coza e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo esele coza ni 'diyisi, okpo ti icita ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea ri ni eca e'da sa'wa driasi. E'yo ti icita niri ma omgbo otuzu risi, ama eco drileba o'diru zota ni azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ejizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikweyongyera kwebaganisamu entaro n'obutakwatanisa, amaani g'okukwatanisa omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe nigeeyongyera kureebeka. Twayoreka okukwatanisa, nitubaasa kutunga emigisha misya y'okutunguuka n'okutandikaho ebintu bisya.

eng_prompt: Countries around the world are increasingly interconnected through commerce and exchange. As economies grow and evolve, the importance of engaging in international trade becomes more apparent.
lug_prompt: Ensi okwetooloola ensi yonna zeeyongedde okukwatagana okuyita mu by'obusuubuzi n'okusuubulagana. Ebyenfuna bwe bikula n'okukulaakulana, omugaso gw'okwenyigira mu by'obusuubuzi by'ensi yonna gweyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Lobo mapat-pat manonge I wilobo gitye ka kube I kingi I yoo me cato wil ki wilo jami. Ka lonyo me lobo tye ka dongo dok tye ka dongo, ber pa timo biacara ikin lobe mapat-pat nen atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Akwapin kere kotoma akwap ejai arucokina naepol noi kotoma agwelanar keda agwelanar. Kwape epoloi keda apol naka ikapun, epol ajokis naka agwelanar keda akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: Kari wudrikuru ma kalasi ndulu 'diyi yi eci yi ma eselea geri tujarani azini tujarani 'diyisi. E'yo robiani 'diyi ni zoria azini zoria, orodri tujari 'yezu kari eselia 'diyi ma eselea ri ni eca e'da.
nyn_prompt: Amahanga okwetorora ensi yoona nigyeyongyera kukwatanisa kurabira omu by'obushubuzi hamwe n'okuguza ebintu. Eby'entaasya ku birikugyenda nibikura, omugasho gw'okwejumba omu by'obushubuzi n'amahanga goona nigweyongyera kureebeka.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to evolve, the unique challenges faced by border communities have become increasingly apparent. These areas are particularly susceptible to the spread of the virus due to their proximity to different regions and varying health regulations.
lug_prompt: Nga ssenyiga omukambwe agenda mu maaso n'okukyuka, okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo abantu ku nsalo kwe basanga kweyongedde okweyoleka. Ebitundu bino byangu nnyo okusaasaana kw'akawuka olw'okubeera okumpi n'ebitundu eby'enjawulo n'ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye ka medde anyim, peko mapat-pat matye I but lobo mapat-pat manonge I wang lobo tye ka nen. Kabedo magi twero nya oyot tutwalle pi nya pa kwidi pi bedo cok ki but lobo mapat-pat ki cik me yot-kom mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka naka ekorona aijulanakin, apolor atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga lu oikoruon. Epatana aiboisio nu awear ekorona naarai eidunya keda aiboisio nuegelegela keda ikisila luegelegela luka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile drile, e'yo ewaru 'ba angu boda'a 'diyi ni esu 'diyi e'da drile. Angu 'diyi tutuni e'yo azo 'da ma ereta niri esu ewakokoru eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma agei ri ma alea azini azita e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma esele cozu ndundu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa korona ku burikugyenda omu maisho, oburemeezi bw'omutaano obu abantu abari aha nsharo barikurabamu bweyongyeire kweyoreka. Emyanya egi neyanguhirwa munonga okujanjaara kw'akakooko ahabw'okugira ngu eri haihi n'emyanya etari emwe n'emwe hamwe n'ebiragiro by'eby'amagara ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In an increasingly interconnected world, the challenges faced by individual countries often transcend borders. To effectively address issues such as climate change, security threats, and economic instability, neighbouring nations need to collaborate.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongera okukwatagana, okusoomoozebwa amawanga bwe gasanga kutera okusukka ensalo. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga ng'enkyukakyuka y'obudde, eby'okwerinda n'ebyenfuna, amawanga agaliraanyeewo geetaaga okukolera awamu.
ach_prompt: I lobo man matye kamede ki kube, peko ma lobo acel acel nongo ipol kare kato wang lobo. Pi cobo peko macalo alokaloka piny, peko me gwoko kuc, ki peko me lim, lobo matye jirani omyero gutii kacelo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naerucokina noi, ainingosia nuetereikina keda akwapin nuegelegela eraas nuegelegela. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio kwape nat aijulanakineta nuka ekuse ka etepe, aitukurianeta nuka ayuwara keda amamus na ainapakina naka ikapun, ekot akwapin nu idunyare aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani yi ecizu yi ma eselea tutu ri ma alea, e'yo ewaru kari alu alu yini dri fuzu yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria 'diyi tutuni aga boda mile yi ra. E'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru ekile angu mile ma ojata le, e'yo ewaru ageitema ni 'diyi pie, azini e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi pie, le kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ma eciti tualu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikweyongyera kukwatanisa,oburemeezi obu amahanga garikushanga nibukira kurenga ensharo. Okukora aha nshonga nk'empindahinduka y'obwire, eby'okwerinda, hamwe n'obutabanguko omu by'entaasya, amahanga agatuherereire gashemereire kukorera hamwe.

eng_prompt: Despite the numerous initiatives aimed at promoting gender equality, many still overlook the importance of educating girls. This oversight often leads to a lack of investment in programs that support their academic growth and development.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo enteekateeka nnyingi ezigendereddwamu okutumbula omwenkanonkano mu kikula ky'abantu, bangi tebafaayo ku bukulu bw'okusomesa abawala. Okulondoola kuno kutera okuviirako obuteeteeka ssente mu pulogulaamu ezibayamba okukula mu by'ensoma n'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub mapat-pat tye me tyelo kor rwom me mon ki coo, polgi pud cayo ber pa pwonyo lutino anyira. Bedo ki wang mabit I kom lok eni ipol kare kelo peko me keto lim I yub ma konyo lutino me dongo ki dongo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu iboro luebeit aswam kanu aitopolorite angor keda ikiliok, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka asioman naka apesur. Amamus na aingic duc eyangauni amamus na aipikakin ikapun toma ainapeta nu ingarakinete kesi apol keda apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara 'bani lezu e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri otuzu 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara eyi nga po'di e'yo orodri ezoanzi eyini onita fezu ri ma dria ku. E'yo 'di ni fe 'ba eyini robia 'bazu otita eyini ani zozu sukulu'a ri ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okutunguura oburinganiza omu bashaija n'abakazi, baingi nibafeerwa omugasho gw'okwegyesa abaishiki. Okwetegyereza eki nikireetera obutateekyera sente omu puroguraamu ezirikubayamba kweyongyera omu by'obwegyese n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown significant disparities in educational attainment between genders. Factors such as socio-economic status and cultural expectations often contribute to these differences.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawulo mu kusoma kw'ekikula ky'abantu. Ensonga nga embeera y'abantu n'ebyenfuna n'ebyobuwangwa bitera okuviirako enjawulo zino.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I rwom me kwan ikin mon ki coo. Jami macalo rwom me kwo ki lim ki tekwaro ipol kare kelo apoka-poka magi.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac atiakatiaka naepol noi naka asioman kiding ikiliok keda angor. Iboro kwape ka ejautene loka itunga keda ikapun keda aomisio nuka inonosio kes eyangaununete atiakatiaka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo esele coza onita ma alia agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ra. E'yo ekile geri 'ba eyini aa'zu tualu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie tualu geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie tualu e'yo a'bi eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie 'diyi tutuni e'yo esele cozu 'diyi eji.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entaaniso y'amaani omu by'obwegyese ahagati y'abashaija n'abakazi. Enshonga nk'embeera y'abantu n'eby'entaasya hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa nibitera kureetaho entaaniso ezi.

eng_prompt: In many communities, access to quality education remains a significant challenge. To address this issue, various initiatives have been implemented to support schools that serve underprivileged populations.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna ebyenjigiriza eby'omutindo kukyali kusoomoozebwa kwa maanyi. Okukola ku nsonga eno, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ziteekeddwawo okuyamba amasomero agaweereza abantu abateesobola.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, nongo kwan me rwom mamalo pud obedo peko madit tutwal. Me tyeko peko man, kicako yub mapat-pat me konyo gangi kwan ma konyo lutino matye ki peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, eringa adumun asioman na abeit erai ainingosit naepol noi. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, etolomun iboro luegelegela kanu aigang isomeroi lu ijanakinete itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, onita muke ri esuzu ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru ni. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi atita fezu sukulu azi ngapi 'ba afa koko 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: Investing in the future of our society means ensuring that every child has access to opportunities. One of the most critical areas of focus is the empowerment and education of girls, as they play a vital role in community development.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu biseera by'omu maaso eby'ekitundu kyaffe kitegeeza okukakasa nti buli mwana afuna emikisa. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu eby'okussaako essira kwe kutumbula n'okusomesa abawala, kubanga bakola omulimu gwa maanyi mu nkulaakulana y'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I kom anyim pa kabedo wa nyutu ni waneno ni lutino weng gunongo gum. Kabedo acel ma pire tek tutwal ma omyero ki ket iye cwiny en aye tyelo kor ki pwonyo lutino anyira pien ni gitiyo tic ma pire tek tutwal I dongo lobo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma oingaren naka itunga wok apolouke awanyun ebe kangin ikoku edumuni arerengesio. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio nuepolok noi nuibusakinit apodokinit ngesi aitigogong keda asioman naka apesur, naarai iswamaete kesi aswam naepol noi kotoma apol naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Lonyi vuti aleza ongulumu amavileri ma ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma efi kini le anzi nyiri dria eyi ma esu drileba eyi ra. E'yo azi okporu 'bani asi 'bazu drinia ri eri e'yo ezoanzi eyini okpo fezu azini onita fezu, eyini aa'zu orodriru ongulumu eyi ma ezota ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu by'omumaisho, nikimanyisa okureeba ngu buri mwana akatunga emigisha. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebishemereire kutaho amaani n'okwegyesa abaishiki, ahabw'okuba nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura ebyanga.

eng_prompt: It is essential for caregivers to prioritize the well-being and development of their offspring. By providing a nurturing environment, they can help shape a brighter future for the next generation.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso abalabirira okukulembeza obulungi n'enkula y'abaana baabwe. Mu kuwa embeera ennungi, basobola okuyamba okutondawo ebiseera by'omu maaso ebitangaavu eri omulembe oguddako.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ni joo ma gwoko lutino omyero guket cwiny gi i kom dongo pa lutino gi. Ka gimiyo kabedo maber, gitwero konyo yubu kwo me anyim maber pi yalwak matye kabino anyim.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi lu idarete idwekec aisingarenit aijar keda apol naka idwekec. Kowai lo aitolomun aiboisio nu isisianakinete kesi, epedorete kesi aingarakin aitolomun ingaren na ejok kanuka ateker na etupakini.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru 'ba anzi ta mbapi 'diyi ni asi 'bazu e'yo onyiru anzi yini 'diyi ma zota ma dria. Geri eyini angu imbata fezu 'diyisi, eyi eco ewu drialeri 'ba ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho abarikureeberera abaana kwebembeza amagara n'entunguuka y'abaana baabo. Kubarikuheereza abantu emituurire mirungi, nibabaasa kuhwera omu kuhanga eby'omumaisho birungi eby'omurembe ogurikukurataho.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted significant disparities in educational attainment across different regions. One notable trend is the increasing number of students who leave school before graduation, particularly in less populated areas.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawulo mu by'enjigiriza mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bigenda mu maaso kwe kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abayizi abava mu masomero nga tebannattikirwa naddala mu bitundu ebirimu abantu abatono.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I rwom me kwan I but lobo mapat-pat. Gin acel ma nen tutwal en aye wel lutino kwan matye ka weko kwan ma pwod pe gutyeko kwangi, tutwalle I kabedo ma dano pe dwong iye.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit atiaketait naepol noi naka asioman kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Idiopebore yenitegelikina ngesi enaaba loepol lo esisiak lu elomanarete esomero eringa elomaria asioman, kacut aiboisio nu ikidioko itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo onita ma esele coza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ra. E'yo azi 'bani eco ne ra ri sukulu anzi sukulu kupi de nga po'di de sukulu ku 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tuni angu kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu were 'diyi ma alea ri i.

eng_prompt: Effective communication strategies are essential for engaging potential donors. By highlighting specific causes and their impact, organizations can inspire support and participation.
lug_prompt: Enkola z'empuliziganya ennungi za mugaso mu kusikiriza abagabi b'obuyambi. Ebitongole bisobola okuleetawo obuwagizi n'okwenyigiramu nga bisonga ku nsonga ez'enjawulo n'ebikosa abantu.
ach_prompt: Diro me lok maber pire tek tutwal me winye ki joo ma miyo kony me lim. I yo me nyutu jami ma kelo peko ki adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat twero cuku cwiny dano me miyo kony ki bedo tye.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges throughout his academic journey, he remained determined to succeed. With the help of generous donors and mentors, he found the resources he needed to stay on track.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa kungi mu kusoma kwe, yasigala mumalirivu okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Ng'ayambibwako abagabi b'obuyambi abagabi b'obuyambi n'ababuulirizi, yafuna ebintu bye yali yeetaaga okusigala ku mulamwa.

eng_prompt: Many students struggle to afford higher education, leading to significant financial burdens. One of the most pressing issues they encounter is the absence of tuition fee support.

teo_prompt: Isisiak luipu etionikinitos noi kanu adumun ikapun luka asioman naka okuju, ido eyangauni kesi ationis naepol noi naka ikapun. Adiopet kotoma atiokisio nuetapit kesi adumun ngesi amamus na agangat na isirigin lu esomero.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi dri ci robia esuzu onita uruleruri ma alea, e'yo 'di ni fe eyini e'yo robia ni 'diyi esuzu okporu. E'yo azi okporu eyini esu ri eri atita sukulu fizi niri ma ako ni.

eng_prompt: Understanding the factors influencing educational decisions is crucial for addressing dropout rates. Researchers are exploring the various motivations and challenges faced by young people in their academic journeys.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ensonga eziviirako okusalawo ku by'enjigiriza kya mugaso nnyo mu kukola ku muwendo gw'abawanduka mu masomero. Abanoonyereza banoonyereza ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebikubiriza n'okusoomoozebwa abavubuka kwe basanga mu misomo gyabwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing challenges faced by vulnerable populations, many local groups have mobilized their resources. These initiatives aim to provide essential support and services to those struggling in the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okweyongera okusoomoozebwa abantu abateesobola, ebibiina by'ebitundu bingi bikungaanyizza eby'obugagga byabwe. Enteekateeka zino zigenderera okuwa obuyambi n'obuweereza obwetaagisa eri abo abatawaanyizibwa mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede ma dano ma goro nongo, dul mapat-pat me tedero guyubu jami gi. Yub eni tye ki miti me miyo kony ki kony ma mite pi joo matye ka lweny I kabedo gi.

eng_prompt: It is our responsibility to support those who are less fortunate. We must take action to uplift and assist individuals facing hardships.
lug_prompt: Buvunaanyizibwa bwaffe okuyamba abo abatalina mikisa. Tulina okubaako kye tukolawo okusitula n'okuyamba abantu ssekinnoomu aboolekaganye n'ebizibu.

teo_prompt: Erai aswam wok aigang ngul lu ican. Ekot oni aswam ibore kanu aikeun ka aingarakin itunga lu etereikina keda atiokisio.

eng_prompt: In times of rising tensions and uncertainty, the community sought ways to ensure their safety and well-being. As a result, they established a dedicated group to safeguard their neighborhoods.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke n'obutali bukakafu obweyongera, abantu banoonya engeri z'okukakasa obukuumi bwabwe n'obulungi bwabwe. N'ekyavaamu, baatandikawo ekibinja eky'obwannakyewa okukuuma ebitundu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma telle ki peko tye ka mede, lwak guyenyo yoo me gwoko kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, guyubu dul mo me gwoko kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu iyatakinor aiyalongong keda amamus ajenanut, apotu itunga komooto iwaitin lu iyuaret keda aijar kec. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi odukutu egurupu kanu ayuarite aiboisio kec.

eng_prompt: Effective recruitment is crucial for finding the right talent to meet an organization's needs. It typically includes various stages of communication and assessment between the employer and potential candidates.
lug_prompt: Okuyingiza abakozi obulungi kya mugaso nnyo mu kunoonya ebitone ebituufu okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'ekitongole. Kitera okuzingiramu emitendera egy'enjawulo egy'okuwuliziganya n'okukebera wakati w'omukozesa n'abo abeesimbyewo.

eng_prompt: Success often comes after many attempts, so perseverance is key. Remember that every setback is an opportunity to learn and grow.
lug_prompt: Obuwanguzi butera okujja oluvannyuma lw'okugezaako ennyo, n'olwekyo obugumiikiriza kye kisumuluzo. Jjukira nti buli kuddirira mukisa gwa kuyiga n'okukula.

eng_prompt: In a rapidly changing world, the ability to adapt and learn is more important than ever. Investing in knowledge and skills can open doors to countless opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ekyuka mangu, obusobozi okukyusakyusa n'okuyiga kya mugaso okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Okusiga ensimbi mu kumanya n'obukugu kiyinza okuggulawo emiryango gy'emikisa mingi.

lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula abakozi abalina obukugu. Bwe tuwa abantu amagezi n'obukodyo bw'okulowooza obulungi, tusobola okusumulula obusobozi bwabwe obw'okuyiiya okugonjoola ebizibu.

lug_prompt: Ebyenjigiriza bikola omulimu munene mu kukola ebisaanyizo by'omuntu n'obukugu bw'okunoonya emirimu. Eky'ennaku, abantu bangi beesanga mu mbeera embi olw'obutaba na buyigirize.

eng_prompt: As the school year approaches, districts often find themselves in need of a large number of qualified educators. This surge in hiring is driven by retirements, resignations, and the expansion of programs.

eng_prompt: In the hiring process, companies often assess their staffing needs based on projected growth and operational demands. As a result, they determine how many new employees are necessary to meet their goals.

ach_prompt: Ikare me coyo lutic, dul mapat-pat ipol kare ngiyo miti pa luticgi malubbe ki dongo ma byek tye I komgi ki miti me tic. Macalo adwogi ne, gimoko wel lutic manyen ma mite me cobo miti gi.

lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba 'bani ofi amuti ageitema ni local defence unit niri ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra. Kalafe tupi 'dileri eji tutuni 'ba ode ava be azi ngazu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi.

teo_prompt: Iyalongongoi noi itunga nuikamunitos iponesio luka ajore. Apotu iripotan luka aitisiliario keda aitukurianeta kolomutu, ayangautu aiyalongong kanejaas itunga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve education and support underfunded institutions, the government of Uganda has implemented various funding initiatives. These measures aim to enhance the quality of learning and provide necessary resources for students and teachers alike.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenjigiriza n'okuyamba amatendekero agatalina buyambi, gavumenti ya Uganda etaddewo enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okuvujjirira. Ebintu bino bigendererwamu kutumbula omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza n'okuwa abayizi n'abasomesa ebintu ebyetaagisa.

lug_prompt: Abalimi bangi balwana okusobola okweyimirizaawo olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu erinnya. Ekimu ku bizibu by'ensimbi ebisingayo obunene bye basanga bye bbeeyi y'ebikozesebwa mu bulimi n'obulunzi eri waggulu.

eng_prompt: Access to quality education is a fundamental right that can empower individuals and transform communities. Therefore, it is essential to ensure that financial barriers do not prevent anyone from pursuing their academic goals.
lug_prompt: Okufuna ebyenjigiriza eby'omutindo ddembe lya musingi erisobola okutumbula abantu n'okukyusa ebitundu. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso okukakasa nti ebizibu by'ensimbi tebiremesa muntu yenna kutuukiriza biruubirirwa bye eby'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Nongo kwan me rwom mamalo obedo twero ma pire tek ma twero jingo dano ki loko kabedo gi. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me neno ni peko me lim pe ogengo ngat mo keken me cobo miti ne me kwan.
teo_prompt: Adumunun asioman na adoketait ejok erai apedor na aitigogong itunga ka aijulakin itunga. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi awanyun ebe mam atiokisio nuka ikapun isimiki idio itunganan aitodolikin apeleikinata ke nuka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Onita muke ri esuzu ri eri drilemgbo azi okporu 'ba alu alu eyini okpo fepi azini ongulumu eyi ojapi ra ni i. Ka'dini, eri orodriru nezu ra kini e'yo robia ni 'diyi atri 'ba azini e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku.

eng_prompt: In order to improve student outcomes and enhance learning environments, it is essential to address the financial challenges faced by schools. Without adequate resources, many educational institutions struggle to provide quality instruction and support services.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula ensoma y'abayizi n'embeera y'okusomeramu, kyetaagisa okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ensimbi amasomero kwe gasanga. Olw'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa ebimala, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi galwana okuwa obuweereza obw'omutindo n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino ki dongo rwom me kwan, pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko me lim ma gangi kwan tye kwede. Labongo jami ma oromo, gangi kwan mapol nongo tek tutwal me miyo pwony ki kony me rwom mamalo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae lo idwe ka aitojokar ejautene lo aisisia, ejokuna aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikapun nu ejaas isomeroi. Arai emamete iboro luedolitos, etiono isomeroi luipu aisisianakin keda aingarakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Anzi eyi ma agata otuzu tualu angu onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru robia ni sukulu eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si, angu onita ni karakara eyi dri ci imbata kililiru azini atita fezu 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kutunguura ebyarugire omu bigyezo by'abeegi, n'eky'omugasho kukora ahaburemeezi bw'esente obu amashomero garikushanga. Ahabw'okuburwa eby'okukoresa ebirikumara, amatendekyero maingi nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okuheereza obuheereza burungi.

eng_prompt: To improve public health and prevent the spread of diseases, it is essential to address the current gaps in knowledge among residents. Educational programs and workshops can play a crucial role in fostering awareness and promoting better practices.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu n'okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde, kya mugaso okumalawo ebituli ebiriwo mu kumanya mu batuuze. Pulogulaamu z'ebyenjigiriza n'emisomo bisobola okukola omulimu omukulu mu kutumbula okumanyisa n'okutumbula enkola ennungi.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak ki gengo nya pa two, pire tek tutwal me cobo peko me ngec matye ikin lwak. Yub me pwonye ki kacoke me pwonye twero konyo tutwal I rweyo lwak ki ilo malo rwom me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar angaleu naka itunga ka aitikitik awea na adekasinei, ejok aitemokin ationis na aijen kanejaas itunga. Ainapeta nuka asioman keda airiamunun epedorete aitodolikin aijen keda aitopolor iponesio luajokak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu azini azo eyi ma ereta atrizu, eri orodriru e'yo 'bani 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu. Otita onita ni azini otita imbatani ni 'diyi eco azi okporu nga mile oziza ma omgbo otuzu azini geri muke 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.

eng_prompt: In a society governed by law, the role of law enforcement is crucial. Ensuring public safety and maintaining order are fundamental responsibilities of those in power.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu abafugibwa amateeka, omulimu gw'abakuumaddembe gwa mugaso nnyo. Okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu n'okukuuma emirembe buvunaanyizibwa bwa abo abali mu buyinza.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma cik aye doro, tic pa abili pire tek tutwal. Gwoko ber bedo pa lwak ki gwoko ber bedo obedo tic ma pire tek pa joo matye I loc.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naeyait ikisila, epol noi aswam naka ipolisin. Awanyun ebe eyuara itunga ka aidar ainapakina eraas aswam naepol noi naka ngul luejaasi toma apugan.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the urgent need for improved sanitation, local leaders have initiated a community development initiative. This effort aims to address health concerns and enhance the quality of life for residents.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okulongoosa eby'obuyonjo, abakulembeze b'ebyalo batandiseewo enteekateeka y'okukulaakulanya ebitundu. Kaweefube ono agenderera kukola ku byobulamu n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bw'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero guniang ni gwoko lengo pire tek tutwal ma oweko gucako yub me dongo kabedo gi. Yub man tye me tyeko peko me yot kom ki ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun eipud loka aiyatakin aila, etolomutu engarenok luka atutubet ainapeta nuka apol. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu ka aitojokar aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru alata ma omgbo otuzuri ma e'yo egazu 'bo, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'do otuta angu ezoma ni ongulumu eyi ma alea ri 'bo. Asisile okpo 'di niri lezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma aza kozu azini geri 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo otuzu.

eng_prompt: Before starting any business, it's essential to understand the legal requirements involved. Obtaining the necessary permits and certifications is crucial for compliance.

eng_prompt: Maintaining good health is essential for overall well-being. One of the most effective strategies to achieve this is through proper hygiene practices.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obulamu obulungi kya mugaso eri obulamu obulungi okutwalira awamu. Emu ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kuyita mu mpisa ennungi ez'obuyonjo.

eng_prompt: Proper sanitation practices are crucial for maintaining public health. When waste is not disposed of correctly, it can contaminate water sources and spread harmful pathogens.

eng_prompt: Markets serve as vibrant hubs of commerce and culture, where diverse individuals come together to exchange goods and ideas. The lively atmosphere fosters a sense of community, drawing in crowds from all walks of life.
lug_prompt: Obutale bukozesebwa nga ebifo by'ebyobusuubuzi n'ebyobuwangwa, abantu ab'enjawulo gyebakungaana okuwanyisiganya ebintu n'ebirowoozo. Embeera ey'omujjuzo ekuzaamu enneewulira y'ekitundu, ekisikiriza abantu okuva mu mbeera z'obulamu zonna.

nyn_prompt: Obutare nibukora nk'emyanya y'eby'obushubuzi n'eby'obuhangwa, ahu abantu b'emiringo mingi barikuza hamwe kuguza ebintu hamwe n'ebiteekateeko. Embeera y'okushemererwa neeyongyera aha mutima gw'okukwatanisa, ekirikureeta abantu baingi kuruga omu miringo yoona.

eng_prompt: Despite the overwhelming evidence in his favor, the allegations against him have caused a significant stir in the community. It's important to remember that everyone is innocent until proven guilty.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo obujulizi bungi obumukakasa, ebimwogerwako bireeseewo okusattira mu bantu. Kikulu okujjukira nti buli muntu talina musango okutuusa ng'akakasiddwa nti alina omusango.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni caden tye mapol tutwal I kome, adot ma ki keto I kome okelo lworo madit tutwal I kin lwak. Pire tek tutwal me poo ni ngat mo keken peke ki bal wang ma kinongo ni otimo bal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ajenanut nuigangitos ngesi, apotu aitoroneta nuikamunitos ngesi koinakisi itunga aiyalongong noi. Erai ibore yenepol aiitun ebe mam itunganan ediakarit itoni ne engicunere ebe ediakarit.
lgg_prompt: Afa e'dapi kini eri ma dria e'yo be angiri 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo 'bani 'yo eri ma dria 'diyi fe ongulumu eyini ava angiri. Eri orodriru e'yo egazu kini 'ba dria e'yo kokoru kpere 'bani e'dazu kini eza e'yo ra.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic forced businesses to close their doors, many faced unprecedented financial challenges. In the midst of these struggles, a troubling trend emerged regarding employee compensation.

eng_prompt: Despite their tireless dedication and long hours, many health workers feel undervalued in their roles. The ongoing challenges in the healthcare system have overshadowed the contributions of these essential professionals.

eng_prompt: In response to the changing needs of employees and advancements in technology, the company has implemented a flexible work policy. This new approach aims to enhance work-life balance and productivity.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyetaago by'abakozi ebikyuka n'enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya, kampuni etaddewo enkola y'emirimu enkyukakyuka. Enkola eno empya egendereddwamu okutumbula enzikiriziganya wakati w'emirimu n'obulamu obwa bulijjo n'okukola obulungi emirimu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lok pa miti pa lutic ki dongo pa tet manyen, dul ne oketo cik me aloka-loka I tic. Yoo manyen man tye ki miti me medo rwom me tic ki kwo pa dano ki bene medo rwom me tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aijulanakineta nuka ipudesia luka eswamak keda apol naka etatai loakwana, etolomu ekampuni ainapeta nuka aijulakin aswam. Alosikinet naka epone lo loitetet erai aitojokar aswam keda aijar ka aswam ejok.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic unfolded, nations struggled to contain the virus's rapid transmission. Despite efforts to implement travel restrictions and public health measures, the disease found its way across borders.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyagenda kyeyongera, amawanga gaalwana okuziyiza okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Newankubadde waaliwo kaweefube w'okussaawo obukwakkulizo ku ntambula n'ebirala ebikwata ku byobulamu, ekirwadde kino kyatuuka mu mawanga amalala.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two opoto, lobo mapat-pat obedo ka tute matek me gengo nya pa two eni. Kadi bed ni ki keto yub me gengo wot ki gwoko yot kom, two ne onongo yoo me kato wang lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kapak na abwangunor adeka naka ekorona, apotu akwapin itereikina kanu aitikitik awea na ekorona. Karaida etamitai kagogong aitodolikin ikisila luka alosit keda nuka angaleu, apotu adekasinei odumutu epone loka aitub ikoruo.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive landscape, businesses are increasingly recognizing the importance of employee well-being. As concerns about workplace safety continue to rise, organizations must adapt to meet these expectations.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'okuvuganya, bizinensi zeeyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'obulungi bw'abakozi. Nga okweraliikirira ku by'okwerinda ku mirimu kweyongera okulinnya, ebitongole birina okukyusa okusobola okutuukiriza ebisuubirwa bino.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal, lutim biacara tye ka niang ber pa luticgi. Kit ma lworo I kom ber bedo I gang tic tye kamede kwede, dul mapat-pat omyero gulok kitgi me cobo miti magi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka lolo, ejenete ibiasaran ajokis naka aijar naka eswamak. Kwape iyata aiyalongongo kanu ayuara na aswam, ekot iriongeta aijulakin kanu aitodolikin aomisio nu.
lgg_prompt: A'bala ewu andruri ma alea, tujari eyi curu'do orodri azi'ba eyini aa'zu muke ri ma e'yo ega. E'yo asi otiza e'yo agei tema ni pari azia 'diyi ma dria ri ni mu drile turia, le amuti eyi ma oja eyi e'yo eyi 'yezu eyini ani e'yo 'dile 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana, abashuubuzi beyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'okureeberera abakozi baabo. Ahabw'okugira ngu okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda aha mirimo nikuguma nikweyongyera, ebitongore bishemereire kukora empindahinduka kwenda kuhikiiriza ebyetengo ebi.

eng_prompt: As the global health crisis escalated, many countries implemented strict travel restrictions to curb the spread of the virus. This has left numerous Ugandans who sought better opportunities overseas in a precarious situation.
lug_prompt: Ng'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu mu nsi yonna bweyongera, ensi nnyingi zaassaawo obukwakkulizo obw'amaanyi ku ntambula okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Kino kirese Bannayuganda bangi abanoonya emikisa emirungi mu nsi z'ebweru mu mbeera etali nnungi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko me yot kom omedde I wilobo, lobe mapol guketo kigeng matek tutwal I kom wot me gengo nya pa two eni. Man oweko anywali me Uganda mapol ma gucito ka yenyo gum me tic I lobo ma woko gubedo I kwo matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor ationis naka angaleu naka akwap kere, apotu akwapin nuipu kikisilasi alosit kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona. Ejalakinit ngin itunga luipu luko Uganda luakoto arerengesio nuajokak kakwapin nukokinga ejautene loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi wudrikurusiri ni tuzurisi, kari karakara eyi 'ba azita acita ma dria okporu 'diyi azo 'da ma ereta atrizu. E'yo 'di ku 'ba Ugandani karakarau drileba muke ndeni 'diyi ndapi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara omu nsi yoona ku bwayeyongyeire, amahanga maingi gakataho obukwakurizo bw'okutambura okubaasa kuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko. Eki kireesire abanya Uganda baingi abarikuronda emigisha emirungi aheeru y'eihanga omu mbeera y'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the company's financial situation, the business owner decided to make significant changes. As a result, all contracts were terminated by the business owner.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku mbeera ya kampuni ey'ebyensimbi, nnannyini bizinensi yasalawo okukola enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi. N'ekyavaamu, endagaano zonna zaasazibwamu nnannyini bizinensi.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom kit ma dul ne tye kwede I lok kom lim, rwed biacara ne omoko tamme me kelo aloka-loka madongo. Macalo adwogi ne, rwod biacara ojuko tic weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok ejautene loka ikapun loka ekampuni, abu elope ebiasara koseu aswam aijulanakineta nuepolok. Kanuka ngun, abu elope ebiasara kikisa aswamisinei kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amuti ma e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, tujari ma e'ini asi 'du e'yo ojata okporu 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, ꞌba tujara ma eꞌiruri atri kontrakiti dria yi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza embeera ya kampuni omu by'empiiha, mukama waayo akasharamu kukora empindahinduka z'amaani. Ekyarugiremu, konturakiti zoona zikashazibwamu mukama wa bizinesi.

eng_prompt: To foster a healthier work environment, the company is implementing new wellness initiatives. As part of this effort, employees are encouraged to take leave in order to improve their health.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula embeera y'emirimu ennungi, kampuni eteeka mu nkola enteekateeka empya ez'ebyobulamu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakozi bakubirizibwa okufuna oluwummula okusobola okulongoosa obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me yot kom I gang tic, dul ne tye ka keto yub manyen me gwoko yot kom itic. Macalo but yub man, kicuku cwiny lutic me kwanyo yweyo pi yubu yotkom gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aiboisit najokan naka aswam, euta ekampuni aitegear iponesio luitetiak luka angaleu. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, isinyikokitai eswamak aiyengun kanu aitojokar angaleukec.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza alata be ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti nde ni otita o'diru e'yo alata ni 'diyi 'ye. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba ai azi'ba eyi lifu 'duzu eyini ani eyi ma rua ala otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho embeera nungi y'emirimo, kampuni eriyo neekora enteekateeka nsya y'eby'amagara marungi. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, abakozi nibahigwa kutwara ekihuumuro kugira ngu batunguure amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: After months of declining morale and increasing pressure from management, the atmosphere at the radio station became unbearable. In a meeting to discuss their concerns, the staff reached a unanimous decision about their future.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukendeera kw'empisa n'okunyigirizibwa okuva mu bakulembeze, embeera ku leediyo yafuuka etali ya kugumiikiriza. Mu lukiiko lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga zaabwe, abakozi baatuuka ku kusalawo okw'awamu ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me poto pa cwiny dano kacel ki lyeto madit ma aa ki bot ludito tic, kabedo me rediyo ne odoko tek tutwal. I kacoke me nywako lok I kom peko gi, lutic gumoko tam acel I kom anyimgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aibiror naka iponesio luka itunga keda aiyalongong kanejaas eyaitene, abu ejautene kositeseni loka eredio koraun loetiono aiting. Kotoma airiamunet naka aitemitem atiokisio kec, apotu eswamak kopedosi aitolomun aomisio nuikamunitos oingaren kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani 'ba eyi ma adriza ma omgbo esizu azini okpo driceza ni ri ma omgbo ni tuzu 'bori ma vutia, angu rediyo 'da ma alea ri eca ewaru. Mitingi azi'ba eyini e'yo eyi ma dria ri ma alea, eyi esu e'yo eyi ma ewu drialeri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukyendeera kw'emitwarize hamwe n'okugyemeserezibwa kw'abebembezi, embeera aha reediyo ekaba etarikwikirizibwa. Omu rukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha nshonga zaabo, abakozi bakasharamu kimwe aha by'omumaisho gaabo.

eng_prompt: The pandemic has had a profound impact on the global economy, leading to widespread business closures and reduced consumer spending. As a result, countless companies have been forced to downsize or shut down entirely.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bbunansi kikosezza nnyo eby'enfuna by'ensi yonna, ekiviiriddeko okuggalwa kwa bizinensi n'okukendeera kw'ensaasaanya y'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, kampuni nnyingi ziwaliriziddwa okukendeeza ku mutindo oba okuggalawo ddala.
ach_prompt: Poto pa gemo eni okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I tenge me lim I wilobo kulu, ma oweko kiloro biyacara mapol dok bene odwoko piny wel cente ma dano tiyo kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat mapol ki diyo gi me dwoko piny wel luticgi onyo loro ticgi.
teo_prompt: Amuna adeka naka ekorona noi nuka ikapun kotoma akwap kere, ido abu koyangau agolokinio naka ibiasaran keda aitidisiar aitosom ikapun. Kanuka ngun, aponi kobuikinai ikampunin luipu aitidisiar eswamae kec arai bo agolokin kes kere.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri eza e'yo robia esuzu wudrikurusiri ra, erini fezu tujari eyi ma ti opizu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, amuti karakara eyi omvi eyi ma kalafe ra kaniku eyi opi eyi ma ti ci.
nyn_prompt: Endwara ruranda nsi eteganiise munonga eby'entaasya y'ensi yoona, ekirikureetera abantu baingi kukinga bizinesi n'okutuubya aha nshohoza yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni nyingi zikagyemeserezibwa kukyendeeza emirimo yaazo nainga okukingaho kimwe.

eng_prompt: As the world grappled with unprecedented health challenges, companies faced a rapidly changing landscape. Many organizations struggled to adapt to new regulations and shifting consumer behaviors.
lug_prompt: Ng'ensi erwanagana n'okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okutabangawo, amakampuni gaayolekaganye n'enkyukakyuka ey'amangu. Ebitongole bingi byalwana okumanyiira amateeka amapya n'enkyukakyuka mu nneeyisa y'abaguzi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo ne tye ka lweny ki peko me yot kom ma peya otimme, dul mapat-pat gubedo ki peko me aloka-loka madit tutwal. Dule mapol onongo tek tutwal me ngiyo ki cik manyen ki kit ma luwil timo kwede jami.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda atiokisio nuka angaleu, apotu ikampunin itereikina keda aijulanakineta nuepolok noi. Apotu iriongeta luipu iswamaata kagogong kanu acamanar keda ikisila luitetiak ka aijulakin iponesio luka agwelak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni dri ciria e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi pie, okalamvu eyi esu e'yo ojapi mbeleru 'diyi. Amuti karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyi 'yezu azita o'diru 'diyi pie tualu 'ba afa ayupi 'diyi ma adriza ojapi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ensi yoona ku yaabaire erwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara, kampuni zikareeba empindahinduka y'amaani. Ebitongore bingi bikabonabonesibwa okumanyiira ebiragiro ebisya hamwe n'empindahinduka y'emitwarize y'abaguzi.

eng_prompt: Before making any land purchase, it's crucial to ensure that all legal and regulatory requirements are met. This will help you avoid potential issues down the line.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kugula ttaka lyonna, kikulu okukakasa nti ebisaanyizo byonna eby'amateeka n'ebiragiro bituukiddwaako. Kino kijja kukuyamba okwewala ebizibu ebiyinza okubaawo mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe iwilo ngom, pire tek tutwal me neno ni jami weng ma mite malube ki cik kitimo. Man bikonyi me gengo peko ma twero bino ikare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Erongo egwela alupok, ejokuna awanyun ebe itodolikinitai nu ekotoi kotoma okisila. Ingarakini ngin ijo aisac atiokisio nuepedorete alomun koingaren.

nyn_prompt: Otakaguzire eitaka ryona, ni kikuru kureeba ngu ebirikwetengwa omu biragiro byona nibihikiirizibwa. Eki nikiija kukuhwera kwetantara oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: As I was going through my daily tasks, I noticed a notification pop up on my screen. Curiosity piqued, I quickly checked to see what it was about.
lug_prompt: Nga ngenda mu maaso n'emirimu gyange egya buli lunaku, nnalaba okutegeezebwa okujja ku lutimbe lwange. Olw'okuba nnali njagala okumanya ebisingawo, nnanoonya mangu okumanya kye kyali.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza ennyonyola y'omulimu n'ebyetaago, nakitegedde nti obumanyirivu bwange tebukwatagana n'ebyo bye banoonya. Wadde nga ndi musanyufu olw'ekifo, mpulira nga siri mwetegefu kutuukiriza bye baagala.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma tic tye kwede ki jami ma mite, aniang ni ngec ma atye kwede pe rwatte ki ngo ma gitye ka yenyo. Kadi bed ni cwinya yom pi tic man, awinyo ni pe atye atera me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuikamunitos aswam keda iboro lu ekotoi, abu eong ajenun ebe mam amisiarit ka eputosi keda nu ekotos kesi. Karaida amina eong adoketait ngin, mam eong akapakina aitodolikin nu ekotos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Erini azi eceza azini afa lele 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ma esu ra kini e'yo mani 'ye 'diyi econi yi eci e'yo yini leleri be ku. Ma ni tro ovuzu ava be pari 'da ma dria ra ti, ma ega kini ma ovuni ngonde e'yo yini ega 'diyi 'yezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebirikukwata aha murimo hamwe n'ebirikwetengwa, nketegyereza ngu obukugu bwangye tiburikuhikaana n'ebibarikuronda. Oihireho okushemererwa kwangye ahabw'omwanya,nimpurira nteteekateekire kuhikiiriza ebibarikuteekateeka.

eng_prompt: Before you can start operating, there are some important steps you must take. One of the first things on your checklist is to ensure that you have all the necessary legal documentation in place.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kutandika kukola, waliwo emitendera emikulu gy'olina okugoberera. Ekimu ku bintu by'olina okusooka okukebera kwe kukakasa nti olina ebiwandiiko byonna ebyetaagibwa mu mateeka.

lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi e'doni azi ngazu ku, le mi ma 'ye e'yo azi orodriru 'diyi ci. Afa oko mini ecozu andrizu 'diyi ma azi eri ra kini mi vu kokobi azita palaa 'diyi dria ci.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the informal economy plays a significant role in the livelihoods of many individuals. However, a large portion of these enterprises operate without official registration.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, eby'enfuna ebitali bya gavumenti bikola kinene nnyo mu kweyimirizaawo kw'abantu bangi. Kyokka, ekitundu ekinene ku bizineesi zino zikola nga teziwandiisiddwa mu butongole.
ach_prompt: I Uganda, biacara ma pe jenge I kom gamente konyo tutwal I kwo pa dano mapol. Kadi bed kumeno, pol pa dul mapat-pat magi tiyo labongo cone.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejaasi ikapun luka itunga luipu keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aijar naka itunga luipu. Konye, ikampunin luipu iswamaete komam iwadikauna.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi azi okporu nga geri 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu ri ma alea. Kani si, amuti 'diyi ma kalafe angiri ni azi nga ru siza azita palaa ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, eby'entatsya ebitari bya gavumenti nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu magara g'abantu baingi. Kwonka, bingi aha bitongore ebi nibikora bitahandikisiibwe omu butongore.

eng_prompt: As individuals fleeing conflict and persecution, refugees often face numerous challenges in adapting to their new environments. It is crucial for host nations to provide support and resources to ensure their successful integration.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu ssekinnoomu abadduka entalo n'okuyigganyizibwa, abanoonyiboobubudamu basanga okusoomoozebwa kungi mu kumanyiira embeera zaabwe empya. Kya mugaso amawanga agaakyaza okuwa obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa okukakasa okwegatta kwago okulungi.
ach_prompt: Macalo dano ma ringo lweny ki aunauna, luring ayela ipol kare ginongo peko mapol ikare me ngiyo ki kabedo gi manyen. Pire tek tutwal pi lobe ma gubedo tye me miyo kony ki jami ma mite me neno ni guribbe maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape itunga lu ekerete kotoma ojie keda aiticanio, ejaas ikerai keda atiokisio nuipu noi kotoma ajenun aiboisio kec nuitetiak. Erai ibore yenepol noi akwapin nu ijaunitos kes aijaikin agangat keda iboro lu itwasamao kanu awanyun ebe epedorete kesi aimorikikin.
lgg_prompt: O'bi yini aparia e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi isuzu 'diyisi, emunyale eyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eyini aa'ria angu eyini aa'zu o'diru 'diyi ma alea. Eri orodriru kari angu 'da ma alea 'diyini atita fezu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu eyini ani aa'zu tualu kililiru beni.
nyn_prompt: Nk'abantu abarikuhunga entaro n'okuhiiganisibwa, empungi nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi omukumanyiira embeera zaabo ensya. N'eky'omugasho amahanga agarikwakiira okuheereza obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa kureeba ngu gatunga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: I just realized that my driving permit is about to expire. It's time to take care of the renewal process before I lose my driving privileges.
lug_prompt: Nakazuula nti olukusa lwange olw'okuvuga emmotoka lunaatera okuggwaako. Kye kiseera okulabirira enkola y'okuzza obuggya nga sinnafiirwa ddembe lyange ery'okuvuga mmotoka.
ach_prompt: Dong aniang ni karatac ma miya twero me dwoyo mutoka dong cok tum woko. Kare dong oromo me tic i kom yub me roco motoka ma pud peya arwenyo twero me dwoyo mutoka.
teo_prompt: Abu eong ajeni ebe ebuni apapulaka naka airenge airenge angetakin. Erai kwana apak naka aitemokin ainapeta nuka aisiteteun eringa eong atwania apedorosioka nuka airenge.
lgg_prompt: Ma esu nga lu e'yo kini ma vile kokobi mutukari ti ojizuri ma o'du 'ye i ra. Sawa ca di e'yo 'yezu e'yo ma vile driwala mutukari ti ojizu ri ma dria de nga po'di awini ma vile driwala mutukari ti ojizuri avi ku.
nyn_prompt: Naaherize kumanya ngu ekihandiiko kyangye ekirikwikiriza kuvuga kiri haihi kuhwaho. N'obwire bw'okureeberera enkora y'okugarura busya orusa rwangye rw'okuvuga.

eng_prompt: In response to the alarming rise in Ebola cases, the Ugandan government has implemented strict measures to protect public health. As part of these efforts, officials announced the closure of all borders.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweyongerayongera kw'abalwadde ba Ebola, gavumenti ya Uganda etaddewo enkola enkakali okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakungu baalangirira okuggala ensalo zonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa two ebola, gamente me Uganda oketo cik matek me gwoko yot kom pa lwak. Macalo but yub eni, lutic guwaco ni kiloro wang lobo weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ebola, etolomu apugan naka Uganda ikisila luikidioko kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisio nu, apotu eswamak kolimosi agolokinio naka ikoruo kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu okporu risi, gamete Uganda niri 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, azi'ba azi 'diyi azi e'yo angu boda ni 'diyi ma ti opizu ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba Ebola, Gavumenti ya Uganda eteireho enkora y'amaani okurinda amagara g'abantu. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, abakuru bakarangirira okukinga ensharo zoona.

eng_prompt: As families faced unprecedented challenges during the lockdown, many struggled to provide basic care and support for their children. Reports from social services indicated a worrying trend in the rise of child welfare concerns.
lug_prompt: Ng'amaka gasanga okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo mu biseera by'omuggalo, bangi baalwana okuwa abaana baabwe obuyambi obusookerwako. Alipoota okuva mu kitongole ky'eby'obulamu ziraga enkola eyeeraliikiriza mu kweyongera kw'okweraliikirira ku mbeera y'abaana.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gangi onongo peko mapol tutwal I kare ma kiloro piny, polgi onongo tek tutwal me miyo kony ki gwok ki lutino gi. Adwogi tic ma aa ki bot dul ma miyo kony bot lutino nyutu ni peko me gwoko lutino tye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kwape apotu ikalia odumutu atiokisio nuipu noi kotoma apakio nuagolitere akwap, apotu itunga luipu itereikina kanu aidar idwekec. Apotu iripotan luka erionget loka itunga itodutu ebe iyata noi aiyalongong naka aijar naka idwe.

O'duko engazu amuti e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ondrepi social services ru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza fepi e'yo anzi nyiri eyini aa'zu muke ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Patient confidentiality is a fundamental principle in healthcare that protects individuals' private information. Breaching this trust can have serious consequences for both patients and medical professionals.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma ebyama by'abalwadde musingi munene mu byobulamu ogukuuma obubaka bw'omuntu obwekusifu. Okutyoboola obwesige buno kuyinza okuba n'ebivaamu eby'amaanyi eri abalwadde n'abasawo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko mung pa latwo obedo cik ma pire tek tutwal I tenge me yot kom ma gwoko ngec pa latwo acel acel. Bal me turu gen man twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom lutwo ki lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Aiyeyea naka adekak erai ainapeta nuepolok noi nuka ayuarite akiro nuka itunga. Aibiror amuno na epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok mama ejaasi adekak keda eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma ta mbazuri eri eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma tambazu. Asi'baza 'diri nyozuri eco e'yo onzi eji 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria tualu 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: In our fast-paced, interconnected world, the importance of personal space cannot be overstated. Whether it's to recharge, reflect, or simply escape the noise, everyone craves moments of solitude.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi yaffe ey'amangu, ey'okukwatagana, omugaso gw'ekifo ky'omuntu ku bubwe tegusobola kugambibwa. Ka kibeere kuddamu amaanyi, okufumiitiriza, oba okuwona amaloboozi, buli omu yeegomba akaseera k'okubeera yekka.

teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap wok nairiamara katipet, mam epedorio aitogogong ajokis naka aiboisit naka itunganan. Arai erai kanu aisiteteun, aomoom, arai bo aisi akonye, itunga kere ekotosi apak naka aiboi bon.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, the rapid dissemination of information has become easier than ever. Unfortunately, this has led to a troubling trend where misinformation is often shared without verification.

teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, epatana aiwe akiro katipet adepar kapakio nukokau. Nukaiturur, eyangau na ationis na akiro nuka aisab aimor komam aingic.

eng_prompt: Before you consider applying for a loan, it's important to understand the bank's policies. Many financial institutions have specific requirements for borrowing, including the necessity of having an account with them.

ach_prompt: Mapwod pe itamo I kom penyo pi den, pire tek tutwal me niang cik me beng. Dul me lim mapol tye ki jami ma mite pi deno lim, man kwako bedo ki akaunt botgi.
teo_prompt: Erongo ijo iwomoom nu ailip eloni, ejokuna amisiikin ainapeta nuka aingadis naka ikapun. Atukona nuipu nuka ikapun ejaas keda iboro lu ekotoi kanu aijaun ilonin, aimoriarit ebe ibusakinit jo ajaut keda akaunt keda kes.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, attracting and retaining top talent is more important than ever. One key factor that can influence an employee's decision to stay with a company is the availability of comprehensive benefits.

teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aswamisinei lolo, ajokunar noi aitelekaar itunga luejaasi keda atalanta. Adiopebore naepol noi naepedori aingarakin eswaman asalakin keda ekampuni ngesi ajaut naka ameda.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing safety concerns and rising health risks, local authorities have implemented emergency measures. As a result, businesses in the city centre have been told to close until further notice.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote financial inclusion and enhance consumer protection, regulatory authorities have initiated discussions with major service providers. As a result, banks and telecom companies have been told to reduce fees on digital transactions.

teo_prompt: Iswamai aingadis naka ikapun aswam naepol noi kowai lo aidar ainapakina keda ainapakina naka ikapun. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, itemonokini ngesi ikisila ka aimaniman iriongeta lu ikapun lu iswamaete kotoma akwapuwok.
