lug_prompt: Olw'embeera etasuubirwa, kkooti esazeewo okukyusa enteekateeka yaayo. N'ekyavaamu, omulamuzi yalangirira okuggalwa kw'olunaku nga bukyali.
ach_prompt: Pi jami ma otimme atura, court ongolo ni myero gulok yubgi. Macalo adwogi ne, langol kop ne owaco ni kiloro nino ne con.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ejautene lomam ewanyunitai, abu ekooti kicorak ainapeta ke. Kanuka ngun, abu ekatubon kolimo ebe ebuni aparan ngin agolokin sek.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma e'yosi, dwani asi e'yo 'du sa'wa erini 'diyi ojazu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo lipiri azi o'du 'da ma ti opizu drioru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera etarabeireho, kooti eshaziremu kuhindura aha ntebeekanisa yaayo. N'ekyarugiremu,omuramuzi akarangirira ngu eizooba rikakingwa bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: Due to the high-profile nature of the case, strict security measures have been implemented. As a result, access to the courtroom will be severely limited.
lug_prompt: Olw'omutindo gw'omusango guno, eby'okwerinda ebikakali biteekeddwawo. N'ekinaavaamu, okuyingira mu kkooti kujja kukendeera nnyo.
ach_prompt: Pi lok man ma pire tek tutwal, ki keto cik matek tutwal me gwoko kuc I tic. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo me donyo I ot kot bibedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanuka epone loepol noi loka emusago kangol, aponi ibwaikinai ainapeta nuka ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, eponio aitikitik noi alomar okooti.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'di ma e'yo onzi 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba 'ba e'yo ageyitema ni okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, muzu pari dwaniniri ma alia ri ni nga ovu ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu omushango gukaba guri ogw'amaani, hatandikirweho enkora y'amaani y'eby'okwerinda. N'ekyarugiremu, okuhika omu kooti nikwija kukyendeera munonga.

eng_prompt: The backlog of cases in our court system has reached an alarming level. As a result, the efficiency of our legal proceedings is suffering significantly.
lug_prompt: Omugejjo gw'emisango mu kkooti zaffe gutuuse ku ddaala eryeraliikiriza. N'ekivuddemu, obwangu bw'emisango gyaffe bukendedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: Wel pido ma odong angec I kot wa dong oo I rwom ma kelo lworo tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo me tic ki cik tye ka canne tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi imusagon luejaasi toma okootiwok. Kanuka ngun, ejai ationis naepol noi kotoma ainapetawok nuka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile makata ma alia 'diyi ma ongmbo ca ongmbo asi otizaru ni ma alia. E'yo 'disi, geri amani e'yo lizani 'diyi 'yezu ri ni candi isu saaru.
nyn_prompt: Emishango erikusigara enyima omu kooti yaitu, ehikire aha rurengo rw'okwerarikirira. N'ekyarugiremu, enkora nungi y'emishango yaitu eriyo neteganisibwa munonga.

eng_prompt: As the COVID-19 outbreak escalated, governments around the world implemented strict measures to curb the spread of the virus. In response to the health crisis, many institutions faced unprecedented challenges in maintaining their operations.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe bwe kweyongera, gavumenti okwetooloola ensi yonna zaateekawo enkola enkakali okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu, amatendekero mangi gaasanga okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo mu kukuuma emirimu gyago.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma poto pa two korona omedde, gamente mapat-pat me wilobo oketo cik matek me gengo nya pa two eni. Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom, gangi kwan mapol gunongo peko mapol tutwal I gwoko ticgi.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor abwangun naka adeka naka COVID-19, apotu apuganisinei kotoma akwap kere itolomutu ikisila luitikitikete awea naka adeka. Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu, apotu iriongeta luipu odumutu atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma aidar aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo COVID-19 niri ni e'dozurisi, gamete wudrikuru ma alea ndulu 'diyi 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi azo 'da ma ereta atrizu. E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu, pari onita ni karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru ndundu eyini ecozu azi eyivile 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kwa COVID-19 ku kweyongyeire,gavumenti okwetorora ensi yoona zikataho oburyo bw'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko. Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'ebyamagara, amatendekyero maingi gakashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kukora emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the case details and ensuring all necessary documentation is complete, the legal team has decided on the next steps. To expedite the process, the court judgements can be sent to the applicants via email.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebikwata ku musango n'okukakasa nti ebiwandiiko byonna ebyetaagisa biwedde, ttiimu y'abalamuzi esazeewo ekiddako. Okwanguyiza enkola, ensala za kkooti zisobola okusindikibwa eri abawawaabira ku email.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok matut I kom lok ne ki neno ni coc weng ma mite dong otum, dul pa lupilida gumoko tam gi I kom ngo ma omyero gutim. Me tyeko tic eni oyot, kitwero cwalo tam pa court bot joo ma cwalo koko gi kun gitiyo ki email.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuikamunitos emusago ka awanyun ebe adaun aiwadikaeta kere, aseutu etimu loka ikisila nu ebeit aswam. Kanu aisunyakin ainapeta ngun, epedorio aijukar etube lo adieket mama ejaasi ngul lu ilipitos kolago.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria kesi ma dria 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini ndrezu kini kokobi dria lele 'diyi de 'bo 'bori ma vutia, amuti azitani 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo drile ri ma dria. ꞋBani eꞌyo ꞌyezu mbele mbele, ꞌba eco eꞌyo ꞌbani li makata ma alia ꞌdiyi ma ti idri ꞌba waraga sipi ꞌdiyi dri geri emailniri vusi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma ebirikukwata aha mushango n'okureeba ngu ebihandiiko byona ebirikwetengwa bihwaire, tiimu y'abanyamateeka eshaziremu ekyokukora. Okuhanguura omurimo,ebirugire omu kooti nibibaasa kwoherezibwa aha email.

eng_prompt: After months of gathering evidence and consulting with his attorney, he finally felt ready to present his case. The deadline for filing was approaching, and he knew it was time to take action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyezi ng'akungaanya obujulizi n'okwebuuza ku munnamateeka we, yawulira nga mwetegefu okuwaayo omusango gwe. Nsalesale w'okujulira yali anaatera okutuuka era yali akimanyi nti kye kiseera okubaako ky'akolawo.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me coko caden ki lok ki lapilida ne, lacen en owinyo ni etye atera me miyo adot mege. Nino me agiki me coc ne onongo dong cok, dok en onongo ngeyo ni kare dong oromo me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aituk ajenanut ka aingitun epulidake, abu ngesi kopup ebe ekapakina aitodiar emusago ke. Ajai apaarasia nuka awasia nuka aijukar apapulai, ido ajeni ngesi ebe erai apak naka aswam ibore.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu azini e'yo ozizu eri vile 'ba e'yo lipiri be 'bori ma vutia, eri asizu ama i ngonde e'yo nzezu. O'du asizuri 'bani e'yo siza 'yezuri ri ni ecaria ogogo, azini eri nii kini sawa ca 'di e'yo 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okurundaana obujurizi n'okwebuuza ahari ba puriida be, ahamuheru akahurira ayeteekateekire kworeka omushango gwe. Ebiro by'ahamuheru by'okuheerezayo ebihandiiko bikaba biri haihi kuhika, kandi akaba naamanya ngu n'obwire bw'okukora.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments, the legal community was abuzz with speculation about potential changes in the judicial process. As tensions rose, the chief justice convened an emergency meeting to discuss the implications of the new presidential directives.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko awo, bannamateeka babadde bateebereza ku nkyukakyuka eziyinza okubaawo mu nkola y'ekiramuzi. Obunkenke bweyongera, ssaabalamuzi yayita olukiiko olw'amangu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bikwata ku biragiro bya pulezidenti ebipya.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, lupirida gubedo ki byek me aloka-loka I yub me ngolo kop. I kare ma lworo omedde, langolkop madit olwongo kacoke me atura me nywako tam I kom adwoki pa cik manyen pa ladit lobo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, apotu itunga luka ikisila kopodokisi aomisio nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuepedorete atakanun kotoma okisila. Neyatakinor atiokisio, abu atubon loapolon onyarau airiamun na engeso kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aicoreta nuitetiak nuka lokapolon akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, ongulumu 'ba e'yo li'baa 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ri asi otiza be e'yo ojata ecopi 'yepi e'yo liza ma alia 'diyi ma dria. Erita ako ni turia, 'ba e'yo lipiri omve mitingi mbeleru e'yo nzezu e'yo azita purezidenti ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka eyabaireho obwahati, abanyamateeka bakaba nibateekateeka aha mpindahinduka ezirikubaasa kubaho omu nkora y'oburamuzi. Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire, omuramuzi omukuru akeeta orukiiko rw'ahonaaho kuhanuura aha biragiro bya purezidenti ebisya.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain public safety and order, various levels of government establish a framework of laws and guidelines. As part of this framework, local governments are tasked with the critical role of enforcing regulations.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma obukuumi n'obutebenkevu bw'abantu, emitendera gya gavumenti egy'enjawulo giteekawo enkola y'amateeka n'ebiragiro. Nga ekitundu ku nkola eno, gavumenti z'ebitundu ziweereddwa omulimu omukulu ogw'okussa mu nkola amateeka.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko ber bedo ki ber bedo pa lwak, rwom pa gamente mapat-pat keto cik mapat-pat. Macalo but yub man, gamente me tedero tye ki tic mapire tek me keto cik itic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar ayuara keda ainapakina naka itunga, iswamaete apuganisinei nuegelegela ikisila keda ainapeta. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ijaikitai apuganisinei nu okwap aswam naepol noi naka aitup ikisila.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma tambazu kililiru, gamete esele ndundu 'diyi azita eyi o'ba. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba fe azi gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi dri azi okporu azita eyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kurinda obusingye n'obutebekana omu bantu, gavumenti z'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe nizikora ebiragiro n'ebiragiro. Nk'emwe aha nkora egi, gavumenti z'ebyanga niziheebwa omurimo gw'amaani gw'okuta ebiragiro omu nkora.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent surge in health concerns, the government has finalized a set of updated guidelines. These measures aim to enhance public safety and well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera gyebuvuddeko, gavumenti emalirizza okuteekawo ebiragiro ebipya. Ebintu bino bigendererwamu kutumbula eby'okwerinda n'obulamu obulungi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa peko me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki, gamente otyeko kati ki cik manyen mapat-pat. Yub magi tye pi ilo malo rwom me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo naka angaleu, adau apugan aitolomun aicoreta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka iboro kalu erai aitojokar ayuwara keda aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba azita o'diru 'diyi 'bo. E'yo 'dile 'diyi lezu o'bi yi ma ageitema azini aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eherize kutaho ebiragiro ebisya, ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire. Ebiragiro ebi bigyendereire kutunguura ebyokwerinda n'amagara marungi g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, government officials convened to discuss necessary measures. After extensive deliberation, the president decided it was time to take decisive action for public safety.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, abakungu ba gavumenti baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kyetaagisa. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, pulezidenti yasalawo nti kye kiseera okubaako ky'akolawo ku lw'obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic pa gamente gubedo ka lok i kom ngo ma omyero gutim. Ingee tam matut, ladit lobo omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me timo gin mo pi ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luka apugan iriamunos kanu aitemitem nuibusakinit aswam. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, abu lokapolon akwap koseu ebe erai kwana apak naka aswam kagogong kanuka ayuwara naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo egaza angiri ma vutia, prisdent 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo e'yo 'duzu okporu o'bi yi ma agei tema ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, abakuru omu gavumenti bakashutama kuhanuura aha bintu ebirikwetengwa. Ahanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, omwebembezi w'eihanga akasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okukora eky'amaani ahabw'okwerinda kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: As the number of infections continues to rise, the strain on healthcare resources has become increasingly evident. It is crucial for everyone to understand their role in combating this public health crisis.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abakwatibwa obulwadde bweyongera okulinnya, okunyigirizibwa kw'ebikozesebwa mu byobulamu kweyongedde okweyoleka. Kikulu nnyo buli omu okutegeera omulimu gwe mu kulwanyisa obuzibu buno obw'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ka nongo two tye ka medde ameda, peko me kony me yot kom bene tye ka medde ameda. Pire tek tutwal pi dano weng me niang tic gi me lweny i kom peko me yot kom eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga lu edekasi adekasinei, epol noi ationis naka iboro lu amukian. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanginitunganan amisiikin aswamukec kotoma aitiji adeka naka angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo esupi 'diyiniri ni mu drile turia, e'yo ewaru afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi ma dria ri eca e'da angiri. Eri orodriru 'ba dria ni azi yini a'di 'dizu e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'di be ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu abarikukwatwa akakooko nigugumizamu kweyongyera, n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara bweyongyeire. N'eky'omugasho munonga buri omwe kwetegyereza omurimo gwe omu kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: It's important to consider the context and challenges we are facing right now. Many factors are at play that may influence the situation you're experiencing.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okulowooza ku mbeera n'okusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo mu kiseera kino. Waliwo ebintu bingi ebiyinza okubaako kye bikola ku mbeera gy'oyolekaganye nayo.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me niang ngo matye katimme ki peko ma watye kwede kombedi. Tye jami mapol ma twero kelo peko ma itye ka kato ie.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom nuikamunitos ejautene keda atiokisio nu itereikina keda oni kopana. Ipu iboro luepedorete aitodolikin ejautene lo ijatatar ijo.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo amani esu sawa 'disi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. E'yo karakara eyi eco fe e'yo mini esu 'di ni ecazu eyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okureeba embeera n'oburemeezi obu turikushanga hati. Hariho enshonga nyingi ezirikubaasa kureetaho embeera ei orikurabamu.

eng_prompt: Before proceeding with any plans, it's crucial to consider the legal implications of your decisions. Always prioritize compliance to avoid potential consequences.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kugenda mu maaso n'enteekateeka yonna, kikulu okulowooza ku biyinza okuva mu kusalawo kwo mu mateeka. Bulijjo mukulembeze okugondera amateeka okwewala ebiyinza okuvaamu.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icito anyim ki yub mo keken, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwoki pa tam ma imoko malube ki cik. Pol kare ter lubu cik macalo gin ma pire tek me gengo adwogi ne.
teo_prompt: Erongo ijo inyikokinit aitemonokin idiobore, ibusakinit ijo aomoom nuikamunitos ikisila luka aseunetekon. Isingarenit duc aitup ikisila kanu aitikitik atiokisio nuepedorete alomun.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi mu drile otita azini be ku, eri orodriru mini e'yo mini pe 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Le mi ma 'du e'yo azita vuti obiza niri sa'wa driasi e'yo ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Otakatandikire enteekateeka yoona, n'eky'omugasho kumanya ebirikubaasa kuruga omu kucwamu kwawe. Buriijo kwebembeza okukuratira ebiragiro okwetantara ebirikubaasa kurugamu.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the proposed solutions, we ensured that each option aligns with current regulations. Our legal team has reviewed the suggestions thoroughly to confirm compliance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza n'obwegendereza ebyateesebwako, twakakasa nti buli kimu kikwatagana n'amateeka agaliwo. Ttiimu yaffe eya bannamateeka yeekenneenyezza bulungi ebiteeso okukakasa nti bigobererwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom yoo mapat-pat makimiyo, waneno ni yoo acel-acel tye malube ki cik matye kombedi. Dul pa lupirida megwa gukwedo tam ma kimiyo maber tutwal me moko ni lutela tye ka lubu cik.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos iwaitin luitemokinitai, apotu sio awanyutu ebe iswamaete ngun kotupitete ikisila lu ejaas. Apodokinit etimuwok loka ikisila aomisio ngun ejok kanu aanyun ebe etupitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lele 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, ama ne ra kini e'yo dria yi eci azita sawa 'disi 'diyi be. Amuti amavile 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ma ale andri egata 'da eyi ma ale kililiru eyini ani e'yo 'da ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebyateirweho, tukareeba ngu buri ky'okukora nikihikaana n'ebiragiro ebiriho obwahati. Tiimu yaitu y'eby'ebiragiro ekashwijuma kurungi ebiteiso, okureeba ngu nibikuratirwa.

eng_prompt: As businesses adapted to unprecedented challenges, they began to explore innovative approaches to maintain productivity. This shift in mindset led to the emergence of new ways of working during the pandemic.
lug_prompt: Bizinensi bwe zaatandika okukolagana n'okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo, zaatandika okunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'obuyiiya ez'okukuuma ebivaamu. Enkyukakyuka eno mu ndowooza yaleetawo engeri empya ez'okukola mu kiseera ky'ekirwadde bbunansi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma biacara ocako timo jami mapat-pat matye katimme I kare-ni, gucako yenyo yoo manyen me timo biacara. Alokaloka man okelo yoo manyen me tic ikare me poto pa gemo.
teo_prompt: Kwape apotu ibiasaran kojenutu atiokisio nuetioko, apotu kesi kogeutu aimo iwaitin luitetiak lu iswamaere iboro. Apotu aijulanakineta ngun koinakisi iponesio luitetiak luka aswam kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Tujura eyini e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, eyi e'do geri o'diru 'diyi onda eyini ani afa eyi edezu ri ma tambazu. Ojata egata ma alia 'diri fe geri azi ngazu o'diru 'diyi e'dozu sawa azo 'dezanirisi.
nyn_prompt: Obu bizinesi zaabaire nizihikaana n'oburemeezi, zikatandika kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okukora emirimo yaazo. Empindahinduka omu miteekateekyere ekareetaho emiringo misya y'okukoreramu omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and mounting legal fees, the parties involved were eager to find a resolution. In a last-ditch effort to avoid a lengthy trial, the lawyer requested the judge to settle the case outside the court.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'enteeseganya n'okweyongera kw'ebisale by'amateeka, enjuyi ezaali zikwatibwako zaali zeesunga okufuna eky'okugonjoola. Mu kaweefube asembayo okwewala okuwozesebwa okuwanvu, munnamateeka yasaba omulamuzi okugonjoola omusango wabweru wa kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me winye ki mede pa wel cul me cik, dul mapat-pat matye I lok ne onongo tye ki miti me nongo yoo me cobo peko ne. I tute matek tutwal me gengo pido ma tero kare malac, lapilida olego langol kop me tyeko pido ne woko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda aiyatakin etiai loka ikapun luka ikisila, apotu ipatei luimoriaritos kopedosi adumun epone loka aitemokin ngun. Kotoma aswamisioit naka awasia naka aisac apupio na apak naepol, abu epulida kilip atubon aitemokin emusago kokinga na adieket.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu 'bori ma vutia azini aje 'ba azita palaa 'diyi ma ongmbo tuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi asi driasi e'yo nde ma aza kozu. Okpo asizuri lezu e'yo liza ezu ri atrizu, 'ba e'yo lipiri a'i 'ba e'yo lipiri kesi 'da otuzu koti'a si amve.
