eng_prompt: Many parties involved in a dispute seek resolution through mediation to avoid the uncertainties of a trial. One of the key benefits of this process is that it encourages open communication and honest dialogue.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abeenyigira mu butakkaanya banoonya okugonjoolwa nga bayita mu kuteesaganya okwewala obutali bukakafu bw'okuwozesebwa. Ogumu ku miganyulo emikulu egiri mu nkola eno kwe kuba nti ekubiriza empuliziganya ey'amazima n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amazima.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma gitye I telle giyenyo yoo me tyeko lok I kingi wek pe gubed ki akala-kala ikare me pido. Ber pa yub man obedo cuku cwiny dano me lok kacel ki lok ada.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu luejaasi toma ongunget ekotosi aitemokin ationis ngin kowai lo aitemokin kanu aitikokin atiokisio nuka emusago. Adiopet kotoma ajokisio nuepolok nuka ainapeta ngun ngesi ebe isinyikokini ngin einer kopone kaloejok ka aineranara.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara e'yo eyi ma alea 'diyi le e'yo eyi ma aza ko geri 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi si eyini ani e'yo ewaru e'yo liza ma alea 'diyi esuzu ku. Orodri okporu e'yo 'di ma alia 'diyi ma azi eri kini eri e'yo nzeza ngmboru azini agbatara e'yo ada be 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikwejumba omu ntongane nibaronda oburyo bw'okuzihaho barikurabira omu kutabaganisamu kwenda kwetantara oburemeezi bw'okuhurira orubanja. Omwe aha migasho y'omuringo ogu n'okugira ngu nigureetaho empurizagana n'okuhanuura omu mazima.

eng_prompt: In order to reach a mutually agreeable resolution, the involved parties must engage in open negotiations. Finding common ground is essential for avoiding a lengthy legal battle.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuuka ku ky'okugonjoola buli omu ky'akkiriziganyaako, enjuyi ezikwatibwako zirina okuteesa mu lwatu. Okufuna enzikiriziganya kya mugaso okwewala entalo z'amateeka empanvu.
ach_prompt: Me cobo peko ma dano weng owinye I komgi, dul mapat-pat matye I lok ne omyero gubed ki winye I kingi. Nongo yoo me winye pire tek tutwal me gengo lweny ma tero kare malac I kot.
teo_prompt: Kanu adolokin aitemokinet na acamanara, ekot itunga kere luejaasi toma aitolot ipegeta. Adumunun acamanara erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik ejie loepol noi loka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Bani ecozu e'yo otuzu yi ma eselea ra, le 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma e'do e'yo nze e'yo 'ba dria ma eselea. E'yo ti icita ni 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru a'di 'diza azita palaa 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga oburyo bw'okugarukamu oburikwikirizana, enjuyi ezirikukwatwaho zishemereire kuteesa butunu. Okushanga enshonga z'okwikirizamu n'eky'omugasho okwetantara entaro z'ebiragiro ezirikumara obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: In many conflict resolution processes, mediation is encouraged as a first step. This approach aims to foster communication and understanding between the involved parties.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola nnyingi ez'okugonjoola obukuubagano, okutabaganya kukubirizibwa ng'omutendera ogusooka. Enkola eno egendereddwamu okutumbula empuliziganya n'okutegeeragana wakati w'abo abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: I yub mapol me tyeko telle, kicuku cwiny dano me kube macalo yoo me acel. Yub man tye ki miti me kelo lok ki niang ikin joo matye ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuipu nuka aitemokin ingungeta, isinyikokitai aimorikikin kwape ainapeta nusodit. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar einer keda apuponoro kiding itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eka e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea ri paale okori ru. Geri 'di lezu e'yo nzeza azini vata ma omgbo otuzu 'ba e'yo 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'okushoborora entongane nyingi, okugarukanisa nikugyemeserezibwa nk'omuringo gw'okubanza. Enkora egi negyenderera okureetaho empurizagana n'okwetegyerezana ahagati y'abantu abu kirikukwataho.

eng_prompt: Mediation offers a unique approach to resolving disputes, focusing on collaboration rather than confrontation. Unlike traditional court proceedings, where a judge makes the final decision, mediation allows the parties to reach a mutually agreeable solution.
lug_prompt: Okutabaganya kuwa enkola ey'enjawulo mu kugonjoola enkaayana, okussa essira ku kukwatagana okusinga okulwanagana. Okwawukanako n'emisango gya kkooti eyabulijjo, omulamuzi mw'asalawo, okutabaganya kusobozesa enjuyi okutuuka ku ky'okugonjoola buli omu ky'akkiriziganyaako.
ach_prompt: Laro lok obedo yoo acel me tyeko telle, keto cwiny I kom ribe me kaka lweny. Ka iporo ki pido me kot macon, kama langol kop moko tam me agiki, laro lok weko joo matye ikin gi cobo peko ma winye i komgi.
teo_prompt: Aitolomio einakinit epone loitegelikina loka aitemokin ingungeta, apodokinit aimorikikina itia ingungeta. Keda imusagon luka okooti lomojong, ne itolomuni ekatubon aseunet na awasia, ecamakinit aimorikikin itunga adolokin ationis na acamanara kesi kere.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBani eꞌyo ꞌyezu ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea Ekile e'yo dwani ni oku 'diyi le, 'ba e'yo lipiri ni e'yo asizuri 'dule, e'yo 'ba yi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea ri ni fe 'ba yi dri e'yo otuzu yi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugarukanisa abantu n'omuringo gw'omutaano gw'okushoborora entongane, ogurikworeka okukwatanisa omu mwanya gw'okurwana. Okutashushana n'emishango y'enzarwa omu kooti, ahu omuramuzi arikukwata encwamu y'ahamuheru, okugarukanisa nikuhwera enshonga kuhika aha muheru ogurikwikirizana.

eng_prompt: In many legal disputes, the resolution often leaves both parties feeling dissatisfied. As a result, parties rarely reconcile after settling these cases.
lug_prompt: Mu nkaayana z'amateeka nnyingi, ensala etera okuleka enjuyi zombi nga tezimativu. N'ekivuddemu, enjuyi tezitera kutabagana oluvannyuma lw'okugonjoola emisango gino.
ach_prompt: I tele me cik mapol, tyeko lok pol kare weko dano aryo weng bedo ma cwinygi pe yom. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat pe gi winye I nge tyeko pido magi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ingungeta luipu luka ikisila, einakini aomisioit ngin itunga kere amamut aiyalama. Kanuka ngun, mam etapit itunga aimorikikin akaulo naka aitemokin imusagon lu.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri karakara e'yo lizani 'diyi ma alia, e'yo 'bani otule ri ni fe 'ba iri 'diyi ni aa'zu ayikosi ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi e'dani eyi ma eselea e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'bori ma vutia ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu ntongane nyingi z'ebiragiro, okuhendera enshonga nikureka enjuyi zombi zitashemerereirwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu tibarikukira kugarukana bwanyima y'okumara emishango egi.

eng_prompt: Before making any legal moves, it's crucial to gather all necessary evidence. Without solid documentation, your case may not hold up in front of a judge.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kukola kintu kyonna mu mateeka, kikulu nnyo okukungaanya obujulizi bwonna obwetaagisa. Awatali biwandiiko bigumu, omusango gwo teguyinza kuyimirira mu maaso g'omulamuzi.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe itimo gin mo keken malube ki cik, pire tek tutwal me coko caden weng ma mite. Labongo coc matir, lok meggi pe twero cung I nyim langol kop.
teo_prompt: Erongo ijo iswamai nu ekisil, ibusakinit jo atukun aitogogongoret. Arai emamei apapula na abeit, mam emusago kon epedori aibwo kama ejai atubon.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di 'yeni e'yo azita palaa ku, eri orodriru afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu dria. Kokobi kililiru 'diyi kokoru, mi vile kesi econi pa so 'ba e'yo lipiri ma drilea ku.
nyn_prompt: Otakakozire kintu kyona omu biragiro, ni kikuru kurundaana obujurizi bwona oburikwetengwa. Hatariho ebihandiiko ebirikwesigwa, omushango gwawe nigubaasa kuremwa kwemerera omu maisho g'omuramuzi.

eng_prompt: After a long and contentious legal battle, parties often find themselves reflecting on their shared history. Mediation provides a space for open dialogue, allowing them to address grievances and rebuild their relationships.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olutalo lw'amateeka oluwanvu era oluliko enkaayana, enjuyi zitera okwesanga nga zilowooza ku byafaayo byazo eby'awamu. Okutabaganya kibawa omukisa okwogera mu bwesimbu, kibasobozesa okugonjoola okwemulugunya n'okuddamu okuzimba enkolagana yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny pi kare malac tutwal I kot, dul mapat-pat ipol kare nongo gitye ka tam I kom jami ma gutimo con. Laro lok miyo kare ki dano me lok, weko gi tyeko koko gi ki yubu wat ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ejie loepol noi loka ikisila, etapit duc ipatei aomoom nuikamunitos akiro nuiswamasi kesi. Aitolomio einakini kesi apak naka aineranara, ijaikini kesi aitemokin ingungeta kec ka aiduk bobo eidicanekec.
lgg_prompt: A'di 'diza e'yo liza ma alia 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi yi esu e'yo ega e'yo eyini 'ye ewu driorisi 'diyi ma dria. ꞋBani eꞌyo ꞌyezu ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma ese
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'orutaro rw'ebiragiro orw'obwire buraingwa kandi orurimu entongane, abantu nibeshanga barikuteekateeka aha byafaayo byabo. Okugarukanisa nikubareetera omwanya gw'okuhanuura, okubaasisa kukora aha kwetomboita kwabo n'okugaruka kwombeka enkoragana yaabo.

eng_prompt: In mediation, both parties engage in discussions to reach a mutually agreeable resolution. It's important to understand the financial implications of this process.
lug_prompt: Mu kutabaganya, enjuyi zombi zeetaba mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okutuuka ku ky'okugonjoola buli omu ky'akkiriziganyaako. Kya mugaso okutegeera ebiyinza okuva mu nkola eno mu by'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare me laro lok, dano aryo weng nywako lok me cobo peko ma giwinye iye. Pire tek tutwal me niang adwogi me lim ma tim man kelo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aimorikikin, itunga kere inerasi kanu adumun aitemokinet na ecamunitos kesi kere. Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin atiokisio nuka ikapun nuka ainapeta nu.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita ma alia, 'ba iri 'diyi e'yo onze e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eri orodriru e'yo robia ni e'yo 'di ma dria 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutabaganisa, abantu boona nibagaaniira, kugira ngu bahikye aha kigyendererwa ekirikwikirizana. N'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ebirikukwata ahaby'empiiha omu nkora egi.

eng_prompt: After being arrested for a serious offense, he found himself in a precarious situation. His friends and family were shocked to learn about the hefty bail amount required for his release.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukwatibwa olw'omusango ogw'amaanyi, yeesanga mu mbeera etali nnungi. Mikwano gye n'ab'omu maka ge baakwatibwa ensonyi bwe baamanya ssente nnyingi ezaali zeetaagibwa okumusumulula ku kakalu ka kkooti.
ach_prompt: Inge make pi bal madit tutwal, en onongo kwo tek adada. Lureme kacel ki lugang mege gubedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma guniang wel cente madit tutwal ma mite me bedo mabuc mawoko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na aikamanario kanuka emusago loepol noi, abu ngesi kodum akekuan toma ojautene loetiono noi. Apotu lukapaperoke keda lukokaleke koumokisi noi na ajenun ebe epol etiai loka ikapun luibusakinit alacakin ngesi kanu alacakin ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Ba obi eri 'bori ma vutia e'yo azita onyoza okporu ni ma e'yosi, eri isu i e'yo ewaru ma alia. Eri ma agyipi eyi tualu familia erivile 'diyi pie eca osutasi eyini e'yo onizu robia 'bani lele 'bani eri ofuzu azita pala ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukwatwa ahabw'ekihagaro ky'amaani, akeeshangira omu mbeera y'akabi. Banywani be hamwe n'ab'omuka ye bakatangaara kumanya esente nyingi nz'okumurekura.

eng_prompt: The legal system must prioritize timely resolutions to ensure fairness for all parties involved. When cases linger unresolved, the very essence of justice is compromised.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'amateeka erina okukulembeza okugonjoola mu budde okukakasa obwenkanya eri enjuyi zonna ezikwatibwako. Emisango bwe girema okugonjoolwa, obwenkanya buba mu matigga.
ach_prompt: Jang gamente ma doro lok me cik omyero oket cwinygi tutwalle I kom tyeko lok I kare ma mitte pi neno ni dano weng ma lok tye I komgi gunongo kony ma oporre. Ka lok odong labongo tyeko, ci ngolo kop atir pe bedo ber.
teo_prompt: Ekot ewai lo ikisila aisingarenit aitemokin atiokisio kotoma apak kanu awanyun ebe ejaas itunga kere. Arai mam itemokitai imusagon, emunarete etube loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Le geri e'yo liza ni 'diyi ma 'ba okpo e'yo eyi ma aza kozu sa'wa dria si nezu ra kini 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma esuta kililiru. Ba ka kesi eyi ma aza ko ku, e'yo liza kililiru ri ni eca ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'ebiragiro eshemereire kwebembeza okutereeza eshonga omu bwire, okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza aha bantu boona abakukwatwaho. Emishango ku erikuguma etarikushobororwa, oburingaaniza nibusiisikara.

eng_prompt: After months of deliberation and numerous testimonies, the jury finally reached a verdict. Despite the outcome, the plaintiff felt that justice had not been served.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteesa n'okuwa obujulizi obw'enjawulo, abalamuzi baatuuka ku nsala. Ng'oggyeko ebyavaamu, omuwawaabirwa yawulira nti obwenkanya tebwaweebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tam ki caden mapol, lungol kop ne dong gumoko tamgi. Kadi bed ni adwogi ne obedo ber, langol kop ne otamo ni ngolo kop atir pe otime.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aomisio keda ajenanut nuipu, apotu ikatubok kodolokisi etube. Karaida aponi kitolomunai akiro ngun, abu loetepesenitai kowomit ebe mam itodolikinitai etube loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Mba egata ma vutia azini e'yo eceza karakara 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi eca asizu e'yo liza ma dria ra. E'yo efupi ra ti, agu to'baa 'da ega kini 'ba awini e'yo li kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteekateeka hamwe n'obujurizi bwingi, abaramuzi bakahendera bahika aha kusharamu. Oihireho ebirugiremu, owahababiire akahurira ngu oburingaaniza bukaba butakozirwe.

eng_prompt: Given the severity of the charges and the defendant's declining health, the judge expressed concern about the timeline of the proceedings. As a result, the court may need to consider alternative arrangements for the upcoming hearings.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'emisango n'obulamu bw'omuwawabirwa okukendeera, omulamuzi yalaze obweraliikirivu ku biseera by'okuwulira omusango. N'ekyavaamu, kkooti eyinza okwetaaga okulowooza ku nteekateeka endala ez'okuwulira emisango egijja.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko madit tutwal makiketo I kome ki two pa ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye, langol kop onyuto lworo I kom kare me winyo lok ne. Macalo adwogi ne, court omyero otam I kom yoo mukene me winyo lok matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo epol noi loka imusagon keda angaleu naka lo iwosatai, abu atubon kitodu aiyalongongokec kanu apak naka aipup emusago. Kanuka ngun, aticepak ibusakinit ekooti aomoom nuikamunitos iponesio ice luka aipup imusagon luetupakinete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza okporu azini 'ba 'bani toleri ma rua ala ni emvizu ri ma e'yosi, 'ba e'yo lipiri ece asi otiza sa'wa 'bani e'yo erizu ri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, le koti ma ega e'yo otuta azi 'diyi ma dria e'yo erizu emupi 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'emishango hamwe n'amagara g'omuhababirwa,omuramuzi akooreka okwerarikirira aha bwire bw'okuhurira omushango. N'ekyarugiremu,kooti neebaasa kwetenga enteekateeka endiijo y'okuhurira omushango ogurikwija.

eng_prompt: After months of legal disputes and mounting tensions, the couple finally reached a breaking point. Their unresolved issues have led to a scheduled court appearance to address their differences.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'emyezi gy'obukuubagano mu mateeka n'obunkenke obweyongera, abaagalana baasembayo okutuuka ku kusasika. Ensonga zaabwe ezitannagonjoolwa zivuddeko okweyanjula mu kkooti okugonjoola obutakkaanya bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me laro lok me cik ki telle matye kamede, lunyom ne dong gu oo I tyeko lokgi. Lok meggi ma pe kityeko tyeko oweko kicwalo gi I kot me tyeko telle matye I kingi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ingungeta luka ikisila keda aiyalongong, apotu ekiliokit keda aberu ngun kodolokisi aiyengun. Akiro kec nu mam itemokitai eyangautu kesi alosit okooti aitemokin atiokisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba a'di 'diza azita palaa azini e'yo ewaru tupi tupi 'bori ma vutia, 'ba iri 'diyi ca asizu e'yo asizuri ma alia ra. E'yo eyini 'diyi ma aza ko ku ri fe eyini emuzu kotia e'yo eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okutonganira omu biragiro hamwe n'obunkenke obweyongyeire, abashwereine bakahika aha nshonga y'okuhenda. Enshonga zaabo ezitarikushobororwa, zireesireho enteekateeka y'okureebeka omu kooti kumaraho obutaikirizana bwabo.

eng_prompt: In a courtroom, various legal proceedings take place, and multiple parties present their arguments. Ultimately, it is the judge's responsibility to interpret the law and determine the outcome of the case.
lug_prompt: Mu kkooti, emisango egy'enjawulo gigenda mu maaso era abantu bangi baleeta ensonga zaabwe. Mu nkomerero, buvunaanyizibwa bw'omulamuzi okutaputa amateeka n'okusalawo ebinaava mu musango.
ach_prompt: I ot kot, pido mapat-pat me cik time dok dano mapol gi kelo lok gi. I agiki ne, obedo tic pa langol kop me gonyo cik ki moko adwogi me pido ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okooti, ipu imusagon lu ejaas, ido itunga luipu itodunitos akiro kec. Kawasia, erai aswam naka ekatubon aitetem ikisila ka aseun nuelomunete kotoma omusago kangol.
lgg_prompt: Kotia, e'yo dwani ni ndundu 'diyi pari 'du, azini 'ba karakara eyi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi e'da. Asizu, eri azi 'ba e'yo lipiri ni azita ma ale andrizu azini e'yo efupi kesi 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kooti, emishango etari emwe nekorwaho, kandi abantu baingi nibaheereza enshonga zaabo. Ekikuru munonga, n'obujunanizibwa bw'omuramuzi okuvunuura ebiragiro n'okumanya ebirikuruga omu mushango.

eng_prompt: Tensions filled the air as the crowd gathered outside the courthouse, their anxious whispers echoing off the stone walls. The atmosphere was thick with anticipation, each person wondering how the judge's decision would impact their lives.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwajjula empewo ng'abantu bakungaanidde wabweru wa kkooti, nga bawuubaala olw'okweraliikirira ku bisenge by'amayinja. Embeera yali ejjudde okweraliikirira, buli muntu yeebuuza engeri okusalawo kw'omulamuzi gye kwandikutte ku bulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Lworo omako dano mapol I kare ma gucokke woko ki I ot kot, kun gitye ka dange ki lworo I kor ot ma kiyubu ki kidi. Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal, dano weng gubedo ki ngeng I kom kit ma tam pa langol kop ne bigudo kwede kwogi.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luetukokinos kokinga na adieket opuputu aiyalongong naepol noi kotoma arwatatin nuka amoru. Apol noi aomisio nuka itunga, kanginitunganan aomoom epone loepedoria atubon aitolitol aijarakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi ga angu ma alia o'bi yini yi trazu pari dwaniniri ma aliarisi amveleru, yi ma o'duko asi otiza ni 'diyi e'doria abi oni ru 'diyi ma dria. Angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi te asi 'baza be tre, 'ba dria eyi osu e'yo 'ba e'yo lipi 'da ma dria ri ni nga eyi ma edri 'ye geri ngosi yari ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu mwanya, abantu baingi baketeerana aheeru y'enju ya kooti, barikuteera orwari aha bisenge by'amabaare. Abantu bakaba nibateekateeka munonga, buri omwe akebuuza oku okucwamu kw'omuramuzi kwabaire nikukwata aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In anticipation of the upcoming trial, our team worked diligently to gather all necessary documentation. We wanted to ensure that everything was in order to present a strong case.
lug_prompt: Nga twetegekera okuwozesebwa okujja, ttiimu yaffe yakola n'obunyiikivu okukung'aanya ebiwandiiko byonna ebyetaagisa. Twagala okukakasa nti buli kimu kikolebwa okusobola okuwaayo omusango ogw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka kuro pido matye kabino anyim, lutic wa gutiyo matek me coko coc weng ma mite. Wamito neno ni jami weng otimme wek wanong adot matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar emusago lo ebunit, apotu etimukosi kiswamata kagogongu kanu atukun apapulai kere nu ekotoi. Akoto sio awanyun ebe iswamaunitai iboro kere kanu aitodun emusago loegogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo obiza emupi ri ma egata ma alea, amuti amavileri nga azi okporu kokobi dria lele 'diyi trazu. Ale ndra ne ra kini e'yo dria 'ye i e'yo okporu 'diyi e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutegyereza okuhurira orubanja orurikwija, tiimu yaitu ekakora n'amaani kurundaana ebihandiiko byona ebirikwetengwa. Tukaba nitwenda kureeba ngu buri kimwe kibaasa kureetaho omushango gw'amaani.

eng_prompt: After numerous attempts at mediation and negotiation, both parties have reached an impasse. As a result, they have no choice but to seek a legal resolution.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugezaako emirundi mingi okutabaganya n'okuteesa, enjuyi zombi zituuse ku buzibu. N'ekivuddemu, tebalina kyakukola okuggyako okunoonya okugonjoolwa mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: Ingee temo tyeko winye ki winye tyen mapol, dul aryo weng dong gucung matek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, pe gitye ki gin atima mapat ki yenyo yoo me cobo peko eni I te cik.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitam naepol noi naka aimorikikin keda aineranara, adolokisi kesi kere ationis. Kanuka ngun, emamete kesi keda aseunet kilema aimo aitemokineta kotoma okisila.
lgg_prompt: O'bita karakara eyi 'yezu e'yo otuzu azini e'yo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti iri 'diyi esu e'yo eyi 'yepi ku 'bo. E'yo 'disi, eyivu e'yo azi 'yezu yo aga e'yo 'di ma aza kozu azita palaa.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okugyezaho emirundi mingi kutabaganisa n'okuteisa, enjuyi zombi zitungire oburemeezi. N'ekyarugiremu, tibaine ky'okukora okwihaho okuronda oburyo omu biragiro.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the evidence and considering the potential outcomes, the legal team gathered to discuss their options. They weighed the pros and cons of going to trial versus seeking a resolution through mediation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obujulizi n'okulowooza ku biyinza okuvaamu, ttiimu y'abalamuzi yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye bayinza okukikolamu. Baapima ebirungi n'ebibi by'okugenda mu kkooti oba okunoonya eky'okugonjoola nga bayita mu kuteesaganya.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo caden ki tam I kom adwogi ne, lupirida gugure me nywako tam gi. Gupimo ber ki marac me cito I kot ka iporo ki yenyo yoo me cobo peko kun gitiyo ki laro lok.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ajenanut keda aomisio nuepedorete alomun, apotu ipulidan kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem nuepedorete kesi aswam. Apotu kesi ipikakisi ajokis keda nuarokok nuka alosit aitepesen arai bo aimo aitemokinet kowai lo aimorikikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa ecetaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini e'yo ecopi yi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi oku yi agbatara gbazu e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Eyi o'bi e'yo muke azini onzi 'bani muzu dwani'a 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu geri 'ba eyi ma eselea risi.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma obujurizi n'ebirikubaasa kurugamu,abajwekyerwa bakateerana kuhanuura. Bakacondooza aha birungi n'ebibi by'okuza omu kooti hamwe n'okusherura oburyo bw'okutereeza enshonga kurabira omu kutabaganisa.

eng_prompt: The courtroom was filled with anxious murmurs as everyone waited for the proceedings to begin. The clock on the wall ticked loudly, reminding everyone of the delay.
lug_prompt: Ekisenge kya kkooti kyajjula okwemulugunya okw'obweraliikirivu nga buli omu alindirira okuwulira omusango okutandika. Essaawa ku bbugwe yakubye mu ddoboozi ery'omwanguka okujjukiza buli omu ku kulwawo.
ach_prompt: Ot kot opong ki koko matek tutwal I kare ma dano weng tye kakuru winyo lok. Cawa ma onongo tye I kor ot obedo ka dange matek tutwal me poyo wi dano weng I kom galle ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu kilelebunos kotoma adieket najaar itunga kere aidar apupio na emusago ageun. Apotu isawan luka arwatat kikonyata noi, aiitunun itunga kere nuikamunitos aiyap.
lgg_prompt: Jo dwani ni ri ga tre 'ba dria ni e'yo eriza ni e'doria. Sawa abi ma dria ri si o'duko urusi, erini 'ba dria ma e'yo egazu sawa ezaza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ekishengye kya kooti kikaijura okwetomboitwa ahabw'okwerarikirira, buri omwe arikutegyereza okuhurira omushango kutandika. Eshaaha aha kisiika ekateera munonga, ekirikwijusya buri omwe okukyerererwa.

eng_prompt: In many legal disputes, the court encourages alternative methods of resolution to alleviate the burden on the judicial system. This approach can lead to more amicable outcomes for all parties involved.
lug_prompt: Mu nkaayana z'amateeka nnyingi, kkooti ekubiriza enkola endala ez'okugonjoola okusobola okukendeeza omugugu ku kitongole ekiramuzi. Enkola eno esobola okuvaamu ebirungi eri enjuyi zonna ezikwatibwako.
ach_prompt: I lok mapol makwako cik, kot cuku cwiny dano me tic ki yoo mukene me tyeko lok me dwoko piny peko matye iwi dul ma ngolo kop. Yoo man twero kelo adwogi maber bot dano weng matye iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ingungeta luipu luka ikisila, isinyikokini ekooti iponesio ice luka aitemokin ngun kanu aitidisiar ationis naka apugan. Epedori epone lo aitodolikin ainapakina kanejaas itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri karakara e'yo liza ma alia 'diyi ma alia, dwani ni 'ba ava geri azi 'diyi ma tia e'yo otuzu e'yo liza ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo esizu. Geri 'di eco fe 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi dri e'yo yi 'yepi geri kililiru si 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu ntongane nyingi z'ebiragiro, kooti neehiga emiringo endiijo y'okuzitereeza okukyendeeza omugugu aha kitongore ky'oburamuzi. Enkora egi neebaasa kureetaho obusingye aha bantu boona.

eng_prompt: In order to resolve their ongoing dispute effectively, the parties involved must agree on a suitable approach. A key step in this process is selecting a mediator who has the relevant qualifications.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okugonjoola obutakkaanya bwabwe obugenda mu maaso obulungi, enjuyi ezikwatibwako zirina okukkaanya ku nkola esaanira. Omutendera omukulu mu nkola eno kwe kulonda omutabaganya alina ebisaanyizo ebikwatagana.
ach_prompt: Pi tyeko laro lok matye kawot anyim gi maber, dul mapat-pat matye iye omyero guwinye i kom yoo maber. Yo acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo yero lalar lok matye ki ngec ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin engunget lo elosi akonye ejok, ekot itunga kere acamanar kanu aitemokin epone lo ebeitor. Ationis naepol noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi aseun acamanar naejaasi keda apapulai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erita ako yini mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, le 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma ati geri kililiru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo okporu e'yo 'di ma alea ri eri 'ba e'yo otupi agapi ra 'diyi opezu.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kumaraho entongane zaabo omu muringo murungi, abarikukwatanisa bashemereire kwikirizana aha muringo ogurikwetengwa. Ekikuru omu nkora egi n'okuronda omutabaganya oine ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: As the proceedings began, the judge noticed the defendant looking visibly anxious and confused. He raised his hand to speak, but the words seemed stuck in his throat.
lug_prompt: Omusango bwe gwatandika, omulamuzi yalaba omuwawaabirwa ng'alabika nga yeeraliikirivu era nga atabuddwa. Yasitula omukono gwe okwogera naye ebigambo byalabika ng'ebimusibye mu mumiro.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma pido ocake, langol kop oneno ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni tye ki lworo dok wiye onywene tutwal. En oketo cinge malo me lok, ento nen calo lok ne odong I dwane.
teo_prompt: Neageuna emusago, abu ekatubon koany ebe ekuriana lo iwosatai. Abu ngesi kikwenyik akekanin kanu einer, konye esubit bala apotu akiro ngun kimakakinos akoik ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizuri ni e'doria, 'ba e'yo lipiri ndre agu 'bani toleri ni e'dazu asi otiza azini e'yo ewaru be. Eri 'du i ma dri uru e'yo nzezu, te e'yo 'da eyi e'da kile eri ma ombelea ci.
nyn_prompt: Omushango ku gwatandikire,omuramuzi akareeba orikujunaanwa arikureebeka nk'orikwerarikirira kandi arikushoberwa. Akaimutsya omukono gwe kugamba, kwonka ebigambo bikaba nibireebeka nk'ebihamiire omu mumiro gwe.

eng_prompt: The legal landscape in our country has undergone significant changes over the years. One of the most notable developments was the introduction of mediation as a formal process to resolve disputes.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'amateeka mu ggwanga lyaffe ebaddemu enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi okumala emyaka. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo ebyakolebwa kwe kuba nti abantu baatandika okuteeseganya okusobola okugonjoola obutakkaanya.
ach_prompt: Lok me cik I lobowa olokke tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec. Gin acel ma otimme ma pire tek tutwal obedo kelo yub me winye macalo yoo me tyeko telle.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda aijulanakineta nuepolok noi kotoma akwapuwok kokaru lu atuboros. Adiopet koboro luaponi kitolomunai ngesi aitolomunio naka epone loka aitemokin ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita ni kari amavileri ma alea ri isu ojata angiri eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. E'yo azi okporu tu 'diyi ma azi e'dota e'yo 'ba eselea 'diyi ma eselea geri 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru ri i.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'ebiragiro omu ihanga ryaitu ehindukire munonga okumara emyaka mingi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebikozirwe, n'okutandikaho enkora y'okugarukanisa abantu, nk'omuringo gw'okumaraho entongane.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have revealed surprising statistics about the criminal justice system. In fact, a significant portion of those labeled as offenders may not fit the traditional definition of a criminal.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kwafulumizza ebibalo ebyewuunyisa ku nkola y'obwenkanya mu bumenyi bw'amateeka. Mu butuufu, ekitundu ekinene ku abo abayitibwa abamenyi b'amateeka bayinza obutakwatagana n'ennyinyonnyola eya bulijjo ey'abamenyi b'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto lok mapol ma weko wabedo ki ngeng tutwal I kom yub me ngolo kop i kom lutim bal. Ki lok ada, pol pa jo ma kilwongogi ni lutim bal pe giromo bedo lutim bal.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit aiwadikaeta nuitegelikina nuikamunitos ewai lo etubitere ikisila. Kabeit, atutubet naepol noi naka ngul lu iwadikauna kwape abilak ikisila mam epedorete aitodolikin nuikamunitos itunga lukodwaratau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da kalafe osuta e'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi. A'danisi, kalafe angiri 'ba 'bani 'bale 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi econi aa 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea ku.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ebihandiiko ebirikutangaaza ebirikukwata ahaby'oburingaaniza. N'amazima, abantu baingi abarikwetwa abakozi b'ebihagaro, tibarikubaasa kuhikaana n'omuringo gw'abakozi b'ebihagaro.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the legal education system in Uganda has gained recognition for its rigorous training and high standards. As a result, many graduates are emerging as top legal professionals in the region.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, enkola y'ebyenjigiriza by'amateeka mu Uganda efunye okusiimibwa olw'okutendekebwa kwayo okw'amaanyi n'omutindo ogwa waggulu. N'ekivuddemu, abattikirwa bangi bavaayo nga bannamateeka abakugu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yub me pwonye me cik I lobo Uganda oywek tutwal pi rwom me pwonye ki rwom mamalo tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol ma gutyeko kwangi gitye ka aa ki I rwom me doko ludito I lok me cik I twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, adumun asioman naka ikisila ko Uganda ajenara kanu aitutuoro ka adoketaitikec naikiara. Kanuka ngun, itunga luipu lu alomunitos kosomero eraas ipirioitin lu ejokuka noi kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, onita e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma dria kari Uganda niri ma alea ri esu rukusa imbata okporu azini wura muke 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara onita univasiti niri depi 'diyi efu 'ba onita be e'yo azitani 'diyi ma dria angu 'di ma alea 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, enkora y'obwegyese bw'ebiragiro omu Uganda, emanyirwe ahabw'okutendeka kurungi n'omutindo gw'ahaiguru. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi baingi abamazire emishomo yaabo, nibarugaho nk'abakugu omu by'ebiragiro ab'omutaano omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Understanding the legal system can help individuals navigate their responsibilities and rights. By adhering to the law, one can maintain peace of mind and stay out of legal trouble.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera enkola y'amateeka kisobola okuyamba abantu kinnoomu okumanya obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe n'eddembe lyabwe. Mu kugoberera amateeka, omuntu asobola okukuuma emirembe mu birowoozo n'okwewala ebizibu by'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Niang cik twero konyo dano me niang tic gi ki twero gi. I lubu cik, ngat moni twero bedo ma cwinye opye mot dok pe donyo I peko.
teo_prompt: Amisikin nuka ikisila ingarakini itunga ajenun apedorosio kec keda apedorosiokec. Kowai lo aitup ikisila, epedori itunganan ajaut keda ainapakina kotoma ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita ni 'diyi ma vata eco 'ba yi ma aza ko azi yini azini driwala yini 'diyi onezu ra. ꞋBani azita ma vuti obizurisi, ꞌba aluni eco asi ala ma ta mba azini eꞌyo ewaru ꞌdiyi ma alia ku.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza enkora y'ebiragiro nikibaasa kuhwera abantu kumanya obujunanizibwa n'obugabe bwabo. Omuntu ku arikukuratira ebiragiro, naabaasa kuguma aine obusingye omu biteekateeko bye, reero atagwa omu kabi k'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the evidence and considering your options, it seems clear that you have a strong case. Consulting with a legal expert has confirmed that pursuing legal action may be your best course of action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obujulizi n'okulowooza ku by'oyinza okusalawo, kirabika nga kyangu nti olina omusango omunywevu. Okwebuuza ku mukugu mu by'amateeka kikakasizza nti okutwalira amateeka mu ngalo kye kintu ekisinga obulungi ky'oyinza okukola.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo caden ki tam I kom gin ma itwero timone, nen atyer kamaleng ni itye ki adot matek tutwal. Lok ki ludiro me cik omoko ni cako tic ki cik twero bedo yoo maber loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ajenanut ka aomoom nu ipedori jo aswam, esubit bala ijaasi jo keda emusago loegogong noi. Aingitun keda epirioit loka ikisila abu itigogong ebe alosit toma okisila erai aswam najokan kakere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ecetaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo mini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma egazu 'bori ma vutia, eri e'da kililiru kini mi vu kesi okporu ni ci. E'yo nzeza 'ba nita be e'yo azita ma dria angiri 'diyi pie ri ece kini e'yo 'duzu azita palaa ri eco adri e'yo mini 'ye muke ndeni ri i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma obujurizi n'okuteekateeka aha bintu ebi orikubaasa kukora, nikyoreka butunu ngu oine omushango gw'amaani. Okwebuuza aha bakugu omu by'ebiragiro nikyoreka ngu okutwara omushango omu kooti nikibaasa kuba eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: As the courtroom fell silent, the judge leaned forward, his brow furrowed in concentration. He posed a challenging question that caught the prosecutor off guard.
lug_prompt: Kkooti bwe yasirika, omulamuzi yeesigama mu maaso ng'amaaso ge gatunudde. Yabuuza ekibuuzo ekisoomooza ekyawuniikiriza omuwaabi wa gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lungol kop ne guling, langol kop ne ojenge anyim, wiye ocung matek tutwal. En openyo lapeny matek tutwal ma omako langol kop ne ki ngeng.
teo_prompt: Neililingia adieket, abu ekatubon kogeu aisingarenit, ido abu akouke kowolio. Abu ngesi kingit aingiset naetiono noi naebwounit lo ewosan.
lgg_prompt: Kotia ri ni e'deria, 'ba e'yo lipiri si i drile, eri ma ombelea ri e'da e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Eri zi zita e'yo ewaru 'dileni agu agu e'yo lipi 'diyi ma dria ri bipi osuta si.
nyn_prompt: Obu kooti yaabaire esirikirwe,omuramuzi akeegama omu maisho, obwonko bwe buketengwa. Akabuuza ekibuuzo ky'oburemeezi ekyakwatsire omuhababi w'eihanga ataine ky'okureeberaho.

eng_prompt: In a world where fairness and equality are paramount, it is essential to uphold the principles that protect individual rights. Justice should be accessible to all, regardless of their circumstances.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi obwenkanya n'okwenkanankana gye bisinga obukulu, kikulu nnyo okunywerera ku misingi egikuuma eddembe ly'omuntu. Obwenkanya bulina okutuuka ku buli muntu, awatali kufaayo ku mbeera ye.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma ngolo kop atir ki bedo marom obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal, pire tek tutwal me lubu cik ma gwoko twero pa dano acel acel. Ngolo kop alenga omyero obed tye pi dano weng labongo paro pi kit ma kwo gi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejokuna noi aitodolikin apedorosio nuka itunga, epolok noi aitogogong ikisila lu eyuaritos apedorosio nuka itunga. Ekot itunga kere adumunun etube loajokan, araida ejaasi kesi toma ojautene loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia e'yo ada azini trotroru 'diyi okporu, eri orodriru e'yo driwala 'ba alu alu 'diyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Le 'ba dria ma esu e'yo liza kililiru ri ra e'yo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza biri eby'omugasho munonga, n'eky'omugasho okugumizamu n'emisingye erikurinda obugabe bw'omuntu. Oburinganiza bushemereire kuhika ahari boona, oihiremu embeera zaabo.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, many societies have enacted regulations that prioritize control over justice. These oppressive laws often disregard the fundamental rights of individuals, leading to dire consequences.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebitundu bingi bitaddewo amateeka agakulembeza okufuga okusinga obwenkanya. Amateeka gano aganyigiriza gatera okubuusa amaaso eddembe ly'abantu kinnoomu, ekivaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, kabedo mapol guketo cik ma weko loc bedo gin ma pire tek loyo ngolo kop matir. Cik magi ma diyo dano ipol kare pe giparo pi twero pa dano, ma man kelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, etolomutu itunga ikisila lu isingarenitos apugan adepar etube loajokan. Ikisila lu lu itisilanarete itunga mam epodokinitos apedorosio nuka itunga, ido eyangaunete atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, ongulumu karakara eyi o'ba azita okpo fepi e'yo ada ma drilea 'diyi. Azita okporu 'diyi tuni drilemgbo 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi ma e'yo 'du ku, e'yo onzi yi ijipi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu baingi bateireho ebiragiro ebirikworeka ngu okwetegyeka nikukizayo oburingaaniza. Ebiragiro ebirikunyangaraza abantu, buriijo tibirikufayo aha bugabe bw'abantu, ekirikurugwamu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the evidence and considering the arguments presented by both parties, the judge has determined that the conditions for bail have been met. As a result, the bail application is acceptable in court.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obujulizi n'okulowooza ku nsonga ezaaleetebwa enjuyi zombi, omulamuzi asazeewo nti obukwakkulizo bw'okweyimirirwa butuukiridde. N'ekyavaamu, okusaba kwe okw'okweyimirirwa kukkirizibwa mu kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo caden ki tam I kom lok ma dul aryo weng okelo, langol kop omoko ni cik me bedo mabuc mawoko dong ocobbe. Macalo adwogi ne, kot twero yee kwac me bedo mabuc mawoko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aitogogongoret keda aomisio nu itolomunitos kesi kere, abu atubon kotema ebe itodolikinitai nutupitono kanu alacakinio. Kanuka ngun, ecamakitai ailip naka alacakinio okooti.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eceza ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo 'ba iri 'diyi ma tia 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri ega kini e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba ofuzu azita pala 'diyi 'ye ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo 'bani 'ba ofuzu azita pala 'diyi a'i kotia ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma obujurizi n'okuteekateeka aha nshonga ezirikworekwa enjuyi zoona,omuramuzi ashazireho ngu obukwakurizo bw'okwemerererwa buhikiiriziibwe. N'ekyarugiremu, okushaba kwemerererwa nikwikirizibwa omu kooti.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain law and order in society, it is essential to hold individuals accountable for their actions. This ensures that justice is served and deters future criminal behavior.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma amateeka n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu, kya mugaso okuvunaana abantu ssekinnoomu olw'ebikolwa byabwe. Kino kikakasa nti obwenkanya buweebwa era kikugira ebikolwa by'obumenyi bw'amateeka mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko cik ki ber bedo I kabedo wa, pire tek tutwal me neno ni dano acel acel tye ki kor tic gi. Man weko ngolo kop atir time dok gengo tim aranyi i kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar ikisila ka ainapakina kotoma atutubet, erai ibore yenepol noi aingic itunga kanu aswamisiokec. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe itodolikinio etube loajokan ka aitikitik aswamisio nuarokok koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Azita eyi ma ta mbazu ongulumu eyi ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba eyi ma aza ko e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyisi. Diri ne ra kini 'ba fe e'yo liza kililiru ri dika 'ba atri e'yo onzi eyi ma 'yeta ewu drialeri ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okurinda obusingye n'obutebekana omu bantu, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu abantu nibajunanizibwa ahabw'ebikorwa byabo. Eki nikihamya ngu oburingaaniza nibubaho kandi kizibira abakozi b'ebihagaro omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In certain situations, the law recognizes that not all individuals should face the same consequences for their actions. This can be due to various factors, such as age, mental capacity, or specific circumstances surrounding the offense.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ezimu, amateeka gakkiriza nti si buli muntu nti alina okwolekagana n'ebivaamu bye bimu olw'ebikolwa bye. Kino kiyinza okuba nga kiva ku nsonga ez'enjawulo, nga emyaka, obusobozi bw'obwongo, oba embeera ezeetoolodde omusango.
ach_prompt: I kare mukene cik moko ni pe dano weng omyero gunong adwogi ma rom pi timgi. Man twero bedo macalo adwogi me jami mapol, calo mwaka, kero me wic, onyo ngo ma otimme ikare me bal.
teo_prompt: Kojautene ice, ejenete ikisila ebe mam itunga kere ibusakinit adumun atiokisio nueputosi kanuka aswamisiokec. Aticepak erai na kanuka iboro luegelegela kwape ekaru, apedorit naka adam, arai bo ejautene loka emusago kangol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi 'diyi ma alea, azita ni ega kini 'ba dria ma esu e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyisi alurile ku. Di eco adri e'yo karakara eyi ma e'yosi ekile eli, omi ma okpo, kani ku e'yo 'bani e'yo onzi 'da 'yezu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera ezimwe, ebiragiro nibimanyisa ngu abantu boona tibashemereire kutunga ebirugyire omu bikorwa byabo. Eki nikibaasa kubaho ahabw'enshonga nyingi, nk'emyaka, obwengye, n'embeera y'omushango.

eng_prompt: After months of deliberation and numerous testimonies, the judges finally reached a consensus. Their decision was based on a thorough examination of the evidence presented during the trial.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteesa n'okuwa obujulizi bungi, abalamuzi baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya. Okusalawo kwabwe kwesigamiziddwa ku kwekenneenya n'obwegendereza obujulizi obwaleetebwa mu kiseera ky'okuwozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tam ki caden mapol, lungol kop ne dong guwinye. Gumoko tamgi malubbe ki kwed matut I kom caden ma kimiyo I kare me pido ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aomisio keda ajenanut nuipu, apotu ikatubok kodolokisi acamanar. Aponi kitutubunai aomisio kec kotupitete aingic ajenanut na ijaikitai kapak na emusago.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma egata ma vutia azini e'yo nzeza karakara 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi esu asizu e'yo azi ma dria ra. E'yo yini 'dule ri ndra e'yo afa ecetaru 'bani e'da sawa 'bani e'yo lizurisi 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteesa hamwe n'obujurizi bwingi, abaramuzi bakahendera bahika aha kwikirizana. Encwamu yaabo ekaba eyegamire aha kucondooza kurungi obujurizi obwaretsirwe omu kuhurira orubanja.

eng_prompt: In a society governed by law, it is essential to uphold justice and maintain order. Consequently, any actions that violate legal statutes are subject to scrutiny and punishment.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu abafugibwa amateeka, kikulu nnyo okukuuma obwenkanya n'obutebenkevu. N'olw'ekyo, ebikolwa byonna ebimenya amateeka bikeberebwa era ne bibonerezebwa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma cik aye doro, pire tek tutwal me gwoko ber bedo ki ber bedo. Macalo adwogi ne, tim mo keken ma turu cik ki ngiyo dok ki miyo pwod.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naeyait ikisila, ejokuna aitogogong etube loajokan ka aidar ainapakina. Kanuka ngun, adio aswamisio nu ebilibilete ikisila eponio airereonor ka alecor.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azita palaa 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo liza kililiru ri ma ta mbazu azini geri kililiru ri ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, 'yeta ci azita ma vuti obipi 'diyi e'yo eti onda azini panga esu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abarikutegyekwa ebiragiro, n'eky'omugasho kurinda oburinganiza n'obutebekana. N'ahabw'ekyo, ebikorwa byona ebirikuhenda ebiragiro nibikyeberwa kandi bibonerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Justice is essential for maintaining order in society. When individuals commit crimes, it is crucial to hold them accountable for their actions.
lug_prompt: Obwenkanya bwa mugaso mu kukuuma emirembe mu kitundu. Abantu bwe bakola ebikolobero, kikulu nnyo okubavunaana olw'ebikolwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ngolo kop atir pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kuc ki ber bedo I kabedo wa. Ka dano acel acel otimo bal, pire tek tutwal me ngolo kop iwi gi pi timgi.
teo_prompt: Ejokuna noi etube loajokan kanu aidar ainapakina kotunga. Karai iswamaete itunga imusagon, ibusakinit aitepesen kes kanu aswamisiokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza kililiru ri eri orodriru otuta ma tambazu ongulumu eyi ma alea. Ba azi 'diyi ka e'yo onzi 'ye, eri orodriru 'bani yi 'duzu e'yo yini 'ye 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Oburinganiza n'obw'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obusingye omu bantu. Abantu ku barikukora ebihagaro, n'eky'omugasho kubajunaana ahabw'ebikorwa byabo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the Ugandan government has implemented various reforms aimed at promoting peaceful electoral processes. These measures are designed to ensure that citizens can express their political views without fear of intimidation or harm.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, gavumenti ya Uganda etaddewo ennongoosereza ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula enkola z'okulonda ez'emirembe. Enkola zino zitegekeddwa okulaba nga bannansi basobola okwogera endowooza zaabwe ez'ebyobufuzi awatali kutya kutiisibwatiisibwa oba okukosebwa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, gamente me Uganda okelo aloka-loka mapol ma obedo ki miti me kelo yer maber. Yoo magi kiyubu me neno ni anywali tye ki twero me miyo tamgi labongo lworo lworo onyo awano.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etolomu apugan naka Uganda aijulanakineta nuipu kanu aitopolor aseo nainapakina. Aponi kitemokinai nu kanu aanyun ebe epedorete itunga aitodun aomisiokec nuka epolitikis komam akurianar arai aimusung.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, gamete Uganda niri 'ye ojata karakara eyini ani ecozu e'yo opetaa ni asianzuru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Ba oti e'yo 'diyi nezu ra kini kari anzi eyi eco egata eyini politiki ni 'diyi ece ori feza kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi,gavumenti ya Uganda eteireho empindahinduka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okureetaho obusingye omu by'oburuuru. Enkora egi eteirweho kureeba ngu abatuuragye nibabaasa kugamba ebiteekateeko byabo by'eby'obutegyeki bateine kutiinisibwa.

eng_prompt: After months of speculation and a thorough selection process, the government has finally made its decision. Legal experts and citizens alike eagerly awaited the announcement of the new leader of the judiciary.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteebereza n'okusunsula obulungi, gavumenti emalirizza okusalawo. Abakugu mu by'amateeka ne bannansi bombi balindirira n'obwagazi okulangirira kw'omukulembeze w'ekitongole ekiramuzi omuggya.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me byek ki yub me yero dano, gamente dong omoko tamme. Ludiro I lok kom cik kacel ki anywali me Uganda gitye ka kuro ki miti madit lok angeya pa latela manyen me dul makilwongo ni Judiciary.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aomisio keda ainapeta nuka aseo, adaun apugan aitolomun aseunetekec. Apotu ipirioitin luka ikisila keda itunga luipu idarakisi alimoret naka engarenon loitetet loka ikatubok.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo egazu azini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, gamete 'du asizu e'yo i'yezu 'bo. Ba onita be e'yo liza ma dria 'diyi tualu kari anzi eyi pie te e'yo 'bani drice'ba o'diru e'yo liza ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma e'yo si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteebereza hamwe n'okukora kurungi omu kuronda, gavumenti eherize kusharamu. Abakugu omu by'ebiragiro hamwe n'abatuuragye bategyereize okurangirirwa kw'omwebembezi w'ekitongore ekiramuzi omusya.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy legal battle, the court finally reached a decision regarding the controversial church demolition. Tensions ran high as the defendants awaited their fate, knowing that their future hinged on the outcome of the trial.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olutalo lw'amateeka oluwanvu, kkooti yatuuka ku kusalawo okukwata ku kumenya ekkanisa okwaliwo enkaayana. Obunkenke bwagenda mu maaso nga abawawabirwa balindirira enkomerero yaabwe, nga bakimanyi nti ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso byesigamye ku biva mu musango.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny me cik ma obedo pi kare malac, kot dong omoko tamgi I kom lok me muko kanica ma onongo tye ki apoka-poka. Lworo omede ikare ma ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye obedo kakuru agiki ne, kun gingeyo ni anyimgi ojenge I kom adwoki me pido ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ejie loepol noi loka ikisila, abu ekooti kodolok aseunet naikamunit aibil ekanisa. Apol noi aiyalongong naarai apotu itunga lu iwosatai idarakisi kes, ejenete ebe ejai oingaren kec kotupitete nuelomunete kotoma aipup emusago.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'di 'diza azita palaa 'diyi ma vutia, dwani asizu ca e'yo liza kanisa ma ale nyoza ma dria ra. Ngiringiri tu uru 'ba e'yo li'baa 'diyi ni e'yo yini 'diyi tezu, yini nii ra kini ewu yini ewu drialeri ni pa so e'yo efupi kesi 'da ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'orutaro rw'ebiragiro rw'obwire buraingwa, kooti ekahendera yasharamu aha bikwatiraine n'okushenya ekanisa. Obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru ahabw'abarikujunaanwa kutegyereza ebiro byabo by'omumaisho, barikumanya ngu ebiro byabo by'omumaisho bikaba nibiruga omu kuhurira orubanja.

eng_prompt: In a recent press conference, the president addressed the rising concerns about violent crime and the justice system's effectiveness. He emphasized the need for a more decisive approach to dealing with those who commit heinous acts.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire gyebuvuddeko, pulezidenti yayogera ku kweraliikirira okweyongera ku bumenyi bw'amateeka obw'effujjo n'obukozi bw'amateeka. Yakikkaatirizza obwetaavu bw'enkola ey'amaanyi ey'okukwatamu abo abakola ebikolwa eby'obukambwe.
ach_prompt: I kacokke pa luco lok angeya ma otime cokcok-ki, ladit lobo oloko I kom lworo ma tye kamedde I kom tim aranyi ki kit ma dul ma ngolo kop atir tiyo kwede. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom miti me tic matek I kom joo ma timo tim maraco.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka arotak iyemuto, abu lokapolon akwap kiner nuikamunitos abilibilio naka ikisila keda ewai lo etubitere ikisila. Abu ngesi kitogogong eipud loka aitikitik ngul luiswamaete nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi be o'diru ri ma alea, prisdent nze e'yo asi otiza tupi e'yo onzi 'yepi okporu 'diyi ma dria azini geri e'yo liza kililiru ri ni azi ngazu kililiru ri ma dria. Eri 'ba asi e'yo lezu geri okporu 'bani azi ngazu 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, omwebembezi w'eihanga akagamba aha kwerarikirira okurikweyongyera aha bikwatiraine n'obukozi bw'ebibi hamwe n'oburingaaniza omu by'oburingaaniza. Akashoboorora ekyetengo ky'okukoragana n'amaani n'abo abarikukora ebikorwa by'ekiniga.

eng_prompt: Due to a scheduling conflict, the judge decided to reassign cases to different attorneys. As a result, the lawyer has been moved to another court.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukuubagano mu nteekateeka, omulamuzi yasalawo okuwa emisango eri bannamateeka ab'enjawulo. N'ekyavaamu, munnamateeka atwalibwa mu kkooti endala.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yub, langol kop omoko tamme me cwalo pido bot lupilida mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, kicwalo lapilida ne I kot mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanuka engunget loka ainapeta, abu ekatubon koinak imusagon mama ejaasi ipulidan luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, aponi itobwotarai epulida adieket acie.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo otuzuri ma e'yosi, 'ba e'yo lipiri asi e'yo 'du kesi 'diyi fezu 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ma dria ndu ndu 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ji 'ba e'yo lipiri dwani nduni ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana omu ntebeekanisa,omuramuzi akasharamu kuhayo emishango omu ba puriida abatarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, puriida atwirwe omu kooti endiijo.

eng_prompt: In the midst of a heated election campaign, concerns arose regarding the opposition candidate's activities. As a result, the lawyers decided it was crucial to gather more information from law enforcement.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kakuyege w'okulonda ow'amaanyi, okweraliikirira kwabalukawo ku bikolwa by'omuntu eyeesimbyewo ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti. N'ekyavaamu, bannamateeka baasalawo nti kikulu nnyo okukungaanya amawulire amalala okuva mu bakuumaddembe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me bito kwi matek tutwal, lworo obedo tye I kom tic pa lucung iwi bye ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, lupirida gumoko ni pire tek tutwal me nongo ngec mapol ki bot dul ma gwoko cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuapolok nuka aseo, apotu itunga kopotu aiyalongong kanuikamunitos aswamisio nuka abwoan loka etepegak. Kanuka ngun, apotu ipulidan kotuboto ebe ejokuna noi adumun akiro nuipu kanejaas ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: Ti odaza opetaa ni okporu ri ma talasi, asi otiza efu 'yeta 'ba pa tupi amuti politiki ni kari ma dricepiri ma alea ku 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo ma aga nyapi 'diyi ega kini eri orodriru e'yo yi trazu engazu 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'ehururu y'akaruuru, okwerarikirira kukatandika aha bikorwa by'omuntu owabaire ayesimbire aha rubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti. N'ekyarugiremu, ba puriida bakasharamu ngu kikaba kiri eky'omugasho kurundaana amakuru kuruga omu b'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: After months of deliberation and careful selection, the leader finally announced the appointments. This significant move is expected to enhance the judicial system's efficiency and integrity.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteesa n'okulonda n'obwegendereza, omukulembeze yasembyeyo okulangirira abaalondebwa. Ekikolwa kino ekikulu kisuubirwa okutumbula enkola y'ekitongole ekiramuzi n'obwesimbu bwakyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tam ki yero ki diro, latela ne dong otyeko cwalo lok angeya I kom joo ma kicimo gi. Yub man ma pire tek tutwal tye ki gen me medo rwom ki ber bedo pa dul ma ngolo kop.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aomisio keda aseo, abu engarenon kolimo aseununeta ngun. Eomitai ebe ebuni aswamisioit na naepol noi aitojokar eswamae loajokan loka ikatubok.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia e'yo egazu azini 'ba opezu geri kililiru si 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba 'da azi 'ba 'bani ope 'diyi ra. Ba ega e'yo orodriru 'di ni nga geri e'yo liza ni 'diyi ma azi ngazu kililiru ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateeka n'okutoorana kurungi, omwebembezi akahendera yarangirira okurondwa. Ekikorwa eki eky'omugasho nikiteekateekwaho kutunguura enkora n'oburingaaniza omu kitongore ekirikucwera emanja.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the case details and the recent ruling, I decided that we needed to take further action. My lawyer is lodging an appeal anytime from today.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebikwata ku musango n'ensala eyaakaggwa, nnasalawo nti twetaaga okukola ekisingawo. Munnamateeka wange ajja kujulira essaawa yonna okuva leero.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok matut I kom pido ne ki ngolo kop ma okato cokcok-ki, amoko ni omyero wamedde ki timo gin mo. Lapilidana tye ka cwalo koko me apil cawa mo keken nicake tin.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuikamunitos emusago keda etube lo atubor, abu eong aseun ebe ibusakinit sio aswam nuipu. Ebeit epulida ka aijukar ailip adio apak ageun ilolo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria kesi 'da ma dria 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo liza ebipi o'diru ri pie, ma 'du asi kini le ama ma 'ye e'yo azi drile. Ma vile 'ba azitaniri nga apili 'ba sawa ciria e'dozu andru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma enshonga z'omushango hamwe n'ensharaho eherize kukorwa, nkasharamu ngu twine kukora ekindi. Puriida wangye naaza kujurira eshaaha yoona kuruga erizooba.

eng_prompt: Authorities launched an investigation after receiving reports of a potential security breach at the state capitol. The suspect was found attempting to infiltrate a high-level meeting involving key government officials.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baatandika okunoonyereza oluvannyuma lw'okufuna alipoota z'obutabanguko mu by'okwerinda mu kibuga ekikulu eky'eggwanga. Ateeberezebwa okuzza emisango yasangiddwa ng'agezaako okuyingira mu lukiiko olw'oku ntikko olwaliko abakungu ba gavumenti abakulu.
ach_prompt: Lutela gucako kwed inge nongo ripot me turu cik I gang tic madit me lobo. Kinongo ngat ma byek me bal tye I kome ni oteme me donyo I kacokke pa ludito pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio kogeutu aingic akaulo na adumun iripotan luka aibil ayuwara kotoma apolon akwap. Aponi kodumunai lo iwosatai ebe etamit alomar toma airiamunet naepol noi naka eswamak lukapolok luka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi e'do e'yo vuti ondaza ni eyi e'dozu 'bani o'duko esuzu e'yo 'bani ecozu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi onyozu aku ambo kari niri ma alea ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia. Ba esu agu 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da ri lezu fi mitingi okporu azi'ba gameteni okporu 'diyi ni ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi batandikireho okucondooza ahanyima y'okutunga ripoota z'okuhenda ebiragiro by'eby'okwerinda aha kibuga ekikuru ky'eihanga. Orikuteekateekwaho akakwatwa arikugyezaho kutaaha omu rukiiko rw'amaani orwabaire rurimu abakuru omu gavumenti.

eng_prompt: When the government fails to uphold the law, the consequences extend beyond just legal ramifications. Ultimately, the financial burden falls on the citizens who fund these legal battles.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti bw'eremererwa okussa mu nkola amateeka, ebivaamu bisukka ku mateeka. Mu nkomerero, omugugu gw'ebyensimbi gukka ku bannansi abavujjirira entalo zino ez'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Kace gamente pe oketo cik itic, adwogi ne pe bedo I te cik keken. I agiki ne, peko me lim opoto iwi anywali ma culu pi lweny me cik magi.
teo_prompt: Arai ipiko apugan aitodolikin ikisila, epol atiokisio nuelomunete. Kawasia, ejaasi itunga luka akwapuwok lueinanakinete ikapun mama ejaasi itunga luka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ka o'bi azita ma ta mba, e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi aga e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ra. Asizu, e'yo ewaru robia niri e'de kari anzi a'di 'dipi azita palaa 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ku erikuremwa kurinda ebiragiro, ebirikurugamu nibirenga aha biragiro. Omugugu gw'esente nigugwa ahari abo abarikushashurira entaro z'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In any organized society, guidelines are essential for maintaining order and harmony. They help establish expectations and promote a sense of responsibility among members.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna ekitegekeddwa obulungi, ebiragiro bikulu mu kukuuma obutebenkevu n'obumu. Ziyamba okuteekawo ebisuubirwa n'okutumbula obuvunaanyizibwa mu bammemba.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken ma oyubbe maber, cik obedo gin ma pire tek me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo. Gikonyo me keto gen ki dongo kit me tic ikin lumemba.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet na itemonokitai ejok, epolok noi aicoreta kanu aidar ainapakina keda acamanara. Ingarakinete kesi aitolomun aomisio ka aitopolorite aswam kanejaas imeban.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ci 'bani otule kililiru 'diyi ma alea, azita eyi orodriru e'yo otuza ni azini aa'ta tualu ri ma tambazu. Eyi azakoma fe e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma dria 'diyi 'bazu 'ba eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyona ekitebekanisiibwe kurungi, ebiragiro n'eby'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obusingye n'obutereera. Nizihwera omu kutaho ebirikuteekateekwaho n'okureetaho obujunanizibwa omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In discussions about educational equity, it's important to recognize the various factors that can influence a teacher's perspective. One significant concern is the potential for personal biases to affect their interactions with students.

teo_prompt: Apol noi aiyalongong kanejaas itunga kanuikamunitos iponesio luka ikapun luka ibiasaran luka atutubet. Mam itunga luipu ejenete ebe iswamaete idukai ice koipone kalo mam ekisil ecamakinit.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza e'bi ovu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea e'yo 'ba tujari 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi e'yo ega dukani azi ecopi azi ngapi azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria ku 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: It is essential for individuals and businesses to maintain accurate financial documentation. Proper record-keeping ensures compliance with tax regulations and provides a reliable reference for audits or inquiries.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso eri abantu ssekinnoomu ne bizinensi okukuuma ebiwandiiko by'ensimbi ebituufu. Okukuuma ebiwandiiko obulungi kikakasa okugobererwa kw'ebiragiro by'omusolo era kiwa ensibuko eyeesigika mu kubala ebitabo oba okubuuliriza.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki dano kacel ki biacara me gwoko karatac me lim ma tye kakare. Gwoko rekod maber weko lutic lubu cik me mucoro dok miyo ngec ma genne pi ngiyo kor tic onyo kwed.

eng_prompt: Many individuals and businesses may attempt to evade their tax obligations for financial gain. However, engaging in such deceptive practices can lead to severe legal consequences.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi n'ebitongole by'obusuubuzi bigezaako okwewala okusasula emisolo okusobola okufuna ssente. Newankubadde, okwenyigira mu bikolwa eby'obulimba ng'ebyo kiyinza okuvaamu ebivaamu eby'amaanyi mu mateeka.

lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi tualu tujari karakara eyi pie eyi o'bi eyi ma musoro tra robia esuzu. Kani si, e'yo onzi 'dile 'diyi 'yezu ri eco fe e'yo onzi eyi 'yezu ra.

eng_prompt: Many people feel frustrated with the government's spending decisions. As a result, some citizens do not like to pay tax.

ach_prompt: Dano mapol cwinygi pe yom ki tam ma gamente omoko me tic ki cente. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali mukene pe gimaro culu mucoro.

eng_prompt: Lately, I've been hearing whispers about some shady characters lurking around. It seems like everyone is on high alert for scams and deceitful schemes.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko, mbadde mpulira okuwuubaala ku bantu ab'ebisiikirize abeesibye okwetoloola. Kirabika nga buli omu ali bulindaala nnyo olw'obufere n'enkwe ez'obulimba.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, abedo ka winyo lok I dwon pa dano mogo maraco ma gitye ka lwok I kabedo mapatpat. Nen calo dano weng tye ma wanggi twolo pi tim me camcana ki bwami.

lgg_prompt: O'du 'diyi ma alia, ma e'bi e'yo erizu 'ba onzi 'diyi ma dria. Eri ena kile 'ba dria yi mile be e'yo ogu ni azini otuta enzoru ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwahati, ntwire nimpurira ebiteekateeko ebirikukwata aha bantu abatari bamwe abarikwetegyerezibwa. Nikireebeka ngu buri omwe ayetegyereize obushumankuzi n'oburyarya.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the team gathered various testimonies and documents. The findings pointed to a troubling pattern of misconduct.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, ttiimu yakuŋŋaanyizza obujulizi n'ebiwandiiko eby'enjawulo. Ebyazuuliddwa byalaga nti waliwo emize emibi mingi.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu etimu otukutu ajenanut keda apapulai nuegelegela. Apotu akiro nuitodunitos itodutu iponesio luarokok luetapit itunga aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, amuti 'da tra e'yo eceza azini kokobi karakara 'diyi. Eꞌyo ꞌbani esu ꞌdiyi ece eꞌyo ꞌbani eꞌyo onzi ꞌyezu ꞌdiyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In an effort to increase revenue and address budget deficits, the government has implemented new fiscal policies. One of the key strategies involves imposing taxes on various consumer goods.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera ku musolo n'okukola ku bbula ly'embalirira, gavumenti etadde mu nkola enkola empya ez'ebyensimbi. Obumu ku bukodyo obukulu buzingiramu okussa emisolo ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me medo lim ki cobo peko me byek me lim, gamente oketo cik manyen me lim itic. Yoo acel ma pire tek en aye keto mucoro iwi jami ma dano tiyo kwede.

eng_prompt: In the legal system, various cases are evaluated to determine their appropriate handling. As a result, certain situations require specialized attention and may lead to further action.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'amateeka, emisango egy'enjawulo gisoomoozebwa okuzuula engeri gye girina okukwatibwamu. N'ekivuddemu, embeera ezimu zeetaaga okufaayo okw'enjawulo era ziyinza okuviirako okwongera okukola.
ach_prompt: I tenge me cik, ki ngiyo lok mapat-pat me niang kit ma omyero kitii kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, jami mukene mito ni ki ket cwiny gi i komgi dok man twero weko kimedo timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okisila, ewanyunono imusagon luegelegela kanu ajenun epone loebeitor kesi aitemokin. Kanuka ngun, ipu iboro ekotosi apodokinit ido epedorete ayangaun aswamisio acie.

eng_prompt: In any legal proceeding, the integrity of the judicial system relies on the impartiality of the judges. It is essential that all parties involved receive equitable treatment throughout the process.
lug_prompt: Mu misango gyonna, obwesimbu bw'ekitongole ekiramuzi bwesigama ku bwenkanya bw'abalamuzi. Kya mugaso nnyo enjuyi zonna ezikwatibwako okuyisibwa mu ngeri ey'obwenkanya mu nkola yonna.
ach_prompt: I lok mo keken makwako cik, ber bedo pa dul ma ngolo kop jenge I kom ngolo kop labongo apokapoka. Pire tek tutwal ni joo weng matye I lok eni omyero gunong kony ma oporre I kare weng me yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit ediokere, ajokis na ekatubon erai amamei atiakatiaka kanejaas ikatubok. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga kere luejaasi toma aitolot akiro ejok kotoma apak kana kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza dria ma alea, e'yo ada 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ma dria ri ati e'yo 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ni opendu kokoru ri ma dria. Eri orodriru 'ba dria e'yo 'di ma alea 'diyi ma esu atita kililiru sa'wa dria 'di ma alea.

eng_prompt: In a fair legal system, every individual deserves the right to a presumption of innocence. This principle is fundamental to ensuring justice and protecting personal freedoms.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'amateeka ey'obwenkanya, buli muntu alina okuteeberezebwa okuba nga talina musango. Omusingi guno mukulu nnyo mu kukuuma obwenkanya n'eddembe ly'omuntu.

teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget loka ikisila loajokan, ekot nginitunganan apedorite ajenun ebe mam nges ediakarit. Erai ainapeta ngun nuepolok noi kanu aitodolikin etube loajokan ka ayuarite ailajara naka itunganan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza kililiru ma alia, le 'ba dria ma ega kini yi e'yo kokoru. E'yo 'di eri orodriru e'yo liza kililiru ri esuzu azini driwala 'ba ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'ebiragiro ey'oburingaaniza, buri omwe aine obugabe kuteekateekwaho nk'otaine rubanja. Omusingye ogu n'ogw'omugasho omu kureetaho oburingaaniza n'okurinda obugabe bw'omuntu.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, recent investigations have revealed a troubling pattern among those in power. Evidence suggests that many elected officials are engaging in activities that directly contradict the laws they are sworn to uphold.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri ey'entiisa, okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga nti waliwo embeera ezitabula mu abo abali mu buyinza. Obujulizi bulaga nti abakungu abalonde bangi beenyigira mu bikolwa ebikontana butereevu n'amateeka ge baalayidde okukuuma.

teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka akiro, aingic napac itodunit epone loetiono noi kama ejaasi ngul luejaasi toma apugan. Itodunit aitogogongoret ebe eutasi eswamak luipu lueseunitai aswam iboro lumam etupitos ikisila luisumunitai kesi aitogogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo ewaru 'ba opi dria 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo ecepi kini azi'ba 'bani pele 'diyi ma karakara eyi e'yo eyi 'yepi azita eyini oyo sozu eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi pie ku 'diyi 'ye.

eng_prompt: Understanding the financial obligations of a business is crucial for compliance and sustainability. One of the key responsibilities that every business owner must be aware of is their tax filing requirements.

eng_prompt: Engaging in deceptive practices can have serious consequences. It is important to understand the legal ramifications of such actions.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu bikolwa eby'obulimba kiyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi. Kikulu okutegeera ebiyinza okuva mu bikolwa ng'ebyo mu mateeka.

lug_prompt: Abatambuze batera okutya okusala ensalo olw'amateeka amakakali. Bangi bawulidde emboozi ezikwata ku kwekenneenya okw'amaanyi okwakolebwa ekitongole ky'eby'emisolo.

eng_prompt: Many countries implement various forms of taxation to generate revenue for public services. One of the most prevalent methods is the value-added tax, which is applied at each stage of production and distribution.
lug_prompt: Ensi nnyingi ziteekawo emisolo egy'enjawulo okusobola okufuna ssente z'okuweereza abantu. Emu ku nkola ezisinga okubeerawo gwe musolo ogugattibwa ku muwendo, ogukozesebwa ku buli mutendera gw'okufulumya n'okusaasaanya.

teo_prompt: Akwapin nuipu itolomunenete iponesio luegelegela luka isolosinei kanu aitolomun ikapun kanu aijanakin itunga. Ediopet kotoma iwaitin lu itwasamao noi ngesi esolo loka etiai lo iyatakitai, lo itwasamao kotoma atutubena kere nuka aitolomio keda aikor.

eng_prompt: As the trial reached its climax, the atmosphere in the courtroom grew tense with anticipation. The defense attorney urged the jury to consider the emotional turmoil her client had endured throughout the ordeal.
lug_prompt: Okuwozesebwa bwe kwali kutuuka ku ntikko, embeera mu kkooti yeeyongera okusika omuguwa olw'okusuubira. Munnamateeka w'oludda oluwaabi yakubirizza abalamuzi okulowooza ku butabanguko mu nneewulira omuntu we bwe yayitamu mu kaseera k'okugezesebwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma pido ne oo I agiki ne, lworo omako dano mapol tutwal I ot kot. Lapilida pa langol kop olego lungol kop me tamo I kom turcwiny ma ngat ma ki ngolo kop i kome okato ki iye I kare me peko ne.
teo_prompt: Neadolio emusago ngol adoketait naepol noi, abu eidicane lo adieket kiyatakin keda aiyalongong naepol noi. Abu epulida kisinyikok atubok aomoom nuikamunitos aiyalongong naka itungake kapak kana aiticanit ngesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza dwaniniri ni cazu asizuri ma alia, e'yo dwaniniri ma alia 'diyi eca asi otiza ru e'yo 'bani egale 'diyi ma e'yosi. Ba e'yo lipiri ai 'ba e'yo li'baa 'diyi e'yo egazu e'yo ewaru 'ba erini tozu 'diyiniri ma dria sawa dria e'yo ewaru 'diyiniri ma aliari ma dria.
