eng_prompt: In response to the increasing prevalence of financial misconduct, lawmakers recognized the urgent need for stronger regulations. As a result, comprehensive measures were introduced to safeguard consumers and maintain the integrity of the marketplace.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweyongerayongera kw'obumenyi bw'amateeka mu by'ensimbi, ababaka baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'amateeka amakakali. N'ekyavaamu, enkola ez'enjawulo zaateekebwawo okukuuma abaguzi n'okukuuma obulungi bw'akatale.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa tim maraco me lim, luwang lwak I ot moko cik gunongo ni omyero ki ket cik matek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kikelo yoo mapat-pat me gwoko luwil ki gwoko ber bedo pa cuk.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aipues na ikapun, apotu imeeban luka airabet kojenutu eipud loka aitolomun ikisila luegogong. Kanuka ngun, aponi kitolomunai iwaitin lu eyuaritos agwelak ka aidar eswamae loajokan loka esokoni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo onzi robia ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma e'yosi, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu azita okporu 'diyi 'bazu mbeleru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba o'ba e'yo dria ecozu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini angu cuu ni 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obushomankuzi omu by'empiiha, ab'eishengyero bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okutandikaho ebiragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo y'omutaano ekateebwaho, okurinda abaguzi n'okurinda obutereera bw'akatare.

eng_prompt: Our inventory levels are running low, and we've received several requests from customers. To meet the demand, we need to add new stock to the shop next month.
lug_prompt: Ebintu byaffe bigenda bikendeera era tufunye okusaba kungi okuva mu bakasitoma. Okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu, twetaaga okwongera ebintu ebipya mu dduuka omwezi ogujja.
ach_prompt: Jami ma watye kwede tye ka dwogo piny, ki bene wanongo kwac mapol ki bot luwil. Me cobo miti ne, omyero wamed jami manyen I dukan dwe manyen.
teo_prompt: Adisiar iboro wok, ido idumunit sio ailipasinei nuipu kanejaas agwelak. Kanu aitodolikin eipuda, ekot oni aiyatakin iboro idukai olap ngol.
lgg_prompt: Afa ama vile afa ozizaru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni i deria, dika ama isu zita engazu aje'ba yi vu 'diyi karakara. Afa 'bani le 'diyi esuzu, le ama ma o'ba afa ozizaru 'diyi dukani 'da ma alea imba drusirisi.
nyn_prompt: Ebintu byaitu biriyo nibihwaho kandi tutungire okushaba kwingi kuruga omu bakasitoma. Okuhikiiriza ebyetengo, twine kwongyera ebintu ebindi omu duuka okwezi okurikwija.

eng_prompt: As we gathered more evidence and testimonies, it became clear that the complexities of the situation were greater than we initially thought. Our team had hoped for a swift resolution, but the unfolding details have led to unexpected delays.
lug_prompt: Bwe twakung'aanya obujulizi obulala n'obujulizi, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti ebizibu by'embeera byali bingi okusinga bwe twali tulowooza mu kusooka. Ttiimu yaffe yali esuubira okugonjoolwa amangu, naye ebigenda mu maaso bireeseewo okulwawo okutali kusuubirwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wacoko caden ki caden mapol, onen atyer kamaleng ni peko me lok ne obedo tek loyo kit ma onongo watamo kwede con. Dul pa lutic wa gubedo ki gen me nongo lagam oyot-oyot, ento jami matye katime okelo galle ma pe byek tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio atukun aitogogongoret keda ajenanut, apotu kojenutu ebe etiono noi akiro ngun adepar nuawomit sio. Aomit sio ebe ebuni etimukosi aitemokin atipet, konye akiro nuiswamasi ayangautu aiyap.
lgg_prompt: Amani afa ecetaru azini e'yo ece'ba 'diyi trazurisi, eca e'da kini e'yo ewaru e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi angiri ndeni aga amani egaleri ra. Amuti amavile ri ma asi 'baza ndra e'yo 'di ma aza kozu mbeleru, te e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi fe sawa ezaza 'bani ega kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ku twaherize kurundaana obujurizi obundi n'obujurizi, kikarebeka butunu ngu embeera ekaba egumire munonga kukira oku twabaire nituteekateeka. Tiimu yaitu ekaba eine amatsiko g'okugonjoora enshonga ahonaaho, kwonka ebirikubaho bikareetaho okukyerererwa okutarikuteekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: In any organization, effective communication is essential for fostering collaboration and trust. To achieve this, it is crucial that all team members comprehend the rationale behind the choices we make.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso mu kutumbula enkolagana n'obwesige. Okutuukiriza kino, kya mugaso nnyo nti bammemba ba ttiimu bonna bategeere ensonga emabega w'okusalawo kwe tukola.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, lok maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo ribe ki gen. Me cobo man, pire tek tutwal ni lumemba me dul tic weng omyero guniang tyen lok ma oweko wamoko tam.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget ediokere, erai einer loejok kanu aitopolor aiswamanara keda amunokina. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ejokuna noi itunga kere luka etimu amisiikin nuikamunitos aseununeta nuiswama oni.
lgg_prompt: Amuti ciria, e'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru ti icita azini asi'baza ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, eri orodriru 'ba dria amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi ma va e'yo amani peta amani pe 'diyi ma driari ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona,okugamba kurungi n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwesiga. Okuhikiiriza eki, n'eky'omugasho munonga ba memba ba tiimu boona kwetegyereza enshonga ezirikureetaho okucwamu kwaitu.

eng_prompt: In any legal system, the principle of "innocent until proven guilty" is fundamental. It is essential to rely on concrete evidence rather than mere accusations when determining someone's culpability.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola yonna ey'amateeka, omusingi gwa "obutaliiko musango okutuusa ng'omusango gukakasibwa" gwa mugaso. Kya mugaso nnyo okwesigama ku bujulizi obutuufu mu kifo ky'okulumiriza kwokka ng'osalawo omusango gw'omuntu.
ach_prompt: I yub mo keken me cik, cik ma waco ni ngat moni pe labal wang ma kimoko ni en labal obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Pire tek tutwal me jenge I kom caden matye ento pe koko keken kace itye ka moko ni ngat moni otimo bal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okisila kere, erai ainapeta nuka "mam ediakarit itoni ne engicunere ebe ediakarit" nuepolok noi. Erai ibore yenepol noi amunokina aitogogongoret itia aitoroneta nuka itunganan kanu ajenun ebe ediakarit itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Geri dria e'yo liza ni 'diyi ma alia, e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini 'ba e'yo onzi 'ye ku kpere 'bani e'dazu kini 'ba e'yo onzi 'ye ra ri' ri eri orodriru tu. Eri orodriru asi'bazu afa ecetaru 'diyi ma dria aga e'yo 'bani 'yozu 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'bani 'ba azi ma dria e'yo onzi 'yezuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'ebiragiro yoona, engyenderwaho y'okugira ngu "otiine rubanja okuhitsya obu orubanja rwawe rwahamiibwe" n'ey'omugasho munonga. N'eky'omugasho okwesigama aha bujurizi obuhikire, okukira okubeeherera, waaba nooshanga omuntu aine orubanja.

eng_prompt: The government of Uganda has established various agencies to manage its financial systems. One of the key institutions responsible for ensuring fiscal compliance is the Uganda Revenue Authority.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti ya Uganda etaddewo ebitongole eby'enjawulo okuddukanya enkola yaayo ey'ebyensimbi. Ekimu ku bitongole ebikulu ebirina obuvunaanyizibwa okukakasa nti ebisale bigobererwa kye kitongole ky'omusolo ekya Uganda Revenue Authority.
ach_prompt: Gamente me Uganda oyabo dul mapat-pat me doro tic me lim. Dul acel matye ki twero me neno ni kiworo cik me lim en aye dul me Uganda Revenue Authority.
teo_prompt: Aduku apugan nako Uganda iriongeta luegelegela kanu aidar ikapun ke. Idiopet kotoma oriongeta luapolok lu ikamunitos nuka ikapun erai Erionget Loka Ikapun koUganda.
lgg_prompt: Gamete Uganda niri e'do amuti ndundu eyi e'yo robia ni 'diyi onezu. Amuti azi okporu ni azi ngapi e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ri eri amuti Uganda Revenue Authority niri'I.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ya Uganda etandikireho ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe by'okureeberera enkora yaayo y'esente. Kimwe aha bitongore ebikuru ebirikujunanizibwa ahaby'emishoro n'ekitongore ky'emishoro ekya Uganda Revenue Authority.

eng_prompt: In a functioning democracy, citizens contribute to the maintenance of public services and infrastructure. This financial support is essential for the government's ability to operate effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya akola obulungi, bannansi bawaayo ssente mu kulabirira empeereza ya gavumenti n'ebintu ebigasiza awamu abantu. Obuyambi buno obw'ensimbi bwetaagisa nnyo gavumenti okusobola okukola obulungi emirimu gyayo.
ach_prompt: I loc alwak matye katic maber, anywali miyo cente pi gwoko tic pa lwak. Kony me lim man pire tek tutwal pi gamente me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan naka itunga, itunga kes ijanakino ikapunukec kanu aidar ejanakine loka apugan keda iboro luingarakinete itunga. Erai agangat na ikapun na epol ajokis kanu apugan aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Democracia azi ngapi muke ri ma alea, kari anzi eyi robia fe azakoma o'bi eyini 'diyi ma tambazu. Atita robia niri eri orodriru gamete ni azi ngazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya erikukora kurungi, abatuuragye nibaheereza ahabw'okureeberera obuheereza bwa gavumenti hamwe n'ebyombeko. Obuhwezi obu obw'esente n'obw'omugasho ahabwa gavumenti kukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: As we delve deeper into complex topics, we often encounter concepts that challenge our comprehension. This raises the question of why certain ideas seem to elude our understanding.
lug_prompt: Nga tweyongerayo mu misomo emizibu, tutera okusanga ebirowoozo ebisoomooza okutegeera kwaffe. Kino kireetawo ekibuuzo ku nsonga lwaki ebirowoozo ebimu birabika ng'ebitukaluubirira okutegeera.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka ngiyo matut I kom lok matego tutwal, pol kare wanongo tam mapol ma pe watwero niang iye maber. Man kelo lapeny ni pingo tam mukene nen calo pe watwero niang iye.
teo_prompt: Neidulokinia oni akiro nuetioko, etapit oni adumunun aomisio nuetioko noi nu mam oni ipedori amisiikin. Eyangauni ngin aingiset kanukinyo mam icie aomisio epedori oni amisiikin.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma ale andriria, ama sawa driasi e'yo ewaru ama ma vata ni 'diyi esu. E'yo 'di eji zita e'yo egata azi 'diyi ni e'dazu ama ma vata ma aliari ma dria ra a'di e'yosi yari ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikugyenda omu maisho omu nshonga ezigumire, nitukira kushanga enshonga ezirikuturemesa kwetegyereza. Eki nikireetaho ekibuuzo ahabwenki ebiteekateeko ebimwe nibitugumira kwetegyereza.

eng_prompt: In a legal system, the foundation of justice relies heavily on the information presented during a trial. Each party must present their case based on the facts and proof they can provide.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'amateeka, omusingi gw'obwenkanya gwesigama nnyo ku mawulire agalagibwa mu kiseera ky'okuwozesebwa. Buli ludda lulina okwanjula ensonga zaalwo nga lusinziira ku mazima n'obukakafu bwe luyinza okuwaayo.
ach_prompt: I yub me cik, tyen lok me ngolo kop atir jenge tutwalle I kom ngec ma kimiyo ikare me pido. Dano weng omyero guwac lok gi malubbe ki lok ada ki caden ma gitwero kelo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget loka ikisila, eswamae loka etube loajokan itodunit akiro nu itodunitai kotoma apak naka emusago. Ekot ngol ewai aitodiar akeswam kotupitete abeit keda aitogogongoret naepedori kesi aijaikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza kililiru ri ma alea, e'yo liza kililiru ri ni asi'ba e'yo 'bani ece sawa 'bani e'yo lizu ri ma dria. Le amuti dria ma e'da e'yo yini 'diyi e'yo ada eyi ma dria azini afa ecetaru eyini eco fe 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'ebiragiro,omusingye gw'oburingaaniza nigwegamira munonga aha makuru agarikugambwa omu kuhurira orubanja. Buri rubaju rushemereire kworeka enshonga zaabo kurugirira aha mazima n'obuhame obu barikubaasa kuheereza.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing cost of living and the demands placed on public services, it has become essential to reassess the compensation of government employees. Many civil servants are struggling to make ends meet, highlighting the urgent need for a salary adjustment.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu n'obwetaavu obuteekebwa ku buweereza bwa gavumenti, kifuuse kikulu okuddamu okwekenneenya empeera y'abakozi ba gavumenti. Abakozi ba gavumenti bangi balwana okweyimirizaawo, ekiraga obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukyusa emisaala.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel cente me kwo matye kamede ki miti matye I kom tic pa gamente, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me ngiyo kit ma kiculu kwede lutic pa gamente. Lutic pa gamente mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi, man nyutu ni myero kilok mucara gi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin etiai loka aijar keda eipuda lo itwasamaere apugan, erai ibore yenepol noi airereonor ikapun lu atacio eswamak luka apugan. Ipu eswamak lu apugan lu itereikina keda aijar, itodunit eipud loka aijulanakineta nuka iropito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje idri nyazani tuzu tualuri ma e'yosi azini e'yo 'bani le o'bi yi dri azi ngazuri ma dria, eri eca orodriru 'bani azi'ba gameteni 'diyi ma ofeta ma ale andrizu o'diru. Azi'ba gameteni karakara 'diyi dri ci afa esuzu, e'yo 'di ece kini le 'ba ma otu musara yi mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu eyeyongyeire hamwe n'ebyetaago by'obuheereza bwa gavumenti, nikiba kiri eky'omugasho kugaruka kushwijuma emishaara y'abakozi ba gavumenti. Abakozi ba gavumenti abaingi nibarwana kwebaisaho, ekirikworeka ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutereeza emishaara yaabo.

eng_prompt: Understanding the importance of financial responsibilities is crucial for any organization. Timely tax payments not only ensure compliance but also contribute to the overall health of the economy.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera obukulu bw'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ensimbi kya mugaso nnyo eri ekitongole kyonna. Okusasula emisolo mu budde tekikoma ku kukakasa kugobererwa kwokka naye era kiyamba ku mbeera y'ebyenfuna okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Niang ber pa tic ki lim obedo gin ma pire tek pi dul mo keken. Culu mucoro ikare ki kome pe weko lutic lubu cik keken ento bene weko tic me lim bedo maber.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin ajokis naka ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka ediokampuni. Mam aitac isolosinei kotoma apak ijaikini itunga atupakinit ikisila konye eyangauni angaleu naka edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo orodri e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma vata eri orodriru amuti dria ni. Musoro ofezu sa'wa dria ri ni lu e'yo azita vuti obiza ni 'diyi ma ta mba ku te eri vini e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ma ta mbaza ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza omugasho gw'obujunaanizibwa bw'esente n'eky'omugasho omu kitongore kyona. Okushashura emishoro omu bwire, tikirikureetera abantu kukuratira ebiragiro by'eihanga byonka, beitu nikureetaho n'entunguuka omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into the company's financial practices, several employees came forward with serious concerns. The board of directors convened to discuss the troubling claims and their implications for the organization.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku nkola ya kampuni ey'ebyensimbi, abakozi abawerako baavaayo n'okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi. Olukiiko lwa badayirekita lwatudde okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ezitawaanya n'ebikosa ekitongole.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom kit ma dul ne tiyo kwede ki lim, lutic mapol okatti ki lworo madit tutwal. Lutela me dul enoni gubedo kacoke me nywako lok I kom adot matye ka kelo peko ki adwogi ne I kom dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuka ikapun luka ekampuni, apotu eswamak luipu kolomutu keda aiyalongongo. Apotu lukapolok luingaranakinete luce iriamunos kanu aitemitem akiro nuetioko ka epone loepedoriata kesi aitodolikin erionget.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba karakara efu asi otiza okporu be. Drice'ba amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ewaru eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyini eco 'ye amuti 'da ma dria ra 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi aha nkora ya kampuni omu by'empiiha, abakozi baingi bakahayo okwerarikirira kw'amaani. Orukiiko rwa ba dayirekita rukashutama kuhanuura aha nshonga ezirikwerarikiriza hamwe n'oburemeezi bwazo aha kitongore.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed a troubling trend in financial misconduct. Experts are warning that more individuals and businesses are engaging in deceptive practices to evade taxes.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga nti waliwo emize egyeraliikiriza egy'okukozesa obubi ensimbi. Abakugu balabula nti abantu bangi n'abasuubuzi beenyigira mu bikolwa eby'obufere okwewala emisolo.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyutu kit ma tim me camucana tye ka time kwede. Ludiro tye ka ciko dano ni dano ki biacara mapol tye katimo tim me bwola wek pe gucul mucoro.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit epone loetiono noi loka aimidicar ikapun. Apotu ipirioitin ikwenyasi ebe ipu itunga keda ibiasaran lu ekokoete kanu aisac aitac isolosinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo azi asi otiza fepi e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma 'yeta onzi ma dria. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi fe bile ndu liza kini 'ba karakara eyi tualu tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie 'yeta enzoru 'diyi 'ye musoro ofeza atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka enkora y'obushomankuzi omu by'empiiha. Abakugu nibarabura ngu abantu baingi hamwe na bizinesi nibejumba omu bikorwa by'oburyarya okwetantara emishoro.

eng_prompt: In many aspects of life, adhering to deadlines is crucial for maintaining order and accountability. When individuals fail to meet these expectations, they may face consequences to encourage timely compliance.
lug_prompt: Mu bintu bingi mu bulamu, okugoberera ebisale by'obudde kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma entegeka n'embalirira. Abantu bwe balemererwa okutuukiriza ebisuubirwa bino, bayinza okwolekagana n'ebivaamu okukubiriza okugondera mu budde.
ach_prompt: I jami mapol me kwo, lubu nino me agiki obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me gwoko kuc ki kor tic. Kace dano acel-acel pe ocobo miti magi, gitwero nongo adwogi ne me cuku cwiny dano me lubu cik ikare ki kome.
teo_prompt: Koiponesio luipu luka aijar, aitodolikin apak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ainapakina keda aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Arai ipiko itunga aitodolikin aomisio nu, epedorete kesi adumun atiokisio kanu aisinyikokin itunga aitodolikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo idri ni karakara eyi ma alea, sa'wa asizu ri ma vuti obizu ri eri orodriru e'yo otuza ni azini e'yo 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Ba eyi ka e'de e'yo 'bani ega 'diyi 'ye ku, eyi eco e'yo eyi esu eyini ani e'yo eyi 'yezu sa'wa dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bintu bingi eby'amagara, okukuratira ebiro by'ahamuheru n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obusingye n'embaririra. Abantu kubarikuremwa kuhikiiriza ebirikuteekateekwaho, nibabaasa kutunga ebirugyemu, kugira ngu babaase kuhikiiriza ebiteekateeko byabo bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: Many individuals feel anxious about their financial disclosures during tax season. This discomfort often stems from concerns about privacy and potential scrutiny from tax authorities.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi beeraliikirivu ku bikwata ku by'ensimbi byabwe mu biseera by'omusolo. Obutali bumativu buno butera kuva ku kweraliikirira ku by'ekyama n'okukeberebwa okuva mu bitongole by'omusolo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ki lworo I kom kit ma myero gunyut kwede cente gi ikare me culu mucoro. Cwer cwiny man pole aa ki I kom lworo I kom lok makwako kwo pa dano kacel ki ngiyo kor tic pa lutela me mucoro.
teo_prompt: Ekuriaka itunga luipu nuikamunitos aitijenaret naka ikapun kec kapakio nuka isolosinei. Ationis na elomunit duc kotoma aiyalongongo kanu aiyeyea keda aingic kanejaas apedorosio nuka isolosinei.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi asi otiza be e'yo robia eyini 'diyi ma e'yo ecezu sa'wa musoro ofeza nirisi. E'yo ewaru 'diri tuni enga asi otiza e'yo 'ba ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo 'bani ecozu yi ma ale andrizu engazu amuti musoro trapi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi niberarikirira oku bashemereire kworeka esente zaabo omu bwire bw'emishoro. Obutashemererwa obu nibukira kurugirira aha kwerarikirira ebikwatiraine n'okushwijuma okurikubaasa kubaho kuruga omu bitongore by'emishoro.

eng_prompt: In our country, the government has implemented a sales tax to generate revenue. As a result, consumers should be aware that every purchase is taxed.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi yaffe, gavumenti etaddewo omusolo ku by'okutunda okusobola okufuna ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, abaguzi balina okukimanya nti buli kye bagula kiggyibwako omusolo.
ach_prompt: I lobo wa, gamente oketo mucoro iwi cat wek okel lim. Macalo adwogi ne, luwil omyero gunge ni jami weng ma giwilo ki mucoro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwapuwok, etolomu apugan esolo loka agwelanar kanu adumun ikapun. Kanuka ngun, ekot agwelak aijen ebe ibusakinit aitac esolo kanu iboro kere luegwelete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Kari amavileri ma alea, gamete 'ba musoro afa ozizaru 'diyi ma dria ri robia esuzu. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba afa je'ba 'diyi ma ni ra kini afa dria eyini je 'diyi ma dria musoro ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu eihanga ryaitu,gavumenti eteireho omushoro aha bintu ebirikuguzibwa, kugira ngu etungye esente. N'ekyarugiremu, abaguzi bashemereire kumanya ngu buri kintu eki barikugura kiine omushoro.

eng_prompt: Understanding the financial responsibilities of running a business is crucial for long-term success. One key aspect of this responsibility involves compliance with tax regulations.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ensimbi mu kuddukanya bizinensi kikulu nnyo mu buwanguzi obw'ekiseera ekiwanvu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu buvunaanyizibwa buno kizingiramu okugoberera amateeka agakwata ku misolo.
ach_prompt: Niang kit me tic ki lim I biacara pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti ne pi kare malac. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I tic man obedo lubu cik me mucoro.
teo_prompt: Amisikin nu ikapun lu aitolot ebiasara erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut na apak naepol. Adiopet koboro luapolok luka aswamisioit kana imoriarit aitup ikisila luka isolosinei.
lgg_prompt: Azi tujari ocezaniri ma e'yo vazu ri eri orodriru drile suza sawa ezu ri ni. E'yo azi okporu azi 'di ma dria ri ma azi azita musoro ni 'diyi ma vuti obiza ni.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza obujunanizibwa bw'esente omu kutwara bizinesi omu maisho n'eky'omugasho munonga aha businguzi bw'obwire bureingwa. Enshonga nkuru y'obujunaanizibwa obu neetwariramu okukuratira ebiragiro by'emishoro.

eng_prompt: Understanding the impact of taxation is crucial for effective financial planning. Many individuals and businesses often overlook how tax obligations can significantly affect their overall earnings.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebiva mu misolo kya mugaso nnyo mu kukola enteekateeka ennungi ey'ebyensimbi. Abantu bangi n'abasuubuzi batera okubuusa amaaso engeri emisolo gye giyinza okukosa ennyo ensimbi zaabwe okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Niang adwoki pa mucoro pire tek tutwal pi yubu cente maber. Dano mapol kacel ki biacara ipol kare gi cayo kit ma culu mucoro twero balo kwede cente gi.
teo_prompt: Amisikin nuka isolosinei erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitemonokin nuka ikapun. Itunga luipu keda ibiasaran mam epalunit epone loepedoriata isolosinei aitolitol ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Vata e'yo musoro ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma vata eri orodriru otita robia ni 'diyi 'yezu kililiru. Ba karakara eyi tualu tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie eyi e'yo 'bani eyi ma musoro ofezu ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'emishoro n'eky'omugasho omu kukora enteekateeka nungi y'esente. Abantu baingi hamwe na bizinesi nibarekyera aho kureeba oku emishoro erikukwata aha ntatsya yaabo.

eng_prompt: The customer has consistently demonstrated loyalty and made timely payments over the past year. Additionally, they have referred several new clients to our business, contributing to our growth.
lug_prompt: Buli lukya kasitoma alaze obwesigwa n'okusasula mu budde mu mwaka oguwedde. Okugatta ku ekyo, basindikidde bakasitoma abapya bangi mu bizineesi yaffe, ekituyambye okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kastoma ne obedo ka nyutu genne ki culu cente ikare ki kome I mwaka ma okato ni. Medo i kom meno, gucwalo luwil mapol manyen I biacara wa, ma man okonyo me dongo biacara wa.
teo_prompt: Etodunit ekasitoma ngol duc amunokina kosodi aitac ikapun kotoma apak kokaru lo atubor. Kilema, apotu kesi ijukasi ikasitomas luitetiak toma obiasarakosi, ido ingarakisi sio apol.
lgg_prompt: Aje'ba 'da e'bi e'da e'yo asi 'baza be dika ofe robia sa'wa dria eli agapi 'bo ri ma alea. Azi dika, eyi edri aje'ba o'diru karakara eyi tujari amavileri ma alea, eyini ani fezu ama ma zota ni.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka oguhwaire, omuguzi atwire naayoreka obwesigwa n'okushashura omu bwire. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, bahindwire ba kasitoma abasya omu bizinesi yaitu, ekyongyeire aha ntunguuka yaitu.

eng_prompt: In the world of business, maintaining clear financial records is essential for accountability and transparency. One common practice to ensure this is through the exchange of invoices.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya bizinensi, okukuuma ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi ebirambulukufu kya mugaso nnyo eri embalirira n'obwerufu. Engeri emu ey'okukakasa kino kwe kuwanyisiganya invoice.
ach_prompt: I tenge me biacara, gwoko rekod me lim maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi nyutu kor tic ki cente. Yo acel ma dano mapol timo me neno ni man otimme en aye me nywako invoice.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka ebiasara, aidar aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun nu ecaete ejok kanu aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Idiopebore yen iswamao kanu aanyun ebe iswamauna ngun erai kowai lo aijulakin invoice.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru tujari niri ma alea, e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo nzezu kililiru. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu nezu ra kini e'yo 'di 'ye i ri geri 'bani invoice yi ojazurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'eby'obushubuzi, okurinda ebihandiiko by'esente ebirikwetegyerezibwa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'embaririra n'oburingaaniza. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga okureeba ngu eki nikigyenda omu maisho n'okuguza za invoice.

eng_prompt: As the tax season approaches, many individuals begin to reflect on their financial obligations. The increasing complexity of tax laws often leaves taxpayers feeling overwhelmed and frustrated.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekiseera ky'okusasula emisolo kisembera, abantu bangi batandika okulowooza ku buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'ensimbi. Amateeka g'emisolo agagenda geeyongera obuzibu gatera okuleka abawi b'omusolo nga bawulira nga bazitoowereddwa era nga baweddemu amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me culu mucoro cok cok, dano mapol gi cako tam I kom tic gi me lim. Peko matye I kom cik me mucoro ipol kare weko lucul mucoro winyo marac tutwal dok cwiny gi pe yom.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aitac isolosinei, egeunete itunga luipu aomoom nuikamunitos ikapunukec. Ationis naepol noi naka ikisila luka isolosinei ijaikini itunga luetacete isolosinei epupete ationis naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa musoro trazu ri ni ecazu ogogo, 'ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo robia eyini 'diyi ma dria. Azita musoro ofeza ni 'diyi ma e'yo ni ecazu kongolokoru ri ni fe 'ba musoro ofepi 'diyi ma asi driza azini candi isu.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okushorooza emishoro ku burikuhika haihi, abantu nibatandika kuteekateeka aha mirimo yaabo y'esente. Ebiragiro by'emishoro ebyeyongyeire kugumizamu nibireka abarikushashura emishoro baine oburemeezi n'okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: The judicial system plays a crucial role in maintaining order and justice in society. From civil disputes to criminal prosecutions, courts are tasked with resolving a wide array of legal matters.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole ekiramuzi kikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukuuma emirembe n'obwenkanya mu kitundu. Okuva ku nkaayana z'obwannannyini okutuuka ku buzzi bw'emisango, kkooti ziweereddwa omulimu gw'okugonjoola ensonga z'amateeka ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Dul pa lungol kop tye ki tic madit tutwal me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo I kabedo wa. Cako I kom telle me kin lwak me oo I kom adot me bal, kot tye ki tic me tyeko lok mapat-pat mapat-pat makwako cik.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete ikatubok aswam naepol noi kanu aidar ainapakina keda etube loajokan kotunga. Anyoun kotoma ingungeta luka itunga kitoni imusagon, ejaasi adieket keda aswam naka aitemokin akiro nuegelegela nuka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Geri dwani ni 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo otuza ni azini e'yo liza kililiru ri ma tambazu ongulumu eyi ma alea. E'dozu e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi vu kpere e'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi pie, dwani eyi azi nga e'yo karakara eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'oburamuzi nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda obusingye n'oburingaaniza omu bantu. Kuruga aha ntongane z'abantu kuza aha mishango, kooti ziine omurimo gw'okushoborora enshonga nyingi z'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In recent years, advancements in digital payment systems have transformed the way individuals manage their finances. As a result, the process of fulfilling tax obligations has become more streamlined and accessible.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, enkulaakulana mu nkola z'okusasula ez'oku mutimbagano zikyusizza engeri abantu gye bakozesaamu ssente zaabwe. N'ekivuddemu, enkola y'okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo by'omusolo efuuse ennyangu era ennyangu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dongo pa yub me culu cente iwi yamo (internet) oloko kit ma dano tiyo kwede ki cente gi. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me cobo miti me culu mucoro dong odoko yot dok yot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apol naka epone loka aitac kolago ejulaki eipone lo itwasamaet itunga ikapun kec. Kanuka ngun, epatana aitodolikin esolo.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, angu ezoma geri robia ofezu oli aliasi 'diyi oja geri 'ba eyini robia ayuzuri ra. E'yo 'disi, geri 'bani e'yo musoro ofezu 'diyi 'yezu ri eca curu'do ewakokoru azini ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, entunguuka omu by'okushashurira aha mikutu ehindwire omuringo ogu abantu barikukoresa esente zaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, enkora y'okushashura emishoro ehindukire eyorobi munonga.

eng_prompt: Governments often impose higher taxes to fund public services and infrastructure. However, these financial burdens can have a ripple effect on the economy.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti zitera okussaawo emisolo egya waggulu okusobola okuvujjirira empeereza y'olukale n'ebintu ebigasiza abantu awamu. Newankubadde, obuzito buno obw'ensimbi busobola okukosa eby'enfuna.
ach_prompt: Gamente ipol kare keto mucoro madit tutwal I kom gamente me nongo cente me yubu jami ma mite pi lwak. Kadi bed kumeno, peko me lim magi twero kelo adwoki marac i kom biacara me lobo.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc apugan aipikakin isolosinei luikiara kanu aijaanakin itunga keda adukena. Konye, epedorete ationis na ikapun aitolitol edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Gamete eyi tutuni musoro 'ba uru eyini ani robia fezu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi dri. Kani si, e'yo robia ni 'diyi eco e'yo onzi 'ye e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti buriijo neetaho emishoro mingi okushashurira obuheereza bwa gavumenti hamwe n'ebyombeko. Kwonka, oburemeezi bw'esente obu nibubaasa kurabanisamu eby'entaasya y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In light of recent health concerns, people are becoming increasingly aware of the importance of hygiene. As a result, public health campaigns are emphasizing the necessity of proper handwashing techniques.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku byobulamu ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, abantu beeyongera okumanya obukulu bw'obuyonjo. N'ekivuddemu, kampeyini z'ebyobulamu zissa essira ku bwetaavu bw'enkola ennungi ey'okunaaba mu ngalo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye cokcok-ki, dano tye ka mede ki ngeyo ber pa gwoko lengo. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me rweyo lwak i kom lok me yot kom tye ka nyutu miti me lwoko cing maber.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos angaleu napac, ejenete itunga ajokis naka aila. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitos ikampeins luka angaleu nuka itunga eipud loka ailot akanin ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, o'bi yi e'yo ega e'yo alata ma orodri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ti odaza e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'ba asi orodri geri dri ojizu kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'obuyonjo. N'ekyarugiremu, ehururu z'eby'amagara g'abantu nizigamba munonga aha nshonga y'okunaaba engaro omu muringo oguhikire.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, health officials have implemented a series of guidelines. These protocols aim to safeguard public health and ensure community safety.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu batadde mu nkola ebiragiro ebiwerako. Ebiragiro bino bigendererwamu okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu n'obukuumi bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom gukati ki cik mapol. Yub magi tye me gwoko yotkom pa lwak ki gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu aicoreta nuipu. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga ka ayuarite itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba azita karakara eyi 'yeta ma alea. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌyele ꞌdiyi lezu oꞌbi yi ma rua ala ma ta mbazu azini ꞌba ongulumu yi ma eselea ꞌdiyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, ab'eby'amagara bateireho engyenderwaho nyingi. Ebiragiro ebi bigyendereire kurinda amagara g'abantu n'okurinda ebyanga.

eng_prompt: In the medical field, accurate diagnosis is crucial for effective treatment. To ensure the right course of action, individuals undergo various assessments and screenings.
lug_prompt: Mu by'obujjanjabi, okuzuula obulwadde obulungi kya mugaso nnyo eri obujjanjabi obulungi. Okukakasa enkola entuufu ey'okukola, abantu bafuna okukeberebwa n'okukeberebwa okw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom, niang two maber pire tek tutwal pi nongo yat maber. Me neno ni kitimo jami maber, dano acel-acel kipimo dok kipimo gi I yoo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo amukian, ajenun adekasinei ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amukian najokan. Kanu aanyun ebe ejai aswamisioit najokan, itunga luegelegela inwakio ka ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: Pari arojoni ma alia, e'yo eti ondaza kililiru ri eri orodriru aro esuzu kililiru. E'yo 'bani 'ye kililiru ri nezu, 'ba eyi ma rua andri azini eyi ma rua o'bi geri ndundu eyi si.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'amagara, okucondooza kurungi n'eky'omugasho omu kuragurira kurungi. Okureeba ngu habaho enkora ehikire, abantu nibashwijumwa kandi bakakyeberwa omu miringo mingi.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases worldwide, health officials have implemented new travel restrictions. As a precautionary measure, authorities have decided to enforce strict health protocols for international travelers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera mu nsi yonna, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bataddewo obukwakkulizo obupya ku ntambula. Ng'ekyokwegendereza, ab'obuyinza basazeewo okussa mu nkola ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu ebikakali eri abatambuze okuva mu nsi z'ebweru.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona I wilobo lung, lutic me yot kom guketo kigeng manyen I kom wot. Macalo yoo me gwokke, lutela gumoko tamgi me keto cik matek pi luwot ma aa ki lobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kotoma akwap kere, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu ikisila luitetiak luka alosit. Kwape epone loka ayuwar, aseutu apedorosio aipikakin ainapeta nuka angaleu mama ejaasi itunga luka akwapin ace.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu wudrikurusi ndulu risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi o'ba azita acita ma dria o'diru 'diyi. Ekile tambaza ru, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo azita rua ala ni okporu 'diyi 'bazu 'ba acipi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire omu nsi yoona, abakuru omu by'amagara bateireho ebiragiro ebitsya aha by'engyenda. Nk'omuringo gw'okwerinda, ab'obushoborozi bashaziremu kutaho ebiragiro by'amaani ahaby'amagara g'abantu abarikutambura kuruga omu mahanga agandi.

eng_prompt: In today's society, there are growing concerns about safety and well-being. Many individuals believe that regulations are necessary to protect the community from potential harm.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, waliwo okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'okwerinda n'obulamu obulungi. Abantu bangi balowooza nti amateeka geetaagisa okukuuma abantu okuva ku bulabe obuyinza okubatuukako.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, dano mapol gitye ki lworo I kom gwoko kuc ki ber bedo. Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni cik mite me gwoko lwak ki i kom peko ma twero bino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, ejai aiyalongong naepol noi kanu ayuara keda aijar najokan. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe ejokuka ikisila ayuarite itunga kama ejaasi atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, asi otiza e'yo ageitema ni azini aa'ta muke ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini azita eyi orodriru ongulumu eyi ma ta mbazu e'yo onzi ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, hariho okwerarikirira okweyongyeire ahaby'okwerinda n'amagara marungi. Abantu baingi nibateekateeka ngu ebiragiro nibyetengwa, okurinda abantu okutahikwaho kabi.

eng_prompt: The impact of viral infections on public health is a growing concern worldwide. Many of these diseases can escalate quickly, overwhelming healthcare systems and resulting in severe consequences.
lug_prompt: Ebiva mu bulwadde bw'akawuka ku bulamu bw'abantu byeyongedde okweraliikiriza mu nsi yonna. Obulwadde buno bungi busobola okusaasaana amangu, okutaataaganya eby'obulamu ne buvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Adwogi marac ma two korona kelo I kom yotkom pa lwak tye ka mede tutwal I wilobo lung. Pol pa two magi twero nya oyot-oyot tutwal, balo yub me yot-kom dok kelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Epone loepedoriata adekasinei nuka ekorona aitolitol angaleu naka itunga erai aiyalongong naepol noi kotoma akwap kere. Ipu adekasinei nu epedorete aiyatakin katipet, aitolitol nuka amukian kosodete ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo o'bu virasi ru 'diyi ni 'ye o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma dria ri eri asi otiza kari 'di ma alea ndulu ni i. Azo 'diyi ma karakara eyi ma omgbo tu mbeleru, eyini ani e'yo arojo ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu dika eyi ma e'yo onzi eyi ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'oburwaire aha magara g'abantu nibweyongyera okwerarikirira omunsi yoona. Zimwe aha ndwara ezi nizibaasa kweyongyera omu bwire butari bwa hare, zikareetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, healthcare facilities have implemented enhanced monitoring protocols. As a result, all individuals diagnosed with the virus are being closely monitored for any changes in their condition.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, amalwaliro gataddewo enkola ey'okulondoola. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bonna abazuuliddwamu akawuka balondoolebwa nnyo okulaba oba waliwo enkyukakyuka yonna mu mbeera yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, odi yadi gukati ki yoo mapat-pat me bedo ki wang mabit I kom two eni. Macalo adwogi ne, dano weng ma kinongo gi ki two eni kitye ka ngiyo gi pi aloka-loka mo keken matye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, etolomutu adekisia ainapeta nuka awanyanar adekasinei. Kanuka ngun, itunga kere lu inwakunono ekurut ewanyanaritai noi kanu aijulakin ejautenekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe COVID-19 niri ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, pari arojo ni 'diyi 'ba azita vuti ondaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba dria 'bani esu azo be 'diyi ma pamvu one e'yo ojata yini ma alia ci 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, amarwariro gataireho enkora y'okukyebera. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu boona abashangirwe baine akakooko bariyo nibarondoorwa kureeba ngu habaho empindahinduka omumbeera yaabo.

eng_prompt: In the competitive field of healthcare, attracting and retaining skilled professionals is essential for providing quality patient care. One effective strategy to achieve this is by offering attractive compensation packages.
lug_prompt: Mu kisaawe ky'ebyobulamu ekivuganya, okusikiriza n'okusigaza abakugu kyetaagisa okusobola okuwa abalwadde obujjanjabi obw'omutindo. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kuwaayo enkola z'okuliyirira ezisikiriza.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom matye ki pyem matek tutwal, kelo ki weko lutic ma ludiro obedo gin ma pire tek pi miyo kony me yot kom maber bot lutwo. Yoo acel maber me cobo man obedo miyo cul ma beco.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka amukian, aitelekaar ka aidar ipirioitin lu emisiaritos ejok kanu aijanakin adekak nuka adoketait najokan. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok kanu aitodolikin ngun ngesi ainakin ikapun lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: A'bala e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri ma alia, 'ba onita be 'diyi ma e'yo ejizu azini yi ma ta mbazuri eri orodriru azakoma fele 'ba azoru 'diyi driri fezu. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri geri 'bani 'ba ofezu geri ndrizaru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara ekirimu okuhayahayana, okureeta n'okusigaza abakugu n'eky'omugasho omu kuheereza abarwaire obujanjabi burungi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kuhikiiriza eki n'okureetaho enshohoza nungi.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak intensified, healthcare facilities implemented strict protocols to protect their staff. In preparation for the influx of cases, medical officers gathered essential protective gear.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde bwe kweyongera, amalwaliro gaassaawo enkola enkakali okukuuma abakozi baago. Mu kwetegekera okuyingira kw'abalwadde, abasawo baakuŋŋaanyizza eby'okwekuumisa ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma poto pa two ne omedde, odi yadi guketo cik matek tutwal me gwoko luticgi. I yubbe pi medde pa wel lutwoo, lutic yoto kom gu jogo jami ma mite me gwokke.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor abwangun naka adeka, apotu adekisia ibwaikisi ainapeta nuka ayuarite eswamak kec. Kanu aitemonokin kanu aiyatakinio naka adekak, apotu imurok otukutu iboro lu ayuara.
lgg_prompt: E'dota azo 'da niri ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, arojo eyi 'ba azita okporu eyi azi'ba eyivile 'diyi ma tambazu. Otuta 'ba azo be 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi tra afa tambaza ni orodriru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'oburwaire ku kweyongyeire, amarwariro gakataho engyenderwaho y'amaani okurinda abakozi baago. Omu kweteekateekyera okweyongyera kw'abarwaire, abashaho bakarundaana ebikwato by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: When faced with illness or injury, individuals often seek professional care. Hospitals serve as essential facilities where medical expertise and resources are readily available.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe bafuna obulwadde oba obuvune, batera okunoonya obujjanjabi bw'abakugu. Amalwaliro gakola ng'ebifo ebikulu awabeera obukugu n'ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Ka dano tye ki peko me two onyo awano, pol kare giyenyo kony ki bot ludiro. Odi yadi gitiyo macalo odi yadi mapigi tego kama ludiro ki jami tic yot kom tye iye.
teo_prompt: Karai etereikina keda adekasinei arai amusungut, etapit itunga aimo amukian kama ejaasi ipirioitin. Iswamaete adekisia kwape aiboisio nu epol ajokis ne ejaas ipirioitin keda iboro lu amukian.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka dri fu azo kani nya'biliko eyi be, eyi tutuni eyi nda dakitari eyi vu. Arojo eyi azi nga ekile pari orodriru 'ba nita be e'yo rua alanisi azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ni aa'zu 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuba baine oburwire nainga obuhuta, nibaronda obuhwezi bw'abakugu. Amarwariro nigakora nk'emyanya y'omugasho ahu obukugu n'ebintu by'okukoresa biriho.

eng_prompt: The ongoing pandemic has had a devastating impact on many sectors of society, including politics. In a tragic turn of events, several lawmakers have succumbed to the virus.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso kikosezza nnyo ebitundu by'abantu bingi omuli n'ebyobufuzi. Mu nkyukakyuka ey'ennaku, ababaka ba palamenti bangi bafudde akawuka.
ach_prompt: Two ma opoto ni okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kabedo mapat-pat me kwo pa dano, ma I kingi obedo lok me cungu iwi-bye. I kare me peko madit tutwal, luwang lwak I ot moko cik mapol gutoo pi two corona.
teo_prompt: Adeka na elosi akonye nes emunarit noi aiboisio nuipu nuka itunga, aimoriarit nuka epolitikis. Kotoma aijulakineta nuarokok, atwakata imeeban luka airabet luipu kanuka adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ebi e'yo onzi 'ye ongulumu eyi ma eselea tualu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi pie. E'yo onzi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara legiko ni 'diyi odra azo 'da si.
nyn_prompt: Endwara ruranda nsi erikugyenda omu maisho, ekozire kihango omu bantu, otwariiremu n'eby'obutegyeki. Omu nshonga y'akabi munonga, abakiiki baingi baisirwe akakooko ka korona.

eng_prompt: Access to effective healthcare is crucial for individuals facing various health challenges. Without appropriate intervention, their conditions may worsen, leading to further complications.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obulungi kya mugaso nnyo eri abantu ssekinnoomu aboolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okw'enjawulo. Awatali kuyingira mu nsonga mu ngeri esaanira, embeera zaabwe ziyinza okwonooneka, ekiviirako ebizibu ebirala.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom maber pire tek tutwal pi dano matye ka nongo peko me yot kom. Labongo timo gin mo maber, kwogi twero doko rac dok kelo peko mapol.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian najokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas itunga lu ejaas keda atiokisio nuegelegela. Arai mam itemokinitai ejok, epedorete ejautenekec aibucaret, ido eyangauni atiokisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo rua alanisi kililiru 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru 'ba e'yo rua alanisi ndundu 'diyi be 'diyi dri. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma aza kozu kililiru kuri kokoru, eyi ma aa'ta ni nga i eza ra, dika e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni nga tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obujanjabi burungi n'eky'omugasho aha bantu abarikubugana oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara butari bumwe na bumwe. Hatariho ebirikwetengwa,embeera yaabo neebaasa kweyongyera kuba mbi, ekirikubaasa kureetaho oburemeezi obundi.

eng_prompt: Many farmers rely on various agricultural practices to sustain their livelihoods. Among these practices, raising livestock has proven to be a viable option for generating revenue.
lug_prompt: Abalimi bangi beesigama ku nnima ez'enjawulo okusobola okweyimirizaawo. Mu nkola zino, okulunda ebisolo kweyolese ng'engeri ennungi ey'okufunamu ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Lupur mapol gijenge I kom pur mapatpat me gwoko kwo gi. I kin jami magi, gwoko lee obedo yoo maber me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi akoriok luipu keda iponesio lu akoru luegelegela kanu aijar kec. Kotoma aswamisio nu, etijenaritai aipit ibaren kwape epone loajokan loka adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba karakara 'diyi yi ati geri agirikica ni ndundu 'diyi ma dria yi ma idri ta mbazu. Yeta 'diyi ma eselea, anyapa eyi ma tambaza e'da i ekile geri azi orodriru robia esuzu ni i.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa baingi nibagyendera aha mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa etari emwe n'emwe okubaisaho amagara gaabo. Omu mirimo egi, okuriisa amatungo n'omuringo murungi gw'okutungamu entaasya.

eng_prompt: Live music events serve as a vibrant gathering place for diverse audiences. They create an atmosphere where individuals from various backgrounds come together to share in the experience.
lug_prompt: Ebivvulu by'ennyimba obutereevu bikola ng'ekifo eky'okukuŋŋaaniramu abantu ab'enjawulo. Zireetawo embeera abantu okuva mu mbeera ez'enjawulo mwe bakolera awamu okugabana ku bye bayitamu.
ach_prompt: Yub me wer makwako kom dano weng tye macalo kabedo ma dano mapol gure iye. Giyubu kabedo kama dano ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat cokke kacel me nongo ngec.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete aitodianareta nuka ikososinei kwape aiboisit na itunga luegelegela atukonokin. Itolomunenete kesi ejautene loepedoriata itunga luka aiboisio nuegelegela aimorikikin kanu aimor akiro.
lgg_prompt: Avita ongo cozani 'diyi azi nga pari 'ba esele ndu ndu yi trazuri ru. Eyi angu azi fe 'ba engapi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini emuzu tualu e'yo eyini esu 'diyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Emikoro y'okweshongora neekora nk'omwanya murungi gw'okuteeraniramu abantu b'emiringo etari emwe. Nibareetaho embeera abantu abarikuruga omu myanya etarikushushana ahu barikubaasa kwegaita hamwe.

eng_prompt: As communities gather to discuss important issues, the close proximity of individuals can create an environment conducive to transmission. This is especially concerning in the context of ongoing health crises.
lug_prompt: Nga ebitundu bikungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga enkulu, okusemberera kw'abantu kinnoomu kusobola okutondawo embeera eyanguyira okusaasaana. Kino kyeraliikiriza naddala mu mbeera y'ebizibu by'ebyobulamu ebigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ka lwak gure me nywako lok I kom lok mapigi tego, bedo cok pa dano acel acel twero kelo kabedo maber me nyayo two. Man pire tek tutwalle I kare me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok, aimorikikina naka itunga epedori aitolomun ejautene loejok kanu awea naka ekorona. Erai na ibore yenepol noi kotupitete atiokisio nuka angaleu nu elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini okuzu tualu agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria, aa'ta 'ba eyi ma eselea ogogo ri eco e'yo eyi ma ereta ma omgbo otu ra. E'yo 'di tuni asi otizaru e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga nkuru, okukwatanisa kw'abantu nikureetaho embeera nungi y'okujanjaza oburwaire. Eki n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, humans have sought ways to mark significant life events, creating rituals that bring meaning and connection. These traditions serve as a reflection of our shared experiences and emotions, binding communities together in times of joy and sorrow.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu banoonye engeri z'okujjukiramu ebintu ebikulu mu bulamu, nga bakola emikolo egileeta amakulu n'okukwatagana. Eby'obuwangwa bino biraga bye tuyiseemu n'enneewulira zaffe, ebikwataganya ebitundu wamu mu biseera by'essanyu n'ennaku.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, dano gubedo ka yenyo yoo me kwero jami ma pigi tego I kwo gi, ki yubu kwer ma kelo tyen lok ki kubbe. Tekwaro magi nyutu jami ma wanongo kacel ki kit ma wawinyo kwede, kubu kabedo wa kacel ikare me yomcwiny ki cwer cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, aimo itunga iponesio luka ainumunum akiro nuapolok nuka aijar, aitolomun ineresinei lu eyangaunete ajokis keda arucokina. Iswamaete inonosio lu kwape aanyunet naka akiro nuetapit oni keda aomisiowok, aimorikikin itunga nepepe kotoma apakio nuka aiyalama keda apipil.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi nda geri eyini ecozu e'yo orodriru idri ma alea 'diyi inzizu, eyi e'do e'yo eyi 'yepi orodriru azini eyi ecipi eyi ma eselea 'diyi. E'yo a'bini 'diyi azi nga e'yo amani esu tualu 'diyi e'dazu, ongulumu eyi eci tualu sa'wa ayiko ni 'diyi ma alea tualu sa'wa candiru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu batwire nibasherura oburyo bw'okujaguza ebyabaireho omu magara gaabo, barikutandikaho emikoro erikureetaho amakuru n'okukwatanisa. Eby'obuhangwa ebi nibyoreka ebiturikuhurira hamwe n'enyehurira zaitu, nitukwatanisa hamwe omu bwire bw'okushemererwa n'obusaasi.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and despair, communities often turn to their faith for solace and guidance. These sacred spaces provide a sense of belonging and support, fostering resilience among their congregants.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okuggwaamu essuubi, abantu baddukira mu nzikiriza zaabwe okufuna okubudaabudibwa n'obulagirizi. Ebifo bino ebitukuvu biwa enneewulira y'okukwatagana n'obuwagizi, okutumbula obugumu mu bakulisitaayo babyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki turcwiny, lwak pol kare gilokke bot dini gi pi nongo kwe cwiny ki tira. Kabedo maleng magi weko dano giwinyo ni gitye kacel dok bene gi tye ka miyo kony, ma weko dano bedo ki tekcwiny ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus ajenanut keda amunokina, etapit itunga aijulakin aiyuunikec kanu agangat keda aingarenikinio. Ijainikinete aiboisio nu ainanakinete itunga aomisioit naka aimorikikina keda igangitokokec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini ava ako ni 'diyi ma alia, ongulumu eyi sa'wa driasi eyi oja eyi ma aita eyi vu asi omiza esuzu azini imbata esuzu. Angu alatararu 'diyi 'ba eyi ma eselea atita fe eyini eyini ani aa'zu eyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa n'okwerarikirira, abantu nibahindukirira enyikiriza zaabo kutunga okuhuumurizibwa n'obuhabuzi. Emyanya egi erikwera neehereza abantu ekiteekateeko ky'okuba hamwe n'obuhwezi, ekirikureetaho amaani omu bantu baayo.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, individuals often seek ways to unwind and escape their daily routines. Socializing and enjoying entertainment are popular methods for relaxation and enjoyment.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, abantu batera okunoonya engeri z'okuwummulamu n'okudduka emirimu gyabwe egya buli lunaku. Okukungaana n'okunyumirwa eby'amasanyu y'engeri emanyiddwa ennyo ey'okuwummulamu n'okunyumirwa.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, dano ipol kare giyenyo yoo me weko tic gi me nino ducu. Bedo kacel ki dano ki nongo mit pa galo wang obedo yoo ma oywek tutwal me nongo yweyo ki yomcwiny.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejai atipet, etapit itunga aimo iponesio luka aiyengun kosodete alakun aswamisinei kec nuka nginiparan. Aimorikikin keda itunga ka ainumunum aitelelio eraasi iwaitin luejenara noi luka aiyengun ka aitelelio.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, 'ba alu alu yi sawa driasi geri nda ava liza esuzu azini apazu e'yo yini 'yele o'du driasi 'diyi vurisi. Aa'ta tualu azini ayiko esuzu e'yo ayiko fezani 'diyi geri 'ba eyini ava lizu azini ayiko esuzu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani maingi, abantu nibasherura oburyo bw'okuhuumura n'okutoroka omu mirimo yaabo eya buriizooba. Okukorengana hamwe n'okushemererwa n'omuringo ogurikumanywa munonga gw'okushemererwa n'okushemererwa.

eng_prompt: After years of reckless behavior and repeated offenses, it became clear that he had crossed too many lines. The community was growing increasingly frustrated with the lack of accountability for his actions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga yeeyisa mu ngeri ey'obulagajjavu era ng'akola ensobi eziwerako, kyeyoleka kaati nti yali ayise mu mitendera mingi. Abantu beeyongera okunyiiga olw'obutaba na mbalirira ku bikolwa bye.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tim maraco ki bal ma obedo ka timme teretere, nen atyer kamaleng ni en otimo jami mapol tutwal. Lwak gubedo ki cwer cwiny madit tutwal I kom lok me pe miyo kor tic ma en otimo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka iponesio lumam epodokinito ka aibucaret, apotu kojenutu ebe abu ngesi kotub aiboisio nuipu noi. Apotu itunga lu atutubet onyunyurasi noi kanu amamus aitodun eipone lo iswamat ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini aa'zu e'yo kokoru azini e'yo onzi 'yezu dika dika 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini eri ali e'yo angiri 'bo. Ongulumu 'da eyi ma asi eza e'yo 'bani e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria e'yo nzezu kuye risi.
