eng_prompt: In an effort to encourage corporate responsibility and support public services, the government has implemented a new incentive program. As part of this initiative, every company that pays taxes receives a special reward.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukubiriza obuvunaanyizibwa mu bitongole n'okuwagira obuweereza bw'olukale, gavumenti etaddewo enteekateeka empya ey'okusikiriza abantu. Nga ekitundu ku nteekateeka eno, buli kkampuni esasula omusolo efuna empeera ey'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I tute me cuku cwiny dul mapat-pat me timo tic gi ki konyo tic pa lwak, gamente okatti ki yub manyen me miyo kony. Macalo but yub man, dul mo keken ma culu mucoro nongo mic ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aisinyikokit aswamisinei nuka ikampunin ka aigang aijaanakinio naka itunga, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ekampuni kere loetaci isolosinei edumunenei eropit loitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo azi ngazu tualu azini atita fezu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma dria, gamete e'do otita azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, amuti dria musoro ofepi 'diyi dria dria dria dria esu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho obujunanizibwa omu bitongore n'okushagika obuheereza bwa gavumenti, gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'okushemeza abantu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, buri kampuni erikushashura emishoro netunga ekiconco ky'omutaano.

eng_prompt: Understanding the financial obligations of a company is crucial for effective budgeting and planning. One key aspect of these obligations is the various taxes that businesses are required to pay.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera obuvunaanyizibwa bwa kkampuni mu by'ensimbi kya mugaso nnyo mu kukola embalirira n'okuteekateeka obulungi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikwata ku buvunaanyizibwa buno bye misolo egy'enjawulo bizineesi gye zirina okusasula.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma dul mo omyero oti kwede ki lim pire tek tutwal pi yubu byek me lim ki yub maber. Gin acel ma pire tek ma lubbe ki tic magi obedo mucoro ma biacara mapat-pat omyero gucul.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin nuka ikapun luka ekampuni erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitemonokin nuka ebajet. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luka aswamisio nu ngesi isolosinei lu ekotoi agwelanarak aitac.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni amuti ma dria 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru otita ajeni kililiru ri 'yezu. E'yo azi okporu e'yo 'diyi ma dria ri eri musoro ndundu 'bani le tujari eyi ma ofe 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza obujunanizibwa bwa kampuni omu by'empiiha n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kukora embaririra n'okuteekateekyera kurungi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikukwata aha bujunanizibwa obu n'emishoro etari emwe n'emwe ei bizinesi zishemereire kushashura.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost local economies and support small businesses, the government has announced a series of new economic measures. One of the most significant changes is the removal of taxes on roadside shops.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenfuna by'ekitundu n'okuwagira bizinensi entonotono, gavumenti erangiridde enkola empya ez'ebyenfuna. Emu ku nkyukakyuka enkulu kwe kuggyawo emisolo ku maduuka agali ku mabbali g'enguudo.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me lim ki biacara matino tino, gamente otyeko cwalo lok angeya manyen mapat-pat makwako lim. Alokaloka acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye kwanyo mucoro iwi dukan ma iteng gudi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolor edumune loka ikapun keda aigang ibiasaran ludidik, elimorit apugan iboro luipu luitetiak luka edumune loka ikapun. Adiopet kotoma aijulanakineta nuepolok noi ngesi alemario naka isolosinei luka idukai lu orotin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu tujari were 'diyi atizu, gamete azi e'yo ndu ndu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria. Ojata azi okporu ndeni 'diyi ma azi eri musoro 'bani oli dukani nzila tia 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'entatsya n'okushagika eby'obushubuzi ebikye, gavumenti erangirire engyenderwaho nsya omu by'entatsya. Emwe aha mpindahinduka enkuru n'okwihaho emishoro aha maduuka agari aha rubaju rw'enguuto.

eng_prompt: Businesses often seek effective strategies to enhance customer retention and satisfaction. One key aspect of this is understanding the importance of recognizing and appreciating those who consistently choose your brand.
lug_prompt: Bizinensi zitera okunoonya engeri ennungi ey'okukuumamu bakasitoma n'okubaleetera okumatizibwa. Ekimu ku bikulu mu kino kwe kutegeera omugaso gw'okusiima n'okusiima abo abatera okulonda ekika kyo.
ach_prompt: Biacara ipol kare gi yenyo yoo maber me weko luwil gi bedo ki yomcwiny. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I lok man obedo niang ber pa pwoyo ki pwoyo jo ma yero jami mamegi kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc ibiasaran aimo iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aidar agwelak keda aiyalama. Adiopet koboro luapolok luka ngun ngesi amisiikin ajokis naka ajenun ka aisiyalamikin ngul lu eseunete ekirorikon.
lgg_prompt: Tujura eyi sa'wa driasi geri kililiru 'diyi nda aje'ba eyi ma tambazu eyini ani aa'zu ayikosi. E'yo azi okporu 'di ma azi eri vata ma orodri egazu azini awa'difo fezu 'ba mi ma wura pe'baa 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obushubuzi buriijo nibisherura oburyo burungi bw'okureeba ngu bakasitoma bagumizemu n'okumarwa. Ekikuru munonga omuri eki n'okwetegyereza omugasho gw'okumanya n'okusiima abo abarikukuratira enteekateeka yaawe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maximize their profits, many small business owners often seek ways to minimize their expenses. One common strategy they employ is to avoid paying taxes altogether.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula amagoba gaabwe, bannanyini bizinensi entono banoonya engeri z'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya yaabwe. Akakodyo akamu ke bakozesa kwe kwewala okusasula emisolo.
ach_prompt: I tute gi me medo magoba gi, lutim biacara matino pol kare gi yenyo yoo me dwoko piny wel cente ma gitiyo kwede. Yoo acel ma gitiyo kwede en aye me weyo culu mucoro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor ameda kec, etapit ikulepek ibiasaran lu ikidioko aimo iwaitin lu aitidisiar ikapunukec. Adiopet ewai lo itwasamaete kesi ngesi ainac aitac isolosinei cut.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu orodri eyini esu ri ma omgbo otuzu, tujari nyiri eyi ma e'ipi karakara eyi geri nda eyini ani robia eyini ayu ri ma omgbo esizu. Otita azi alu yini ayu ri eri musoro ofezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera amagoba gaabo, bakama ba bizinesi bakye nibaronda oburyo bw'okukyendeeza aha nshohoza yaabo. Omuringo gumwe ogu barikukoresa n'okwetantara kimwe okushashura emishoro.

eng_prompt: In many communities, domestic violence remains a pervasive issue that often goes unaddressed. Establishing a local judicial system could provide the necessary support and resources for victims seeking justice.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, obutabanguko mu maka bukyali kizibu ekibunye buli wamu nga tekikolebwako. Okuteekawo ekitongole ekiramuzi mu kitundu kiyinza okuwa obuyambi obwetaagisa n'ebikozesebwa eri abakoseddwa abanoonya obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tim gero me ot pud tye peko madit tutwal ma pol kare pe kitiyo iye. Keto yub me ngolo kop I tedero twero miyo kony ki jami ma mite pi joo ma onongo peko ma mito ngolo kop atir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu, eringa amumu naka ikalia erai ationis naepol noi na mam itemokitai. Aitolomun ewai lo atubok kotoma atutubet epedori aijaikin agangat keda iboro lu itunga lu ekotosi aitodun etube loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, ngiringiri aku eselesi ri ni nga po'di e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma aza kozu ku ni i. Geri e'yo liza ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma e'dota ni nga atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fe 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi dri e'yo liza kililiru lepi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi,obutabanguko omu maka bukiri ekizibu ekirikujanjaara munonga kandi ekitarikukira kukorwaho. Okutandikaho enkora y'oburamuzi omu byaro, nikibaasa kuheereza obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa ahari abo abarikuteganisibwa okuronda oburingaaniza.

eng_prompt: In response to escalating political tensions and widespread protests, the Ugandan government implemented drastic measures to control the situation. As a result, access to the internet was completely cut off across the country.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke bw'ebyobufuzi obweyongera n'okwekalakaasa okwabaddewo, gavumenti ya Uganda yakozesa enkola ey'amaanyi okufuga embeera. N'ekyavaamu, intaneeti yasalibwako ddala mu ggwanga lyonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa telle me cungu iwi bye ki jemo mapol, gamente me Uganda okatti ki yoo matek me gengo peko ne. Macalo adwogi ne, kijuko tic ki intanet I but lobo man weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka epolitikis keda aidiya naepol, abu apugan nako Uganda kitolomu nuepedorete aswam kanu aitikitik ejautene. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolemunai elago kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako politiki ni tupi tu 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi pie, gamete Uganda niri 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi e'yo nde ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba li geri oli internetniri kari 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ya Uganda, ahabw'obutabanguko bw'eby'obutegyeki obweyongyeire hamwe n'okwesharinga kw'abantu baingi, ekataho emiringo y'amaani y'okureeberera embeera. Ekyarugiremu, intaneeti ekacwekyerezibwa omu ihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: As the holiday season approaches, many people begin their shopping in anticipation of celebrations. This increased demand often leads to noticeable changes in the market.
lug_prompt: Ng'ennaku enkulu zisembera, abantu bangi batandika okugula ebintu nga beetegekera ebikujjuko. Obwetaavu buno obweyongedde butera okuvaako enkyukakyuka mu katale.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me karama tye ka cok, dano mapol gicako wilo jami gi ikare me kwero karama. Medde pa miti eni ipol kare kelo aloka-loka I cuk.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aparasia nuapolok, egeunete itunga luipu agwel iborokec kanu aidar ainumunum. Eipuda lo lo iyatakinitai eyangauni aijulanakineta nuipu noi kosokoni.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti natali niri ni ecazu ogogo risi, 'ba karakara eyi e'do afa eyi je eyini ayiko zu 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi lezu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ni tutuni ojata eji cuu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obwiire bw'okujaguza ku burikuhika haihi, abantu baingi nibatandika kugura ebintu, barikutegyereza ebiro bikuru. Okweyongyera kw'ebyetaago, nikureetaho empindahinduka omu katare.

eng_prompt: In response to increasing health concerns, many businesses have implemented new hygiene protocols. One of the most noticeable changes is the requirement for customers to sanitize their hands before entering.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera, bizinensi nnyingi zitadde mu nkola enkola empya ez'obuyonjo. Emu ku nkyukakyuka ezirabikako kwe kusaba bakasitoma okunaaba mu ngalo nga tebannayingira.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede, biacara mapol guketo cik manyen me gwoko lengo itic. Alokaloka acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye ni luwil omyero gubed ka lwoko cinggi ki sanitizer ma peya gudonyo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo naka angaleu, etolomutu ibiasaran iponesio luitetiak luka aila. Adiopet kotoma aijulanakineta nuejenara noi ngesi ebe ibusakinit agwelak aisanitiza akaninikec eringa elomaria.
lgg_prompt: E'yo rua ala ni tupi tutu 'diyi ma aza kozu, tujari karakara eyi e'do azita alata ni o'diru 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Ojata azi e'dapi saaru ri lezu 'ba aje'ba ru 'diyi ma osu eyi ma dri sanitayiza si raka de nga po'di eyi fi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara ezyeyongyeire, bizinesi nyingi ziteire omu nkora engyenderwaho nsya y'eby'obuyonjo. Kimwe aha mpindahinduka ezirikureebeka munonga n'eky'okwetenga ngu bakasitoma bakorese sanitaiza omu ngaro batakatahire.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating health crisis, the government mobilized various resources to combat the outbreak. Among these efforts, the army was deployed to assist in containment and prevention measures.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera, gavumenti yakunga ebintu eby'enjawulo okulwanyisa okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde. Mu kaweefube ono, amagye gaayiiriddwa okuyamba mu kutangira n'okutangira obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede, gamente ocoko jami mapol me lweny i kom poto pa two eni. I kin tic magi, ki cwalo mony me konyo I gengo ki gengo nyayo two.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na iyatakin, abu apugan ingalau iboro luegelegela kanu aitikitik abwangun naka adeka. Kotoma aswamisio nu, aponi ibwaikinai ajore aingarakin kotoma aitikitik keda aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete tra afa ndundu eyi a'di 'dizu azo korona niri be. Okpo 'dayi ma eselea, 'ba 'ba asikari eyi azakoma fezu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu azini e'yo eyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire,gavumenti ekakoresa ebintu bingi kurwanisa okubarukaho kw'endwara. Omubikorwa ebi, amahe gakasindikwa kuhwera omu kurwanisa n'okuzibira.

eng_prompt: Many individuals often self-diagnose their ailments based on online information. As a result, they may choose to start treatment without consulting a healthcare professional.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi batera okwekebera obulwadde bwabwe nga beesigama ku bubaka ku mikutu gya yintaneeti. N'ekivuddemu, bayinza okusalawo okutandika obujjanjabi nga tebeebuuzizza ku basawo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gingeyo peko me two gi kengi kun gitiyo ki intanet. Macalo adwogi ne, giromo yero me cako nongo yat labongo lok ki ludaktari.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu etapit aingic adekasinei kec bon kotupitete akiro nuka elago. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kesi aseun ageun amukian komam ipegeta keda epirioit lo adekis.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi eyi ma azo eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi si geri o'duko eyini esu geri oli aliasi 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, eyi eco pe aro e'dozu eyi ma dria azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibeshwijuma endwara zaabo barikwihirira ahamahurire agari aha mikutu. N'ekyarugiremu, nibabaasa kusharaho kutandika kuragurirwa batagambireho n'omushaho.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, authorities implemented strict measures to contain the spread of the virus. As a result, individuals who tested positive or were exposed to the virus are being isolated in designated facilities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko, ab'obuyinza baateekawo enkola enkakali okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka. N'ekivuddemu, abantu abazuuliddwamu oba abakwatibwako akawuka bali mu kwawulibwa mu bifo ebyateekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutela guketo cik matek tutwal me gengo nya pa two eni. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ma kinongo ni gitye ki two onyo kinongo ni gitye ki two gitye ka poko gioo ki jo mukene i kabedo ma kiyubu pi gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka ekorona, apotu apedorosio itolomutu ikisila luikidioko kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona. Kanuka ngun, itunga lu inwakunitai ekorona arai lu apotu kodumutu ekorona eutai atiakar kotoma aiboisio nu eseunitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi 'ba geri okporu eyi azo 'da ma ereta atrizu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'bani esu azo be 'diyi ma esele co pari 'bani ope 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, ab'obushoborozi bakataho emiringo y'amaani y'okurwanisa okujanjaara kw'akakooko. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abashangirwe baine akakooko ka muzibwe nainga ababaire baine akakooko ka muzibwe, nibatwarwa omu myanya eteirweho.

eng_prompt: It's important to prioritize your safety and well-being. There are certain areas that are off-limits for a reason.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okukulembeza obukuumi bwo n'obulungi bwo. Waliwo ebifo ebimu ebikugirwa olw'ensonga.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me keto ber bedo megi obed gin ma pire tek. Tye kabedo mukene ma dano pe twero donyo iye pi tyen lok mo.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aisingarenit ayuwara kon keda aijar kon. Ejaasi aiboisio ace numam ecamakitai alomar kanuka akirot.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru mini e'yo mi agei tema ni azini aa'ta muke ri 'duzu okporu. Angu azi 'bani lezu 'ba ma fi yi ma alia ku 'diyi ci e'yo azi si.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kwebembeza eby'okwerinda n'okuba gye kwawe. Hariho emyanya emwe etarikwikirizibwa ahabw'eshonga.

eng_prompt: With the recent outbreak making headlines, many are concerned about its potential impact on public health. Experts are urging everyone to stay informed and take necessary precautions.
lug_prompt: Olw'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde mu mawulire, bangi beeraliikirivu ku ngeri gye kiyinza okukosaamu obulamu bw'abantu. Abakugu bakubiriza buli omu okumanya n'okwegendereza.
ach_prompt: Ki poto pa two man ma okato cokcok-ki I wi lok angeya, dano mapol tye ki lworo I kom adwogi ne I kom yotkom pa lwak. Ludiro tye ka lego dano weng me bedo ki ngec ki gwokke.
teo_prompt: Keda abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona kotelebision, epodokitos itunga luipu nuikamunitos epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol angaleu naka itunga. Isinyikokitos ipirioitin itunga kere aijen ka aidar iboro lu ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi asi otiza be e'yo erini eco 'ye o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma dria ri ma dria. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi ai 'ba dria eyi aa'zu o'dukoti be eyini ani e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, abantu baingi niberarikirira oku kirikubaasa kukwata aha magara g'abantu. Abakugu nibashaba buri omwe okuguma naamanya kandi akore eby'okwerinda ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: After hearing the news about her passing, I felt an overwhelming sense of loss. The memories we shared flooded my mind, bringing tears to my eyes.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnawulira amawulire agakwata ku kufa kwe, nnawulira nga nfiiriddwa nnyo. Ebintu bye twayogerako byanziza mu birowoozo, ne nkulukusa amaziga.
ach_prompt: I nge winyo lok angea me too ne, abedo ki arem cwiny madit tutwal. Wiya opong ki jami mabeco ma wapoko i kare ma watye ka lok, man okelo pig wang.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na apupun iyemuto nuikamunitos atwanareke, abu eong apupi atwaniar naepol noi. Apotu akiro nuapotu sio imorata kilelebunos kotoma aomisioka, ido abu akonyokonyok akoi.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo eri ma drata ma dria 'diyi erizu 'bori ma vutia, ma etumu e'yo 'bani eri avizuri ma dria onzi. E'yo amani e'yo nzezu ama eselea 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma omi ma dria tre, dika eyi ma milea tiza eji.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira amakuru g'okufa kwe, nkahurira okufeerwa kw'amaani. Ebintu ebi twabaire nitugaaniiraho, bikanyijusya ebiteekateeko byangye, byandeetera amarira omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In a recent press conference, the president emphasized the importance of investing in scientific research and innovation. He highlighted that attracting top talent in the field is crucial for the nation's progress.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire gye buvuddeko, pulezidenti yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okusiga ensimbi mu kunoonyereza kwa ssaayansi n'obuyiiya. Yakikkaatirizza nti okusikiriza ebitone mu kisaawe kikulu nnyo eri enkulaakulana y'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I kacokke pa luco lok angeya ma otime cokcok-ki, ladit lobo owaco ni pire tek tutwal me keto lim I kwed me cayanc ki diro manyen. En owaco ni kelo dano ma gitye ki diro me timo tic enoni pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka arotak iyemuto napac, abu lokapolon akwap kitogogong ajokis naka aipikakin ikapun toma aingic naka esayanis keda acoasinei nuitetiak. Abu ngesi kitogogong ebe aitelekaar itunga luejaasi keda atalanta kotoma akwap erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi be o'diru ri ma alea, prisdent 'da fe okpo orodri 'bani robia ayuzu e'yo eti ondaza sayansini 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. Eri ece e'yo kini 'ba talanta onyiru ndeni 'diyi ma e'yo ejizu angu 'di ma alea ri eri orodriru tu kari ma zota ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, omwebembezi w'eihanga akahamya omugasho gw'okuta esente omu kucondooza kwa sayansi n'okujumbura. Akashoborora ngu okushendashenda abaine etaraanta n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: The healthcare community is grappling with the devastating impact of the ongoing pandemic. In recent weeks, the virus has claimed the lives of several dedicated professionals.
lug_prompt: Ekisaawe ky'ebyobulamu kirwanagana n'ebizibu ebiva mu ssenyiga omukambwe agenda mu maaso. Mu wiiki eziyise, akawuka katutte obulamu bw'abakugu abawerako abeewaddeyo.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom tye ka lweny ki peko ma two ma opoto ni okelo. I cabit ma okato ni, kwidi ne oneko ludiro mapol.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi itunga luka angaleu keda atiokisio nuka adeka naka ekorona. Kosabitin lu atuboros, ayari ekorona aijar naka ipirioitin luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu arojo ni 'diyi dri ci e'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ni 'diyi be. Sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, azo 'da o'di 'ba azi ngapi okporu 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara nibarwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'endwara ruranda nsi erikugyenda omu maisho. Omu sande ezihweire, akakooko kataireho amagara g'abakugu baingi.

eng_prompt: In order to provide the best care for patients, healthcare professionals must prioritize their interpersonal skills. This is especially important in high-pressure environments like government hospitals, where interactions can significantly impact patient outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuwa abalwadde obujjanjabi obulungi, abasawo balina okukulembeza obukugu bwabwe mu kukolagana n'abantu. Kino kya mugaso nnyo mu bifo eby'obunkenke nga amalwaliro ga gavumenti, okukwatagana gye kuyinza okukosa ennyo ebyava mu balwadde.
ach_prompt: Pi miyo kony maber loyo ki lutwo, lutic yoto kom omyero guket cwiny gi i kom kit me tic ki dano. Man pire tek tutwalle I kabedo matye ki lyeto madit tutwal calo odi yadi pa gamente, kama winye twero kelo adwogi maber I kom lutwo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aijanakin adekak amukian najokan, ekot eswamak luka angaleu aisingarenit acoa kec naka aiswamanara keda itunga. Erai na ibore yenepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuepolok noi kwape adekisia nuka apugan, ne epedoriata aiswamanara keda adekak aitojokaar eswamae loka adekak.
lgg_prompt: Lezu azakoma kililiru fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri, le azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma 'ba e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi okporu. Diri orodriru tuni angu okporu ekile arojo gamete ni 'diyi le 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ni ecozu e'yo 'yezu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abakugu omu by'amagara, okubaasa kuheereza abarwaire obujanjabi burungi, bashemereire kwebembeza emyoga yaabo y'okukorengana n'abantu. Eki n'eky'omugasho munonga omu myanya y'oburemeezi nka amarwariro ga gavumenti, ahu okukorengana kurikubaasa kukora kihango ahamikorere y'abarwaire.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, health officials have implemented strict monitoring measures. As a result, individuals diagnosed with the virus are being closely tracked for their health and safety.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bataddewo enkola enkakali ey'okulondoola. N'ekivuddemu, abantu abazuuliddwamu akawuka balondoolwa nnyo olw'obulamu bwabwe n'obukuumi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, lutic me yot kom guketo yub matek tutwal me bedo ki wang mabit I kom two eni. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ma kinongo ni gitye ki two eni kitye ka lubu korgi pi ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu ainapeta nuka awanyanar. Kanuka ngun, itunga lu inwakunono ekorona eutasi aanyanar kanu angaleukec keda ayuwarakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba azita okporu eyi e'yo eyi ma pamvu onezu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba 'bani esu azo be 'diyi ma pamvu andri eyi ma rua ala azini ageitema eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, ab'ebyamagara bateireho enkora y'amaani y'okureebuuza. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abarikushangwa baine akakooko bariyo nibarondoorwa munonga ahabw'amagara gaabo n'oburinzi bwabo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of anticipation and uncertainty, the hospital staff gathered in the lobby, eager to meet their new colleague. Rumors had circulated about the doctor's impressive credentials and innovative approach to medicine.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okusuubira okumala wiiki eziwera n'obutali bukakafu, abakozi b'eddwaliro baakuŋŋaanidde mu kisenge, nga beesunga okusisinkana munnaabwe omupya. Olugambo lwali lubunye ku biwandiiko by'omusawo oyo ebyewuunyisa n'enkola ye ey'obuyiiya mu by'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me bedo ki byek, lutic me ot yat gucokke I ot madit, ma cwinygi obedo yom me rwate ki luticgi manyen. Lok angea obedo kawot I kom ngec pa daktar enoni ki kit ma en tiyo kwede ki diro me cango two.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aomisio keda amamut aomisio, apotu eswamak lu adekis kotukokinos orot, ekotosi airiamun keda ipaupakec luitetiak. Apotu akiro okerata nuikamunitos akiro nuejokuka nuka emuron ngol keda epone loitetet loka amukian.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia, 'ba azi ngapi arojo 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi angu 'da ma alea, eyini ava be eyi ma agyi o'diru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo onzi aci ndra dakitari 'da ma e'yo onyiru 'diyi ma dria azini geri aro esuzu o'diru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okutegyereza hamwe n'okwerarikirira, abakozi b'eirwariro baketeeranira omu kishengye ky'okureebereramu, baine ekihika ky'okubugana bataahi baabo abasya. Orugambo rukaba rwajanjaire aha bikwatireine n'ebihandiiko by'omushaho n'omuringo murungi gw'okukoresa emibazi.

eng_prompt: Many small-scale farmers struggle to expand their operations due to financial constraints. As a result, they often find themselves limited in their ability to increase production.
lug_prompt: Abalimi abatonotono bangi balwana okugaziya emirimu gyabwe olw'ebbula ly'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwesanga nga bakendeezeddwa mu busobozi bwabwe okwongera ku bifulumizibwa.
ach_prompt: Lupur matino-tino mapol nongo peko me dongo ticgi pi peko me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare ginongo ni pe gitye ki kero me medo rwom me jami ma giyubu.
teo_prompt: Akoriok luipu lu ikidioko etionikinit aisiekikin aswamukec naarai ikidioko ikapun. Kanuka ngun, mam kesi epedoritos aiyatakin aitolomunun iboro.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba kalafe weresi 'diyi dri ci eyi ma tujari ma omgbo otuzu e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi eyi esu okpo eyini ecozu afa ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa bakye nibarwana kwongyera aha mirimo yaabo ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kushanga ngu tibarikubaasa kwongyera ahaby'amasharuura gaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising COVID-19 cases, the city council held an emergency meeting. After much deliberation, they decided to implement strict measures to ensure public safety.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, akakiiko k'ekibuga kaatuuza olukiiko olw'amangu. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, baasalawo okuteekawo enkola enkakali okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, kancil me boma madit obedo ki kacokke ma opoto atura. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi me keto cik matek me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak itic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luedekasi adeka naka ekorona, abu ekansulo loka eibuga iriamunos katipet. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu kesi ocamutu aitegear ikisila lu eyuara kanu ayuarite itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, kanisulu aku ambu city niri niri 'ye mitingi mbeleru ni. E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi ai 'yeta okporu 'diyi 'bazu o'bi eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire,akakiiko k'orurembo kakakora orukiiko rw'amaani. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, bakasharamu kutaho enkora y'amaani okurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: As the discussion progressed, he began to feel increasingly unwell. Despite his efforts to stay focused, it became clear that he was struggling to keep up.
lug_prompt: Emboozi bwe yagenda egenda mu maaso, yeeyongera okuwulira obubi. Wadde nga yafuba okusigala ng'afaayo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti yali alwana okusigala ng'afaayo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nywako lok ne omedde, en ocako winyo marac adada. Kadi bed ni en otute matek me keto cwinye, nen atyer kamaleng ni en tye ka tute matek me lubu kore.
teo_prompt: Neautar aitetem akiro ngun, abu ngesi kogeu aiyalongong. Karaida abu ngesi iswama agogongu, apotu kojenutu ebe etiono ngesi aitodolikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza ni muzu drile, eri e'do i ama kililiru ku. Erini tro okpo 'bazu e'yo dria ma dria ra ti, eca e'da kililiru kini eri ri dri ciria e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okugaaniira ku kwayeyongyeire, akatandika kwehurira kubi munonga. Oihireho okuteeraho kwe kuguma ataire amaani, kikarebeka butunu ngu akaba nabonabonesibwa okugumizamu.

eng_prompt: I had planned to be there to support him during such a difficult time. Unfortunately, unforeseen circumstances prevented me from making the trip.
lug_prompt: Nnali ntegese okubeerawo okumuwagira mu kaseera kano akazibu. Eky'omukisa omubi, embeera ezitasuubirwa zannemesa okukola olugendo.
ach_prompt: Onongo atye ki yub me bedo tye me konye I kare man matek-ki. Ki gum marac, jami ma pe byek tye I komgi oweko pe atimo wot ne.
teo_prompt: Akapanakin eong ajaut kanu aigang ngesi kotoma apakio nuetioko. Nukaiturur, abu akiro nu mam eong aomit abu kimik eong alosit.
lgg_prompt: Ma otuta 'ye ndra aa'zu eri atizu sa'wa ewaru 'dileri ma alea. Drile onziru, e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi atri ma acizu ku.
nyn_prompt: Nkaba nyeteekateekire kubaho kumuyamba omu bwire bugumire nk'obwo. Eky'omugisha mubi, ebintu ebitaratebekanisiibwe bikanyemereza kukora orugyendo.

eng_prompt: After years of feeling a calling to serve his community, he realized that there was a growing need for a place of worship. Inspired by his vision of inclusivity and hope, he decided to open up a new church.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'awulira omulanga gw'okuweereza ekitundu kye, yakizuula nti waaliwo obwetaavu obweyongera obw'ekifo eky'okusinzizaamu. Ng'akubirizibwa okwolesebwa kwe okw'okuyingiza abantu bonna n'essuubi, yasalawo okuggulawo ekkanisa empya.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me winyo lwongo me tic pi lwak, en oniang ni tye miti madit tutwal pi kabedo me woro Lubanga. Ki cuku cwiny I kom neno mege me bedo ki dano weng ki gen, en omoko tamme me yabo kanica manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijaanakin itunga, abu ngesi koany ebe ejai eipuda lo aiboisit na ilipere. Kanuka aomisioitike naka aimorikikina keda amuno, abu ngesi koseu apukor ekanisa loitetet.
lgg_prompt: Eli alipi 'bori ma vutia 'bani eri omvezu azi ngazu ongulumu erivileri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, eri esu ra kini lezu pari inzizaniri ma ovu ra. Egata erini 'ba dria ma esele cozu azini asi'baza ma dria risi, eri asi'ba kanisa o'dini ma ti zizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okwetwa kuheereza abantu be, akeetegyereza ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'omwanya gw'okuramizamu. Ahabw'okushagikwa okworekwa kwe okw'abantu boona hamwe n'amatsiko, akasharamu kwiguraho ekanisa ensya.

eng_prompt: Due to ongoing safety concerns and local regulations, the event organizers have made a difficult decision. As a result, the bars will not be opened this year.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukuumi obugenda mu maaso n'ebiragiro by'ekitundu, abategesi b'omukolo bakoze okusalawo okukaluba. N'ekyavaamu, ebbaala tezijja kuggulwawo omwaka guno.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me gwoko kuc matye kawot anyim ki cik me tedero, luyub yub ne gumoko tam matek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, bar pe obuyabbe imwaka ni.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ayuwara na elosi akonye keda ikisila luka atutubet, eswamautu lu itemonokinak epucit aseunet na etiono noi. Kanuka ngun, mam eponio apukor ibaan okaru lo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ageitema ni mupi drile azini azita angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba e'yo otupi 'diyi 'du e'yo ewaru ni. E'yo 'disi, ba ngani pari ewa mvuzu 'diyi ma ti zi eli 'disi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eby'okwerinda ebirikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'ebiragiro by'omubyaro, abatebekanisa omukoro bakozire encwamu egumire. N'ekyarugiremu, amabaara tigarikwija kwigurwa omwaka ogu.
